sessions.sessionName: "Show Me the Impact": Where to Start When An Executive Needs a Data Story
sessions.sessionAbstract: As a Salesforce admin, you've got your system on lock, and everyone loves your reports and dashboards. But what happens when an executive knocks on your door, asking vague questions about organizational impact and what you can show her with Salesforce? This session will focus on telling great stories with data, teaching attendees how to mine through the vast haystack of their instance and pull out the needles that really matter. Attendees will walk away knowing how to tell a compelling data story geared at what C-levels care about, with Salesforce dashboards as their primary tool.

sessions.sessionName: (Work)Flows, Processes, Triggers & More... How to See the Forest for the Trees
sessions.sessionAbstract: On the surface, the Salesforce Platform provides incredibly powerful process automation tools, like Flows, Workflows, Processes, Triggers, Apex, and Approvals. But underneath, there is significant overlap in their capabilities. It can feel overwhelming if not impossible deciding what to use and when. Join Salesforce MVP, Jennifer Lee, and Salesforce Automation Expert, Shane McLaughlin, as they help you forge your trail to success. You'll learn why to use one tool versus another, how to manage your automation efforts as you grow, and how to untangle any messes along-the-way."

sessions.sessionName: 10 Free AppExchange Apps for a Big Pay Off
sessions.sessionAbstract: There are hundreds of free apps on AppExchange. Not sure which ones are right for your business? Join us for this fast-paced session to learn about 10 awesome free apps and how they can immediately add value to your business.

sessions.sessionName: 10 Free Salesforce Labs App to Help You Get Started Faster
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce Labs apps are apps built by Salesforce employees. They're free, customizable, and fast options to get you started with any business challenge. Learn about the most popular Labs Apps Admins are raving about.

sessions.sessionName: 10 Free Salesforce Labs App to Help You Get Started Faster
sessions.sessionAbstract: What's better than a free app? 10 Free apps! Come hear about 10 free Labs apps Admins are raving about. Salesforce Labs apps are free, customizable, and fast options to get you started solving any business challenge. Did we mention they are free?

sessions.sessionName: 101 Guide to Watson and Salesforce Today and What’s Coming
sessions.sessionAbstract: In March 2017, IBM and Salesforce announced a strategic partnership agreement to connect our artificial intelligence platforms (Watson and Einstein, respectively). In this session, you’ll learn about Watson services that are complementary to Einstein. In addition, see an example of how HearInsights is using Watson, the IBM Data Science Experience and Salesforce to automatically extract insights to improve client conversations and conversion rates.

sessions.sessionName: 13 Ways for a Small Business to Drive More Leads
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join Salesforce's all-star team of current and former digital marketers to learn how you can generate leads better and faster. Whether that means using SEO best practices, stepping up social media, conducting paid search, or using site optimization, this session will give you 13 tips on how you can immediately start driving more leads for your growing business.

sessions.sessionName: 3 Effective Ways to Supercharge Your B2B Social Marketing
sessions.sessionAbstract: Are you a B2B brand having trouble getting liftoff with your social efforts? Have you been told social doesn't work in B2B? Join this panel discussion with Social Studio customer who are not only getting B2B social right, but are excelling and seeing great results. We'll show you how to ramp up quickly by achieving small wins that build support for social in your organization. Learn how these two B2B social pioneers built their social programs, their lessons learned, best practices, and what you can start doing right away to bring social to the next level. You'll also hear about some not so typical uses of social listening, publishing, and engagement.

sessions.sessionName: 3 Steps to Sales Forecast Accuracy for Manufacturers
sessions.sessionAbstract: From Sales planning and demand forecasting, to inventory controls and supply chain management, accurate sales forecasts allow manufacturers to more efficiently manage virtually all aspects of their business. However, most sales forecasts are wrong - less than half the deals that are forecast to close, actually do. Learn specific tactics and techniques to boost your forecast accuracy and position your company for faster growth.

sessions.sessionName: 3 Strategies to Increase Partner Adoption and Engagement
sessions.sessionAbstract: Developing an effective channel sales strategy is critical for organizations looking to gain market share and enter new markets. Partner programs play a key role in aligning and incentivizing your channel to ensure a mutually beneficial relationship. Learn from channel sales leaders and industry analysts how to structure your channel programs in order to reduce conflict and maximize ROI.

sessions.sessionName: 3 Tips for a Mobile Salesforce: Amp Up your Field Sales
sessions.sessionAbstract: Field sales reps are always on the go, so it's important to have processes and solutions that keep up with their every move. In this session, learn how to maximize productivity of field sales reps with Inbox and Salesforce1.

sessions.sessionName: 3 Tips for the VP of Sales and Sales Strategy to Share a Brain
sessions.sessionAbstract: Access to useful data is the great equalizer in sales -- and increasingly that data resides within operations. It's the sales leader's job to partner with operations to ensure actionable insights are always within reach. In this story-filled session, Salesforce's SVP of Commercial Sales, SMB will discuss the processes and behaviors that make for an effective relationship between his leadership and their counterparts in field operations

sessions.sessionName: 3 Tips to Boost Rep Productivity with Salesforce Inbox (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: In the world of selling, time is money. Every second spent on administrative tasks is a second your reps could have invested in growing the business. Unfortunately, in today's digital-first world all too much of the average sales team's time is consumed by mundane tasks like scheduling meetings or replying to email. Join this session to learn how every sales rep on your team can get 25% more selling time back in their day with Salesforce Inbox.

sessions.sessionName: 3 Tips to Boost Sales Productivity With Salesforce Inbox (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: In the world of selling, time is money. Every second spent on administrative tasks is a second your reps could have invested in growing the business. Unfortunately, in today's digital-first world all too much of the average sales team's time is consumed by mundane tasks like scheduling meetings or replying to email. Join this session to learn how every sales rep on your team can get 25% more selling time back in their day with Salesforce Inbox.

sessions.sessionName: 3 Tips to Ensure Your Growing Business Can Maximize Each Salesforce Releases
sessions.sessionAbstract: Not sure about how to leverage Salesforce Releases to help your growing business? Overwhelmed with how to keep track of all our new features and functionality? Join us to learn best practices directly from one of our customers, on how they use Salesforce Releases to help propel their business forward.

sessions.sessionName: 3 Ways to Maximize your Service Cloud Agent Console
sessions.sessionAbstract: Every successful business needs stellar customer support, but it can be hard for small teams to keep up - enter Service Cloud. In this session, you'll experience how small support teams deliver big customer service through consoles. Whether you're a manufacturing company in the Midwest, a savvy tech startup in the Bay, or a fashion retailer in the Big Apple, Consoles can make servicing your customers quick and easy. We'll take a deep dive into side panels, macros, and quick actions and you'll take home tips to apply to your business today. Get ready to watch CSAT soar.

sessions.sessionName: 4 Obsessions to Nurture for Optimal Customization on Large Data Volume
sessions.sessionAbstract: As data volumes get larger, custom development becomes challenging due to issues related to performance and governor limits. However, this can be overcome with some simple design considerations, development tricks, best practices and debugging tips. In this session, I will share with you, the possible use cases you need to consider before designing or developing custom processes for LDV. I will also walk you through an enterprise design pattern which helped to increase the performance of a custom batch process by more than 200%.

sessions.sessionName: 4 Tips to Driving Pipeline Through Events
sessions.sessionAbstract: Events are becoming the most powerful tool in a demand generation arsenal because events are the only tactic that actively addresses and solves for current challenges facing the demand generation profession. In this session, you will learn the top 4 ways to successfully execute a flawless event and help drive pipeline for your sales team.

sessions.sessionName: 4 Trends High Performing Customer Service Teams are Embracing
sessions.sessionAbstract: Service is the new Sales, and you have to keep your customers happy if you want to rise to the top of the competition. Join Dan Ross, Salesforce's SVP of Commercial Sales, Small Business, as he discusses the 4 killer trends that high-performing service teams are embracing to bring in the revenue and create repeat business.

sessions.sessionName: 5 App Stacks You'll Want In Your Salesforce Org
sessions.sessionAbstract: Most Trailblazers use AppExchange apps (and we thank you), but wouldn't it be neat to know which apps they use and how they use them? Now you can see the app stacks created by customers, and not only that, the top app stacks voted on by customers. See these winning stacks on the big screen and even create your own at this session.

sessions.sessionName: 5 Best Practices for Integrating Salesforce and Gmail by Google
sessions.sessionAbstract: If there’s one thing sales teams can be sure of, it’s that productivity is the key to their success. Everyone from the chief executive to finance is hooked on to quota expectations, and when sales hits that quota– quickly –they become rockstars. Join us to learn the 5 best practices for integrating Salesforce and Gmail to enable your sales teams to be more productive and ‘always be closing'.

sessions.sessionName: 5 Best Practices for Integrating Salesforce and Outlook
sessions.sessionAbstract: If there’s one thing sales teams can be sure of, it’s that productivity is the key to their success. Everyone from the chief executive to finance is hooked on to quota expectations, and when sales hits that quota –quickly –they become rockstars. Join us to learn the 5 best practices for integrating Salesforce and Outlook to enable your sales teams to be more productive and ‘always be closing'.

sessions.sessionName: 5 Customizations Execs will Love in Lightning Experience
sessions.sessionAbstract: Want to impress your business leaders? We all know that Execs aren't the easiest to impress, so come join us while we explore 5 cool customizations that your Execs will absolutely love

sessions.sessionName: 5 Customizations Execs will Love in Lightning Experience
sessions.sessionAbstract: Want to impress your business leaders? We all know that Execs aren't the easiest to impress, so come join us while we explore 5 cool customizations that your Execs will absolutely love

sessions.sessionName: 5 Strategies to Get Sales Buy-In as a Marketer
sessions.sessionAbstract: In the current age of selling, the sales and marketing relationship has to be tighter than ever for your company to succeed, especially in small business. What's the most successful way to build this partnership? Join us to learn 5 key strategies to get sales buy-in as a marketer, so you can scale your business for success with the ultimate partnership!

sessions.sessionName: 5 Tips for Choosing When to Click Instead of Code
sessions.sessionAbstract: It used to be that writing code was the only way to address business requirements. Now there is the ability to address business challenges with declarative solutions, such as Visual Flow and Process Builder instead of programmatic methods. These declarative tools can be more efficient and easier to maintain by applying business logic but you also have to consider how these tools can handle evolving requirements and scale appropriately with factors like changing business processes and data storage extensions. In this session, you will learn about the pros and cons of declarative and programmatic solution approaches, finding the right balance of combining tools, and optimizing system capabilities that result in a solution that is easy to maintain, generic, and scalable.

sessions.sessionName: 5 Ways to Build Lightning Fast Components
sessions.sessionAbstract: Getting your Lightning Components to perform Lightning Fast might not be as hard as you think. Join this session to learn about how to get started and dramatically improve the performance of your components. Even if you've never created a Lightning Component, our goal is to help you walk away with the knowledge to start building the Lightning Components you've been dreaming of.

sessions.sessionName: 5 Ways to Get the Most Out of Your CRM Using Lightning
sessions.sessionAbstract: Lightning is the biggest change to hit to Salesforce in years. Join us to learn how to unlock all of the benefits that Lightning has to offer - from gaining better sales insights, to driving rep productivity, to increased adoption, you'll leave this session with tactical tips on how to extend the power of the Salesforce platform.

sessions.sessionName: 5 Ways Your Small Business Can Save Time with AI
sessions.sessionAbstract: The internet, cloud technology, mobility, artificial intelligence (AI)... These aren't just trends, but new directions. Imagine where your company would be if you hadn't embraced the ubiquity of the internet, or if you didn’t have 24/7 mobile access to your email and business applications. New technology helps companies add efficiency and smarts — and as a small business, you can't risk losing customers to your competition if they adapt before you do. Now it’s time to jump on board the AI train. Join this session to learn how your small business can — and should — save time with AI.

sessions.sessionName: 6 Things To Do With Influencers Besides Marketing
sessions.sessionAbstract: Unless you've been hiding under a rock for the last 5 years, you've heard of Influencer Marketing. While influencers can certainly help us get the word out about our products and services, marketing is just the tip of the iceberg. Influencers are masters of creativity, community, and communication. Why limit ourselves to just leveraging them as modern-day sandwich boards and instead take full advantage of their skills and insights? In this session, Gregarious Narain, serial entrepreneur and former VP of Product at Klout, will look at 6 winning strategies to engage influencers right now that give you an advantage over the competition - and the inside track with the most important influencers of all, your customers. Understand each technique, see examples, and learn how to put them to use immediately.

sessions.sessionName: 7 Big Time SEO Tactics for Small Businesses
sessions.sessionAbstract: You don't have to be an enterprise to compete on Google -- sure it helps, but small businesses can also come up big without a big budget. Learn how to rank on the keywords you want by being smarter and grittier with these new tactics that'll bring you rankings, traffic and conversions. Our speakers have seen it all -- with more than 50 years of SEO experience, you can trust that you'll walk away with actionable items that will have a impact on your business.

sessions.sessionName: 7 Principles of Success with Salesforce for Nonprofit, Higher Ed and K-12 (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce.org nonprofit and higher ed customers - Join us for an interactive discussion with other nonprofit customers to learn how to get and stay on the path to success with Salesforce. Getting and staying on the path to success is challenging as organizations grow more complex and the needs of your business users evolve. Join us to discuss how other customers have become successful through identifying executive sponsors, planning for growth, and dedicating resources to Salesforce.

sessions.sessionName: 7 Principles of Success with Salesforce for Nonprofit, Higher Ed and K-12 (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce.org nonprofit and higher ed customers - Join us for an interactive discussion with other nonprofit customers to learn how to get and stay on the path to success with Salesforce. Getting and staying on the path to success is challenging as organizations grow more complex and the needs of your business users evolve. Join us to discuss how other customers have become successful through identifying executive sponsors, planning for growth, and dedicating resources to Salesforce.

sessions.sessionName: 7 Steps in Building a Seamless Release Management Process
sessions.sessionAbstract: The rapidity of development is always overtaking the speed in which we can deploy. With more and more projects in the pipeline, this gap is growing wider and wider. This triggers a whole new thought about how to reinvent the deployment process. Learn in this session how to increase your release quality and how to identify errors at early stages of the delivery chain. You'll also walk away with an understand about how to diminish the deployment stream time for projects and features. Develop fast, deploy often!

sessions.sessionName: 7 Winning Apps Compete in the MEGA Demo Jam
sessions.sessionAbstract:
You're invited to the final epic, action-packed Dreamforce 2017 Demo Jam. All
week AppExchange partners have been competing for a place in the Mega Demo Jam. Now, the winners will compete once more with only three minutes to showcase the best of their apps with a real-time demo. The winner is chosen by you, the audience, and will be revealed by an exciting guest. Join us for this fast-paced, highly-anticipated match.

sessions.sessionName: A Beginner's Guide to Lightning Components
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join us to learn about Lightning Components! You’ll learn what they are, how you can use them, and our interactive demo will get you ready to implement Lightning Components on your own. No previous experience or coding skills are required.

sessions.sessionName: A FinTech Marketer's Guide to Disruption - One Customer Journey at a Time
sessions.sessionAbstract: FinTech brands are radically disrupting traditional financial services, including lending, payments, money transfers, crowd funding, asset management and more. It’s not just their own technologies and business models that are the secrets to their success. Savvy FinTechs like Upstart, the first lending platform to leverage AI and machine learning to transform the borrowing process, use Marketing Cloud to automate personalized 1-to-1 customer journeys to engage with customers at scale. Attend this session to learn how Upstart implemented over 20 unique customer journeys on Marketing Cloud to achieve 2x-4x conversions rates.

sessions.sessionName: A Peak Under the Hood: How Salesforce Scales Customer Success
sessions.sessionAbstract: Every small business gets to a point where it needs to scale its service model to support an ever-growing customer base. But where do you even start? How do you prioritize your investments? Join our Salesforce Customer Success team as we share some of our own learnings from scaling our customer programs. We'll share how we think about scaling and building programs that any business can use.

sessions.sessionName: A Sneak Peak Into the Future of Channel Sales (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Don’t manage partners, empower them! Join us to get a glimpse into the future of Partner Community’s new turnkey apps and features that will help partners onboard, market, and sell more, faster.

sessions.sessionName: A Strategic View of Salesforce's Product Roadmap: An AppExchange Partner's Guide
sessions.sessionAbstract: In this session, we'll take a high-level tour of Salesforce's product roadmap. We'll summarize the key elements of the roadmap, highlighting why they're important and the business opportunities they present for AppExchange Partners. This is not a deep-dive technical session; it's designed for busy Product Managers, Marketers, and business execs, who want to align their product strategy with Salesforce. #DF17Partners

sessions.sessionName: AAA's Journey to Digital Relevance
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Every business today has a digital footprint, whether they like it or not: it’s an expected channel of delivery and communication. But at AAA Carolinas, we weren’t driving engagement with our website. Our pain points ranged across security, UX, technology and even awareness. Our authentication mechanisms were outdated and a lack of self-serve maintenance was costing us time and money. To top it off, we knew nothing more about our members. It was very evident we needed to make a change.

Our Salesforce implementation was already underway. Our Travel business had begun using SFDC as a front-line, business tracking and development tool. We had committed to expanding to an enterprise-wide “360 View of the Customer” and were working diligently to forge a plan to bring it all together. Naturally, the SFDC Community cloud made sense as a capstone initiative. Its open architecture and declarative toolset would be a significant technology upgrade while allowing us to provide targeted, intuitive engagement.

It would be a monumental task. Our success hinged on the joint efforts of multiple teams and disciplines, all of whom turned out to be valuable assets. Our Salesforce professional services teammate (PA, Mark Braga) assisted in crafting a proof of concept and worked with IT on resource alignment. Our sales, support and marketing teams challenged the “we’ve never done it that way” approach as we worked to resolve data and process issues. Most significantly, our executive team embraced the project as a critical deliverable in our digital strategy.

At current state, we’re targeting an early August roll-out for the initial launch of our community and will adopt an agile strategy for future releases, with an eye on delivering several new features before Dreamforce 2017. That said, the impact is found in the big picture. The vision of Salesforce Clouds providing a unified approach AND an organization embracing a new technology stack to solve longstanding problems is a unique story that we hope to share.

As support to the commentary above, here’s an outline supporting the framework of our presentation. We look forward to your questions and feedback.

sessions.sessionName: ABM, AI and Influencer Marketing: The New Revenue Stack
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join Kirk Crenshaw, CMO at Traackr, and learn about the new "Revenue Stack" and how the combination of these three techniques have translated into accelerated pipeline, increased revenue and repeat customers. See an overview of his journey, what he learned along the way, and how it has aligned his company across departments, from Marketing to Sales to Customer Success.

sessions.sessionName: Accelerate Channel Sales with Sales Cloud PRM
sessions.sessionAbstract: Take the guesswork out of channel management. Make channel sales fast and easy with Sales Cloud PRM, an out-of-the-box partner relationship management solution built natively on the world's #1 CRM. Learn how leading companies are blending CRM and PRM to intelligently deliver training, content, and leads in a beautifully branded and mobile responsive experience with clicks, not code.

sessions.sessionName: Accelerate Incremental Code Deploys in Salesforce
sessions.sessionAbstract: Want to accelerate your code deployment? Then attend our session to accelerate your deployment by automatically deploying only what is changed, only selective files and exclude files from without deleting them from repository. Be the speed hero of your team!

sessions.sessionName: Accelerate Your Adoption of Lightning!
sessions.sessionAbstract: Do you want to accelerate adoption of Lighting within your organization? In this session we’ll show how custom Lightning components tailored to your specific business requirements drive user adoption, productivity, and revenue. We’ll demonstrate how to create compelling, custom business solutions using Skuid with Lightning in significantly less time.

sessions.sessionName: Accelerate Your Deal Cycles with Salesforce CPQ
sessions.sessionAbstract: Tired of spending hours in PDF's and Word Documents to simply send a quote to your prospect or customer? Join us to learn how Salesforce CPQ makes quoting streamlined and easier than ever, right within the opportunity workspace! Quoting now takes seconds, not days.

sessions.sessionName: Accelerating New Hire Sales Productivity: How Salesforce Quickly Ramps New Reps
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce onboards its new hire sales reps 29% faster, resulting in hundreds of millions of dollars in increased sales productivity. Smartly using Sales Cloud Lightning is one key to that success. We help you chart your own winning path in this interactive session featuring straight talk from our sales leaders, a behind-the-scenes virtual tour, and your roadmap to success.

sessions.sessionName: Accenture's Blueprint to Global Sales Excellence
sessions.sessionAbstract: Accenture is one of the world's largest consulting companies who have teams all over the world working on the same projects at the same time. Their CRM and legacy systems could not support their growing needs and it was time for a change. Join us to hear how the Sales and IT leaders from Accenture turned to Salesforce to implement the changes required to unify their high performing global sales team. You'll walk away with their blueprint and practical tips to help you on your journey too.

sessions.sessionName: Account Based Marketing with Einstein at Salesforce
sessions.sessionAbstract: Learn how salesforce uses our internal toolset to develop and go to market with account based marketing and account targeting strategies. Using Einstein, DMP, Ad Studio, CRM and the marketing cloud we will share and discuss strategy, tactics and results utilizing the Salesforce Platform.

sessions.sessionName: Achieve Operational Excellence: An Inside Look at the Enabled Sales Rep
sessions.sessionAbstract: According to Salesforce's annual State of Sales report, the average sales rep only spends 36% of their time actually selling. The other 66% is spent completing administrative work, traveling and other non-selling activities. Best in class customers are using Salesforce and its solutions to build backend operations that take back some of this valuable selling time. You won't want to miss this session as we explore what a Salesforce org looks like in the eyes of the sales rep when they have been completely enabled to spend more time selling and growing the revenue.

sessions.sessionName: Add Intelligence to Any Salesforce App with Einstein Discovery
sessions.sessionAbstract: Bring intelligence in the context of any Salesforce app thanks to the power of Einstein Discovery. Any Salesforce Admin or Developer can add in context prediction and prescription using a model created automatically by the machine.

sessions.sessionName: Adding Intelligence to Your Application with Einstein Prediction Builder
sessions.sessionAbstract: Einstein Prediction Builder, in the pilot in Winter ‘18, is the latest addition to Salesforce Einstein. It gives you the ability to add intelligence to custom applications built on the Force.com platform. Here we'll cover how to set up Einstein Prediction Builder and how to consume its output and the types of predictions that can be built using Einstein Prediction Builder. We'll also give a sneak peek at the Einstein Prediction Builder capabilities planned for the upcoming Spring ‘18 release.

sessions.sessionName: Adiós JS Monolito, Hola Lightning (Goodbye JS Monolith, Hello Lightning)
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Esta presentación será en Español.
Como desarrollador, quizá te encuentras analizando el impacto de las restricciones de LockerService en tus aplicaciones que sólo soportan Salesforce clásico. En esta sesión convertiremos una aplicación monolítica JavaScript en una aplicación Lightning compuesta de componentes modulares. Aprenderás a diseñar y codificar componentes Lightning y a incluirlos en una aplicación compatible con LockerService.



Please note this presentation will be in Spanish. 
As a developer you might be looking at the impact of LockerService restrictions on your legacy applications that only support Salesforce Classic. In this session we will go through the process of converting a monolithic JavaScript application into a Lightning application composed of highly modular components. You will learn how to design and code your Lightning components and how to include them in a LockerService compliant application.

sessions.sessionName: Admin Data Scientists in Action!
sessions.sessionAbstract: Any Admin can be a Citizen Data Scientist with Einstein! Come see what Trailblazers just like you have built with Einstein Analytics and get inspired on how you can transform your businesses with the power of Einstein. What these Admin Data Scientists have done with Einstein is so amazing, we are presenting them with special awards!

sessions.sessionName: Adopting Files and Enhanced Notes in Lightning Experience
sessions.sessionAbstract: In Winter ‘18, Salesforce began to phase out the Classic Notes & Attachments related lists in favor of feature-rich Lightning Files and Enhanced Notes. Lightning Files and Enhanced Notes support previews, versioning, external sharing, and are the standard for Lightning Experience. In this session you will learn to enable these features for your users, understand migration options for Classic Notes & Attachments, and explore workarounds to preserve shared files when Accounts, Contacts, and Leads get merged.

sessions.sessionName: Adopting Files and Enhanced Notes in Lightning Experience (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: In Winter ‘18, Salesforce began to phase out the Classic Notes & Attachments related lists in favor of feature-rich Lightning Files and Enhanced Notes. Lightning Files and Enhanced Notes support previews, versioning, external sharing, and are the standard for Lightning Experience. In this session you will learn to enable these features for your users, understand migration options for Classic Notes & Attachments, and explore workarounds to preserve shared files when Accounts, Contacts, and Leads get merged.

sessions.sessionName: Advance Your Team's CRM Adoption through Email Integration
sessions.sessionAbstract: Seeing some blank white fields where there should be rich account and opportunity data? Make it easy for teams to adopt Salesforce and get the most of it. In this session, learn how Salesforce Inbox can bridge the gap between Salesforce and the place where reps already surface tons of data: in their email inboxes.

sessions.sessionName: Advance Your Team's CRM Adoption through Email Integration (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Seeing some blank white fields where there should be rich account and opportunity data? Make it easy for teams to adopt Salesforce and get the most of it. sessions.sessionName: Advanced Report and Dashboard Administration with SOQL and the REST API
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join us and we'll show you how to dynamically filter reports, manage private reports with SOQL, and figure out which dashboards reference a report using the REST API.

sessions.sessionName: Advanced Reporting Tips and Tricks for New Admins
sessions.sessionAbstract: Are you a new Admin struggling to create reports for your team? Do you spend way too much time racking your brain trying to get data to present properly? You're not alone. Many beginner Admins spend hours trying to develop reports that should only take minutes to finish. This session will show you real examples of advanced reporting features that will make your job easier and provide greater value to your users. During this live demo you will learn how to use: Custom Summary Formulas, Cross Filters, Power of 1, Joined Reports, Buckets, and Custom Report Types. These tips will help you easily identify and present data, enable your marketing team to see Lead conversion rates and show sales reps revenue toward goal. The presentation will help you take your reporting game to the next level.

sessions.sessionName: Advanced Reporting Tips and Tricks for New Admins (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Are you a new Admin struggling to create reports for your team? Do you spend way too much time racking your brain trying to get data to present properly? You're not alone. Many beginner Admins spend hours trying to develop reports that should only take minutes to finish. This session will show you real examples of advanced reporting features that will make your job easier and provide greater value to your users. During this live demo you will learn how to use: Custom Summary Formulas, Cross Filters, Power of 1, Joined Reports, Buckets, and Custom Report Types. These tips will help you easily identify and present data, enable your marketing team to see Lead conversion rates and show sales reps revenue toward goal. The presentation will help you take your reporting game to the next level.

sessions.sessionName: Advertising Studio Product Roadmap
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join the Advertising Studio product management team to learn about key trends in digital advertising and how Advertising Studio is evolving to help the data-driven marketer drive intelligent 1-to-1 advertising. Get key insights into the Advertising Studio roadmap straight from the source, share product feedback, and ask questions during this interactive session.

sessions.sessionName: AI, IoT, & Salesforce: Building intelligent, customer focused device strategies
sessions.sessionAbstract: Artifical Intelligence and the Internet of things have changed the way customers interacteract with businesses. During this session you learn more more about how Einstein and IoT Cloud, together, can help you better connect with your customers.

sessions.sessionName: Alexa, how is our team is doing?
sessions.sessionAbstract: We created a voice interface to Salesforce! Using Agile Accelerator, Heroku, Force.com and Alexa technologies we automated common scrum team tasks. Things like creating stories, projecting team velocity and getting a snapshot of overall team health are now Alexified. This session will provide and in-depth look at the technical design behind this innovation, demo the current capabilities of the tool, and provide ideas for generalizing and extending the capability to other areas of a Salesforce org.

sessions.sessionName: Aligning Your Organization Around Customer Experience
sessions.sessionAbstract: Marketing is now squarely in charge of executing personalized, differentiated customer experiences. Top marketers are beginning to re-align their teams to support these initiatives. Gone are siloed channels. In are cross-channel and cross-functional teams focused awareness, onboarding, engagement and retention. In this session, Beachbody will discuss how they are re-defining themselves to re-define the customer experience.

sessions.sessionName: Always be Collaborating - Connecting Customers and Work-Flows Using Cisco Spark
sessions.sessionAbstract: Learn how the Cisco Spark cloud collaboration platform is ready to super-charge your Salesforce work-flows. Get the latest details on available Cisco and Salesforce integrations and features, check out the awesome Sparkboard and Spark video endpoints, and be intrigued by powerful use-cases using Spark REST APIs and mobile/web video SDKs.

sessions.sessionName: Amazing Customer Service: Turn Your Contact Center into a Profit Center
sessions.sessionAbstract: In 2016 $64B USD was lost due to either poor or average customer service delivery – up 53% from the prior year. Those numbers might bake you think customer service is getting worse, but it’s not. It’s getting better. What’s happening is that best-in-class companies are setting a higher standard and expectation that many companies, while improving, are not able to meet. In this session, you will learn from service industry expert, Shep Hyken, how every customer care interaction is a Moment of Truth which can easily be turned into a Moment of Magic® by simply providing service that is just a little better than expected. Discover the top trending customer experience expectations along with the technologies required to make your brand a leading trailblazer in customer care. You’ll walk away with the ability to make instant changes to your service organization, designed to turn your contact center into a profit center.

sessions.sessionName: Amazon: How We Built the Worlds Biggest Pardot Instance
sessions.sessionAbstract: How do you deploy governance in a Marketing Automation platform at a global Enterprise scale? Join Elliot Pearl-Sacks, Amazon Product Manager, as he talks through how Amazon Seller Services navigated complex business requirements, multiple business units, and detailed reporting needs while deploying Pardot in under three months.

sessions.sessionName: Amplify Prospect Engagement Like Never Before
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Learn how to captivate prospects and drive engagement like a pro. Pardot's Engagement Studio is the latest and greatest marketing automation tool, effortlessly empowering you to take your marketing to the next level. Whether you're an Engagement Studio beginner or an experienced user, you'll
leave this session with actionable takeaways for use in your own marketing strategy.

sessions.sessionName: An Admin Roadmap to a Clean Org
sessions.sessionAbstract: Do you have 400 custom fields on an Object? More than 20 installed packages? Page layouts running wild? No idea what maps to which tool and how to tell where data is coming from? I've been there, done that AND can walk you through all of the steps to identify the areas of cleanup in your Org to make it the lean, mean, data-crushing machine that you have always envisioned. In this session, I'll walk you through; identifying problem data types, migrating data, how to handle the backup, documentation and process of change management as you clean up your Org!

sessions.sessionName: An Admin's Guide to git
sessions.sessionAbstract: Does version control make you think of blinking cursors and command lines? There is another way! Join Kevin to cut through the jargon and harness the power of git with Gearset. You’ll learn how to supercharge your deployments with continuous integration and version control, all with a few clicks. #Awesome!

sessions.sessionName: An Inside View of Application Architecture
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce lets you connect to your customer in a whole new way. But how does Salesforce's software really work under the hood? In this talk, Salesforce Software Architect and author of the popular Medium blog "The Architecture Files", Ian Varley, provides you an inside understanding of what makes Salesforce tick from database design to product and release architecture across our product clouds. We'll cover the gamut of essential approaches that make our multi-tenant architecture so powerful, with concrete lessons to improve your organization's setup and performance, so you can be smarter and more predictive about each and every customer.

sessions.sessionName: An Introduction to Heroku Connect
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join us to learn how Heroku Connect provides high volume, bi-directional data flow between your customer apps and Salesforce. The challenges of data synchronization are managed by Heroku Connect, creating maintenance-free data integration. Now, you can have unified customer data between your applications and Salesforce with a single system of record.

sessions.sessionName: An Introduction to Lightning Communities & Community Builder
sessions.sessionAbstract: Communities gives you a whole new way to leverage the power of your CRM, enabling customers, partners, and employees to access your Salesforce data and business processes — in an engaging, branded experience. Learn how to use Lightning components, themes, CMS Connect and Community Builder to create a custom digital experience.

sessions.sessionName: Analytics & Salesforce: How Salesforce Uses Einstein Analytics to Sell Smarter
sessions.sessionAbstract: See how sales leaders at Salesforce use Einstein Analytics to track and forecast pipeline, coach teams, and get a 360-degree view of all accounts, enabling everyone to sell faster and smarter.

sessions.sessionName: Analytics for Sales Operations
sessions.sessionAbstract: Your sales ops teams spend all day mining through data to help the field perform. With Einstein Analytics, sales ops can take insight to the next level — come hear from Square on how they're transforming their Sales organization with Einstein Analytics, making their sales teams smarter and helping them close bigger, better and more strategic deals.

sessions.sessionName: Analytics Roadmap: A Sneak Peek at New Features and Future Roadmap (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Salesforce Analytics is seeing rapid global adoption as companies everywhere are demanding mobile, actionable analytics that are embedded in the business process allowing employees to be smarter about their customers. We have disrupted the analytics industry with Analytic Apps for every business function from Marketing, Sales, Service and everything in between. 

Come join us to to see how Einstein Analytics will continue to change the game by delivering the power of Autonomous Analytics to everyone 

1) Accelerate your journey from zero to insights with smart Wave Apps that help understand not just what has happened but why it happened and what could happen in the future 
2) Use Einstein Analytics and the power of machine learning to discover unbiased insights and explanations from millions of data combinations in minutes using smart data discovery without needing advanced training 
3) Deliver unbiased actionable insights the way your business stakeholders like ... in the form of automated storytelling and presentations (NLG) 
4) Smart Data Prep

sessions.sessionName: Analytics Roadmap: A Sneak Peek at New Features and Future Roadmap (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Salesforce Analytics is seeing rapid global adoption as companies everywhere are demanding mobile, actionable analytics that are embedded in the business process allowing employees to be smarter about their customers. We have disrupted the analytics industry with Analytic Apps for every business function from Marketing, Sales, Service and everything in between. 

Come join us to to see how Einstein Analytics will continue to change the game by delivering the power of Autonomous Analytics to everyone 

1) Accelerate your journey from zero to insights with smart Wave Apps that help understand not just what has happened but why it happened and what could happen in the future 
2) Use Einstein Analytics and the power of machine learning to discover unbiased insights and explanations from millions of data combinations in minutes using smart data discovery without needing advanced training 
3) Deliver unbiased actionable insights the way your business stakeholders like ... in the form of automated storytelling and presentations (NLG) 
4) Smart Data Prep

sessions.sessionName: Analytics, GSuite, & Lightning Creates the Perfect Storm for User Transformation
sessions.sessionAbstract: The Verizon Wireless Business Group (WBG) were looking for that perfect storm to transform Salesforce adoption. Learn how seeding customer change with innovation labs and usability studies enabled WBG to create a whole new experience with Lightning Express, Goggle Suite, and Wave.

sessions.sessionName: Anomaly Detection for Performance Data Using Einstein Analytics
sessions.sessionAbstract: This presentation covers models that could help cloud based companies implement solutions analyzing system data from Salesforce and other sources. We will explore the anomaly detection process on important performance metrics comparing the observed value vs. prediction. When detected, we will generate near real time alerts. With just a few steps, we can visualize data created using predictive analytics and share them via Salesforce Wave dashboard throughout the organization.

sessions.sessionName: AppExchange Apps for High-Performance Customer Engagement
sessions.sessionAbstract: Struggling to find the right path to engage customers? Salesforce Research's fourth annual State of Marketing report determined that high-performing marketers are more likely to address four key areas: customer journey alignment, data integration, artificial intelligence, and channel coordination. In this session, you'll learn about several AppExchange apps that can help you tackle these specific areas and deliver high-performance marketing.

sessions.sessionName: AppExchange Demo Jam for Admins
sessions.sessionAbstract: You're invited to an epic, action-packed Demo Jam where six partners will have only three minutes to showcase the best of their admin app with a real-time demo. The winner is chosen by you, the audience. Join us for this fast-paced, highly-anticipated match where Salesforce partners face off.

sessions.sessionName: AppExchange Demo Jam for Customer Service
sessions.sessionAbstract: You're invited to an epic, action-packed Demo Jam where six partners will have only three minutes to showcase the best of their customer service app with a real-time demo. The winner is chosen by you, the audience. Join us for this fast-paced, highly-anticipated match where Salesforce partners face off.

sessions.sessionName: AppExchange Demo Jam for Sales
sessions.sessionAbstract: You're invited to an epic, action-packed Demo Jam where six partners will have only three minutes to showcase the best of their sales app with a real-time demo. The winner is chosen by you, the audience. Join us for this fast-paced, highly-anticipated match.

sessions.sessionName: AppExchange Demo Jam for Small Business
sessions.sessionAbstract: You're invited to an epic, action-packed Demo Jam where six app builders will have only three minutes to showcase the best of their small business app with a real-time demo. The winner is chosen by you, the audience. Join us for this fast-paced, highly-anticipated match where Salesforce partners face off.

sessions.sessionName: AppExchange Developers Demo Jam
sessions.sessionAbstract: You're invited to an epic, action-packed Demo Jam where six partners will have only three minutes to showcase the best of their developer app with a real-time demo. The winner is chosen by you, the audience. Join us for this fast-paced, highly-anticipated match where Salesforce partners face off!

sessions.sessionName: AppExchange for Admins: Apps Every Admin Should Know
sessions.sessionAbstract: AppExchange is an admin's secret weapon. Join us to hear customers dig into some of the key challenges Admins face and the AppExchange apps, mostly free (and a few paid), that have helped admins power solutions for every challenge and department.

sessions.sessionName: AppExchange for Everyone: Everything you need to know about the AppExchange
sessions.sessionAbstract: AppExchange is the complete, one-stop shop for everything you need to extend Salesforce into every department and industry. Whether you have been using AppExchange for 10 years or haven't installed your first app, you won't want to miss this session. Be the first to see what's new as we introduce new products that you can now find on the AppExchange. And we'll show new ways to find the right solution to solve your business challenges easily and quickly.

sessions.sessionName: Are You an Imposter? OWN IT!
sessions.sessionAbstract: I'm not good enough. I don't know as much as everyone else. What if someone asks me a question and I don’t know the answer? Does your inner voice ever say things like this? Mine has, plenty of times. Join me to learn about Imposter syndrome, how it affected me, and what I've learned from other Salesforce professionals who have dealt with these feelings. I'll share tips I've used to overcome these negative thoughts that held me back in my career, and how facing your fears and relying on the Salesforce community can help you succeed.

sessions.sessionName: Artificial Intelligence Is Shaping the Future of Customer Service
sessions.sessionAbstract: Artificial intelligence has reached a stage in which systems can have increasingly engaging and human conversations, allowing businesses to leverage the inexpensive and wide-reaching technology to engage with customers. Join us as we discuss how AI is affecting our industry and highlight ways you can start to take advantage to deliver a smarter customer experience leveraging the world's #1 intelligent customer service platform.

sessions.sessionName: ASC 606 - Preparing for the New Revenue Recognition Standard (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: The deadlines for the new revenue recognition standard are coming up quickly for private and public companies alike. Finance and IT teams are working furiously to get ready. Join Salesforce CPQ and Connor Group to learn more about ASC 606, how it impacts your sales and revenue operations, and what you need to do to prepare your data and systems.

sessions.sessionName: At Lightning Speed: How Google's Leveraged Lightning for Channel Sales
sessions.sessionAbstract: Google’s Channel teams needed a world class trade promotion management system to scale with their launches of innovative new products and exceptional demand. Google partnered with Accenture to build a 100% Lightning Experience trade promotion management solution for their channel sales organization in weeks rather than months using Agile methodology.

sessions.sessionName: Aurora Health Care's Remedy for Patient Engagement and Wellness
sessions.sessionAbstract:
When it comes to our health, many of us have a 'get sick, get fixed' attitude. We seldom think about our relationships with health care providers--until the symptoms start to appear. Aurora Health Care believes there is a better way: Why not help our customers and communities remain healthy from the start? And when health care services are needed, why not make the patient experience simple and painless before, during and after care? 

Join this session to hear directly from Aurora's marketing leaders about their digital marketing strategy for 15 hospitals, 150 clinics and over one million patients. Discover how Aurora uses email for health and wellness journeys, and has achieved amazing app and web portal adoption results. From basic use cases to long-term patient journeys, you'll get practical tips and fresh ideas for digital engagement.

sessions.sessionName: Automate Business Processes Now with a Low-Code, Enterprise-Grade Platform
sessions.sessionAbstract: Businesses rely on efficient interactions of people, processes and technology - back-office operations, working with business partners, or serving customers. In this session you’ll learn how you can quickly and easily build processes - with the Salesforce platform and low-code Boomi Flow (formerly ManyWho) - to truly connect your business.

sessions.sessionName: Automate Critical Business Processes Without Any Code
sessions.sessionAbstract: Lightning Process Builder continues to unleash the power of workflow for non-developers. Join us as customers and the Salesforce product team share how to automate your business without writing a single line of code.

sessions.sessionName: Automating Delivery of Large Scale Salesforce Projects
sessions.sessionAbstract: How Salesforce IT automates the entire development lifecycle in an AGILE based delivery framework

sessions.sessionName: Automotive’s Digital Future: Driving Transformation with AI-Driven CRM
sessions.sessionAbstract: Customers today demand more out of their automotive experiences. Beyond sleek leather interiors and moonroofs, customers now expect digitally connected experiences. The race is on: Automakers and retailers need to deliver digital, personalized services if they want to win in our connected world. Learn how industry leaders are using Salesforce to drive digital transformation to redefine the ultimate customer experience.

sessions.sessionName: Banking on the Future: Banking Innovation Delivered on the Salesforce Platform
sessions.sessionAbstract: Learn how Banking IT is driving the future with innovation on the Salesforce Platform. From Heroku, through Bitcoin, we're seeing incredible innovation that enables IT trailblazers to create the Bank of the Future.

sessions.sessionName: Be a Big Data Champion with Big Objects and Async SOQL
sessions.sessionAbstract: The shape of data is changing. Regular Objects simply don’t scale up to the world of big data, where the capture, storage and analysis can be too expensive and complex, like storing historical records. Big Objects are Salesforce’s answer to this challenge, allowing you to store billions of records in your org without affecting storage limits - and Async SOQL lets you process these huge data sets! Learn in this session the basics of Big Objects and how to create them. We'll walk you through a full process from moving a custom object to a Big Object and how to make further use of it using Async SOQL. Become a Big Data Champion for your org!

sessions.sessionName: Beat Governor Limits By Taking Your Compute Processes to Heroku
sessions.sessionAbstract: “Apex CPU time limit exceeded” - a phrase that strikes terror into the hearts of Apex developers. Learn how to build and connect to a secure, scalable, stateless Heroku app that makes light work of complex and high volume calculations. We’ll share our code, and the lessons we learned along the way.

sessions.sessionName: Become a Data Management Rockstar
sessions.sessionAbstract: Understand how simple concepts, such as naming standards and validation rules, can have a positive impact on data. We will also discuss best practices for using Salesforce functionality and tools that can positively impact effective data management.

sessions.sessionName: Become a Data Management Rockstar for Nonprofit, Higher Ed and K-12 (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce.org nonprofit and higher ed customers - Join us for an interactive discussion with other nonprofit customers to gain an understanding around Data management and it's challenges which impacts all areas of your organization. Determine not only what features are available but also the best practices for using Salesforce functionality for effective data management. Employ the right tools to ensure that you keep your data clean and enriched.

sessions.sessionName: Become a Data Management Rockstar for Nonprofit, Higher Ed and K-12 (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce.org nonprofit and higher ed customers - Join us for an interactive discussion with other nonprofit customers to gain an understanding around Data management and it's challenges which impacts all areas of your organization. Determine not only what features are available but also the best practices for using Salesforce functionality for effective data management. Employ the right tools to ensure that you keep your data clean and enriched.

sessions.sessionName: Become a Salesforce Einstein Analytics Evangelist
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join us for a break from the daily routine and learn how to become a Salesforce Analytics Evangelist within your org, know the analytics landscape and the future outlook, get to know key approaches to design and implementation, and learn about guiding assets available for your analytics journey.

sessions.sessionName: Become an Admin Rockstar with Einstein
sessions.sessionAbstract: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is transforming the world around us and becoming ever more engrained in our day to day interactions. It's building momentum in our daily culture - from our shopping experiences, to how we converse with our customers, to how we engage with the very devices in our own homes. But what is this world of AI, and how do we transform a seemingly intangible concept to tactile benefits that we can take home with us and apply in real life scenarios?

sessions.sessionName: Become an Admin Rockstar with Einstein (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is transforming the world around us and becoming ever more engrained in our day to day interactions. It's building momentum in our daily culture - from our shopping experiences, to how we converse with our customers, to how we engage with the very devices in our own homes. But what is this world of AI, and how do we transform a seemingly intangible concept to tactile benefits that we can take home with us and apply in real life scenarios?

sessions.sessionName: Behind Dreamforce: How Quip Enables Event Execution
sessions.sessionAbstract: Every year the George P. Johnson Experience Marketing team runs the biggest business conference in the world. Running an event of this magnitude requires unparalleled levels of coordination and collaboration. Learn how GPJ uses Quip to coordinate Dreamforce, manage production meetings, and stay connected with day-of contractors. In this session, you'll learn how Quip can be used to breakdown communication silos, maximize productivity, and align your team to achieve their goals.

sessions.sessionName: Best in Class Social Listening
sessions.sessionAbstract: Get the knowledge you need to build an effective Social Listening program today! Join us as we dig deep into Social Listening use cases and best practices. We'll be talking form as well as function, touching on the technical aspects of building building search queries and retrieving relevant conversations to your brand. You'll learn how to turn insights into action for any campaign, sale or service opportunity.

sessions.sessionName: Best Practice in Change Management: Service Transformation at Dell EMC
sessions.sessionAbstract: Change can be tricky. (No, ‘tricky’ is not the name of a new Salesforce mascot.) Program executives, consultants and implementation teams sooner or later face these pivotal questions: How to do it? When to begin? What to consider? At Dell EMC we mapped out an end-to-end approach right from the start. Here’s what we learned undertaking service transformation on an enterprise-scale. Align change management with your roadmap and view it with the same horizon. Be ready to change, pivot and optimize your strategy to conditions as they arise. Track success not just in numbers. Track it in the improved processes, team collaboration, and exceptional customer experience that ultimately impacts return on investment. Join us for a journey into change management best practice, and how do it.

sessions.sessionName: Best Practices for Email Marketing
sessions.sessionAbstract: Take your email program to new heights! In this session, our panel of experts will share tips, tricks and best practices related to email marketing. We will hear from some customers who have been hands on in Email Studio and Content Builder. They will share what they have learned and how they are becoming a lot more efficient in creating targeted emails. Also, Email Studio product managers will provide a tour of the latest funcationality that you should be utilizing today.

sessions.sessionName: Best Practices for Email Marketing
sessions.sessionAbstract: Take your email program to new heights! In this session, our panel of experts will share tips, tricks and best practices related to email marketing. We will hear from some customers who have been hands on in Email Studio and Content Builder. They will share what they have learned and how they are becoming a lot more efficient in creating targeted emails. Also, Email Studio product managers will provide a tour of the latest funcationality that you should be utilizing today.

sessions.sessionName: Best Practices to Setup and Deploy Sales Cloud PRM (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Sales Cloud PRM makes personalizing the tools and information partners need to sell smarter and faster easy. Attendees will learn how to setup and deploy the suite of out-of-the-box PRM functionality including Partner Programs and Levels, MDF/Co-op, and Lead Distribution built natively in this turnkey app. And one of our customers will demonstrate how you can leverage its AI-powered Video Management and Learning Engagement all in a suite of Lightning components to onboard your partners better and faster than ever.

sessions.sessionName: Best Thing I Ever Built on AppExchange: My Career
sessions.sessionAbstract: AppExchange is not only the Salesforce Store where you can find everything you need to extend Salesforce, but also a a catalyst for rapid career growth. Time and time again, we hear how admins are leveraging the skill set and community on AppExchange to propel their careers. Come get inspired and hear the adventures (and lessons learned) first hand from admins who used AppExchange to transform from an ‘accidental admin’ to someone with a seat at the executive table.

sessions.sessionName: Beyond the Sale: Turning Shoppers into Brand Advocates (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Today?s connected shopper expects a unified experience not just across commerce channels but at every touchpoint throughout their journey with the brand. A great overall experience can create powerful brand advocates; a poor or disconnected one can yield the opposite. In this track, learn how Salesforce?s complete Shopper Success Platform, including Service Cloud and Commerce Cloud, can connect commerce to customer service, communities, and other aspects to provide a unified customer experience.

sessions.sessionName: Beyond the Sale: Turning Shoppers into Brand Advocates (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Today?s connected shopper expects a unified experience not just across commerce channels but at every touchpoint throughout their journey with the brand. A great overall experience can create powerful brand advocates; a poor or disconnected one can yield the opposite. In this track, learn how Salesforce?s complete Shopper Success Platform, including Service Cloud and Commerce Cloud, can connect commerce to customer service, communities, and other aspects to provide a unified customer experience.

sessions.sessionName: Blaze a Trail to Predictive Selling with Einstein Intent
sessions.sessionAbstract: Give every representative a personal Data Scientist in their hand. Your data is information that Einstein can turn into knowledge - knowledge that will help you and your customers be more successful. Using data already in Salesforce, we will train an Einstein Intent model to suggest upsell and cross-sell opportunities based on past behavior. Attendees will learn how to build an app which can train a model using Salesforce data, send it to Einstein for prediction, and integrate the results back into the app.

sessions.sessionName: Blaze a Trail: Starting an Implementation with a Good Compass Bearing
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Think chemical companies lag in digital innovation? Not Eastman. They used the design principles of customer-focused processes to roll out a global solution to 1,000 users in less than 4 months, almost entirely with out-of-the-box functionality. Then the company supercharged their users with Einstein Analytics.
 Come hear how Eastman increased rep productivity and the accuracy of management reporting to allow Sales Reps to focus on serving their customers uncommonly well.

sessions.sessionName: Blockchain: The Cost of Trust
sessions.sessionAbstract: Business transactions are based on trust. Distributed ledger technologies like Blockchain reimagine trust in a world of global digital transactions. Join us to examine how distributed ledger technology has the power to transform healthcare, global logistics, contracts, the gig-economy, manufacturing and more by laying a new foundation for trust and commerce in the digital age.

sessions.sessionName: Blueprint for Account-Based Marketing: How Small Companies Can Succeed at ABM
sessions.sessionAbstract: Many small companies question the commitment and viability of account based marketing for their sales and marketing strategy, but the advantages of ABM can give smaller companies the competitive advantage they need to compete with larger companies in the marketplace. A five time Salesforce and Pardot customer with both large and small companies, Christine Olivas will offer valuable insight for small companies who may be financially hesitant to implement an ABM strategy. Christine will pull from her own experience and provide use-cases for marketers to leverage ABM tools (like Engagio and Terminus) on top of powerful database tools (like Salesforce and Pardot) to create more efficient processes for leaner sales and marketing teams.

sessions.sessionName: Blueprint for Account-Based Marketing: How Small Companies Can Succeed At ABM(1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Many small companies question the commitment and viability of account based marketing for their sales and marketing strategy, but the advantages of ABM can give smaller companies the competitive advantage they need to compete with larger companies in the marketplace. A five time Salesforce and Pardot customer with both large and small companies, Christine Olivas will offer valuable insight for small companies who may be financially hesitant to implement an ABM strategy. Christine will pull from her own experience and provide use-cases for marketers to leverage ABM tools (like Engagio and Terminus) on top of powerful database tools (like Salesforce and Pardot) to create more efficient processes for leaner sales and marketing teams.

sessions.sessionName: BMC's Approach to Lightning Success for the Large Enterprise
sessions.sessionAbstract: Moving to Lightning can seem like setting up a new implementation vs an upgrade. BMC took the Lightning transition as an opportunity to incorporate this initiative as part of their Digital Transformation story. They involved the end users in their transition plan and have moved over half of their org, 1200 users, to the next generation of Salesforce. Learn their methodology and leave with actionable steps to implement a plan in your organization.

sessions.sessionName: Boost Adoption and Turn Sales Cloud into Your Team's Favorite System
sessions.sessionAbstract: To get the full benefit of Salesforce, your team has to actually use it. It's a simple concept, but sometimes it's not so simple to accomplish. If your sales reps' adoption isn't where you want it, come learn how you can get things back on track and turn Salesforce into their most valued sales system.

sessions.sessionName: Boost Your App's Performance with Platform Cache
sessions.sessionAbstract: Do you want a faster, more dependable app built on Salesforce? Platform Cache allows developers to specify what to cache and how long, no custom objects or or overloaded view state required! See how you can boost the speed and reliability of your app and improve performance with Platform Cache.

sessions.sessionName: Boston Scientific Delivers Next Level Adoption with Lightning
sessions.sessionAbstract: Boston Scientific are Lightning trailblazers. Not only have they future proofed their investment in Salesforce with Lightning, they are also seeing outstanding Lightning and Salesforce1 adoption by all their Sales users accross divisions. Come learn how they locked in next level productivity with Lightning.

sessions.sessionName: Breaking BPM Out of the CRM Silo: Enterprise Automation for Everyone
sessions.sessionAbstract: To win in today's market, your business has to move fast, and automation is the key. But few tools can reach beyond the traditional silos of their CRM. This session introduces Salesforce's approach to BPM and demonstrates the ease with you you can extend automation to any department, app, or employee.

sessions.sessionName: Bring Einstein's Language Skills into Your Org with Process Builder
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Einstein can analyze and classify any text field in any object in Salesforce. 
Learn how to request that analysis using Process Builder. 
Use Process Builder to give feedback to Einstein when users disagree with the classification, so your model gets smarter over time. 
Most importantly, learn how to create custom models so that data in your org from the past can predict the future.

sessions.sessionName: Bring Users With You on The Trail to Lightning
sessions.sessionAbstract: Lightning is the future of Salesforce. New features and functionality come to Lightning every release that aren't available in Classic, so it is time to make the switch. We have to form a plan to move our users to Lightning, including long-time Classic users. Join me as l share how to build out a change management strategy with Lightning in mind, including some key takeaways to help you convince your most reluctant users to embrace the change.

sessions.sessionName: Build Applications on Financial Services Cloud
sessions.sessionAbstract: Are you ready to tap into the multi-billion dollar Financial Services market? Salesforce released its first industry cloud "Financial Services Cloud" in early 2016 and since then has gained significant momentum. In this session, you'll learn how to extend Financial Services Cloud using a step-by-step approach. We'll provide an architectural overview, code samples, and best practices to package and distribute your application. This session is a must-see for any partner wishing to extend and complement the Financial Services Cloud. #DF17Partners

sessions.sessionName: Build Custom Setup Apps & Config Tools with the All-New Apex Metadata API
sessions.sessionAbstract: Building an app is not enough. To really win over your customers and empower your admins, a great app should have a superior setup, customization, and upgrade experience. The Apex Metadata API now gives developers access to metadata through Apex, making it easier than ever to develop and deliver these setup experiences. This feature is the most popular Apex idea on IdeaExchange - no developer will want to miss this session!

sessions.sessionName: Build Efficient Processes: The Admin's Guide to the Developer Console
sessions.sessionAbstract: Why isn't my workflow, validation rule, or process working? Help is at hand in the Developer Console. Join us to learn how to read debug logs so you can see what's happening when you update or create a record. We'll also share top tips on creating efficient processes to limit process chaining and issues with governor limits.

sessions.sessionName: Build Einstein Analytics Apps for the AppExchange
sessions.sessionAbstract: IDC reports that the big data and the analytics market will grow to $203 billion over the next few years. Join us in this session to learn how easy it is to build and resell Analytics Cloud Apps on the AppExchange. We'll cover packaging, license management, dependencies, security reviews, design, and architecture. This session is a must-attend for any current and potential partners looking to expand their portfolio with offerings on Analytics Cloud. #DF17Partners

sessions.sessionName: Build Einstein Analytics Powered Applications
sessions.sessionAbstract: Leverage Einstein Analytics rich set of integration services to build powerful Apps...

sessions.sessionName: Build High-Compliance Apps with Speed and Trust
sessions.sessionAbstract: Patient care is transforming with digital solutions that put user-experience in the hands of doctors, patients, and healthcare providers. But regulatory and compliance needs often slow down innovation. Learn how Salesforce Heroku Shield enables Health and life Sciences to build HIPAA and PCI compliant apps.

sessions.sessionName: Build Live Apps to Extend Quip
sessions.sessionAbstract: The Quip Platform enables partners to extend the functionality of Quip with interactive, custom built Live Apps. Learn the steps needed to get started building apps and templates that can be embedded directly into Quip documents. Hear from partners first-hand on their experience building Quip Live Apps. #DF17Partners

sessions.sessionName: Build on the Quip Platform
sessions.sessionAbstract: Integrate and innovate by building on the Quip platform. The Quip API enables you to automate processes and integrate Quip with other products you or your company uses. Come and learn how easy it is to build on the platform to make the most of Quip, and allow your team to work smarter and faster by integrating the other tools they use most.

sessions.sessionName: Build Powerful 360 Customer Views with Einstein Analytics Connectors
sessions.sessionAbstract: Using Einstein Analytics broad set of Connectors, customers can create compelling 360 customer views. This session will showcase the Connector, Data Prep and complex visualization capabilities of Einstein Analytics. Marketing professionals can gain end to end visibility into campaign effectiveness - from Google Analytics online campaign to paying customer.

sessions.sessionName: Build Self-configuring Apps with the Apex Metadata API
sessions.sessionAbstract: One size rarely fits all, and customers routinely tweak and extend apps to suit their specific business needs. Thanks to the Apex Metadata API, ISVs can now build smarter apps that configure themselves and empower Admin Heroes with custom setup UIs. We’ll share code, best practices for maintaining trust and security, and advise you on how to take full advantage of this exciting new technology!

sessions.sessionName: Build vs. Buy: Tips to Create the Perfect App Strategy
sessions.sessionAbstract: We all know that apps boost productivity, but how do you know when to build vs. buy? Discover best practices from leading companies who scaled through hyper growth by building apps with Salesforce Platform and installing apps from AppExchange.

sessions.sessionName: Build Your Own Jaw-dropping Salesforce Chrome Extension
sessions.sessionAbstract: Do you know that Salesforce APIs and Chrome extensions are a dream team? Come and learn about what a Chrome Extension is made of and how to build it. You'll learn the building blocks around authorizing it with your Salesforce org and how to manage data access. Get inspired so that you can build YOUR own jaw-dropping extension!

sessions.sessionName: Building a Commercial Lending Powerhouse
sessions.sessionAbstract: Commercial lending continues to surge and banks are pushing to new heights in profits. However, banks must drive new levels of efficiency across lending from front to mid-office to sustain long-term growth. Join us to hear how TD Bank and Texas Capital Bank have developed commercial lending powerhouses in collaboration with nCino and Salesforce.

sessions.sessionName: Building a Data-Driven Culture: Best Practices for Driving Analytics Adoption
sessions.sessionAbstract: Adding an Analytics tool is the first step,but getting people to use it is critical for success. Hear from customers who have successfully rolled out Einstein Analytics across their organizations. They'll share best practices, key learnings and the ROI they've seen. Come with questions for a lively Q&A!

sessions.sessionName: Building a Service Driven Business with AI
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Your customers expect you to know them. They crave personal interactions tailored to their history with your company. Generic, canned responses don’t cut it anymore, nor does supporting just voice or email.

Gartner says by 2020, 30% of web browsing sessions will be done without a screen. (Think: Siri, Alexa.) This means your apps, voice and text-chat solutions need to learn to be conversational. Artificial Intelligence (AI) will be the glue that allows your company to surface your solutions across new conversational interfaces.

In this session, we’ll explore how AI and conversational interfaces are becoming the gold standard for customer interactions in service.

sessions.sessionName: Building an Effective Data Model
sessions.sessionAbstract: The #1 success metric for building a successful customer journey is having a strong data foundation. A well-designed data model creates personalized interactions and makes your analytics more powerful, high-performing, and accessible. In this session, you'll learn four tips to building your best data model with product experts.

sessions.sessionName: Building Better Lightning Components: Reusable and Generic
sessions.sessionAbstract: Many developers write the same code over and over such as checking the state for an Aura-Action-response for “SUCCESS”. In this session you will learn how to reduce boilerplate code and increase reusability by creating truly generic components. I will present advanced Lightning Components patterns leveraging abstract components, inheritance and component methods. Join and benefit from the long experience in building Lightning-based products as an ISV partner and take home some ready-to-use snippets that will save you time for future projects!

sessions.sessionName: Building custom applications on top of Heroku Connect
sessions.sessionAbstract: Are you interested in building a custom web or mobile application in Heroku that leverages your Salesforce data? In this Session we will walk through how you can use Heroku Connect to build a custom application that integrates with your Salesforce data. We will cover in detail how Heroku Connect operates in Postgres and all the things you must consider when building an application that reads and writes from the Heroku Connect tables.

sessions.sessionName: Building Marketing Cloud Data Architecture
sessions.sessionAbstract: Considering endless possibilities for setting up data in the marketing cloud, what are the best practices & strategies in use today? We will help you understand how to make sure the right data is where it needs to be, when it needs to be there, and at scale. We will include Contacts data management & schema for Journey Builder decision splits, how the Salesforce Sales & Service architecture translates to the Marketing Cloud and Q&A.

sessions.sessionName: Building Predictable Pipeline (It’s Easier Than You Think)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Most of us would relish the chance to strengthen our forecasts. Or so we tell ourselves as we shrug at mentions of “predictability,” because who really has time to figure that out? But if you’re using Sales Cloud, you’re closer than you think. There are actionable steps you can take today to establish one source of truth for all of your customer data (not limited to sales) and empower your entire organization with predictability. We’ll share them in one valuable breakout session. It’s time to move away from inaccurate forecasts, and start scaling through predictability. We can’t wait to show you how.

sessions.sessionName: Building Salesforce Platform Mobile Extensions with Swift
