sessions.sessionAbstract: 'There's an app for that' is now passe! Now, there's an extension for that! iOS extensions provide custom functionality and content beyond apps. For example, you can create an iOS extension to view Salesforce tasks in Today view or a watchOS extension to reply to Chatter messages . Join us in this session to learn how to write App Cloud extensions using Swift and Salesforce Mobile SDK for iOS 10. You'll learn how to make your app interact with your extension, how to leverage the REST and Chatter APIs, and how to use custom UI components for imparting a SLDS-style look and feel to your extensions.

sessions.sessionName: Building Single Page Apps with Lightning Components
sessions.sessionAbstract: The Lightning Framework allows developers to develop Single Page Apps (SPAs) using both Base and Custom Lightning Components. An SPA is an application that stands on its own. In this session you'll learn how to use the Lightning Framework to create an SPA that allows you to go beyond the standard user experience.

sessions.sessionName: Building the Dream Team: Uniting Sales and Marketing with Salesforce and Pardot
sessions.sessionAbstract: The divide between sales and marketing has always existed, but when your goal is improving customer experience and unifying your branding, how do you bring the two teams together? Join us to learn how Mizuho OSI united their sales and marketing teams using Pardot and Salesforce and increased trust and collaboration across their business. You'll learn how they customized their Pardot instance to drive more high quality leads into the sales funnel, and how they were able to deliver a streamlined customer journey from start to finish.

sessions.sessionName: Callbacks, Events and More - Bring Sanity to Asynchronous Lightning Code
sessions.sessionAbstract: Every time you call "$A.enqueueAction" in your Lightning component, you're making an asynchronous call to Apex and handling the results in a callback. As your components grow in complexity, callback hell seems inevitable, but it doesn't have to be! In this session, we'll review practices to make your Lightning components more modular, consistent, and comprehensible by using Lightning Events and building reusable utility components that eliminate boilerplate code and flatten your callback chains.

sessions.sessionName: Calling a Truce: Aligning Your Marketing and Sales Teams (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: We're all familiar with the ongoing struggles between marketing and sales: marketing thinks sales isn't following up on their leads, and sales thinks marketing's lead gen strategy could stand improvement. Toss in widely different metrics, goals and processes and tensions rise. But what if there's a way to bring marketing and sales together in peace and camaraderie with the help of technology? Join Brian Schmid, Campaign Marketing Manager at VinSolutions of Cox Automotive as he shares how to unite your sales and marketing teams and develop a partnership between the warring departments.

sessions.sessionName: Calling a Truce: Aligning Your Marketing and Sales Teams (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: We're all familiar with the ongoing struggles between marketing and sales: marketing thinks sales isn't following up on their leads, and sales thinks marketing's lead gen strategy could stand improvement. Toss in widely different metrics, goals and processes and tensions rise. But what if there's a way to bring marketing and sales together in peace and comraderie with the help of technology? Join Brian Schmid, Campaign Marketing Manager at VinSolutions of Cox Automotive as he shares how to unite your sales and marketing teams and develop a partnership between the warring departments.

sessions.sessionName: Capture Every Communication in Salesforce
sessions.sessionAbstract: It’s an an AI-Powered world, so why should your inbox be left behind? Get empowered to give your prospects exactly what they want by understanding the true value of Einstein and Salesforce Inbox. Join this session and discover the secret to delivering perfect responses to your business critical sales emails in Salesforce with Artificial Intelligence.

sessions.sessionName: Catch the Release: How to Manage Salesforce's Major Releases Year-round
sessions.sessionAbstract: One of the great things about Salesforce is that we are constantly introducing new and improved features to our offerings. This great thing can also give some customers headaches, as keeping up with the latest & greatest can seem like a full time job on its own. Join us, as we discuss best practices for keeping up with changing technology and offer up tips to keep you on the cutting edge of Salesforce usage

sessions.sessionName: Catch the Release: How to Manage Salesforce's Major Releases Year-round (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: One of the great things about Salesforce is that we are constantly introducing new and improved features to our offerings. This great thing can also give some customers headaches, as keeping up with the latest & greatest can seem like a full time job on its own. Join us, as we discuss best practices for keeping up with changing technology and offer up tips to keep you on the cutting edge of Salesforce usage

sessions.sessionName: Change Management for Awesome Admins
sessions.sessionAbstract: Admins get to fix problems and introduce new ways of doing things that make it easier for everyone to do their jobs. But without nailing change management, you might spend days, weeks or even months building out Apps, Lightning Processes, Workflows, and beautiful Page Layouts only to discover a few months later that no one knows what they do or how to use them. In this session, you'll learn how to get started with great change management and get ideas that you can immediately put into practice.

sessions.sessionName: Changing the Game: Growth and Scalability on The Road to Account-Based Marketing
sessions.sessionAbstract: Interested in Account-Based Marketing? New to the idea of Marketing Automation? Learn how nThrive used Pardot, Salesforce's B2B Marketing Automation Platform to consolidate their marketing tech stack and streamline their processes during a company-wide rebrand. Take a deep dive into how they set up their lead generation and lead nurturing programs in Pardot, and learn how they're shaping their account-based marketing strategy to deliver deeper personalization to their customers.

sessions.sessionName: Chatter & Files - Collaboration re-invented in Lightning Experience
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Learn how Chatter and Files has re-invented itself in the Lightning Experience, and hear about the more than 30 new features introduced in lightning experience. How Einstein is helping users become more productive, and get their job done. 

You will learn how to stay on top of what is important in your company, in your communities, and organize all your conversations.

sessions.sessionName: Chatter & Files - Collaboration re-invented in Lightning Experience
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Learn how Chatter and Files has re-invented itself in the Lightning Experience, and hear about the more than 30 new features introduced in lightning experience. How Einstein is helping users become more productive, and get their job done. 

You will learn how to stay on top of what is important in your company, in your communities, and organize all your conversations.

sessions.sessionName: Check Your Flow! How Visual Workflow Helps Remove the Need for Code
sessions.sessionAbstract: Have you ever wanted to be able to dynamically share records based on changes to your data? We will show you how to build a Visual Workflow that enables you to share records with users when they need them and remove that sharing when they don't. You'll walk away from this session understanding the basics of flow, including naming conventions limitations and considerations.

sessions.sessionName: CIO Trends: Finding the Middle Path Between Innovation, Cost, and Stability
sessions.sessionAbstract: CIO's are constantly facing contradictory demands and tradeoffs. Balancing innovation, agility, security, and cost is a difficult task, but your business depends on you to make the call. Join us as customers share practical tactics for navigating this precarious combination and what trends to pay attention to going forward.

sessions.sessionName: CIO Trends: What's Your Number? (ROI)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Every CIO faces the challenge of quantifying ROI however many methods underestimate the business impact. Join us as we examine 3 approaches that comprehensively calculate your return, provide leverage for budgets & innovation, and make you an ROI savant.

sessions.sessionName: Closing the Customer Experience Gap: a Harvard Business Review Study
sessions.sessionAbstract: Harvard Business Review's Analytics Services interviewed 680+ leaders on their ability to deliver customer experiences in the digital age. But at the end of the day, it’s all about bringing the data together to deliver the right experience. The session reveals the biggest gaps you can close to get ahead.

sessions.sessionName: Coast to Coast with Mark Cuban: Tips for Success from Founders Across the US
sessions.sessionAbstract: Silicon Valley may seem to get all the headlines, but the spirit of entrepreneurship is strong across North America. In this session, successful entrepreneurs from across the land will share how the challenge of entrepreneurship varies, is similar—and how they've succeeded. Whether you're from Poughkeepsie or Palo Alto, you will gain perspective and get practical advice—no matter where you hang your hat.

sessions.sessionName: Code Everyone Loves
sessions.sessionAbstract: We'll be sharing design patterns and sample code from solutions built to put the power of business logic firmly in the realm of declarative tools, and free up code to focus on performance and long-term resilience. You'll walk away from this session with concrete strategies to give your code base and business users new levels of freedom.

sessions.sessionName: Code to Clicks
sessions.sessionAbstract:
You've inherited a Salesforce org that is all code and you want to make changes but are prevented by the code. You want to use standard functionally in Salesforce but heavy customization exists. What do you do?
 
In this session we will highlight strategies to migrate from code to clicks by following some simple steps that help you transform your Salesforce org into an efficient and manageable CRM.

sessions.sessionName: Codeless Advanced Lightning Components
sessions.sessionAbstract: Design and deploy advanced Lightning Components without coding by using Altimetrik's new platform.

sessions.sessionName: Come Hear What It Takes to Build And Scale a Successful Global Inside Sales Team
sessions.sessionAbstract: What does it take to build and scale an inside sales team? Come hear Autodesk's journey to successfully building a global inside sales team. What are the 'pillars of success’ and where should you start? Autodesk will share the key challenges and share the most important aspects to getting it right.

sessions.sessionName: Commerce Journeys: Boost Marketing ROI With 1 to 1 Personalization
sessions.sessionAbstract: Every interaction with shoppers is a chance to build a loyal customer. The modern consumer expects a personalized experience from awareness to the moment of truth and beyond. Come learn 5 tips to deliver intelligent commerce journeys on every marketing channel.

sessions.sessionName: CommScope Gets to the Next Level with Lightning
sessions.sessionAbstract: Migrating from Classic to Lightning has the potential for huge rewards that can take not just your user experience, but your entire organization, to the next level. Learn how CommScope, a large communications infrastructure company, positioned themselves for growth with a move to Lightning. Through thoughtful planning and a creative communication plan, CommScope was able to realize increased user adoption, have a successful relaunch of Salesforce1, and deliver a system the users WANT to use.

sessions.sessionName: Community Bank as Fintech: The Playbook for the New Digital Business
sessions.sessionAbstract: Cloud and digitization are transforming mortgage processes, and Fintech's are not the only ones benefitting. Join this session to hear about how two community banks launched entirely new digital-first businesses with spectacular results in mortgage and student loan finance in a few months.

sessions.sessionName: Community Cloud Roadmap & Vision (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce Community Cloud leads the way when it comes to deploying next-generation portals, communities, and customer-facing websites. They’re fast, scalable, and agile. Build beautiful, branded, and intelligent experiences for your customers, partners, and employees. Join us to learn about exciting new developments and what’s next for Community Cloud in 2018.

sessions.sessionName: Community Cloud Roadmap & Vision (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce Community Cloud leads the way when it comes to deploying next-generation portals, communities, and customer-facing websites. They’re fast, scalable, and agile. Build beautiful, branded, and intelligent experiences for your customers, partners, and employees. Join us to learn about exciting new developments and what’s next for Community Cloud in 2018.

sessions.sessionName: Community Manager Best Practices: Measuring Community Value
sessions.sessionAbstract: Every community manager wants their community to meet their business goals and generate return on investment (ROI). Join us as we discuss ROI models for communities and you'll leave with a better understanding of how to measure and demonstrate the value of your community.

sessions.sessionName: Community Manager Success: Best Practices for developing Community Advocates (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: One of the most important elements of a vibrant community is having advocates. A well organized and properly managed customer community can dramatically scale your advocacy program. Learn how advocates can influence sales, marketing, innovation, and service, thereby increasing the value of your community to your customer and employee base.

sessions.sessionName: Community Manager Success: Best Practices for developing Community Advocates (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: One of the most important elements of a vibrant community is having advocates. A well organized and properly managed customer community can dramatically scale your advocacy program. Learn how advocates can influence sales, marketing, innovation, and service, thereby increasing the value of your community to your customer and employee base.

sessions.sessionName: Composing Heroku Applications with 3rd Party Cloud Services
sessions.sessionAbstract: Heroku’s platform makes the processes of deploying, configuring, scaling, and managing apps as simple and straightforward as possible. As part of that, Heroku applications are built to be easily integrated with 3rd party cloud services through the Heroku add-ons marketplace. In this session, you’ll learn how to compose a Heroku application utilizing a broad array of 3rd party tools. The session will cover the integrations that are key for most production applications, such as logging, monitoring, and error tracking. The session will also cover new technologies and tools that are emerging in the marketplace.

sessions.sessionName: Configuring Permission Sets for Analytics
sessions.sessionAbstract: Do you already have too many profiles, but need to provide access to analytics tools? Want to free up time for your administrators and reduce organizational tasks? We'll show you how your team will have the access they require in no time! Learn how to expand permissions using best practices and how to master creation and assignments for Einstein Analytics.

sessions.sessionName: Congratulations! You've Inherited a Mature Org... Now What?
sessions.sessionAbstract: Many awesome, eager admins find themselves in a similar situation - they are hired on or promoted to an administrator for a mature org that has problems, no owner, no governance, and no documentation. With a combination of top-level pressure, end-user complaints, end-user questions, and trying to understand the org, it can be overwhelming. Join us to learn how this is more common than one thinks and hear the basic steps that can help solve the problem. We'll combine core level ideals, quick wins for top-level and end-users, and introduce change management/governance.

sessions.sessionName: Congratulations! You've Inherited a Mature Org... Now What? (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Many awesome, eager admins find themselves in a similar situation - they are hired on or promoted to an administrator for a mature org that has problems, no owner, no governance, and no documentation. With a combination of top-level pressure, end-user complaints, end-user questions, and trying to understand the org, it can be overwhelming. Join us to learn how this is more common than one thinks and hear the basic steps that can help solve the problem. We'll combine core level ideals, quick wins for top-level and end-users, and introduce change management/governance.

sessions.sessionName: Connect Any External Datasource with Custom APEX Connector
sessions.sessionAbstract: The APEX Connector Framework enables developers to leverage the flexibility of Salesforce Connect to virtually integrate data from external systems. It provides powerful capabilities to develop your own custom adapter when the other available Salesforce Connect adapters aren’t suitable for your needs. In this session, you will learn the general concepts of the APEX Connector Framework, get an introduction to upcoming and planned product features and will learn how to build a custom connector on your own.

sessions.sessionName: Connect the Marketing, Sales, & Service Clouds to Unify the Consumer Experience1
sessions.sessionAbstract: Today’s marketing is about more than just campaigns - it’s about the entire experience. Just building 1-to-1 relationships with your customers is no longer sufficient: it's the norm. Consumers now expect that of every brand. Join us for a step-by-step live demo of Marketing Cloud Connect feature and learn how to better leverage data across Salesforce Marketing, Sales, and Services Clouds to ultimately create a smarter, 360-degree view of your consumers.

sessions.sessionName: Connect the Marketing, Sales, & Service Clouds to Unify the Consumer Experience2
sessions.sessionAbstract: Today’s marketing is about more than just campaigns– it’s about the entire experience. Just building 1-to-1 relationships with your customers is no longer sufficient: it's the norm. Consumers now expect that of every brand. Join us for a step-by-step live demo of Marketing Cloud Connect feature and learn how to better leverage data across Salesforce Marketing, Sales, and Services Clouds to ultimately create a smarter, 360-degree view of your consumers.

sessions.sessionName: Connecting Consumer Journeys Across Marketing, Sales, and Service
sessions.sessionAbstract: Personalization begins with understanding a customer's tastes and preferences. Data about those preferences could live all over your organization and it's up to marketers to harness that data to create the most meaningful customer experiences. Learn how one customer leveraged the data in Sales Cloud to segment and personalize their message. Then used the Marketing Cloud to take those customers on a personalized journey.

sessions.sessionName: Connecting Social to your Sales Organization to Increase Pipeline
sessions.sessionAbstract: When someone expresses propensity to buy via a social channel today, what happens? For many companies, the answer is nothing...In this interactive session, we'll walk you through how to identify and nurture early stage leads by monitoring keywords and topics relevant to your brands and potential customers, best practices for engaging with prospects and tracking pipeline generation, and tips for improving account knowledge and prospect interactions with social research and insights.

sessions.sessionName: Connecting to your Customers Across Every Channel with Salesforce Identity
sessions.sessionAbstract: In this session you will learn how to connect to your customer faster using Salesforce Identity. We will show how to go from an empty org to digital engagement using a combination of single and social sign-on and user registration as well as Salesforce’s new Embedded Login that helps you bring Salesforce Identity-based sign-in to every site.

sessions.sessionName: Considerations for Moving from Desk.com to Service Cloud
sessions.sessionAbstract: As a growing organization with evolving service needs, you have considerations related to both your customer experience and team's performance. Join us to learn about the benefits of moving to Service Cloud and the expanded features available on the Salesforce Platform

sessions.sessionName: Consumer Goods Keynote: From Mass-Production to Personalization
sessions.sessionAbstract: Consumers today are informed, empowered, and inundated with choice. With massive growth in e-commerce, the dominance of Amazon, and virtually limitless digital shelf space, CG companies need to deliver more than a product - they must deliver an experience. In this keynote, learn how CG companies like Nestlé Waters and L'Oréal are redefining the consumer experiences with Salesforce. We'll explore how CG companies are putting every consumer on a journey, helping them discover products they might like, buy through their preferred channel, and receive personalized offers driven by online and in-store behavior - all powered by AI. You'll leave this session learning how get started to ensure your brick and mortar presence is effective, your digital channel is optimized, and that consumers connect with your brand and product offering in deeper ways than ever before.

sessions.sessionName: Consumer Goods: Reimagine Retail Execution
sessions.sessionAbstract: Think faster, sell smarter, and win on the shelf. Salesforce is putting the next-generation Retail Execution in the hands of consumer goods companies for a complete connected channel experience. Equip your reps with intuitive mobile apps for predictive actions and speed to market. Join us to get unique insights and best practices to help strengthen your brands and drive new levels of sales execution.

sessions.sessionName: Consumer Goods: It’s Time to Talk about the Consumer Engagement Revolution
sessions.sessionAbstract: We’re talkin’ about a revolution, the consumer engagement revolution. It's about building personalized journeys and services across multiple channels on a single unified commerce platform. Join us to hear how you can deliver a personalized digital consumer experience faster — with lower costs —using the Salesforce Connected Consumer solution.

sessions.sessionName: Consumer Goods: Turn Up the Intelligence to Boost Channel Operations
sessions.sessionAbstract: Today’s consumer expects the right product, in the right store, at the right time. Are you where your customers expect you to be? Join us to learn how Salesforce innovations apply new levels of intelligence to monitor in-store stock conditions, analyze key data, generate field service notifications, and create actions to drive sales.

sessions.sessionName: Continuous Improvements in Service Availability
sessions.sessionAbstract: 24x7 monitoring of all the instances across the expansive Salesforce Infrastructure allows our Site Reliability team to react, triage and remediate issues as quickly as possible. Not all incidents are created equal - some are potentially more impactful on the service availability than others. We continue to make big strides in improving availability across all of our product clouds. Come join us for an exciting session where we will share our philosophies, best practices, and roadmap regarding Service Availability.

sessions.sessionName: Continuously Delivering, Managing, and Scaling Apps: A Tour of Heroku
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join us as we explore the Heroku developer experience, designed to help you build, deploy, and manage everything from large complex applications to last night’s hack. In this session, you’ll get a tour of Heroku’s many deployment options, a demonstration of how you can attach 3rd party add-ons in a single click, set up a team-based continuous delivery pipeline, and gain visibility into the runtime characteristics of a production application using metrics.

sessions.sessionName: Continuously Delivering, Managing, and Scaling Apps: A Tour of Heroku
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join us as we explore the Heroku developer experience, designed to help you build, deploy, and manage everything from large complex applications to last night’s hack. In this session, you’ll get a tour of Heroku’s many deployment options, a demonstration of how you can attach 3rd party add-ons in a single click, set up a team-based continuous delivery pipeline, and gain visibility into the runtime characteristics of a production application using metrics.

sessions.sessionName: CPQ Hands-On Workshop
sessions.sessionAbstract: We invite you to an in-depth workshop where you will get first hand experience in administering Salesforce CPQ with point & click. Led by Salesforce CPQ product experts, this workshop will give you an in-depth understainding of:* The CPQ object model and product bundle structure.* How to set up products with different pricing structures.* How to create discount schedules and pricing tiers.* How to create option constraints and the difference between a dependency and an exclusion.

sessions.sessionName: Crawl, Walk, Fall, then Run: How to Deploy Salesforce and Hit the Ground Running
sessions.sessionAbstract: Starting a new Salesforce implementation? Perhaps you're thinking of overhauling outdated Salesforce processes? Are you unsure of where to start or worried you're biting off more than you can chew? Join us to to outline the key steps of a Salesforce project and set yourself up for success by leveraging a phased approach. And, learn from a customer who has skinned their knees at some point along the way and how they picked themselves up, dusted themselves off, and started to run.

sessions.sessionName: Create a Winning Content Strategy with Salesforce Files, Files Connect & CMS
sessions.sessionAbstract: How comprehensive is your content strategy? It should consider everything from sales enablement, training and onboarding, employee communications, to customer support, and brand and site building. Learn how cutting edge companies leverage Files and Knowledge in Salesforce, and combine them with external systems such as Quip, Google, Box, Microsoft, and Adobe.

sessions.sessionName: Create Branded Experiences with Community Cloud's Digital Experience Platform
sessions.sessionAbstract: Community Cloud has it all. Our Digital Experience Platform lets you create visually stunning communities that directly target your audience, all without code and in real-time. Learn how you can build beautiful, personalized, and intelligent CRM experiences using Community Builder and CMS Connect.

sessions.sessionName: Create custom Lightning components without writing code!
sessions.sessionAbstract: Are you an Admin with complex, custom business requirements that you need to bring to users? In this breakout, you’ll learn how to create custom Lightning components tailored to your specific business requirements. We’ll demonstrate compelling business solutions and show how to use Skuid to create amazing functionality with Lightning!

sessions.sessionName: Create Customer Communities and Portals Fast with Lightning Bolt (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Lightning Bolt helps you deploy communities and portals faster and transform your digital customer experience. Learn how you can leverage the expertise and experience of our leading partners who are building industry specific solutions.

sessions.sessionName: Create Customer Communities and Portals Fast with Lightning Bolt (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Lightning Bolt helps you deploy communities and portals faster and transform your digital customer experience. Learn how you can leverage the expertise and experience of our leading partners who are building industry specific solutions.

sessions.sessionName: Create Engaging Employee Communities Out of the Box
sessions.sessionAbstract: See how you can easily transform your employee experience by deploying an employee community from Salesforce. Maximize employee engagement by building a personalized, intuitive, and immersive employee community from Salesforce.

sessions.sessionName: Create Interactive & Dynamic dashboards with Bindings 2.0
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join this session to learn all about Bindings 2.0, and take your Einstein Analytics dashboards to a whole new level. Create dynamic reference lines on charts, easily switch between chart types, add conditional highlighting--the uses are many! We'll also take a look at the Bindings Enablement Dashboard, which lets you see your bindings in action and learn how to best implement them for users.

sessions.sessionName: Create Partner Communities and Portals Fast with Lightning Bolt
sessions.sessionAbstract: Lightning Bolt helps you deploy communities and portals faster than ever before. Learn how you can leverage the expertise and experience of our leading partners who are building industry specific solutions.

sessions.sessionName: Create Your Own Journey Builder Activities
sessions.sessionAbstract: Whether it's email, mobile SMS, push notifications, or advertising, Marketing Cloud’s Journey Builder helps you deliver automated digital engagements that result in a personalized 1:1 customer experience. Marketing Cloud APIs allow developers to extend these Journey Builder capabilities. In this session, you will learn how to build custom activities that can integrate with external systems or other Salesforce clouds, including a live demo!

sessions.sessionName: Creating a Data Strategy for Complete Customer Views
sessions.sessionAbstract: Having high quality data is essential to how we run our business, ensure adoption, and take advantage of the latest intelligence technologies. Join our practitioner experts to learn proven tips and best practices applicable for everyone from fast-growing small businesses to larger organizations dealing with acquisitions, more complex sales teams, and global markets. You will learn about how to start, grow, and sustain data strategy, how to address business entity and implementation specific scenarios for new implementations and multi-cloud expansions, and how Salesforce features and products can be used to ensure effective data governance. We will build upon last year’s session with brand new content. Don’t forget to bring your own questions.

sessions.sessionName: Creating a Exploration Culture with Einstein Analytics Explorer
sessions.sessionAbstract: Learn how to empower yourself and your users with the Einstein Analytics Explorer. We'll show you the tools and tricks to train an army of data explorers within your own organization. We'll teach you the basics of Measures, Groups, and Filters. We'll go over the powerful features like drilling, and focus, and teach you when you need to go to a compare table for more power! We will walk you through a few real world use cases to show how your newfound skills can create ROI immediately. We'll also show you how to use the explorer on mobile to find insights in your data on the go.

sessions.sessionName: Creating a Pathway From School to Career: Workforce Development in K-12
sessions.sessionAbstract: In this session we’ll explore lessons learned from educators and technologists who have successfully built and scaled personalized student internship models in K-12. Panelists will show you how they use internships to help prepare students for professional success and share practical advice on how to overcome the challenges of integrating personalized employment pathways into a student’s school experience.

sessions.sessionName: Creating a Relationship Bank in the Digital Age
sessions.sessionAbstract: City National Bank (CNB), known for its relationship with its clients and uncommon dedication to client service, recently went live with Salesforce across the Bank and its Asset Management division. Come hear how they are approaching their transformational journey, the challenges they faced, and the lessons learned along the way

sessions.sessionName: Creating a WOW experience for your Employees
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join us and learn creative ways to create an amazing employee experience while maximizing efficiency and reducting costs.

sessions.sessionName: Creating Connected Cross-Channel Consumer Journeys in Marketing Cloud
sessions.sessionAbstract: Right channel. Right time. Depending on a customer's preferences, their intent and their expectations, the best customer experience could be an email, SMS, push, ad or website content. Learn how you can leverage Journey Builder from the Marketing Cloud to "be there" wherever your customers want to interact with you. Then, learn how one customer implemented multi-channel journeys to reach their consumers before, during and after events to deliver optimal engagement.

sessions.sessionName: Creating Dynamic and Real-time Charts for Printable Reports
sessions.sessionAbstract: Embedding dynamically generated charts into PDF can lead to questionable results and difficulties rendering correctly. When building a stand-alone Lightning application or VisualForce page, we can embed a chart using Google Charts, HighCharts or ChartJS API services. In this session, you will learn how to embed dynamically generated SVG charts into Lightning Components and Visualforce pages and then convert them into downloadable PDF reports by using the standard Salesforce PDF engine.

sessions.sessionName: Creating Hybrid and React Native apps using Salesforce Mobile SDK
sessions.sessionAbstract: This session will cover developing a sample mobile application using React Native with Salesforce Mobile SDK and developing a mobile application using a hybrid web approach with Salesforce Mobile SDK. It will discuss the differences in implementation, the pros and cons of each approach and tips and tricks for developing your own mobile application using the Salesforce Mobile SDK. Sample code will be provided for attendees to download and explore.

sessions.sessionName: Creating LockerService Ready Lightning Components With Webpack
sessions.sessionAbstract: Are your Lightning components LockerService ready? Third-party Javascript dependencies can be tricky to manage without help. So let Webpack do the heavy lifting. In this session we'll show you how to configure Webpack 2.x with plugins and configurations that can automatically fix your libraries, compress your code, use the most modern ECMAScript specifications, and assist with code quality and security.

sessions.sessionName: Creating Secure Apps Using the Salesforce Mobile SDK
sessions.sessionAbstract: Creating a mobile app has never been easier with the wide-range of frameworks and languages available at your fingertips. But is it easy to secure a mobile app? Join our mobile security experts as they walkthrough the Salesforce Mobile SDK and learn everything you need to know about hardening your mobile apps. We will discuss common vulnerabilities and mistakes, followed by a dive deep into how the Salesforce Mobile SDK makes following our security best practices easy and painless!

sessions.sessionName: Creating Synergy at Cox Automotive from Mergers and Acquisitions
sessions.sessionAbstract: Cox Automotive is on a sales transformation journey to bring together 20+ Salesforce orgs to provide a single face to their enterprise auto dealer customers. Join us as they discuss their victories, challenges, learnings and opportunities to serve their customer better.

sessions.sessionName: Creating Value from Chaos – Unlocking the power of Data
sessions.sessionAbstract: Last year, Capital One Bank embarked on a journey to build a banker facing CRM system to engage with customers visiting the branches. In the last 6 months, this platform, that is built on Salesforce, in record time, is one of the most widely used platforms by users. We will discuss the story of how we implemented this instance, the architectural principles and the agile software development practices we followed.

sessions.sessionName: CRM, ERP, and MDM - An Enterprise Integration Strategy
sessions.sessionAbstract: Integrating CRM, ERP, and MDM Systems can provide tremendous value to your business; from end to end visibility to forecasting & revenue pull through to effectiveness of campaigns. When planning for an integration between 2 or more systems you need to do your homework. Ensuring you spend the proper time planning for all aspects of the project with a primary focus on quality vs. expediency and business prep vs. IT prep. This session will review what went well and lesson's learned from Pearson's CRM/ERP/MDM Integration project.

sessions.sessionName: Crucial Conversations: Creating a Culture of Feedback
sessions.sessionAbstract: Employees crave feedback that can help them improve their performance and companies need to get more value from their employees. It's a virtuous circle. Join the Salesforce Employee Success team to learn how we built an app on the Salesforce Platform to become the catalyst for crucial conversations that are creating a culture of feedback at the company.

sessions.sessionName: Culture Shock: Transform your Executive Team and your Company with Quip
sessions.sessionAbstract: Executives spend their days in meetings, making decisions, and keeping their teams aligned to their goals. It's lonely at the top, and hard work too. Learn how Quip lightens the load by helping execs make their meetings count, keep an eye on their organization, and drive results from their phones.

sessions.sessionName: Curated Mobile-First Experiences using Lightning Experience and Salesforce1
sessions.sessionAbstract: The strength of the Lightning platform is the promise of a device-independent future for your Salesforce users. Lightning allows your reps to easily access information while on their phone, desktop, and just about any other device. As a Salesforce admin, how do you design solutions that are mobile first? In this session, we will demonstrate how to develop a solution that combines capabilities from the Lightning Experience and Salesforce1 to create a custom and consistent mobile-first experience across mobile and desktop. We'll also demonstrate how to effectively leverage platform capabilities and configurations as well as how to build custom work to generate the best possible ROI for the solution.

sessions.sessionName: Customer Community Roadmap: Build Connected Communities and Portals (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Customer Community enables companies of all sizes to deliver the connected, engaging online self-service experiences that today's customers expect. Extend the World's #1 CRM platform to customers in beautifully branded communities and portals that are seamlessly integrated with your business process. Join the Customer Community product leadership to see what's new and learn about coming innovation for the next year.

sessions.sessionName: Customer Community Roadmap: Build Connected Communities and Portals (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Customer Community enables companies of all sizes to deliver the connected, engaging online self-service experiences that today's customers expect. Extend the World's #1 CRM platform to customers in beautifully branded communities and portals that are seamlessly integrated with your business process. Join the Customer Community product leadership to see what's new and learn about coming innovation for the next year.

sessions.sessionName: Customer Einstein Experience (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join us at the Einstein theatre to see how Commerce Cloud customers are using Einstein to personalize the shopper journey and power smarter and more efficient merchandising decisions. From Product Recommendations to Predictive Sort, we will take a tour through customer websites from both the shopper and merchant view. At the end of this experience, you will understand Einstein's ability to transform vast amounts of commerce data into revenue driving personalization.

sessions.sessionName: Customer Einstein Experience (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join us at the Einstein theatre to see how Commerce Cloud customers are using Einstein to personalize the shopper journey and power smarter and more efficient merchandising decisions. From Product Recommendations to Predictive Sort, we will take a tour through customer websites from both the shopper and merchant view. At the end of this experience, you will understand Einstein's ability to transform vast amounts of commerce data into revenue driving personalization.

sessions.sessionName: Customer Growth Strategies for SMB Success in 2018
sessions.sessionAbstract: Research shows that SMB CEOs believe that the climate for growth is strong. Leaders of high-growth SMBs have a strong focus on their customers as they implement strategies and execute initiatives to drive growth through their marketing, sales and customer service functions. Join Joe Galvin, Chief Research Officer of Vistage, as he shares recent research on customer growth strategies implemented by SMB CEOs as well as the resources, including leadership and technologies, they leverage to achieve their goals. You’ll also hear first-hand from Salesforce customers as they share their success stories for finding, winning, and keeping customers.

sessions.sessionName: Customer Panel: Driving ROI with CRM-Powered Advertising
sessions.sessionAbstract: Hear from Advertising Studio Trailblazers about the strategies and tactics they're using to drive leads, increase return on ad spend, lower cost per acquisition, and improve KPIs across both marketing and sales channels. We promise you'll come away with a goodie bag of tips, tricks, and more ideas than you know what to do with, for how to use Advertising Studio and the Salesforce Customer Success Platform to drive ROI for your company.

sessions.sessionName: Customer Service and Personalized Marketing: A Retailer’s Sweet Spot to Success
sessions.sessionAbstract: Learn best practices on how retailers are getting rid of outdated data silos and using shopper data to create a true 360-degree view of their customers that blend into a true omni-channel experience.

sessions.sessionName: Customer Service and Visual Workflow: a Primer
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Guiding your users through complicated processes is important for them and critical for you. Customer satisfaction goes up and costly errors go down. 

Empower the front line of your customer service team with Visual Workflow. With all the new features Salesforce is releasing just in time for Dreamforce, you'll want to learn more so you can build stunning experiences for your customers and your customer service team. Come learn how to take your Salesforce experience to an entirely new level.

sessions.sessionName: Customer Success as a Product: How to Solve your Customer Problems at Scale
sessions.sessionAbstract: Tired of firefighting? Learn a lightweight approach you can apply to customer challenges, big or small, to tackle them at scale and iterate for success. We'll also discuss how to take this product-oriented approach one step further, to create customer programs that scale with your growth. Join Shaochen Wu, now innovating on Customer Success within Salesforce's Product group, to learn how her customer success team got scrappy in RelateIQ's pre-acquisition days.

sessions.sessionName: Customer Success in the Public Sector
sessions.sessionAbstract: Government agencies are accelerating their move into the digital age faster by adopting Salesforce and other SaaS solutions. Learn how a couple of our public sector agencies are reaching more people and increasing efficiencies with the Salesforce Platform.

sessions.sessionName: Customer Success Journey: How Marketing Connects Sales, Service, IT & Community
sessions.sessionAbstract: Customer engagement is more than marketing. The rise of the connected customer is redefining customer engagement. To achieve a 360-degree view of a customer, businesses must build 1-to-1 journeys across sales, service, marketing and their communities. But the digital marketing landscape has grown in complexity and continues to be fragmented. Per Gartner, marketers must develop a digital marketing hub, a gravitational center to the constellation of digital marketing tools, applications and business processes. In order to do so, CMOs must align their organizational vision and capabilities by partnering with line-of-business leadership, including the chief information officer, chief customer officer, chief digital officer, and chief revenue officer. Our CXO panel will focus on highlighting proven successful methods of orchestrating marketing across other key lines of business including sales, services and the community in order deliver the very best customer experience. Get ready for a new kind of customer success; one that requires precision and intelligent marketing.

sessions.sessionName: Customer Success Story with Commerce Cloud Digital and Einstein
sessions.sessionAbstract: The pace of change in customer demands, competitive pressure, and technology means that retailers must be innovative, agile and organized in order to compete. Join this session to hear how retailers are leveraging Salesforce Commerce Cloud to solve tough challenges like driving conversion on mobile, personalizing the shopping journey and unifying the consumer experience to meet the demands of fickle shoppers while driving massive lift in GMV.

sessions.sessionName: Data Access Best Practices for Apex, Visualforce, and Lightning
sessions.sessionAbstract: With sharing or without sharing... is the question. The answer can impact your ability to harden the code for your Salesforce app and keeping your data secure. In this session, we will cover best practices in sharing, FLS, CRUD, and the common mistakes and misconceptions about how these features work.

sessions.sessionName: Data Science as a Foundation to AI
sessions.sessionAbstract: As artificial intelligence (AI) moves center-stage and becomes transformational across multiple business units and platforms (from cybersecurity to robotics), the demands on data science will grow exponentially as well. Join this presentation to understand how data science underpins AI activities across the enterprise and what you need to do to prepare and evolve to respond fast to this rapidly evolving innovation.

sessions.sessionName: Dear Admin, You Are a Project Manager
sessions.sessionAbstract: Do you use your Salesforce Admin skills to solve business problems? Are you being pulled into meetings to answer questions about what can be done in Salesforce.com to accomplish XYZ? Have you raised your hand and said “We can build that in Salesforce.com”? If you said yes to one of these, then you are combining your Awesome Admin Skills with Project Management Skills. Join this session to learn a basic project management framework and how to apply it in your career. We will also walk through examples of common admin projects and highlight the framework. Lastly, we will equip you to handle the most important skill in project management: communication.

sessions.sessionName: Dear Admin, You Are a Project Manager (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Do you use your Salesforce Admin skills to solve business problems? Are you being pulled into meetings to answer questions about what can be done in Salesforce.com to accomplish XYZ? Have you raised your hand and said “We can build that in Salesforce.com”? If you said yes to one of these, then you are combining your Awesome Admin Skills with Project Management Skills. Join this session to learn a basic project management framework and how to apply it in your career. We will also walk through examples of common admin projects and highlight the framework. Lastly, we will equip you to handle the most important skill in project management: communication.

sessions.sessionName: Death to Boring B2B Marketing, Part 2: Jobs to be Done
sessions.sessionAbstract:
According to Seth Godin, the biggest mistake marketers are making today is "Thinking that their job is to spend money to get attention”. In our new economy of trust, connection, and relevance, marketing strategies need to reflect a deep understanding of customer value. Unfortunately, the classic, persona-based form of marketing isn’t designed to achieve that outcome. We need a new way to be relevant.
Fortunately, there’s a framework to help marketers do just that: “Jobs to be Done”. It’s designed—and proven—to give tremendous insight into the true value you provide to your customers. Knowing what your customers “hire” your product or service to do means you know how to help them achieve their goals. That’s true relevance!
Come learn about the Jobs-to-be-Done mindset, see how it worked for others, and walk away with a fresh way to be truly relevant to your customers.

sessions.sessionName: Deep Dive: The Path to Digital Transformation with Visual Workflow
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce Visual Workflow is a"clicks not code" tool you can use to automate work and build workflow applications that transform and modernize the way employees work. Join us as we cover two in-depth real-world workflow applications built by customers using Visual Workflow. They'll detail their use case, show how they got started, share tips and tricks on what it took to build, demo their applications, and show you their before-and-after transformations.

sessions.sessionName: Defend Your Castle: An Essential Checklist for Establishing Secure Communities
sessions.sessionAbstract: Create an impregnable website with Salesforce Communities! Doing so requires a combined awareness of the security best-practices for Salesforce internally and establishing a fortified community exposed to the world. This 20-minute session will detail the essential steps to cover all the security considerations you must manage presented as an easy-to-digest recipe.

sessions.sessionName: Deliver a Modern Customer Self-Service Experience
sessions.sessionAbstract: Great customer service means enabling a connected experience thatÕs personalized and consistent across all channels. To do this, leading companies create incredibly productive and rewarding online experiences that improve the service experience and delight customers. Join us to see how Customer Community combines engaging design with simple, intuitive access to business systems.

sessions.sessionName: Deliver Conversational Service with Two-way Mobile Messaging
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join this session to learn about the newest mobile conversational messaging channel, LiveMessage. Hear how conversational messaging is the lowest cost channel to support customers & prospects with the highest CSAT and ease to deploy. Whether allowing customers to start the conversation over mobile or starting it through an automatic notification, conversational messaging is what your customers want and expect. Hear directly from customers about how they've used LiveMessage to enhance customer interactions and the benefits they've seen.

sessions.sessionName: Deliver Flawless Customer Service with Ease (and Some Service Cloud Magic)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Is your customer base growing faster than expected? How do you plan to keep up with customer support and urgent inquiries? Join us to learn how Service Cloud can work 24/7 to make sure your customers are happy. From automation, to escalations, email templates, and notifications, we'll uncover how you can build an airtight service model.

sessions.sessionName: Deliver Intelligent Employee Experiences and Boost Engagement and Productivity
sessions.sessionAbstract: See how leading companies deliver amazing employee experiences that help the business thrive. Learn how connecting every employee and providing powerful business applications, that can work on any device, fosters a culture of innovation, collaboration and productivity. Join us and youÕll learn how you too can deliver an amazing employee experience with Salesforce.

sessions.sessionName: Deliver Personalized Home Health Services with Health Cloud
sessions.sessionAbstract:
From the aging baby boomer generation to growing populations with chronic diseases or disabilities, more people are seeking home health services for care. And with changes in new value based reimbursements, healthcare and life science organizations must personalize the experience to succeed. 

Join our Salesforce experts as they discuss solutions that enable home healthcare organizations to tailor support for care management, scheduling, and on-site resources. Hear how Health Cloud & Field Service Lightning empowers care teams and caregivers to collaborate more efficiently on a mobile-first platform while managing the continuity of care.

sessions.sessionName: Deliver Personalized, Embedded Service in your Mobile Apps with Snap-Ins
sessions.sessionAbstract: Companies use mobile apps as their main point of engagement with their customers, but few have a strategy to support their customers when and where they need help. Join us to learn how companies are using Service Cloud Snap-ins to offer real-time in-app support, provide an engaging customer experience, and enhancing their corporate brand.

sessions.sessionName: Delivering Lightning Console Apps: Gotchas, Best Practices, and Sample Recipes
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Learn about:
1. Wave and Lightning Integration. Gotchas, Best practices and sample recipes.
2. App Navigation using the new JS API. Gotchas, best practices, and sample recipes.
3. Building lightning components to display large data volume (LDV) lists. Gotchas, Best practices and sample recipes.
4. Performance optimization strategies for Lightning Console Apps. Controlling Component Proliferation, Caching, Background actions and lazy loading strategies.
5. Leveraging VF iframes strategically for REST calls, LDV queries, and WAVE queries.

sessions.sessionName: Delivering your First Accessible Lightning Component
sessions.sessionAbstract: Nearly 1 in 5 people in the US have a disability, but we are still coding without accessibility in mind. Have you ever heard about ARIA or WCAG ? If not, come and learn a few best practices to enhance your components with accessibility features, and see why designing with accessibility in mind will benefit to everyone. Your next component will be the one everyone wants, and most of all, the one everyone can use!

sessions.sessionName: Demo: Unleash Your Salesforce Data with Innovative Multi-Point Integration Hub
sessions.sessionAbstract: Increasing Salesforce integration complexity leads to management challenges and unnecessary API call charges. See live how to quickly simplify multi-point Salesforce integration with Informatica Cloud Integration Hub. Speed access to data across all your systems, streamline integration management and save costs with a modern publish/subscribe data hub for cloud integration.

sessions.sessionName: Demystifying Checkout for AppExchange
sessions.sessionAbstract: Are you an AppExchange Checkout Partner or a partner that wants to better understand if Checkout is right for you? Join the AppExchange Product and Technical team to see how to implement the Checkout Management App (CMA) for your app. Track your product offering performance with powerful, real-time data visualization, and stay in-the-know with email notifications triggered when you close a deal. #DF17Partners

sessions.sessionName: Demystifying Single Sign On for Salesforce Admins
sessions.sessionAbstract: Does Salesforce support single sign-on or SSO? If you’re a Salesforce Admin like me you might be getting questions like this one from your IT department or from third party vendors. I love getting this question because the answer is a resounding, “yes, big time!” But as admins, where do we go from there? In this session, we will untangle the jargon associated with SSO, show you how to broker the conversation with other players, and demonstrate how to configure Single Sign On with clicks, not code. Improve your admin or consultant chops by getting cozy with SSO and learning about new security features like two-factor authentication. Oh yeah, your users will love you too!

sessions.sessionName: Demystifying Single Sign On for Salesforce Admins (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Does Salesforce support single sign-on or SSO? If you’re a Salesforce Admin like me you might be getting questions like this one from your IT department or from third party vendors. I love getting this question because the answer is a resounding, “yes, big time!” But as admins, where do we go from there? In this session, we will untangle the jargon associated with SSO, show you how to broker the conversation with other players, and demonstrate how to configure Single Sign On with clicks, not code. Improve your admin or consultant chops by getting cozy with SSO and learning about new security features like two-factor authentication. Oh yeah, your users will love you too!

sessions.sessionName: Demystifying Time-Based Automation
sessions.sessionAbstract: Time-based actions for Workflow and Process Builder offer powerful and flexible options to drive automation and adoption for your business. Scheduling field changes, emails, and tasks out into the future can be really confusing, but scheduled automation doesn’t have to be intimidating. We'll take you through some community-driven examples so that you can walk away with some great ideas to jumpstart Salesforce automation for your users and add another solution to your Awesome Admin toolkit!

sessions.sessionName: Deploying an Event-Driven Software Architecture with Platform Events
sessions.sessionAbstract:
With the release of Platform Events in Summer '17, developers now have the necessary tooling to venture into the realm of event-driven software architecture.
In this session you will get an introduction to the concept of enterprise messaging and dive into Platform Events. You will learn about their capabilities, discover use cases and get access to sample code.

sessions.sessionName: Deploying the Salesforce CRM Application
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Salesforce delivers 3 major releases a year and extensively prepares our customers for each. Did you know the Salesforce platform is seamlessly updated every day?

Get a peek behind the curtain about how our Salesforce Infrastructure teams rollout the releases. We will showcase the processes and tools involved including the major differences between daily updates and major releases. We will also discuss the large scale aspects and show our roadmap for future work.

sessions.sessionName: Designing for Today's Inbox
sessions.sessionAbstract: In this session we will discuss email design best practices for a mobile world. We will review examples of successful email campaigns, and discuss your questions and successes.

sessions.sessionName: Destroying Duplicates in Lightning (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Want to take back control from the scourge of duplicate data in your org? Join us to learn how Salesforce Duplicate Management can help your organization maintain clean and accurate data. We'll demo new features available in Lightning, preview our duplicate management roadmap, and share how our customers are using Salesforce to identify, manage, and destroy duplicates.

sessions.sessionName: Develop for Changing Requirements with Custom Metadata Types
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Business requirements are constantly changing. Make your code more resilient to change by implementing Custom Metadata Types. In this session, we'll show you how to use Custom Metadata Types to easily add configuration to your code. We'll compare them to Custom Settings and when to use each type for configuring your code. We will also cover testing strategies for code that uses Custom Metadata Types.

Attendees will leave with an understanding of how to use this excellent feature and a Github library full of samples.

sessions.sessionName: Develop Visually Stunning & Personalized Lightning Communities
sessions.sessionAbstract: Learn how to build the next generation of visually stunning, personalized and engaging digital experiences to connect your customers, partners and employees. Take control of your UI with custom theming, integrate rich content from external content management systems and personalize your community with the audience platform and Community Builder.

sessions.sessionName: Developer Strategies from the Territory Management Trenches
sessions.sessionAbstract: Enterprise Territory Management 2.0 helps you delegate territory administration to your business users. Great - less work for us! But your users want to do more and with some customization you can extend the out-of-the-box capabilities. Learn how to work with its strengths and how to shore up shallow points. We will get in the weeds and you will take away code that solves many common use cases.

sessions.sessionName: Developer to CEO: Start Your Own Company
sessions.sessionAbstract: Many developers consider starting their own company. But if you've never been an entrepreneur, it can be hard to know where to get started, what to focus on, or the type of team needed to deliver success. Come learn all this and more in a fast-paced session that will lay out the path from idea to successful company with tips and tricks from the trenches given by a developer-turned-CEO who mentors and coaches entrepreneurs.

sessions.sessionName: Developing an Automated Data Quality Process
sessions.sessionAbstract: Create a harmonious and automated Salesforce data quality process with easy to customize tools and best practices. Beginning with the identification of data concerns, processes and standards of introducing data, cleansing and merging data and keeping the processes in place with automation and scheduled processes.

sessions.sessionName: Developing an Automated Data Quality Process
sessions.sessionAbstract: Create a harmonious and automated Salesforce data quality process with easy to customize tools and best practices. Beginning with the identification of data concerns, processes and standards of introducing data, cleansing and merging data and keeping the processes in place with automation and scheduled processes.

sessions.sessionName: Developing Lightning Apps with Flexipages and Components
sessions.sessionAbstract: Leveraging our best in class metadata platform this session will be a deep dive into the parts that make up a Lightning app. We will walk through flexipages and where they can be used to customize an app and how they control the layout of Lightning components. We'll also cover what's included in a Lightning app package and how a developer's customer can interact and customize the app post-installation.

sessions.sessionName: Developing Lightning Components for App Builder
sessions.sessionAbstract: In this session, we will guide you through the best practices of building a component for use in App Builder! We'll leverage UX guidelines, styling decisions and expose admin friendly properties. We'll also introduce brand new functionality: Building your own page template!

sessions.sessionName: Digital Connections In-Store: Use Sign-Ups and SMS for Shopper Engagement
sessions.sessionAbstract: The store is still the hub of retail with 90% of all transactions taking place in physical locations. Hear first hand how a focus on the single view of the customer and an emphasis on automation and optimization drive deeper shopper engagement. Learn how Rack Room Shoes and Off Broadway Shoes Warehouse builds a bridge for shoppers to stay connected from the store to email and SMS.åÊ

sessions.sessionName: Digital Engagement Starts Here: How Digital Identity Drives Customer Journeys
sessions.sessionAbstract: Customers are more connected than ever and they expect to be recognized across every channel of engagement: in person, on the web, in mobile apps, and even via connected products. Identity management provides the context you need to build a complete picture of your customer. Come hear how Salesforce Identity can help you better connect with your customers across every channel.

sessions.sessionName: Digital Mortgage: Borrowers can Finish the Process from Start-End in 16 Days
sessions.sessionAbstract: Borrowers are excited about buying homes, not purchasing mortgages. Digital-first mortgage applications are a great start to hastening the process but leading companies are driving innovation that is providing a significant competitive advantage. Learn how First Cal Mortgage is beating the average mortgage closing duration by over 66% using Salesforce and Roostify.

sessions.sessionName: Digitize the Store to Sell Smarter, Surprise and Delight your Shoppers
sessions.sessionAbstract: Unchain your associates from the cash wrap and customer binders by equipping them with tools in the palm of their hands to create personal and meaningful interactions with every customer that walks into your stores. With Clienteling, retailers can now harness a 360-degree view of the customer, product recommendations, and inventory information to dynamically change the in-store experience.

sessions.sessionName: Discover Commerce Cloud (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: What's the secret behind brands like Tory Burch, Uniqlo, Vineyard Vines, Birkenstock and L'Oreal? They are using Salesforce Commerce Cloud to power unified, AI-driven experiences that convert shoppers at every touchpoint?both online and in-store. Learn how you too can use Commerce Cloud to personalize the shopping experience, go to market faster, deliver continuous innovations, reinvent the in-store experience, and enable ?buy, service, and fulfill anywhere? experiences that will exceed customer expectations and crush sales targets.

sessions.sessionName: Discover Commerce Cloud (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: What's the secret behind brands like Tory Burch, Uniqlo, Vineyard Vines, Birkenstock and L'Oreal? They are using Salesforce Commerce Cloud to power unified, AI-driven experiences that convert shoppers at every touchpoint?both online and in-store. Learn how you too can use Commerce Cloud to personalize the shopping experience, go to market faster, deliver continuous innovations, reinvent the in-store experience, and enable ?buy, service, and fulfill anywhere? experiences that will exceed customer expectations and crush sales targets.

sessions.sessionName: Discover Commerce Cloud (3)
sessions.sessionAbstract: What's the secret behind brands like Tory Burch, Uniqlo, Vineyard Vines, Birkenstock and L'Oreal? They are using Salesforce Commerce Cloud to power unified, AI-driven experiences that convert shoppers at every touchpoint?both online and in-store. Learn how you too can use Commerce Cloud to personalize the shopping experience, go to market faster, deliver continuous innovations, reinvent the in-store experience, and enable ?buy, service, and fulfill anywhere? experiences that will exceed customer expectations and crush sales targets.

sessions.sessionName: Discover Commerce Cloud (4)
sessions.sessionAbstract: What's the secret behind brands like Tory Burch, Uniqlo, Vineyard Vines, Birkenstock and L'Oreal? They are using Salesforce Commerce Cloud to power unified, AI-driven experiences that convert shoppers at every touchpoint?both online and in-store. Learn how you too can use Commerce Cloud to personalize the shopping experience, go to market faster, deliver continuous innovations, reinvent the in-store experience, and enable ?buy, service, and fulfill anywhere? experiences that will exceed customer expectations and crush sales targets.

sessions.sessionName: Disrupting Sales with AI
sessions.sessionAbstract: Everyone is talking about how AI will fundamentally change the way we sell to and communicate with customers. But how? Join Salesforce Chief Digital Strategist Vala Afshar in conversation with industry experts Jim Dickie, Paul Greenberg, and Rebecca Wettemann on the future of selling and what you need to stay ahead of the AI curve.

sessions.sessionName: Distributed Marketing: Empower Franchises, Partners, and Advisors
sessions.sessionAbstract: Corporate marketers are often the stewards of customer experience, but what if most of your customer touchpoints are outside of the corporate marketing department? Regional marketers, franchise owners, partners, financial advisors and agents all need the tools to speak with the same voice and deliver cohesive, connected customer experiences. Learn how Tige Boats developed a Distributed Marketing strategy to arm it's dealers with the tools they needed to put the right customers down the right (branded!) journeys. Also, see a demo of the new Distributed Marketing platform from the Marketing Cloud, which is currently in Beta.

sessions.sessionName: DMP for Retail: How to Activate Online & Offline Data to Drive Sales
sessions.sessionAbstract: How are marketers with rich online and offline data leveraging data management to drive better audience segmentation, get improved efficiency in media delivery, and better understand cross-channel attribution? The Salesforce DMP team delivers an interactive presentation featuring use cases from Carrefour, Bol.com, and Kit and Ace.

sessions.sessionName: Do Not Fear the Command Line: You Are Smarter Than It
sessions.sessionAbstract: If you can write a formula in Salesforce, you too can harness the power of the command line. Many developers and admins want to do more with their orgs, and faster. Salesforce DX has the potential to democratize the command line and give them the power they didn’t even know they wanted. In this talk you will have a brief introduction to command lines, syntax, and a practical demonstration of several admin and configuration tasks, done using Salesforce DX.

sessions.sessionName: Don't Even Lift a Finger: Selling Faster with Lightning Dialer
sessions.sessionAbstract: Connect with your customers faster with Lightning Dialer. See in action how to increase rep efficiency with integrated click-to-call, automatic call logging, call lists, voicemail drops, and more! Join us to learn more about this exciting new productivity tool that allows your reps to get back to doing what they do best, selling.

sessions.sessionName: Dreamforce '17: Partner Kickoff
sessions.sessionAbstract: Welcome Partners! Join us in the Partner Lodge (Park Central Hotel) immediately after the Partner Keynote for lunch and a special tour of Dreamforce for Partners. From where to go, to what to do - we've got you covered with featured panels, killer sessions, prize giveaways, and much more. Don't miss it!

sessions.sessionName: Drive Customer Loyalty with Amazing Apps on Heroku
sessions.sessionAbstract: Every business needs loyal customers and that means developing a loyalty program that considers all customer touch-points. Learn how customers have built a digital customer loyalty platform with Salesforce and Heroku.

sessions.sessionName: Drive Customer Success Transformation Through Data Science & Analytics
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Salesforce is growing & innovating at a tremendous rate and our Customer Success teams need all the key insights & recommendations to be trusted advisors. A key strategy involves the effective use of advanced analytics, machine learning and AI to get necessary insights and drive better decisions. 

Join us to learn how the Customer Success & Growth organization drives the data digital transformation by leveraging Einstein Analytics to get predictive and prescriptive insights to drive value and build trust with our customers.

sessions.sessionName: Drive Efficiency in Brick and Mortars through Connected Technology, Employees
sessions.sessionAbstract: Living in a world of data and communication silos? You are not alone, but there is a fix. Come learn how to increase visibility and transparency from your home office to all your retail locations, make collaboration and communication hurdles a thing of the past, and empower your stores to hit a new level of operation through a dynamic suite of Salesforce for Retail tools.

sessions.sessionName: Drive Metrics Using Reports and Dashboards
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join us for an intimate and interactive discussion with other customers to learn about the leading Key Performance Indicators that drive the reports and dashboards you rely on to make your most important business decisions. We'll discuss best practices for identifying, creating, managing, and assigning metrics in your business

sessions.sessionName: Drive Mobile Adoption with Adoption Manager, powered by Thunder IoT
sessions.sessionAbstract: Quickly turn your mobile employees into Salesforce1 power users with Adoption Manager. In this session, the Adoption Manager product manager will discuss why and how admins should enable Adoption Manager and the results other orgs have gotten from using it.

sessions.sessionName: Drive Productivity with Salesforce and Gmail by Google
sessions.sessionAbstract: Your sales reps are only as valuable as their productivity. There is nothing more frustrating than knowing that the lifeblood of your organization is spending most of their time on admin tasks. Join us for this interactive session to learn more about the Salesforce & Gmail email integration that brings email, calendar and Salesforce together into one seamless mobile and desktop productivity app. The result? 25% more time spent selling.

sessions.sessionName: Drive Productivity with Salesforce and Outlook
sessions.sessionAbstract: Your sales reps are only as valuable as their productivity. There is nothing more frustrating than knowing that the lifeblood of your organization is spending most of their time on admin tasks. Join us for this interactive session to learn more about Salesforce & Outlook email integration that brings email, calendar and Salesforce together into one seamless mobile and desktop productivity app. The result? 25% more time spent selling.

sessions.sessionName: Drive Results with a Dynamic Change Management Program
sessions.sessionAbstract: Creating a Dynamic Change Management Program can make the difference between creating awareness vs driving adoption. Learn how to create a change management program that will ignite adoption

sessions.sessionName: Drive Results with a Dynamic Change Management Program
sessions.sessionAbstract: Creating a Dynamic Change Management Program can make the difference between creating awareness vs driving adoption. Learn how to create a change management program that will ignite adoption.

sessions.sessionName: Driving Adoption with Dashboards
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Implementing Salesforce will have an amazing impact on my professional services firm! I can’t wait to get our new users on board - but they can. Does this situation sound familiar?

We’re an accounting firm that struggled with Salesforce adoption by our business development-focused management team. What helped us turn things around? Dashboards. As an accounting firm, we love and understand numbers. Exposing our users to data in dashboards showed them what we could do in Salesforce if only they entered their data.

Attend this session for insight on how to engage your users and develop dashboards! Speakers:

sessions.sessionName: Driving End-to-End Information Security: Salesforce Best Practices
sessions.sessionAbstract: At Salesforce, nothing is more important to our company than the privacy of our customers' data. Successfully implementing data privacy and security is critical to your success in the cloud, but understanding how to get started and what principles to apply can be intimidating. Best practices can help! Join us as we share the most effective techniques for securing your Salesforce deployment and confidently scale your business in the cloud.

sessions.sessionName: Easy Einstein Setup: the No-Code Path to Data Science for the Entreprenerd
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Sales Cloud Einstein is different than every other AI solution on the market because #itjustworks. As an Entreprenerd, you’re looking to help your business grow faster with a little help from artificial intelligence. The good news? How easy it is to get up and running fast! Join this session to walk through the setup process, ask questions, and hear from a customer that deployed it themselves in minutes.
PRO TIP: Run the Sales Cloud Einstein Readiness Assessor before this session! Get your results in 3-5 minutes.

sessions.sessionName: Effective End-User Training
sessions.sessionAbstract: You just spent countless hours putting together training materials for your end-users, but moments after you begin your audience drifts away. How can you get through to them to ensure that they’ve understood not only enough to completely adopt Salesforce, but to become champions of it? I'm passionate about training, and in this session, I'll share my top tips and tricks learned from training thousands of end-users. You'll learn how to empower users, choose the best medium, create the best road map, leverage quick wins, and increase adoption and end-user retention.

sessions.sessionName: Einstein ABM: Find New Prospects & Increase Engagement with Advertising
sessions.sessionAbstract: Account-Based Marketing (i.e. "ABM") is all the rage for B2B marketers these days, but what does that actually mean in practice? Join us for an actionable session on how to leverage Advertising Studio and Pardot to find new high quality prospects with lookalike audiences on Facebook and Google that are similar to your best accounts, and how to improve account engagement through coordinated email and ad nurture programs.

sessions.sessionName: Einstein Account-Based Marketing: The Complete ABM Solution by Salesforce
sessions.sessionAbstract: Account-Based Marketing is a popular and much-hyped trend these days in B2B. Most practitioners and thought leaders in the space would agree that CRM plays a critical role in any Account-Based approach. But, did you know that Salesforce has a complete ABM solution powered by AI and built on the world’s most powerful CRM? Join our product team to learn how Salesforce is tackling the ABM trend, and see some simple customizations and features you could be using right now to power your ABM strategy, campaign execution, measurement, and campaign optimization.

sessions.sessionName: Einstein Analytics - Adoption Best Practices
sessions.sessionAbstract: This session will cover how to go from 0-100% fast with Einstein Analytics, including best practices in use case discovery, design, rollout and some common real-life pitfalls.

sessions.sessionName: Einstein Analytics - Tips and Tricks - Dashboards, Dataflows, SAQL
sessions.sessionAbstract: This session will cover various tips, tricks and workarounds that can be handy when building dashboards, constructing saql queries or composing dataflow to address business requirements.

sessions.sessionName: Einstein Analytics - What's New Winter 18
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Einstein Analytics is all about facilitating the Analytics experience for business users, admins, and developers, and we packed the Winter '18 release with features to help you make it happen. Attend this session to get a sneak peak of new features, functions, and visualizations.
