Explorer quickly makes sense of your data using the more intuitive explorer window, including new properties and functions for tables, visibility into dataset fields, and smart chart suggestions. Easier Dashboard building saves time by editing steps instead of re-creating them, and includes many more optimizations. Data integration into Analytics is easier with enhancements to the dataflow editor, dataset edit page, recipes, and replication setup page.

sessions.sessionName: Einstein Analytics Design Best Practices for Transforming Data to Insights
sessions.sessionAbstract: In this session, we will talk about the design team's process for building apps. Based on our conversations with several customers, we've realized that they struggle with finding a task-oriented and actionable visual representation of their business goals. This presentation will help the audience build a consumable interface that represents complex information, delivers insights, and ultimately brings about customer success.

sessions.sessionName: Einstein Analytics Developer Experience
sessions.sessionAbstract: This session will cover the Einstein Analytics Developer Experience (EADX), including SDKs, APIs, App Templates, and more.

sessions.sessionName: Einstein Analytics Governance and Lifecycle Management
sessions.sessionAbstract: Learn how Comcast setup Einstein Discovery and quickly began benefitting through immediate insights

sessions.sessionName: Einstein Analytics in HR: Driving Employee Success
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Salesforce's Employee Success Strategy & Analytics team uses Einstein Analytics to drive tactical and strategic decisions for various cross-functional teams. 

Come join us and see how the Employee Success Strategy & Analytics team (HR Analytics) uses the powers of Einstein Analytics External Data API and other open source tools to deliver value on Einstein Analytics in the areas of Employee Service and Employee Surveys.

sessions.sessionName: Einstein Analytics Success Community Panel: Ask the SI Experts Live!
sessions.sessionAbstract: You've seen them answer a large majority of the questions on the Einstein Analytics Success Community group. Here's your chance to ask questions about best practices live! Get your Twitter accounts and tough questions ready as we ask and answer in a fun, innovative format.

sessions.sessionName: Einstein Analytics Templates: Build. Customize. Sell
sessions.sessionAbstract: So, you've built a killer Einstein Analytics app, but now you need a way to help your customers make it their own. Einstein Analytics templates can be your secret weapon! This session will show AppExchange Partners what Einstein Analytics templates can do and give you the info you need to start building them into your own Analytics app. #DF17Partners

sessions.sessionName: Einstein Analytics: Genius Dashboards
sessions.sessionAbstract: Make your dashboard interactive and tell a vivid story using Einstein Analytics. You'll learn how to use design and navigation, filter and selection, and complex calculations (without any code!) can improve any dashboard from a standard flat set of reports to a highly interactive space to help drive decisions.

sessions.sessionName: Einstein and the Social Marketer
sessions.sessionAbstract: Social media marketing has become a vital pillar within an organization's digital marketing practice but managing a social media presence has become a daunting task. The high volume of social content plus the growth of non-text social content has made it difficult for social pros to keep up. Join us to discover how image intelligence and automation can help marketers scale their social business. Uncover actionable data, identify influencers, generate leads, and automate tasks to free your marketing team and increase ROI.

sessions.sessionName: Einstein Discovery: Customer Panel - Sales, Service, Marketing Use Cases
sessions.sessionAbstract: Learn from the real hands on experiences of our customer panel how Einstein Discovery changed their businesses and helped them truly become data driven companies.

sessions.sessionName: Einstein Guidance: Predictive Forecasting inside Salesforce
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Here at Salesforce, we use Einstein Guidance, a revenue forecasting tool used at C-level to get accurate and unbiased end-of-quarter estimates, as highlighted in Business Insider. Einstein Guidance uses state-of-the-art artificial intelligence, drawing from diverse fields ranging from traditional time-series forecasting to robotics to predict Salesforce’s quarterly revenue within a margin of 0.2% at the start of the quarter. This allows executives to take timely action to remediate shortfalls.

This talk will focus on the challenges inherent in creating good forecasts, Salesforce AI experts baked solutions to these problems into Einstein Guidance saving our customers the pain.

sessions.sessionName: Einstein is for Everyone!: Data Science for the Entreprenerd
sessions.sessionAbstract: CALLING ALL ENTREPRENERDS! We get it. You need to do more with less, and you’re not about doing business as usual. You’re looking to help your business grow faster with a little help from science. Data science and artificial intelligence, to be specific. Join this session to learn how you can increase sales productivity to sell more, faster. Added bonus: hear from a Sales Cloud Einstein customer and fellow Entreprenerd about the transformation they’ve realized with Sales Cloud Einstein!

sessions.sessionName: Einstein Platform Services: Best Practices
sessions.sessionAbstract: Once you've started using Einstein Platform Services it's time to dig deeper. Training parametrization, prediction feedback, model metrics and more will be demystified for you. A must-attend session for everyone who wants to get the most out of Einstein Platform.

sessions.sessionName: Einstein Platform Services: Overview
sessions.sessionAbstract: Einstein Platform Services offer a variety of APIs to enhance your companies processes. Learn in this session about the options like image recognition and object detection or classifying text utterances based on tone and type of action. After this session you'll have a solid understanding of what Einstein Platform is and how to use it.

sessions.sessionName: Einstein Platform Services: Turn Unstructured Data into Apps People will Love
sessions.sessionAbstract: Einstein offers a variety of Deep Learning APIs that allow developers of all skill levels to leverage the power of image recognition and natural language processing to build AI-enabled apps fast. With Einstein Platform Services, you can iterate quickly to build the most accurate models without the complexity of managing and maintaining them. Join this session to learn how to use Einstein Platform Services to make your applications smarter with deep learning-powered image recognition and natural language processing.

sessions.sessionName: Einstein Predictions: Taking the Pain Out of Enterprise-Grade AI
sessions.sessionAbstract: Artificial Intelligence (AI) has now become one of the hottest fields in the industry, so why can't businesses seem to find enough data scientists to make their business processes more intelligent? Even when they do find the talent they need, why is it so difficult to generate value across marketing, sales, and service departments? In this session we'll delve into these business process problems and show you how Einstein Predictions takes the pain out of scaling AI across your organization.

sessions.sessionName: Einstein's Auto-Machine Learning: Under the Hood
sessions.sessionAbstract: A typical Machine Learning pipeline involves a series of steps to build a single use model from a predefined set of product features. But at Salesforce, we need to build models for hundreds of thousands of customers who have very different behaviors and data. Join us as we share the challenges we faced building Salesforce Einstein's Machine Learning. Learn how we've automated the most repetitive Machine Learning tasks to build hundreds of thousands of models, while delivering quicker modeling turnaround and higher accuracy.

sessions.sessionName: Email Deliverability: How to Stay out of Email Jail
sessions.sessionAbstract: Deliverability is still a moving target and managing an email program while flying blind puts marketers at risk for potential failure. In this session, our panel of experts will share tips, tricks and best practices related to email deliverability.

sessions.sessionName: Email Marketing Power Admin: How to Configure and Launch Marketing Cloud
sessions.sessionAbstract: As retail businesseses grow, so do their digital marketing needs. Come learn how a leading disruptor in the plus size women's clothing category scaled their email marketing. What prompted the need to move to Marketing Cloud, how did they plan the migration and how did they move dozens of automated marketing programs in less than 28 days.

sessions.sessionName: Email Segmentation and Personalization Best Practices
sessions.sessionAbstract: Reaching the right audience with the right information is the goal of every marketer, but with so many ways to segment and personalize to audiences where do you start? Join Marketing Cloud experts to learn the top tips they have for delivering engaging customer experiences. You'll also learn how you can take full advantage of the segmentation and personalization features in Marketing Cloud and hear how your marketing peers are generating success in their own campaigns and messages.

sessions.sessionName: Email Studio, Mobile Studio, Content Builder and Journey Builder Product Roadmap
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join the messaging product team to learn about key trends in email and how Marketing Cloud will evolve to help you build deeper relationships with customers and prospects. Get key insights into the Email Studio, Mobile Studio, Content Builder, and Journey Builder roadmaps and share feedback with the product team during this interactive session.

sessions.sessionName: Email Studio, Mobile Studio, Content Builder and Journey Builder Product Roadmap
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join the messaging product team to learn about key trends in email and how Marketing Cloud will evolve to help you build deeper relationships with customers and prospects. Get key insights into the Email Studio, Mobile Studio, Content Builder, and Journey Builder roadmaps and share feedback with the product team during this interactive session.

sessions.sessionName: Embedded Analytics: Use Data to Empower Users at Decision Time
sessions.sessionAbstract: Analytics aren't just for managers anymore. With Einstein Analytics, today's end-users are armed with the data they need to take better decision. Join us to learn how Wave Analytics make it possible and how Dependable Auto Shippers uses it to empower service agents, streamlining call center operations and improving overall customer satisfaction.

sessions.sessionName: Embedding Lightning Components in Salesforce Email Integrations
sessions.sessionAbstract: Our email integrations are completely customizable. Users can configure the experience that they want displayed in Outlook or Gmail using the App Builder. Lightning components that come up in Outlook or Gmail give users the most relevant experience they need, so that can work the way they want. During this session, you will learn how to get new lightning components from the AppExchange and learn to develop your own to bring the much needed functionality that sales reps need in their Outlook or Gmail application to be more productive and sell faster.

sessions.sessionName: Employee Experience: Create Communities and Portals Fast with Lightning Bolt (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Lightning Bolt helps you deploy communities and portals faster and transform your digital employee experience. Learn how you can leverage the expertise and experience of our leading partners who are building industry specific solutions.

sessions.sessionName: Employee Experience: Create Communities and Portals Fast with Lightning Bolt (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Lightning Bolt helps you deploy communities and portals faster and transform your digital employee experience. Learn how you can leverage the expertise and experience of our leading partners who are building industry specific solutions.

sessions.sessionName: Empower Your Organization with Lightning Reports
sessions.sessionAbstract: Create powerful reports quickly and easily with the new Lightning Report Builder. See examples of reports that are useful to many organizations, and give feedback on additional functionality you would like available to you when building your reports.

sessions.sessionName: Empowering Admins with Salesforce Visual Workflow
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce has a lot of tools for Admins, but sometimes that makes it difficult to know where to start when you have to solve problems that seem to complex for workflows and validation rules. That's why I'm going to teach you how visual workflows in Lightning can empower Admins to quickly build dynamic, defined processes allow you to simplify user experience and increase data quality. You can deploy these screen flows to both desktop and mobile without writing any code in Lightning, making it easier for Admins to create and maintain custom solutions.

sessions.sessionName: Empowering Women in Leadership and Technology
sessions.sessionAbstract: Having a high performing technical team is powerful. Having a high performing technical team with roles ranging from developers, scrum masters, quality analysts, and directors—all of which are women—can be even more powerful. Check out this session to hear the inspiring success story of how an all women team engages and empowers one another in order to achieve excellence in advancing technology, leadership, and career progression.

sessions.sessionName: Enable Customers to Manage Their Field Service Activities in a Snap!
sessions.sessionAbstract: Deliver incredible Field Service with Field Service Lightning and the Customer Community. Give customers the ability to manage their entire experience via the web: reporting and diagnosing a problem, requesting a technician, managing the field service appointment, and even being able to view the estimate.

sessions.sessionName: Enabling DevOps Journey Using Maturity Model and Value Stream Architecture
sessions.sessionAbstract: As organizations depend on cross-functional teams to adopt DevOps practices, software delivery processes must support the need for business agility. Traditional development on Salesforce requires managing changes in sandboxes and using change sets for deployments. A value stream based maturity model provides a framework for managing the DevOps journey.

sessions.sessionName: Enabling Powerful Encryption @ Rest with Einstein Analytics
sessions.sessionAbstract: Encrypt your data in Einstein Analytics with no loss in functionality. Bring in sensitive data you were not able to analyze before with the security of encryption at rest. Utilize Shield key management to export, revoke, rotate, and bring your own keys.

sessions.sessionName: Energy: Discovering a Digital Platform for Asset Management and Revenue Growth
sessions.sessionAbstract: 20 years ago, ERP systems revolutionized asset performance for the energy industry. But times have changed and complex production facilities like power stations, wind and solar farms, oil and gas platforms, and refineries are due for an update. Keeping these expensive plants running is demanding and prone to error. Now’s the time to rethink how this work is done and the tools used to do it well. In this session, we will show how Salesforce can help you manage these complex assets — and accelerate growth.

sessions.sessionName: Engage, Delight, and Retain Employees with Awesome Experiences
sessions.sessionAbstract: In the Age of the Customer, your employees are more important than ever in delivering experiences that win and keep customers. But without the right tools, employees can't be engaged or productive and eventually... they'll leave. This session shows you how Salesforce can help you create the perfect employee space in minutes, complete with collaboration, file sharing, groups, mobility, integration, process automation, and a complete control over look-and-feel and content management.

sessions.sessionName: Engagement Studio Tips for the Savvy Marketer (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: You've mastered the basics of Engagement Studio. You've built killer programs and are seeing results. So, what now? Come join us to learn how to take your programs to the next level. You'll hear advanced tips and tricks to get the most out of your B2B lead nurturing efforts.

sessions.sessionName: Engagement Studio Tips for the Savvy Marketer (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: You've mastered the basics of Engagement Studio. You've built killer programs and are seeing results. So, what now? Come join us to learn how to take your programs to the next level. You'll hear advanced tips and tricks to get the most out of your B2B lead nurturing efforts.

sessions.sessionName: Enterprise Apps for Any Employee or Department in a Flash
sessions.sessionAbstract: Development of a new app can take a long time, particularly if developers need to rebuild from the ground up each time. Join us to learn how declarative tools are significantly shortening the time necessary for building and deploying modern UX applications. Join us to learn how the State of Colorado built more than 90 apps fast!

sessions.sessionName: Enterprise Grade Deployments on Heroku
sessions.sessionAbstract: This presentation is an exposé of the robust set of Heroku Enterprise features and their use cases in real production case studies. We cover Salesforce data integration opportunities with Heroku Connect, the use of Private Spaces to deploy contained micro-services, Pipelines, Flow, and Continuous Integration to elegantly deliver well tested software and more. Real world enterprise customer architectures will be used as case studies to discuss modern system integration techniques in concert with Heroku Enterprise features.

sessions.sessionName: Enterprise-Class Release Management with Copado
sessions.sessionAbstract: Discover how to boost your speed to deliver features and increase your product and process quality for Salesforce implementations with Copado, a Salesforce-native application integrating agile project management, code versioning, continuous integration, automated testing, code analysis on one platform from user story definition to production deployment.

sessions.sessionName: Everything You Need to Know About MySalesforce1
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Take the full power of Salesforce1, brand the app your way and list on the App Store and Google Play. That's the power of MySalesforce1, our new offering to let customers build and publish their very own Salesforce1 app.

This session will walk through the basics of building an employee app using Lightning App Builder, custom-branding it, and publishing to the app stores using the new Listing Wizard.

Learn how MySalesforce1 can let you be the hero in your organization by driving employee productivity through your very own mobile app.

sessions.sessionName: Evolve Your Community and Your Customer Experience
sessions.sessionAbstract: Communities are an important element in improving the overall customer experience. In this session we'll hear how this is taking place from two perspectives. Erica Kuhl, VP Success Community, will talk about how a community at scale (over 2 million members) has helped Salesforce customers over last 10 years and what's in store for the future. We'll also hear from a Community Cloud customer who is transforming the customer experience in the retail sector and how their community plays a central role.

sessions.sessionName: Executing at the Speed of the Market in Sasles, Trading and Research
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Global Markets organizations are investing in future-ready digital platforms to deliver new client experiences and address an ever changing regulatory world. Hear firsthand the best practices Global Markets firms are leveraging to deliver tools to their salespeople and research analysts that: 
Leverage better client data and unified client view to generate thoughtful insights
• Embed artificial intelligence to target and guide client interactions
• Track and report on client activities, preferences, and interests to help satisfy regulatory requirements such as MiFID II

sessions.sessionName: Experian: A Retrospective on their Global Deployment on a Single Org
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Join us to learn how Experian embarked on a multi year journey to reinvent themselves onto the Salesforce platform. Experian just completed a global CRM consolidation in 2016 reducing their CRM footprint from 20 legacy systems into a single enterprise B2B Salesforce instance with 5,000 user. 

In this session participants will learn how Experian set themselves up for success by:
o Defining and implementing a global CRM consolidation program
o Establishing a CRM strategy and governance: alignment with enterprise strategy, defining a roadmap, leading executive engagement
o Building and operating a global CRM Center of Excellence

sessions.sessionName: Expert Tips for Using Social Media to Deliver Amazing Customer Experiences
sessions.sessionAbstract: By 2020, customer experience will overtake price and product as a brand’s key competitive differentiator. Delivering an amazing customer experience across all touch points is pivotal as you and your customer base grow. Learn from Salesforce’s own social guru how you can harness the power of Social Media to deliver an unrivaled experience across sales, service, and marketing.

sessions.sessionName: Exploring Bulk API V2
sessions.sessionAbstract: Building scalable data loading solutions requires a robust API. The current Bulk API version has enabled customer to ingest millions of records per day, but as integrations and organization design become more complex, the need for a new Bulk API is evident. Join us to discover the capabilities of the now generally available bulk API v2 and how it can help your data ingestion needs.

sessions.sessionName: Exploring Cases: Program & Consituent Management for Nonprofit, Higher Ed & K-12
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce.org nonprofit and higher ed customers - Join us for an interactive discussion with other nonprofit customers to gain an understanding of Managing the services you provide to constituents more efficiently with native Salesforce functionality. This session will focus on covering the fundamental concepts and functionality that you can use to manage your Constituent Services more efficiently. In addition, we will collaborate on common service adoption challenges and share ways to use Analytics and KPIs to achieve operational excellence. Manage the services you provide to constituents more efficiently with native salesforce functionality.

sessions.sessionName: Extend Salesforce: Create and Consume APIs To Enrich Data In Your Enterprise
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce has APIs, but what happens when you need to integrate Salesforce with other endpoints that do not expose information as APIs? During this session you learn about how you can quickly and easily create APIs for non-Salesforce endpoints to integrate data seamlessly across your enterprise and with your partners.

sessions.sessionName: Extend the Power of Your CRM with Custom Apps Built on Heroku
sessions.sessionAbstract: Learn how Zayo transformed a complicated telecom purchase process into a delightful, fast and frictionless shopping experience using the power of the entire Salesforce Platform. In this session, you will learn how the Salesforce platform enables application development across the continuum from low-code to fully custom apps to deliver a compelling user experience.

sessions.sessionName: Extending the Report Builder with Custom Report Types
sessions.sessionAbstract: The Salesforce Report Builder provides Admins with an easy way to create reports, but sometimes the standard report templates just don’t provide you with the data you need. Join us as we demonstrate how to create Custom Report Types to create new report templates for you and your users. We’ll show how to extend the functionality of the Report Builder by using Custom Report Types to create your own report joins, rename column headers, create exception reports, replace cross-object formulas, and more.

sessions.sessionName: Extending Your JavaScript Toolbox
sessions.sessionAbstract: We increasingly rely on JavaScript front-ends to drive our User Interfaces. Join us as we quickly implement Webpack, a new tool that accelerates JavaScript development. Along the way we'll discover tips that help us to skip server compiles, use one line commands to build static resources, and improve the developer experience.

sessions.sessionName: Facebook and WeWork: Building Communities is Good for Business
sessions.sessionAbstract: Building business is also good for communities. Community benefits us at the most basic human level and on the broadest economic level. Dan Levy, VP at Facebook, and Jon Slavet, General Manager at WeWork, will discuss how the power of mobile technology can bring the world closer together and grow businesses — from online to offline, from a one-person business to a worldwide company, from local to global. Dan will share his perspective on how millions of businesses around the world can build, scale, mobilize and win. With the power of mobility in all our hands, this session will expand on how we can connect more, not less, to grow businesses, communities and the economy as a whole.

sessions.sessionName: Fast & Secure Blockchain Integration with Salesforce CPQ
sessions.sessionAbstract: The way we regulate and maintain contracts and transactions has to change in order to keep up with today's digital economy. Blockchain, the open, distributed ledger promises to solve this challenge. Join Salesforce CPQ and one of our customers for a review of best practices on how to quickly secure contracts and transactions using this revolutionary technology.

sessions.sessionName: Fearless Date and Time Formulas
sessions.sessionAbstract: Today’s the day! It’s about time! Pilot in Summer ’17 and Beta in Winter ’18 [FLS], Admins have a new data type at their fingertips: TIME! (12,000 IdeaExchange points!) We’ll check out this powerful new tool for admins and the awesome new time-related formula functions that came with it. We’ll also review the core date-related functions, and then put them all together into some rockin’ formulas to solve some common and creative use cases. No more cowering in fear from Leap Years or wondering why every four years your date formulas all get a day out of whack. No more hacky picklist workarounds for gathering time data. Let’s build confidence with date AND TIME functions and build absolutely bulletproof formulas…fearlessly!

sessions.sessionName: Female Leaders: Secrets to Building and Sustaining a Successful Startup
sessions.sessionAbstract: What are the secrets to building a successful startup in the most competitive place in the world? Join our power house of female startup leaders from PagerDuty, Speck, and Twilio that have grown and bred their companies in the heart of the Silicon Valley for an exciting session on how they built their businesses, the technology and tools that helped them scale, and how to keep up with the fast pace of living life in the limelight. They'll share advice for entrepreneurs looking to reach that next stage of growth -- with an interesting perspective on how their journeys may have differed from their male counterparts.

sessions.sessionName: Fidelity: How to deploy secure, compliant business apps with Salesforce Shield
sessions.sessionAbstract: At Salesforce, trust is our top priority. Earning that trust from our enterprise customers, especially those in regulated industries like Financial Services, requires that we meet rigorous security and compliance requirements. Join us to hear from Fidelity Investments on how they translated the security and compliance requirements to an actionable plan with Salesforce Shield. Learn how Fidelity Investments architected their Salesforce deployments along with Salesforce Shield Platform Encryption to deliver secure, compliant, performant business solutions.

sessions.sessionName: Field Service Lightning Roadmap: The Future of On-Site Customer Experience
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join us to hear the exciting innovation we've got planned for Salesforce's fastest growing new product: Field Service Lightning. We'll show you how today's intelligent routing and scheduling will grow to include inventory, billing, eSignature, and Internet of Things capabilities so you can connect with customers like never before.

sessions.sessionName: Financial Services: Building Trust with Balanced Digital and Human Interactions
sessions.sessionAbstract: To give customers the fast, convenient, and personalized service they want, leading global financial services institutions are using data and technology to humanize every interaction and create an effortless digital journey that leads to lasting loyalty. Join Trailblazers Grupo Cooperativo Cajamar, Pepper Financial Services, and Valiant Finance to hear how they balance digital innovation with human connection to deliver superior customer experiences.

sessions.sessionName: Five Fantastic Formulas For #AwesomeAdmins
sessions.sessionAbstract: Finding formulas frustrating? Let us show you some amazing formulas for Salesforce Admins to solve some tricky business needs. We’ll show you how to build a formula to account for Daylight Savings Time or how to get the 24 hour format of a Date/Time field. Learn to isolate certain words in complex text fields using nested FIND functions. We'll show you how to build out dynamic list views for your managers to return only their direct reports, and more!

sessions.sessionName: Five Key Traits for High Performing Marketing Organizations
sessions.sessionAbstract: The need to be a better marketer is apparent, but what makes you better? Brand new research from 7,000 marketers from around the world answers this very question. For the first time, we now know the difference between a high performer and an underperformer. To find out, listen to Mathew Sweezey as he shares the 5 key traits of high-performing marketing organizations such as what is a best in class budget, how many and what tools are high performers using, and even what are their winning tactics. Plus, you'll discover how to implement them in your organization.

sessions.sessionName: Five-Step Program To Building Indispensable Dashboards
sessions.sessionAbstract: Step-by-step walkthrough of evolution of a basic dashboard built using point-and-click to a fully interactive and personalized, mobile-enabled dashboard.

sessions.sessionName: Force.com Development in IntelliJ IDEA - What's New in Illuminated Cloud
sessions.sessionAbstract: Attendees will learn about the latest developments in Illuminated Cloud, the powerful Force.com plugin for JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA. The session will be conducted as a live demonstration of exciting new and upcoming features such as extensive support for the Salesforce DX development model, refactoring, intelligent source code generation, and client-side source code validation and auto-fixes that dramatically increase Salesforce developer code quality and productivity.

sessions.sessionName: Formulas for the Everyday Admin
sessions.sessionAbstract: Writing Formulas can be intimidating, but they don't need to be! Join us to learn some simple, yet powerful "Plug & Play" Formulas, Tips & Tricks. Whether you're building a Workflow Rule or Lightning Process Builder, or trying to create a Validation Rule, a Formula Field, a Report Custom Summary Formula. It doesn't matter if you're a beginner or advanced Admin, which Edition your Salesforce org is on, or if you're on Lightning or Classic. You can take these Formulas home and deploy them in your own Salesforce org TODAY!

sessions.sessionName: From 0 to 60: Eurostar’s Path to Unify Consumer Experience Across Marketing, Sal
sessions.sessionAbstract: In an era where European high-speed railway carriers are striving for excellence, Eurostar is setting an ambitious goal for itself: to become the most loved travel experience in Europe. Moving from 'transport' to 'travel', learn how Eurostar is transforming its organization, by developing a customer-first philosophy and ecosystem. Hear how Eurostar has created a centralized view of its customers, using a combination of 3 Salesforce Products: Marketing Cloud, DMP and Service Cloud to optimize its marketing and customer service strategies and improve consumer engagement and traveler satisfaction.

sessions.sessionName: From Accidental to Awesome Admin: What I Wish I Knew When I Started
sessions.sessionAbstract: It isn't easy to learn how to be an Awesome Admin. Join to hear stories about overcoming common challenges of becoming an Awesome Salesforce Admin. Learn why documentation and governance are critical, the importance of naming conventions, and why you should channel your inner 3-year old and keep asking "Why?"

sessions.sessionName: From Change Sets to DX – The Evolution of Collaboration
sessions.sessionAbstract: Key concepts when transitioning from change cets to Salesforce DX. Transition challenges when moving to source control driven model, behavioral differences between change sets and DX for the key metadata types like Processes, Lightning components etc. Best practices when checking-in changes to source control, role of DX in enhancing collaboration.

sessions.sessionName: From Classic to Lightning: The Future of Knowledge
sessions.sessionAbstract: Knowledge has been reimagined to take advantage of the power of Lightning. Join this session to learn about all of the new features in Lightning Knowledge, how easy it is to configure and customize your Knowledge experience, what will be required to migrate, and to hear about the Lightning Knowledge Roadmap.

sessions.sessionName: From Crowdfunding to Grants Management, K-12 Fundraising That Makes Cents
sessions.sessionAbstract: Whether tracking federal, state, local, or private grants; running fundraising campaigns; managing payment schedules; or reporting out on results - see why thousands of education institutions and nonprofits use Salesforce to raise more funds. Hear from a large district that raises over $10M a year via grants and crowdfunding with Salesforce. And see how a private school uses Salesforce to supercharge their fundraising and advancement efforts.

sessions.sessionName: From Idea to App: Three Winning Appventurer Stories
sessions.sessionAbstract: In a thrilling contest to create highly impactful apps on the Salesforce Platform, three teams stood out from the competition. Learn how you can ideate, validate and deliver apps and be the hero your company deserves.

sessions.sessionName: From Intuition to Insight: 3 Provocations from the Frontiers of AI
sessions.sessionAbstract: How confident are you in your intuition? For aeons, human intuition has served as a critical component in complex decision making. Now, artificial intelligence threatens to usurp it with powerful tools for finding connections in large datasets that humans often can't understand. In this session, we offer three provocations from the leading edge of man-machine decision-making to shine a light on how we might ensure that the AI systems we design help instead of hinder us in the long term.

sessions.sessionName: From Zero to Code - the Vision of Salesforce DX
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce is the only platform that provides a unified model for developing from no code to low code to code. Get the inside scoop on our vision for the future of building on the Salesforce Platform with Salesforce DX.

sessions.sessionName: From Zero to Service - How to Setup Service Cloud in 15 Minutes
sessions.sessionAbstract: In this fast-paced session, learn how to get your company up and running with Service Cloud in 15 minutes or less! We will show you how to try out Service Cloud for free and setup Service Cloud using clicks (no developers needed). You'll walk away with everything you need to start providing intelligent service to your customers.

sessions.sessionName: Fundamentals of Building Amazing Mobile Apps with the Salesforce SDK
sessions.sessionAbstract: Customer demands and expectations for mobile apps continue to grow?Is your mobile strategy keeping up? Hear from a Salesforce customer who recently completed the entire mobile app process from initial planning and budgeting, to successful app deployment and maintenance. Learn best practices that can be applied to your business, and find out how Salesforce is making mobile app development faster and easier.

sessions.sessionName: Fundraising for Nonprofits - Donor Acquisition: Prospecting & Qualification
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce.org nonprofit customers - Learn how the Salesforce Nonprofit Success Pack (NPSP) can help your fundraising team increase and diversify your new donor pool. We'll collaborate on and review best practices for using Salesforce to more effectively prospect and qualify potential donors.

sessions.sessionName: Fundraising for Nonprofits - Donor Engagement: Cultivation & Solicitation
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce.org nonprofit customers - Learn how the Salesforce Nonprofit Success Pack (NPSP) can help your fundraising team cultivate and sustain major donors. We'll collaborate and review best practices for using Salesforce to engage donors, solicit gifts, and maximize your fundraising strategy.

sessions.sessionName: Gain Insight and Take Action with Einstein Analytics for Service
sessions.sessionAbstract: Do you have to wait for data analysts to consolidate information into key reports? Are your predictive models running in a siloed system? See how business users can gain insight and take action by monitoring key performance indicators and analyzing trends with Einstein Analytics for Service. Take this to the next level by providing business users with predictions in the context of the moment and recommendations in a natural language.

sessions.sessionName: GDPR Right to be Forgotten and Data Security for Marketers
sessions.sessionAbstract: Learn how you can use tools within the Marketing Cloud to comply with a General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) Right to be Forgotten (RTBF) request and how you can effectively secure your data. In this session we will discuss how the Contacts Framework helps you manage individual contact data across marketing channels. Additionally, you will learn how field level encryption works within Marketing Cloud, how keys are managed, and how encrypted data flows between Sales and Service Cloud into Marketing Cloud.

sessions.sessionName: Get Aligned With the Einstein Analytics Mobile SDK
sessions.sessionAbstract: A good dashboard can focus your business and shine the light on metrics that help to make important decisions. Imagine holding that dashboard in your hand! This session will cover real world examples of how to use the Einstein Analytics Mobile SDK including a specific use case of embedding an Einstein Analytics dashboard in Align Technology's custom mobile app. You'll walk away with specific guidance on how to deep link to a dashboard from the mobile app and a good understanding of the benefits and lessons learned from using the Einstein Analytics mobile SDK.

sessions.sessionName: Get Ready for Lightning for the Large Enterprise Customer
sessions.sessionAbstract: Are you ready for the switch to a new and modern user experience? Do you need strategic and technical guidance to help you get ready for all future developments on the platform that will happen within the new Lightning UI? Learn from our top Program Architects on how they?ve helped other Salesforce customers migrate to Lightning and overcome roadmap challenges and complexity.

sessions.sessionName: Get Rid of URL Hacks in Lightning Experience
sessions.sessionAbstract: If you've been a Salesforce customer for years, you've likely used URL hacks in your org. Now that you want to migrate to Lightning Experience, these URL hacks are an issue. Learn what you can do as an Awesome Admin to replace them with standard Salesforce features.

sessions.sessionName: Get Started Building AI into your AppExchange App
sessions.sessionAbstract: As an AppExchange Partner, are you trying to understand how your app can leverage Einstein? In this session, we'll discuss the various use cases and how AppExchange Partners can leverage Salesforce Einstein in their applications. We'll cover the Einstein Platform Services available today, provide demos of a few of the key capabilities, and share the roadmap for relevant updates. This session is a must-attend for any current and potential partners looking to understand how to integrate Einstein into their application. #DF17Partners

sessions.sessionName: Get Started on the Salesforce Platform with Sales Cloud (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: SMBs need a CRM that is easy to try, easy to use, and easy to scale your business with. Plus, every sales rep wants time back in their day to close more deals - with Einstein embedded into the platform, you'll never have to log sales activities again. Let's talk about your path to success and how Sales Cloud can help you grow your business.

sessions.sessionName: Get Started with the Salesforce Partner Community
sessions.sessionAbstract: What if you could have Dreamforce-type access every day? With the Partner Community - you can! Take free training, get answers directly from Salesforce staff members, learn about important updates, and collaborate with other partners. The Partner Community is your one-stop shop for education, enablement, and engagement. Join us to understand all of the resources available to you in the Partner Community, hear new (and future) enhancements, and see a live demo. If you need help signing up, go to http://p.force.com/signup. #DF17Partners

sessions.sessionName: Get to Market Faster with the New Onboarding Wizard
sessions.sessionAbstract: New AppExchange Partners, want to started with the AppExchange Partner Program? Join us in this session to learn about the new and improved onboarding wizard that can streamline your enrollment. This is a must attend session for anyone considering joining the AppExchange Partner Program. #DF17Partners

sessions.sessionName: Get Your CFO Excited for Mobile Service!
sessions.sessionAbstract: The verdict is in! Customers don't want to sit on the phone and wait for service - they want to interact with businesses like they interact with friends and family. But if you're thinking of investing in new chat or text service channels, how do you prove the value to your CFO? Come see how Salesforce customers have been able to drive down costs AND increase NPS via mobile service.

sessions.sessionName: Getting a 360 View: Student Success & Case Management with Salesforce for K-12
sessions.sessionAbstract: Every day teachers are thrown into the deep end of the data pool. Traditionally, teachers use notebooks, file folders, stacks of papers, baskets, more file folders etc. to contain this data. Salesforce for K-12 provides classroom teachers with the organizational systems to add and interact with classroom data that is mission critical to instructional decision making.

sessions.sessionName: Getting Started with an Inherited Salesforce Org Nonprofit, Higher Ed & K-12 (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce.org nonprofit and higher ed customers - Nowadays it is rare for Admins to start from scratch with a new Salesforce implementation. It's more likely that an Admin will inherit an org that has been around for a few years and contains lots of customizations, but little documentation. This session is intended to provide a framework for new Admins to successfully assess and manage an inherited Salesforce org. Let's discuss and collaborate where to start with your assessment, what tools can help assess your org health and what action you can take relatively quickly to improve the usability of your org.

sessions.sessionName: Getting Started with an Inherited Salesforce Org Nonprofit, Higher Ed & K-12 (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce.org nonprofit and higher ed customers - Nowadays it is rare for Admins to start from scratch with a new Salesforce implementation. It's more likely that an Admin will inherit an org that has been around for a few years and contains lots of customizations, but little documentation. This session is intended to provide a framework for new Admins to successfully assess and manage an inherited Salesforce org. Let's discuss and collaborate where to start with your assessment, what tools can help assess your org health and what action you can take relatively quickly to improve the usability of your org.

sessions.sessionName: Getting Started with Customer Service
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join us for an intimate and interactive discussion with other customers to learn about strategies and best practices on how to leverage Service Cloud to streamline post-sales functions such as Customer Support, Finance, Logistics and more. We will discuss about Salesforce capabilities that help support a consistent process and documentation in your business. We will also discuss best practices for using computer telephony integration (CTI) and chat.

sessions.sessionName: Getting Started with Lightning Components
sessions.sessionAbstract: The Lightning Framework allows you to work with resuable components instead of starting from scratch every time. Learn from professionals in the the industry some of the tips and best practices for developing components using the Lightning Framework.

sessions.sessionName: Getting Started with Marketing Cloud Einstein Engagement Scoring
sessions.sessionAbstract: One of the newest Einstein innovations in Marketing Cloud, Einstein Engagement Scoring will change the way you segment and target audiences forever. Join the Marketing Cloud Einstein product team to learn about how it works, best practices and use cases that every marketer in any industry will be able get started with!

sessions.sessionName: Getting Started with Salesforce Customizations
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join us for an intimate and interactive discussion with other customers where we will focus on sharing common challenges with identifying, building and augmenting Salesforce using its native button-click customization features. We will discuss best practices on how you can customize Salesforce to align with your business processes.

sessions.sessionName: Getting Started with Salesforce Customizations Nonprofit, Higher Ed and K-12 (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce.org nonprofit and higher ed customers - Mirror your nonprofit process within your Salesforce instance to improve efficiency and boost adoption. This session will be a highly interactive small group discussion where we will focus on: Collaboratively learning what types of customizations can be made; Identify common challenges with identifying, building, and augmenting your organization's Salesforce instance. Discuss best practices for customizing Salesforce to meet your organization's needs.

sessions.sessionName: Getting Started with Salesforce Customizations Nonprofit, Higher Ed and K-12 (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce.org nonprofit and higher ed customers - Mirror your nonprofit process within your Salesforce instance to improve efficiency and boost adoption. This session will be a highly interactive small group discussion where we will focus on: Collaboratively learning what types of customizations can be made; Identify common challenges with identifying, building, and augmenting your organization's Salesforce instance. Discuss best practices for customizing Salesforce to meet your organization's needs.

sessions.sessionName: Getting Started with the New Apex Metadata API
sessions.sessionAbstract: In this session we give an overview of the newly launched Apex Metadata API and demonstrate how it can be used to manipulate page layouts. We discuss business scenarios where the Apex Metadata API can become a great tool, and future roadmap of Metadata API.

sessions.sessionName: Getting starting with DX in VS Code
sessions.sessionAbstract: Come join us for a quick introduction to our new extension for Visual Studio Code. We'll explain its functionality, highlight interesting features and explain best practices for an easy start with Salesforce DX.

sessions.sessionName: Getting The Most Out of Security Scans
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce Security Engineers will explain the differences between scanner types, pros and cons of each, and how to be sure you're using each in the best way possible. Join us for demos of what you can expect to find with scanners - and what you won't.

sessions.sessionName: Give Service Agents Insight to Community Activity with Community 360
sessions.sessionAbstract: A hallmark of a great service experience is interacting with an agent who already is aware of your issues and is prepared to solve your problems. With Community 360, now your service agents can see a customer's community activity, giving them helpful insight to enhance every service interaction.

sessions.sessionName: Give your technicians effortless, Eureka moments with Field Service Lightning
sessions.sessionAbstract: See how employees out in the field don't have to be left out in the cold. Using the Field Service Lightning mobile app, technicans have all the information they need and more at their fingertips. They'll have all the information about the job, knowledge articles to help, customer information, asset history and more! What more you ask? Let Einstein Vision identify parts for them! No more scrolling through thousands of parts trying to figure out the correct one. Harness the power of artificial intelligence in your field operations!

sessions.sessionName: Global Research: The Second Annual State of Sales
sessions.sessionAbstract: The latest "State of Sales" research report, based on a survey of over 3,000 executives, managers and representatives worldwide, found that meeting customer expectations is the top challenge for today's sales organizations. Join Tiffany Bova as she analyzes what high-performing sales teams do differently to measure success, set strategic priorities, and leverage technology as key competitive differentiators. You'll walk away with actionable best practices on how to help your team thrive in the Age of the Customer.

sessions.sessionName: Global Research: The Second Annual State of Service
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join Vala Afshar as he covers comprehensive cross-industry services research gathered from over 2,600 global customer service leaders. This session explores the common goals, obstacles, and success measures for today's service teams, what sets high-performing organizations apart from underperformers, and the areas in which service is supercharging efforts to grow business, gain market share, and delight customers.

sessions.sessionName: Global Sales Made Easy: 3 Stories of Success Selling Across The Atlantic
sessions.sessionAbstract: Do you have teams based in Europe and North America? Do want to know how to make them both successful? This session is for you. Hear how 3 of our customers are growing revenue across the world from their home base in Europe. It's a can't miss session full of best practices for sales in global markets.

sessions.sessionName: Go From Quote To Contract To Signed Without Friction Using Nintex
sessions.sessionAbstract: Accelerating any stage of the sales cycle reaps instance benefits for both your customers and business. However, eliminating friction can be challenging. There is a better way! See how Nintex Workflow enables you to rapidly automate, analyze, and optimize any sales process with powerful, yet easy-to-use intelligent process automation.

sessions.sessionName: Go Password-Free with Lightning Login
sessions.sessionAbstract: "I love passwords!" said no one ever. Agonize over forgotten passwords no more with Lightning Login! Using the power of the free Salesforce Authenticator app, Lightning Login both increases security and improves user experience. We'll walk through set up with a live demo showing how easy it is to set up, provide greater security and enhance user login experience with Lightning!

sessions.sessionName: Governance and Centers of Excellence
sessions.sessionAbstract: Having the right Governance and an effective Center of Excellence (CoE) are key components of any successful innovation and transformation program. Join us for an engaging conversation, including Salesforce experts and a special customer guest, where we will discuss the critical role Governance and CoE fills to ensure you get the most from your Salesforce investment.

sessions.sessionName: Grow Revenue with 3 Proven Pipeline Management Strategies
sessions.sessionAbstract: Every sales force has some form of sales pipeline yet most use it only for reporting & forecasting purposes. Would you like to learn how cutting-edge sales teams are managing pipeline to actually grow revenue by up to 28%? Join best-selling author Jason Jordan in a workshop format as he reveals best practices to building a healthy sales pipeline to grow revenue by design.

sessions.sessionName: Grow Your Business: Best Practices to Drive Adoption and Success
sessions.sessionAbstract: You've implemented the Sales Cloud, but now comes the hard part — rolling it out to your teams. Join us to learn tips, tricks, and best practices from Salesforce customers who have succeeded in driving adoption among their sales teams and the resulting business benefits.

sessions.sessionName: Hacking the Salesforce Console
sessions.sessionAbstract: Built for speed, the Salesforce Console is one of the most powerful and customizable aspects of the platform. Did you know you can also control the Console with JavaScript? The Lightning Console JavaScript API and the Console Integration Toolkit allow you to control tabs and components, pass data using events, and more. Learn the basics in this session, as well as some extraordinary tricks to make the console even more powerful.

sessions.sessionName: Happy Customers in 3 Steps with Service Cloud
sessions.sessionAbstract: Happy customers are loyal customers. Sit with us to see how easy it is to make your customers love you with Service Cloud, in just three easy steps. Deliver personal customer service, make smarter and faster decisions, and provide self-help options for your beloved customers!

sessions.sessionName: Harnessing the Power of the Marketing Cloud
sessions.sessionAbstract: AMPscript, Marketing Cloud's proprietary scripting language, is one of the most powerful tools in digital marketing. Join us as we discuss AMPscript functionality and use cases; we'll also get fancy with a showcase. Whether you're new to scripting or a veteran, you'll gain new insights into this incredible technology.

sessions.sessionName: Having flexibility in your B2C selling model
sessions.sessionAbstract: Hear how Person Accounts provides a flexible model for our top customers to sell more in a B2C economy, all on the Customer Success Platform. Dig into the top ways Person Accounts can drive deeper engagement with your key individual customers and prospects.

sessions.sessionName: Health Cloud for Healthcare: Contain Costs and Achieve Patient & Member Outcomes
sessions.sessionAbstract: Technology is empowering healthcare to reimagine the patient, member, and care-team experience. Learn how fellow healthcare organizations are using Health Cloud to accelerate network collaboration, increase engagement, and drive more effective care across populations. Join us as we dive deeper into how Health Cloud delivers a next-generation engagement platform across the care continuum. From reducing readmissions to longitudinal care management, hear inspiring stories from customers on how they personalize patient and member journeys at scale.

sessions.sessionName: Health Cloud for Life Sciences: Build Personal, Long-Term Patient Relationships
sessions.sessionAbstract: Hear from fellow life science professionals and learn how they are using Health Cloud to manage patients and transform the patient experience by offering personalized, connected, and mobile solutions, making it possible to gain important insights supporting patient adherence, population heath management, and value-based care.

sessions.sessionName: Healthcare and Life Sciences Compliance in the Cloud: HIPAA, Part 11, and GDPR
sessions.sessionAbstract: Trust is our top priority at Salesforce. Earning and sustaining that trust from our healthcare and life sciences customers requires that we address the safeguards and regulations specific to healthcare compliance. Join Salesforce architecture experts and legal counsel to learn about our compliance evaluation process and our role in providing a platform that empowers your compliance programs.

sessions.sessionName: Healthcare Payers: Grow Membership and Improve Satisfaction with CRM
sessions.sessionAbstract: Learn from payer industry leaders as they create a complete view of the member, to grow membership, distinguish service, collaborate with brokers and providers, and improve satisfaction. See how a connected member journey across sales, service, marketing, and care management can exist, complementing existing systems.

sessions.sessionName: Healthcare Providers: Streamline Operations and Drive Efficiency with CRM & Apps
sessions.sessionAbstract: Hear leading healthcare providers discuss how they are streamlining their business workflow and operations to increase efficiency and transform the patient experience. See how Salesforce CRM and custom apps help the business of healthcare move quickly and effectively.

sessions.sessionName: Help Customers Help Themselves with 24/7 Self-Service
sessions.sessionAbstract: Many of today's savvy customers would rather access information themselves than wait on hold to speak to a customer service representative. While meeting customer expectations with a modern, effortless self-service channel, organizations also reduce service costs by diverting interactions to the portal. Learn how Salesforce Communities are a win-win by providing a first line of support, empowering customers to find information, crowd-source collaborative answers, request services, and resolve their issues.

sessions.sessionName: Help Customers Help Themselves with Communities
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Curious about how Salesforce Communities can open new doors and growth opportunities for your Small Business? Want to help your customers, help themselves? 

Join Master Solution Engineer, Iman Maghroori, as he dives into various Small Business use cases for the Community Cloud.

sessions.sessionName: Help your Employees be more Productive with Best In Class Service
sessions.sessionAbstract: Learn how you can improve your employee experience by providing a best in class internal helpdesk solution. In a single, mobile-optimized hub, employees can easily find information, ask questions, log tickets, and get personalized support from the right people fast. Reduce down time and ensure every employee has what they need to be their best. In this session you will hear how top companies have dramatically minimized service costs, maximized employee productivity and employee satisfaction, and supercharged business productivity.

sessions.sessionName: Helping IT and Business Units Form Successful Partnerships in Large Enterprises
sessions.sessionAbstract: Do your Business and Technology Teams operate like sibling rivals? Oil and Water? Estranged spouses? To develop an overwhelmingly successful CRM business strategy, you need to work at strengthening the relationship between your business and technology teams. Learn how Getty Images synchronized objectives, split ownership, pooled budget and most importantly, openly and willingly shared credit between the Business Program Management and Technology Delivery teams. This collegial, team-oriented partnership resulted in a successful global CRM transformation across 30 offices in 20 countries. Come learn how to do the same at your company.

sessions.sessionName: Heroku Superpowers: Tips & Tricks for Boosting Your Team's Productivity
sessions.sessionAbstract: Are you looking for ways for your engineering to save time and be more efficient? Then don't miss this session with Mike Coutermarsh from Product Hunt, who will share his tips and tricks for being more productive when using Heroku. These tips will be quick, actionable and relevant for any programming language or stack.

sessions.sessionName: How a Customer Closed The Contract Loop With Electronic Signatures
sessions.sessionAbstract: There's nothing worse than getting to the final steps of closing the deal, only to have a delay with the contract, or to have the process fall to paper, especially in an industry as progressive and fast as media. This can cause a ripple effect throughout the business, throwing forecasting and revenue recognition out of alignment. If only there was a solution to ensure accurate quotes are delivered quickly, contracts are signed in a timely fashion, and everything is recorded, so we can proceed to deliver the best service to our customers. One of our customers has solved this challenge with Salesforce CPQ and eSignLive. Attend this session to get key insights on how this media titan implemented a better quote-to-contract process and how easy it is now to close deals faster than ever before.

sessions.sessionName: How Adidas Implemented Chatbot Into Their Service Cloud
sessions.sessionAbstract: The audience will learn the steps Adidas has taken to implement the new Live Agent Chatbot which will be in Beta in Winter 18 Release. In this session you'll learn directly from managers and developers at Adidas the need for the bot and things their developers had to do to implement it. This includes writing Apex classes, adding Natural Language Processing and creating a Bot builder. There will be a live demo of the bot and how various parts work to make it happen.

sessions.sessionName: How Amplify Credit Union Drove 50% More Leads and 11x ROI with Marketing Cloud
sessions.sessionAbstract: Amplify, an Austin, Texas-based credit union, grew leads 50%, slashed cost per acquisition 50%, and achieved over 1000% ROI with Marketing Cloud! Amplify migrated from 80 disparate systems to Marketing Cloud and Sales Cloud to drive relevance and productivity gains. Learn valuable lessons learned from their rapid 59-day implementation journey.

sessions.sessionName: How an IDE Can Turn #AwesomeAdmins into #AwesomeSuperheroAdmins
sessions.sessionAbstract: Why should you use an IDE, if you have Setup already in the org? Because you can do everything with fewer clicks, less memorizing where things are, less jumping between many pages. See the full picture, and get the right tools, inside one convenient control center, and at your fingertips.

sessions.sessionName: How Autodesk Changed Their Development Culture to Explore and Adopt Lightning
sessions.sessionAbstract: At Autodesk, we are constantly looking for new ways to sell and to drive the future of selling things. We see getting to Lightning as a key initiative to doing that. In this session you will hear how Autodesk changed their internal development culture to adopt Lightning Components and how they leveraged the Lightning Design System to give to the user a seamless experience that helped the transition to the Lightning Experience.

sessions.sessionName: How B2B Commerce Is Transforming Channel Sales
sessions.sessionAbstract: Power has shifted away from vendors as channel partners look for faster ways to recognize value from their partnerships. In order to win partner mindshare, businesses are tuning to e-commerce solutions as part of an end-to-end partner engagement platform. Join us to learn how one of our customers and Sales Cloud PRM are helping businesses make channel sales fast and easy with B2B commerce.

sessions.sessionName: How Brooksource Drove Automation with Lightning
sessions.sessionAbstract: Learn how Brooksource harnessed the power of Lightning to automated their business process to achieve business growth and drive adoption!

sessions.sessionName: How Chatter fuels the culture of collaboration at Salesforce
sessions.sessionAbstract: Have you ever calculated the time spent tracking down information like deal status, latest competitive positioning, pricing, answers to RFP questions, etc.? It's a lot. There has to be a better way, right? There is - and it's called Chatter. Join us as we demonstrate how Salesforce uses Chatter to alleviate these obstacles and help you get your sales done faster and more effectively.

sessions.sessionName: How Cisco Delivered a Lightning Pilot in Six-Week!
sessions.sessionAbstract: Discover how Cisco was able to deliver a successful pilot of Lightning to end-users in six-weeks. Managing a complex and integrate business process it is not easy to move to a new platform quickly. Cisco was able to mobilize the Business and IT to craft a pilot strategy and execute it quickly. Find out how the did it and the results they achieved!

sessions.sessionName: How Data.com Products are Evolving and What You Can Do to Prepare
sessions.sessionAbstract: Are you a Data.com customer curious about our roadmap and our new data solutions? Join our product leaders to learn about the current state of Data.com Clean and Prospector. We'll share our plan for the existing features and products, and how you can look into and start preparing for a transition to our new solutions.

sessions.sessionName: How Does Cake Boss Offer Sweet eCommerce Customer Experiences with the Platform?
sessions.sessionAbstract: Carlo’s Bakery aka "Cake Boss" takes advantage of the power of Salesforce App Cloud and AppExchange apps to provide awesome online Customer Experiences to their customers. Cake Boss CIO Leo Minervini says "As we grow, we want to keep our focus on building fantastic wedding cakes and customer experiences, not on IT infrastructure". We'll explore how Retail/eCommerce companies can too with this sessions on the best practices around AppCloud and finding, installing and managing AppExchange applications. Leo will also share their journey from a small retailer to a global brand with a major focus on providing amazing customer experiences in store and online. We'll also share how we're leveraging Salesforce Lightning to take these experiences to the next level.

sessions.sessionName: How FareCompare's email engagement takes flight with Einstein
sessions.sessionAbstract: Travelers can be fickle -- consuming content ferociously when in the market, but often preferring a more hands-off approach when not traveling. FareCompare knows these challenges well as one of the leading travel deal sites in the world. When they began noticing high unsubscribe rates and low engagement from their regular promotional emails, they turned to Einstein for help. In this session you'll learn how they were able to effectively identify at risk subscribers and lower unsubscribe rates while honing in the message to their engaged audience to drive high ROI.

sessions.sessionName: How HCSC Turns Data into Opportunities in the Health Insurance Payer Market
sessions.sessionAbstract:
In today's highly competitive and rapidly evolving health insurance market, it's more important than ever for insurance payers to rethink their marketing, sales and service strategies. Join us for this session to learn how one of the largest health insurers--HCSC--is capitalizing on its vast data to transform its approach to group sales and more. 

Along with Salesforce industry experts, HCSC's thought leaders will discuss: 
- Health insurance trends, challenges and opportunities 
- Acquisition tactics for creating and nurturing leads with cost-conscious employers and time-strapped brokers
- Cross-channel tips for selling new products and reducing attrition 
- How to leverage data to deliver personalized and timely experiences.

sessions.sessionName: How High Performing Software Teams Use Heroku Pipelines for Continuous Delivery
sessions.sessionAbstract: Continuous Integration and continuous delivery are the key to code quality, product agility, and engineering velocity. In this session, you’ll learn how your team can use Heroku Pipelines and Heroku CI to make continuous delivery simple and flexible. The Git-based methodology provides for a pipeline through which code begins as a fully executable pull request, goes through automated unit and integration tests, is automatically merged to test and staging apps, and is then deployed to production with a single click. Some customers are able to deploy features and fixes up to 500+ times a week, with very few rollbacks from production.

sessions.sessionName: How HPE Initiated a Global Service Transformation at Scale with Salesforce
sessions.sessionAbstract: Business transformations have a beginning. Something that sparks the need to change the way things are done. Join us as we discuss how HPE PointNext initiated a successful deployment of Service Cloud during their transformational journey.

sessions.sessionName: How I Built This: Geek Hive
sessions.sessionAbstract: Whether you are in growth mode or just looking to streamline how your teams collaborate, having a complete view of your client is paramount to providing the best service possible. Come hear CEO Peter Ladka discuss how his digital agency, Geek Hive, is leveraging Salesforce to not only get and retain new clients, but also how they manage current client expectations while adapting to an ever-changing media landscape.

sessions.sessionName: How Life Sciences Accelerates Research on the Salesforce Platform
sessions.sessionAbstract: Learn how one customer accelerates its research with Salesforce. Join us as they showcase their work which minimizes duplication, increases collaboration and improves their ability to discover new molecules.

sessions.sessionName: How Lightning "Strikes" a Balance Between Admins and Developers
sessions.sessionAbstract: Lightning Components offer new ways to build apps that are highly customizable and configurable, both with custom code and configuration through the UI. During this session, we'll discuss how your admin and your developer can collaborate to build solutions that will make your users more productive. We'll create a dashboard that uses Lightning Components to display Report result walking through requirements gathering, planning, configuration and even share some code so you can start using it today!

sessions.sessionName: How Marsh Increased Productivity and Forecast Accuracy with Salesforce1
sessions.sessionAbstract: Want to learn how to use Salesforce1 for sales enablement to increase productivity and improve sales forecasting? Join us as Marsh shares their business need, rollout plan, best practices, and lessons learned. Take away the insights and a model strategy to successfully implement Salesforce1.

sessions.sessionName: How Massage Envy Mastered the Personalized Consumer Experience at Scale
sessions.sessionAbstract: After 15 years in the wellness space, nationally-recognized franchise Massage Envy saw an opportunity to reinvigorate its marketing teams: its decentralized marketing strategy had begun to cramp the rapidly growing brand, resulting in a fractured brand experience across its various franchises. Join us to hear how the Salesforce Marketing Cloud helped Massage Envy align and empower regional teams to optimize their cross-channel spend, deliver a more unified brand message and, ultimately, deliver a more personalized customer experience.

sessions.sessionName: How Not to Fail at Your Salesforce Implementation
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join Kelly Hardebeck, Salesforce.org's Success Engagement Director, Common Sense Media, and CARE on best practices for planning and executing on your Salesforce implementation ensuring its success.

sessions.sessionName: How Salesforce Builds Apps to Improve Sales Productivity
sessions.sessionAbstract: Ever wonder what it's like to use the Salesforce Platform as a Salesforce employee? Don't throw away your shot to hear from the VP of Salesforce's Q Branch about how we built apps and streamlined processes to arm our Sales team and Solutions Engineers with everything they need to create spectacular customer demos--all with the Salesforce Platform.

sessions.sessionName: How Salesforce Does Agile on Salesforce
sessions.sessionAbstract: For years, Salesforce development teams have been using the Salesforce Platform to manage sprints, code releases, and other parts of the development lifecycle. Salesforce has also churned out multiple releases per year successfully, on time, with the highest level of quality and trust. One of the keys - a workforce engineering productivity tool developed internally on the Force.com and Lightning platforms. Salesforce has released this tool for it's customers on the AppExchange in a package called Agile Accelerator so you too can manage your development efforts. Join our session to get a hands-on demo of Agile Accelerator and also meet the team and get all of your questions answered.

sessions.sessionName: How Salesforce does Incremental Code Deploys for internal orgs
sessions.sessionAbstract: Want to learn how Salesforce keeps our internal orgs operating at peak efficiency? Join this session to learn how to make your code deployment faster by automatically deploying only what is changed. We'll also show you how we deploy only selective files from your code repository and exclude files from your deploy without deleting them from repository.

sessions.sessionName: How Salesforce Instruments Lightning
sessions.sessionAbstract: In this session we will explore how Salesforce instruments our own Lightning framework, and how we gain insights on adoption & usage. We will also do a sneak peak of the exciting forward looking feature called Lightning Adoption Dashboard, this customer dashboard will give you visibility in your own org level Lightning Adoption progress.

sessions.sessionName: How Salesforce is Delivering Customer Care at the Speed of Social
sessions.sessionAbstract: In todays digital age, social listening has become a necessity for any company that wants to retain and keep their customers happy. Brands recognize that they need to do more than just market to their customers, but provide great social support. Join us to learn how you can use Social Studio and service cloud to provide customer care at the speed of Social. We will show how these tools make it possible to deal with the growing number of social media interactions and ever higher customer expectations.

sessions.sessionName: How Salesforce is Delivering Customer Care at the Speed of Social - Repeat
sessions.sessionAbstract: In todays digital age, social listening has become a necessity for any company that wants to retain and keep their customers happy. Brands recognize that they need to do more than just market to their customers, but provide great social support. Join us to learn how you can use Social Studio and service cloud to provide customer care at the speed of Social. We will show how these tools make it possible to deal with the growing number of social media interactions and ever higher customer expectations.

sessions.sessionName: How Salesforce is Driving Renewals Digital Transformation & Innovation
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join us to learn how Salesforce is driving Renewals Digital Transformation and Innovation. We built an advanced renewals console and insights platform leveraging the best of Salesforce cloud technology to drive down customer attrition and drive up customer retention, ACV/AOV growth, productivity & engagement. Learn how Analytics is used to to predict customer attrition risks and prescribe the recommended actions to drive value and manage risks more effectively.

sessions.sessionName: How Salesforce Leverages Machine-Learning & AI to Develop Infrastructure
sessions.sessionAbstract: Getting started with data science and Machine Learning is a chicken and egg thing. Do I have enough data to even do data science? Which use cases should I start with? It can be intimidating. Join us to get an insight into how Salesforce leverages machine-learning and artificial intelligence to optimize our infrastructure.

sessions.sessionName: How Salesforce Product Management Builds Great Products
sessions.sessionAbstract: Come hear directly from this panel of seasoned Product Managers about how they build products at Salesforce. Learn about how they look at ideas and prioritize them into roadmaps, drive decision making and alignment, and work cross functionally to turn those plans into actual products and features. They will discuss both their ongoing strategic challenges and how they overcome them, as well as how they are able to use the Salesforce platform to identify ideas, gather adoption insights, and drive transparency of the entire product lifecycle.

sessions.sessionName: How Salesforce Rolled Out Lightning (and you can to)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Want to learn about how the most complex Salesforce implementation around, our own Salesforce Org62, managed our Lightning Experience Roll Out? In this session you'll hear from our internal team that have made Lightning a soaring success here at Salesforce, and find out how you can do the same.

sessions.sessionName: How Salesforce Runs It's Sales Team on Quip
sessions.sessionAbstract: Quip brings the productivity element to Salesforce's offerings, allowing Salesforce customers around the world spend less time managing work, and more time doing work. Join us to learn how teams at Salesforce are using Quip to increase productivity and success everyday!

sessions.sessionName: How Salesforce uses Data Science to Guide Lightning Product Development
sessions.sessionAbstract:
How does Salesforce Engineering and Product Management utilize data-science to make informed decisions on which Lightning products and features to build? Once built, how does Salesforce help customers successfully switch to Lightning and get the most out of all the amazing new functionality? 

Answer: The Product Data Science team (PDS) team within Salesforce has developed a scalable framework called the “Growth Factory” to 1) deliver prescriptive insights to R&D teams so they can make data-informed product investment decisions, and 2) lead Marketing, Customer Success, Product, System Integrator, and Trailhead teams to help customers adopt Lightning. 

In this session, the PDS team will showcase the technology and processes that make it possible for Salesforce teams to consistently utilize data-science to build great products, and help customers adopt Lightning.

sessions.sessionName: How Salesforce Uses Service Cloud
sessions.sessionAbstract: Ever wonder how Salesforce places our Customers in the center of our business? Join Atul Nanda, SVP, Global Customer Success and Paul VanMaanen, VP Technical Support for a behind-the-scenes look at Salesforce's global support operations. Learn how we use Knowledge, Console, Case Feed, Communities, Live Agent, Analytics and other Service Cloud functionality to provide world-class customer service.

sessions.sessionName: How Salesforce Uses Service Cloud (1)
