sessions.sessionAbstract: Ever wonder how Salesforce places our Customers in the center of our business? Join Atul Nanda, SVP, Global Customer Success and Paul VanMaanen, VP Technical Support for a behind-the-scenes look at Salesforce's global support operations. Learn how we use Knowledge, Console, Case Feed, Communities, Live Agent, Wave, and other Service Cloud functionality to provide world-class customer service.

sessions.sessionName: How Salesforce Uses Service Cloud (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Ever wonder how Salesforce places our Customers in the center of our business? Join Atul Nanda, SVP, Global Customer Success and Paul VanMaanen, VP Technical Support for a behind-the-scenes look at Salesforce's global support operations. Learn how we use Knowledge, Console, Case Feed, Communities, Live Agent, Wave, and other Service Cloud functionality to provide world-class customer service.

sessions.sessionName: How Service Corp Switched to Lightning and Saw Big Results
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Increased revenue. Improved sales productivity. Powerful business insights. All results Salesforce told our leadership at Service Corporation International (SCI) they could expect to see by transitioning from the company’s existing customer relationship management system to Sales Cloud. 

During this session, we will discuss how we identified what was holding us back from realizing the full potential of Salesforce, how we corrected course, and where Lightning fits into it all. We are seeing exciting results within our sales organization today and look forward to sharing these lessons learned with you.

sessions.sessionName: How Small Marketing Teams Can Deliver Big Results
sessions.sessionAbstract: Working with limited marketing resources? Join us to learn about strategies and tools to optimize your marketing efforts and drive growth. Small business marketing leaders will share their best practices and let you in on the secrets to their most successful tactics to boost pipeline.

sessions.sessionName: How SMBs Are Digitally Transforming to Fuel Growth and Capture New Markets
sessions.sessionAbstract: It’s time to embrace digital transformation. Learn how successful SMBs are digitally transforming their products, business models, and processes to open up new growth opportunities and reduce overall costs. Laurie McCabe of the SMB Group leads an expert panel of small business leaders who will share real experiences and offer practical advice on digital transformation. Gain an understanding of what digital transformation entails, why it’s important, and where to start within your business.

sessions.sessionName: How Starr Companies Successfully Made the Move To Lightning
sessions.sessionAbstract: Learn how Starr Companies adopted the Lightning Experience step-by-step. From assessing their org, identifying the benefits of Lightning for their business, preparing end users, and gathering user feedback, this session will illustrate the end-to-end experience of harnessing Lightning.

sessions.sessionName: How T-Mobile and Facebook Drive Digital Transformation in Retail
sessions.sessionAbstract:
The retail industry continues to own the title of “biggest digital advertising spender,” spending $15.8 billion in 2016 in the U.S. alone, and looks to hold its position at #1 through 2020.

In this interactive session led by Liam Doyle, head of Advertising Products at Salesforce, leaders from T-Mobile and Facebook will discuss how they're tackling the digital transformation happening in retail, and the critical role customer data and hyper targeted advertising will play in the overall customer experience.

sessions.sessionName: How the Salesforce Platform Keeps Your Business Agile
sessions.sessionAbstract:
As a growing business, your business processes and employee needs are constantly changing. How do you plan to keep up with these demands?

The Salesforce Platform is one of the fastest paths from idea to fully functional app -
 and by leveraging the Salesforce platform's agility, you'll be able to easily stay on top of employees changing needs. 

Join this session to understand how to leverage the Salesforce platform to build robust, scalable, integrated, mobile, employee-facing applications.

sessions.sessionName: How the Salesforce Technology & Products Organization Runs on Salesforce
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join us for a behind-the-scenes look at how the Salesforce Technology & Products organization leverages Salesforce solutions. Learn how we use the Salesforce platform to build and operate the World's Most Trusted Enterprise Cloud.

sessions.sessionName: How to Build a Best-In-Class Mobile Shopping Journey (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: We are living in a mobile-first age where mobile devices are used by consumers in many situations of their everyday life. For retailers, mobile optimization is crucial. This session will showcase a Commerce Cloud customer and how they are leveraging the latest mobile innovations and design best practices to build best-in-class shopping journeys that enhance their brand experience and increase mobile conversation.

sessions.sessionName: How to Build a Best-In-Class Mobile Shopping Journey (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: We are living in a mobile-first age where mobile devices are used by consumers in many situations of their everyday life. For retailers, mobile optimization is crucial. This session will showcase a Commerce Cloud customer and how they are leveraging the latest mobile innovations and design best practices to build best-in-class shopping journeys that enhance their brand experience and increase mobile conversation.

sessions.sessionName: How to Build a Great Product with Quip
sessions.sessionAbstract: Unlock the real benefits of Quip for modern development teams. It facilitates productive discussions between development team members, business stakeholders, and customers. Come learn how Quip connects content and collaboration ensure shared understanding and faster project completion.

sessions.sessionName: How to Build a Lightning App from Start to End
sessions.sessionAbstract: Learn how to build an app from start to end in Salesforce Lightning without writing any code! We'll walk through the phases of app building: gathering requirements, planning, building, testing, and rollout. I'll share how I built a content management app that my team uses every day that will inspire you to build your first Lightning app too!

sessions.sessionName: How to build an access control system using Tessel and Salesforce Einstein
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join us to learn how you can build a creative access control system with Salesforce Einstein Vision and Tessel. It's like keypad access, but with your face! With the power of Salesforce AI and just $75 in hardware it'll be up to you after this session to build your own.

sessions.sessionName: How to Build your First AppExchange App
sessions.sessionAbstract: Do you have a great idea for an app, but not sure where to start or how to list it on AppExchange? With the Salesforce Platform, bringing your idea to fruition has never been easier. Join us as we discuss the steps for building and releasing an app on the leading enterprise marketplace, the AppExchange. This session is for product managers, architects, and developers. #DF17Partners

sessions.sessionName: How to Check Your Lightning Readiness with One Click
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Are you wondering if your Salesforce org and users are ready to transition to Lightning Experience? 

Learn how to generate a custom assessment of your Lightning readiness with one click! Our product experts will show you how to run the Readiness Check and use the results to start planning your transition. We'll also share some best practices to help you develop a phased Lightning rollout strategy.

sessions.sessionName: How to Check Your Lightning Readiness with One Click
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Are you wondering if your Salesforce org and users are ready to transition to Lightning Experience? 

Learn how to generate a custom assessment of your Lightning readiness with one click! Our product experts will show you how to run the Readiness Check and use the results to start planning your transition. We'll also share some best practices to help you develop a phased Lightning rollout strategy.

sessions.sessionName: How to Connect Google Advertising with the Rest of the Customer Journey
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join Google and Salesforce product leaders to learn how to leverage your CRM and email data to optimize your Google advertising efforts across search, shopping, Gmail, and YouTube. In this session, we'll dig into best practices, tips and tricks for how to acquire more high quality customers, and how brands are delivering relevant ads to people at different stages of the sales cycle by connecting their advertising to the rest of the customer journey to increase both ROI and CSAT.

sessions.sessionName: How to Create Employee Apps that Rock
sessions.sessionAbstract: With the Salesforce Platform anyone--whether you are a developer or admin--can build apps with low code or code. In this session, you'll hear firsthand what it takes/how easy it is for customers, like yourself, to streamline unique business processes and transform business in just a couple of months with apps built on the Salesforce Platform.

sessions.sessionName: How to Create Your First Consumer Journey in Marketing Cloud (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Transforming your customer experiences begins with building that first journey. Learn best practices on how to set goals, define your audience, leverage new and existing content and measure success. Then hear from a customer who, one journey at a time, has gone from traditional campaign thinking to behavioral-based journeys that span the customer lifecycle.

sessions.sessionName: How to Create Your First Consumer Journey in Marketing Cloud (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Transforming your customer experiences begins with building that first journey. Learn best practices on how to set goals, define your audience, leverage new and existing content and measure success. Then hear from a customer who, one journey at a time, has gone from traditional campaign thinking to behavioral-based journeys that span the customer lifecycle.

sessions.sessionName: How to Deliver Intelligent Cust Services with IoT & Service Cloud Einstein
sessions.sessionAbstract: Every connected device is a chance to know more about your customer's wants and needs. Join us as we explore how the IoT Cloud can leverage your network of connected products to help you develop new and engaging customer service models.

sessions.sessionName: How to Deliver Training on Lightning Experience – Without Breaking into a Sweat
sessions.sessionAbstract: You're a Salesforce Admin who is tasked with transitioning from Classic to Lightning Experience. Training your end users seems like a daunting task. Yet, it really doesn't have to be scary or overwhelming. During this session, you will learn a simple, effective and flexible process for rolling out your Salesforce training without purchasing any additional tools, apps or plugins. This solution works - whether you are training 5, 500 or 50,000 users.

sessions.sessionName: How to Deploy Salesforce1 with the Lightning Experience
sessions.sessionAbstract: Is your business making the move to Lightning? Come join us to learn how to roll out Salesforce1 and Lightning to your organization, take advantage of the Lightning App Builder, and custom Lightning Components to ensure maximal re-use across your mobile and desktop experiences.

sessions.sessionName: How to Drive Business Impact with SMS
sessions.sessionAbstract: Come learn how AusPost is driving business impact with SMS. Review the real-time, 2-way capabilities of MobileConnect through the AusPost live use case. End users (package recipients) receive an SMS from AusPost, powered by MobileConnect, within 30 minutes of package delivery. This message asks the recipient to confirm whether or not they will be home at the time of delivery. If not, then inbound SMS allows the end user to tell AusPost whether they would like the package left at the door or brought back to a shipping facility.

sessions.sessionName: How to Extend the Power of Your CRM to Everyone in Your Business
sessions.sessionAbstract: For far too long, the power of CRM has been locked in sales, service, and marketing departments. Today, every employee in every department deserves a modern, mobile, digital experience. With the Salesforce Platform at the core, it's easier and faster than ever to transform any role or department with apps. In this session, you'll learn how you can engage every employee across your organization with Salesforce and deliver digital transformation faster than your competitors.

sessions.sessionName: How to fit a DMP into your technology stack
sessions.sessionAbstract: Data Management Platforms (DMP) provide a great tool for using all types of data to connect with both "known" and "unknown" consumers. In this session technical marketers, working on data lakes, customer data hubs, CDPs, etc, will learn how to best leverage and integrate a DMP. In addition, we will cover ETL capabilities, data feeds, identity resolution, and how all these elements effect your Technology Stack.

sessions.sessionName: How to Forecast More Accurately with Greater Confidence w/Jason Jordan
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Data, data, data. Companies collect a lot of it, but not all companies know how to use it to improve sales performance. Join Jason Jordan, best-selling author of Cracking the Sales Management Code, as he shares his latest research on the topic of sales forecasting. During this interactive workshop, Jason will reveal the: 

• Drivers of accurate sales forecasts and the fundamental ways to forecast your sales 
• Critical differences between forecasting and pipeline management 
• Key characteristics of a healthy pipeline 

This workshop features the simple steps you can take to improve your processes and build superb forecasts and pipelines.

sessions.sessionName: How to Get Free Publicity through Earned Media Coverage
sessions.sessionAbstract: Getting the media to cover your business can kick-start growth for your small or medium-sized business. It isn’t hard, but it does take time and a strategic plan of action (and some luck). Learn from Ramon Ray, founder and editor of Smart Hustle magazine, easy ways to gain media coverage and free publicity. In this session, Ramon will show you his proven method for having journalists, producers, and others in the media listen to you and report about you, your company, product, or service. Ramon will also share tips for how you can use video and other social content to boost your brand and generate sales.

sessions.sessionName: How to Get Started With Mobile Messaging
sessions.sessionAbstract: You have a been using email for years and understand the business impact, but what about the complimentary mobile impact? Your competitors are introducing an entire mobile ecosystem full of endless possibilities. 64% of marketing leaders say their company has become more focused on providing a consistent experience across every channel as a result of changing customer expectations. Come join us and let our mobile experts educate you on how you can truly make a mobile impact across SMS, Push Notifications, Geotargeting, and more!

sessions.sessionName: How to Grow Partners Sales with Channel Marketing Automation
sessions.sessionAbstract: Accelerating channel sales begins with the understanding that partners need help communicating the value of your products to customers. Unfortunately, most partners have a limited budget, marketing staff, and capacity to effectively drive demand. Learn how new turnkey Marketing Cloud integrations with Partner Community are making it fast and easy for business to power partners with packaged campaigns and turn them into world class marketers.

sessions.sessionName: How to Increase User Adoption with Salesforce Actions
sessions.sessionAbstract: Is Salesforce adoption the number one goal in your organization? Learn how to increase user adoption with Salesforce Actions. We will discuss use cases across a wide range of industries and company sizes to help maximize your Salesforce investment and show you how to get the most out of Actions in both Classic and Lightning without even a line of code! You will easily learn to create a custom "Quick Notes" action for a demanding sales team that allows your users to capture rich text notes and meeting sentiments in super-quick time from client meetings. Build a dashboard and analyze the results in minutes!

sessions.sessionName: How to Increase Your Org's Security With 2FA
sessions.sessionAbstract: Hackers came in at No. 3 on Time's Person of the Year List 2016. With the prevalence of data breaches today, how can admins better secure their customer data in Salesforce today? By setting up two-factor authentication (2FA)! We'll show how to use tools available in Salesforce to set up & roll out 2FA to your users, tailor session settings and demo Salesforce Authenticator. Security doesn't have to be nebulous and daunting. Don't just take our word for it - Lizz Hellinga from Stroz Friedberg will share her 2FA rollout success story!

sessions.sessionName: How to Lead Change Management Like a Boss
sessions.sessionAbstract: Change management is key to ensuring success as you roll out new Salesforce functionality across your organization. In this session you'll learn what the Admin's role is in change management and how to lead it like a boss. Learn the personality types of employees, how they are likely to react, and how to overcome their resistance to change. You'll also learn how to communicate successfully when managing change, especially the difference between selling and managing change.

sessions.sessionName: How to Leverage Salesforce for Advertising to Drive Smarter Customer Journeys
sessions.sessionAbstract: Is your company working to build a modern-day marketing organization and tech stack centered around digital? Join us to learn how AngieÛªs List tackled this exact challenge, and supercharged their digital marketing with Salesforce for Advertising. In this session, marketers will learn how the combination of Advertising Studio and DMP enable you to leverage your Salesforce data, across all your digital campaigns, to drive smarter customer journeys, deepen relationship with customers, and target prospects that closely resemble your most valuable customers.

sessions.sessionName: How to Make the Move to Lightning Experience
sessions.sessionAbstract: Are you ready to make the move to Lightning Experience but not sure where to start? In this session you will receive get a step by step guide on how you can move your Org to Lightning Experience.

sessions.sessionName: How to Make the Move to Lightning Experience
sessions.sessionAbstract: Are you ready to make the move to Lightning Experience but not sure where to start? In this session you will receive get a step by step guide on how you can move your Org to Lightning Experience.

sessions.sessionName: How to Make your App Work with Shield and Encryption
sessions.sessionAbstract: AppExchange Partners, are your customers asking for more security and compliance out of your apps? Learn what steps you need to take as an ISV to make your app work with Salesforce Shield, a set of premium services for compliance and security. In this session, we will cover the basics for getting started, share best practices and what is needed to extend your app to work with Shield Platform Encryption. #DF17Partners

sessions.sessionName: How To Measure and Optimize Pardot Campaign Performance in Salesforce (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Do you have campaigns in Pardot and different campaigns in Salesforce? Are you struggling to understand how effective your marketing campaigns are and how to improve your next one? Are you spending a lot of time exporting data to Excel or copy and pasting screens from Pardot? Then this is the session for you. Find out how Campaign Alignment, Engagement History data natively in Sales Cloud, and the power of B2B Marketing Analytics enables you to measure and optimize Pardot campaign performance in Salesforce.

sessions.sessionName: How To Measure and Optimize Pardot Campaign Performance in Salesforce (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Did you know that 65% of B2B buyers have already made a purchase decision by the time they engage with a vendor sales rep professional (IDC)? So, it's more important than ever for marketing and sales to be able to collaborate, in fact, the highest performing marketing teams are 2x more likely to understand what sales needs to succed. Join us to get an inside look at how the Salesforce for B2B marketing suite of tools enables you to intelligently engage with your buyers across all of your marketing channels from acquisition to nurture to close.

sessions.sessionName: How to Motivate a Lean Selling Machine: a Glimpse into Sales at Salesforce
sessions.sessionAbstract: Every salesperson has a mix of 6 main traits that make them a great salesperson. All too often sales leaders only look for a handful of these traits, making building a well-rounded and diverse team difficult. So how do you manage both the art and the science of what truly makes a sales rep a great one? Join Casey Hopcraft, Regional Sales Manager at Salesforce, to learn learn how to build, motivate, and retain a high performing team of GREAT sales reps.

sessions.sessionName: How to Package Custom Metadata Types
sessions.sessionAbstract: Are you an AppExchange Partner wondering how to leverage Custom Metadata Types? Do you want to understand how others are using Custom Metadata types? In this session, learn about the value of Custom Metadata Types and how to build them into your app. #DF17Partners

sessions.sessionName: How to Pick the Right Visualization?
sessions.sessionAbstract: Learn what charts to use when, do/don't and some killer visualizations you didn't even thought about!

sessions.sessionName: How to Quickly Power Partners to Sell
sessions.sessionAbstract: Take the guesswork out of partner management with Sales Cloud PRM, a new turnkey app designed to accelerate channel sales. Learn just how fast and easy it is to deploy PRM tools with Guided Setup and design an engaging partner experience with Community Builder.

sessions.sessionName: How to Run Einstein Discovery Analysis
sessions.sessionAbstract: None

sessions.sessionName: How to Run Supplier Relationship Management the Salesforce Way
sessions.sessionAbstract: Exactly how is Salesforce reimagining its supplier relationships? Join us to learn how we partnered with PwC to develop a Bolt Solution to simplify the supplier relationship management process by bringing visibility to the supply chain.

sessions.sessionName: How to Run Your Next Big Marketing Project with Quip
sessions.sessionAbstract: The strongest marketing teams are aligned and hyper-collaborative. Learn how Quip can help launch your next big thing without a hitch. In this session we'll cover how to plan, operate, and launch a marketing project without a single email and fewer meetings.

sessions.sessionName: How to Set Up Your Customer Service Platform for Growth
sessions.sessionAbstract: Interested to learn first-hand what growing customers are achieving when moving from tool to platform? Join us as customers answer scaling service questions such as “Why did you decide to move to a platform solution?” and “How is Salesforce improving your service metrics?”

sessions.sessionName: How to Speed Up Contract Negotiations and Lose Fewer Deals
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Even the speediest sales and legal teams get bogged down in contract negotiations. All parties would like nothing more than to get agreements are signed so you can begin to deliver the goods or services you just committed to.

A full contract lifecycle often requires plenty of work after signature like addendums, renewals and terminations, leading to a complex workflow that has ripple effects throughout the organization. Contracts are everywhere in today’s business, and their importance only continues to grow.

Join this session to:

* Understand the growing role of Salesforce CPQ
* Realize the cost of ineffective contracting
* Speed up your contract completions for fewer lost deals and contract stalls
* Hear best practices from real-world examples to hear how your team can continuously improve.

sessions.sessionName: How to Use Facebook & Salesforce Products Together to Drive More Leads
sessions.sessionAbstract: Advertising on Facebook and Instagram is rapidly evolving. Your customers use these apps on their mobile devices, and today you can use Facebook Lead Ads to seamlessly engage with people across multiple channels, including your email and sales pipeline. Product leaders at Facebook and Salesforce will demonstrate how Lead Ads will drive results for your business this year, and how brands have directly integrated Facebook and Instagram ads into their customer journey to drive phenomenal results.

sessions.sessionName: How to Use Social to Drive Engagement and Advocacy in Health and Life Sciences
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Just like in other industries, healthcare consumers have taken to social to express their complaints, get questions answered, read reviews, and get recommendations about healthcare providers, pharmaceuticals, insurance and medical devices. It's now more important than ever for healthcare companies to listen to, engage with, and educate their communities in order to protect and grow their business. The challenge is, that regulated industries are tough... 

Join us to learn how Merck KGaA, SmileDirect and other healthcare companies are using Social Studio and the Salesforce Platform to effectively engage with their patients and foster lifetime advocates.

sessions.sessionName: How to Win Friends and Influence with Einstein Analytics
sessions.sessionAbstract:
So you've successfully implemented Einstein Analytics at your company. How do you market that success to the rest of the business and handle the political landscape or the all-too-familiar "we already have analytics tools" or "we can export to Excel or Access just fine" objections? 

In this session, we'll take a look at how two different enterprises used relationship building, internal solution selling, and agile concepts in a repeatable framework to become successful with Einstein Analytics!

sessions.sessionName: How Toyota Financial Services Broke the Silos between Sales and Service
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Breaking the silos between Sales and Service teams is the key to transforming the customer experience. Yet, most companies lack visibility between departments, which negatively impacts team productivity, revenue, and most importantly, customer satisfaction. 

Join to learn best practices, and hear how Toyota Financial Services transformed their customer experience with a complete CRM.

sessions.sessionName: How Unconscious Bias Affects Building Innovative Solutions
sessions.sessionAbstract: User experience design is one approach to addressing the issues of unconscious bias often found in today’s technology. Unconscious bias is an often overlooked and undervalued aspect of UX design since the little details seem to be so minor to us, however these minor details can have large and lasting impacts. Designing a user experience without paying attention to unconscious biases is leaving out small changes that, in turn, alienate large demographics of people and shrink your client base. On the other hand, making these small changes could be just the kickstart your product needs to expand and catch on within other demographics. This presentation will detail how to identify and overcome unconscious bias in order to achieve the maximum client or consumer base possible.

sessions.sessionName: How We Do the Magic We Do - A Peek into Multi-tenancy
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join us for a deep dive into the architecture of Salesforce's product clouds. We'll explain how multitenancy actually works across product clouds and how it affects you as a Salesforce customer. We'll cover the performance and security implications around the platform to give you a better understanding. By the end of the session, you'll have a better grasp of the architecture underpinning our product portfolio and understand how to get the most out of it.

sessions.sessionName: How Zayo Moved Their Highly Customized Salesforce Implementation to Lightning
sessions.sessionAbstract: Come learn how Zayo planned and created a roadmap for highly customized Salesforce implementation. By defining personas, doing ride alongs and understanding the processes that are important to the business, Zayo was able to adopt a UX based approach to Lightning migration rather than just overhauling the existing system

sessions.sessionName: Human Centered Design
sessions.sessionAbstract: Experience Design isn't just a buzzword anymore ? it has become table stakes for any company trying to compete in today's digital environment. In fact, according to Forrester, on average, every dollar invested in UX brings 100 dollars in return. Learn why a design-led approach to innovation can make or break your competitive advantage in the Age of the Customer.

sessions.sessionName: Hybrid Advice in the Age of the Client: Top Tips to Grow your Book of Business
sessions.sessionAbstract: Create the hybrid robo and advice experience your clients want by combining the best of digital with human capital and learn how you can keep clients from one generation to the next. Join us to learn how a hybrid advice model is helping firms grow their book of business and how Financial Services Cloud is simplifying, automating and personalizing client advice with integrations with Jemstep by Invesco, Deloitte Digital, and more.

sessions.sessionName: I Don't Need No Stinkin' Documentation
sessions.sessionAbstract: Have you inherited an org that has little documentation and even less help or description text? Is your company using agile and now you have to apply that to your Salesforce.com instance? Join two scrummasters to learn some approaches to documenting your org - and improve your company agility.

sessions.sessionName: I Installed My App, What's Next?
sessions.sessionAbstract: You've found the right app to solve your challenge, but what happens after you click Get It Now? Post-installation is just as important as pre-installation, so come learn best practices and tips on how to implement, track, and maintain your AppExchange solution.

sessions.sessionName: Identify Protein Structures using Einstein
sessions.sessionAbstract: A research laboratory positioned as a service organization built its next generation lab information management system (LIMS) on its Salesforce platform. Learn in this session how the lab used Einstein Image Classification for identifying 3D protein structures and how they surfaced that information for their customer base through a gamified Community Cloud environment. Finally we will look into options how not only to identify but also to predict the protein structure from the sequence.

sessions.sessionName: If You Can Create Reports Then You Can Write SOQL
sessions.sessionAbstract: The Report Builder is a great tool for answering business questions, but SOQL lets you act on your data directly. Writing SOQL queries isn't all that hard, especially since you can write them using the same logic you use to build report criteria. In this session we'll show you what SOQL actually is, how SOQL queries are structured, and how to use the Developer Console to run queries and act upon results. You'll walk away with the power to manage your data in a whole new way.

sessions.sessionName: If You're not Getting Certified, You're Certifiably Nuts!
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce Admins, Developers, and Architects, are in high demand. Certification is one of the best ways for these professionals to prove their knowledge, stand out from the pack, and grow their careers. Join Vivek M. Chawla, certified Platform Dev II, Advanced Admin, App Builder, and Sales+Service Cloud Consultant for an open discussion about the real-world benefits of certification, tips for getting started on your first certification, and how to map out your own personal certification journey.

sessions.sessionName: Ignite Your Communities: Combine Lightning Process Builder w/ Lightning Bolt (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Get ready for a double dose of Lightning with a little Flow on the side! Lightning Process Builder and Lightning Bolt are two very exciting areas of innovation on the Salesforce platform right now. In this session, you’ll not only get an overview of both, you’ll also learn how to combine them by injecting process automation into your community! Lightning Bolts (i.e. Community Templates) are pre-configured, pre-packaged communities that can be leveraged as solution accelerators and distributed globally with ease. I will cover the elements of a bolt and touch on how to construct your own Lightning Bolt. Things will get really interesting when I take everyone’s favorite automation tool on Salesforce (Process Builder) and show how it can be combined with a Lightning Bolt. The result of the combination: easily distributed business process automation for your customers, partners, or employees via a Salesforce Community! I’ll cover new features from the past few releases, such as platform events, flows via quick actions, and the new flow component for communities. This session is relevant to anyone who builds apps or uses process builder, as well as those interested in the latest and greatest in the world of Salesforce communities, including admins, community managers, BAs, executives, and others. Note: You do not need to be a user of Lightning Experience; classic users get all the same goodies!

sessions.sessionName: Ignite Your Communities: Combine Lightning Process Builder with Lightning Bolt
sessions.sessionAbstract: Get ready for a double dose of Lightning with a little Flow on the side! Lightning Process Builder and Lightning Bolt are two very exciting areas of innovation on the Salesforce platform right now. In this session, you’ll not only get an overview of both, you’ll also learn how to combine them by injecting process automation into your community! Lightning Bolts (i.e. Community Templates) are pre-configured, pre-packaged communities that can be leveraged as solution accelerators and distributed globally with ease. I will cover the elements of a bolt and touch on how to construct your own Lightning Bolt. Things will get really interesting when I take everyone’s favorite automation tool on Salesforce (Process Builder) and show how it can be combined with a Lightning Bolt. The result of the combination: easily distributed business process automation for your customers, partners, or employees via a Salesforce Community! I’ll cover new features from the past few releases, such as platform events, flows via quick actions, and the new flow component for communities. This session is relevant to anyone who builds apps or uses process builder, as well as those interested in the latest and greatest in the world of Salesforce communities, including admins, community managers, BAs, executives, and others. Note: You do not need to be a user of Lightning Experience; classic users get all the same goodies!

sessions.sessionName: Implementing CPQ - Data Migration Considerations and Best Practices
sessions.sessionAbstract: Implementing Salesforce CPQ may be a scary thought for Salesforce Admins tasked to ensure that data and functionality across Products, Opportunities, Assets, Contracts and other Object data are migrated properly. In this session, we will help to ensure that your data is not compromised at launch and that existing functionality and records are enhanced, not impaired (or lost!). When implementing Salesforce CPQ, data model changes need to be accounted for across core Objects which affect business processes and fundamental structures. This intermediate session highlights considerations, approaches, and methodologies that can help Salesforce admins tasked with CPQ implementation transform and migrate existing native Salesforce data.

sessions.sessionName: Implementing CPQ - Data Migration Considerations and Best Practices (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Implementing Salesforce CPQ may be a scary thought for Salesforce Admins tasked to ensure that data and functionality across Products, Opportunities, Assets, Contracts and other Object data are migrated properly. In this session, we will help to ensure that your data is not compromised at launch and that existing functionality and records are enhanced, not impaired (or lost!). When implementing Salesforce CPQ, data model changes need to be accounted for across core Objects which affect business processes and fundamental structures. This intermediate session highlights considerations, approaches, and methodologies that can help Salesforce admins tasked with CPQ implementation transform and migrate existing native Salesforce data.

sessions.sessionName: Improving Agent On-boarding and Productivity Through Competency Based Learning
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join us to learn how a leading financial services organization improved agent on boarding and productivity by implementing a Competency Based Learning (CBL) model driven 100% by the Salesforce Platform.

sessions.sessionName: Incorporating Social into Your Customer Care Workflow in Service Cloud
sessions.sessionAbstract: Your customers and community are online and it has fundamentally changed how and where they look for support, service, and how they engage with you today. For organizations of any size, listening to constituents online doesn't only present the opportunity to uncover and address complaints and issues, but the opportunity to learn, improve, and engage your audience in new ways to strengthen and build your brand. Join us to learn how companies from all industries: Provide exceptional service to their customers through social channels; Use social customer service interactions as a marketing opportunity; Scale operations and create positive ROI

sessions.sessionName: Increase Productivity with Activity Management Nonprofit, Higher Ed and K-12 (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce.org nonprofit and higher ed customers - Learn how activity management increases productivity and insights. This session takes you on a journey highlighting the importance of activity management, how to best capture critical activities and how this information provides business insights.

sessions.sessionName: Increase Productivity with Activity Management Nonprofit, Higher Ed and K-12 (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce.org nonprofit and higher ed customers - Learn how activity management increases productivity and insights. This session takes you on a journey highlighting the importance of activity management, how to best capture critical activities and how this information provides business insights.

sessions.sessionName: Influence Sales Behavior & Deal Level Pricing Using Salesforce CPQ and Einstein
sessions.sessionAbstract: Sales is both a science and an art. With AI becoming more ubiquitous, smart sales organizations are looking to get ahead of the curve by mining their own deal data for previously unknown insights. What if you could help every salesperson optimally price deals in real time? What if you could easily identify salespeople who consistenly create more value for your company? In this session, learn from thought leaders in Sales Enablement and Data Science on how CPQ data and AI can help your sales teams scale to new heights.

sessions.sessionName: Infrastructure Keynote - The Path to a Unified Infrastructure
sessions.sessionAbstract: Trusted Customer Success is the #1 Value for Salesforce. Continuous transformation and improvement of the underlying Infrastructure through innovative solutions is key in ensuring we keep growing this customer trust. In this talk you will hear directly from the Infrastructure Engineering leadership on the Vision and Strategy for continuing to provide the most Trusted Enterprise Cloud Infrastructure, and the path to a Unified Infrastructure.

sessions.sessionName: Innovate at the Speed of a Fintech: How to Create Meaningful Client Experiences
sessions.sessionAbstract: Differentiated client experiences must fit with a client's lifestyle and evolving needs - from the day they are onboarded as a new client to when they reach their first financial goal. See how Financial Services Cloud is helping Trilogy Financial innovate at the speed of a fintech by creating end-to-end client experiences that are convenient, competitive and highly personalized.

sessions.sessionName: Innovate How You Educate Your End Users
sessions.sessionAbstract: Your end-user training is not working. Salesforce is live and your adoption needle is hovering between give-up and what do we do? Join me as I walk you through pushing your adoption needle to success by delivering quick training wins and innovating advanced strategies to make your training have a lasting effect on your users. We will talk about strategic burst training, communications using Salesforce, developing an ongoing training schedule and making it all fun.

sessions.sessionName: Insights: How Growing Businesses Can Achieve High Performance
sessions.sessionAbstract: In a customer landscape with more information, more choice, and less loyalty than ever, top companies are transforming sales, service, and marketing to deliver experiences that win hearts and wallets. But such efforts can take resources that are in short supply for SMBs. This session will provide data-driven insights on practices of today's top sales, service, and marketing teams, as well as the challenges your fellow SMB trailblazers face in keeping up. You'll leave with best practices for growing in the Age of the Customer, and tips on how to stand up to big competitors, and become a high-performing team, even with limited time and money.

sessions.sessionName: Institutional Banking & Markets:Become the Investment Bank of the Future
sessions.sessionAbstract: Regulation and demand for value-based client relationships is forcing banks to reimagine their institutional banking and markets businesses. Now more than ever, banks must simplify their business models, embrace an ever-changing regulatory environment, and empower their bankers and trading floor to be even more productive and innovative. Join us to discover how investment banks use the Intelligent Customer Success Platform to secure and connect business units, offer a more collaborative client experience, and deliver deal and trade execution that leverages the full capabilities of the bank.

sessions.sessionName: Institutional Onboarding for Customer Success
sessions.sessionAbstract: More than ever, institutions differentiate their firms through outstanding customer experience. Yet – onboarding – the approval for a firm to transact with another firm – is hampered by outdated processes and technology, compounded by increasing regulatory constraints. Join us to discover how Salesforce is helping firms across the globe tackle this thorny topic in new and exciting ways.

sessions.sessionName: Insurance Productivity: Create an Agent-Broker Portal that Moves the Needle
sessions.sessionAbstract: A compelling account portal engages customers and empowers your agents and brokers. Transform everything from recruitment, registration and training, to managing funds and closing business. Learn how leading companies manage deals in real time, measure partner performance, and connect agents with product experts.

sessions.sessionName: Insurance: Future-Proofing the Digital Life Insurer
sessions.sessionAbstract: As customer expectations shift, new digital upstarts enter the marketplace, and traditional distribution models evolve, insurers need technology to help them deepen relationships in new ways. Join us to learn how innovative life insurers are moving up the digital maturity curve by overcoming resistance to change and rolling out foundational capabilities for artificial intelligence to deliver delightful customer and agent experiences.

sessions.sessionName: Insurance: Integrate and Innovate at the Speed of InsurTech
sessions.sessionAbstract: Are you dedicating your resources to creating differentiated customer experiences? Or are you focused on integration and "keeping the lights on"? Join this session to learn how 1 + 1 = 3 when Salesforce joins forces with Guidewire. Discover how innovative insurers are embracing agility and are engaging policyholders in whole new ways. Learn how you too can build digital roadmaps that will meet the needs of today and the challenges of tomorrow.

sessions.sessionName: Insurance: Rethinking Insurance Distribution
sessions.sessionAbstract: How are traditional brokers responding to disruptors (PolicyGenius, Embroker) who seek to disintermediate them? Will roboadvisors ever replace human advisors and brokers? How are leading financial services firms responding to the threat (or potential synergies) of rising insurtechs?

sessions.sessionName: InsurTech: How can large insurers be more agile yet scale?
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join us for a highly interactive discussion on how leading insurers are developing foundational capabilities to enable compelling customer experiences that create competitive advantages. Where are you on the digital maturity curve? How are innovators differentiating themselves with AI and delightful customer and agent experiences?

sessions.sessionName: Integrated Business Processes Drive Transparency and Reportability
sessions.sessionAbstract: How Siemens used integrated business processes in manufacturing to drive 20% on time production to consistently achieving 95% on time production.

sessions.sessionName: Integrating External Services With Chatter
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join us and learn how to make communication more enjoyable and entertaining among users! Our goal will be to integrate GIPHY, Embedly, Emojis and reactions services with Salesforce Chatter to make the overall experience more user-friendly.

sessions.sessionName: Intelligent and Impactful Insights wth B2B Marketing Analytics (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Gain the most out of your data with B2B Marketing Analytics. For marketers, it's all about impacting the bottom line, sales revenue. Learn how you can consolidate all of your marketing and sales data on a single platform and streamline your reporting. Easily understand your top performing campaigns and your engagement data and take data-driven actions to improve your marketing efforts.

sessions.sessionName: Intelligent and Impactful Insights wth B2B Marketing Analytics Undo (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Gain the most out of your data with B2B Marketing Analytics. For marketers, it's all about impacting the bottom line, sales revenue. Learn how you can consolidate all of your marketing and sales data on a single platform and streamline your reporting. Easily understand your top performing campaigns and your engagement data and take data-driven actions to improve your marketing efforts.

sessions.sessionName: Interactive Lightning Components Using the Reports & Dashboards API
sessions.sessionAbstract: Your users want more than just of the out-of-the-box Lightning Reporting Components, they want an interactive list of results as a place to work from. During this session you'll learn how to create configurable Lightning reporting components using the Reports and Dashboards API. If you haven't had a chance to build a custom Lightning Component, this is a great a project to get your feet wet. Not interested in coding? We'll also cover how you can install this code into your org so your users can start using this today!

sessions.sessionName: Introducing Lightning Data: The New Way to Integrate Data in Salesforce (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce is making it easier to get intelligent about your customers by integrating valuable industry data at the click of a mouse. Come hear the latest about our new data capabilities and see a live demo. We'll show you how you can get key customer insights from trusted sources integrated into your CRM with clicks, not code.

sessions.sessionName: Introducing Lightning Data: The New Way to Integrate Data in Salesforce (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce is making it easier to get intelligent about your customers by integrating valuable industry data at the click of a mouse. Come hear the latest about our new data capabilities and see a live demo. We'll show you how you can get key customer insights from trusted sources integrated into your CRM with clicks, not code.

sessions.sessionName: Introducing the Lightning Design System Validator Chrome Plugin
sessions.sessionAbstract: SLDS Validator is a new tool that helps you verify if you are using Lightning Design System properly. In this session you will learn how to use it to check overridden CSS styling, ensure accessible markup, proper usage of CSS classnames and so on. These will help you keep your Lightning apps clean and make it easy to upgrade to future SLDS versions.

sessions.sessionName: Introducing: The AI-Powered Email Inbox (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: How many hours did you spend reading and answering email last week? What if you had a smart assistant to read emails for you? Join this visionary session to get a sneak peek into how Salesforce is supercharging your email inbox with artificial intelligence. Our product leaders are going to walk through our roadmap for making Salesforce Inbox smarter with Einstein.

sessions.sessionName: Introduction To Einstein Analytics SDK with Lightning
sessions.sessionAbstract: Learn how to leverage the Einstein Analytics SDK to build events that communicate between Lightning Components, Apex and Einstein Analytics dashboard components. We will demonstrate how a custom Lightning Component can use events to communicate with an Einstein Analytics component. We will cover examples of how to use Apex methods from an Einstein Analytics namespace to execute SAQL. Using a sales forecasting dashboard we will demonstrate interactivity between Lightning Components and Einstein Analytics Dashboards.

sessions.sessionName: Introduction to Flow (Now with Lightning!)
sessions.sessionAbstract: You're an admin, and you've heard about this Flow thing. It sounds promising, but seems daunting. While it is a relatively complex tool, its capabilities make it one of the most powerful utilities in any admin's arsenal. It enables admins to utilize complex workflow, with branching analysis and loops. It lets you capture data, storing it for later use in your automation. It also harnesses the power of Lightning to present questions and data to users, getting their input and using that to control automation. We'll present a primer on flow, covering everything from variables to Lightning integration, and talk about how it is being used in small and large orgs alike. Join us to learn how you can supercharge your automation without code!

sessions.sessionName: Introduction To Service Cloud Snap-Ins SDK For Mobile
sessions.sessionAbstract: Service Cloud Snap-ins provide developers with a lightweight SDK that gives users access to powerful Service Cloud features within your native mobile app. This session will show developers how they can use the Snap-ins SDK to incorporate a two way video chat button in a native iOS swift application. We will review the required service cloud setup, introduce the Salesforce mobile SDK + Snap-ins SDK and demonstrate the use case of incorporating SOS into native iOS application.

sessions.sessionName: IoT Cloud & Heroku: Connecting your Customer Apps to the Internet of Things
sessions.sessionAbstract: Heroku provides developers a way to develop applications without worrying about infrastructure. IoT Cloud allows companies to easily connect their network of connected device CRM. What happens when you combine the two products? Join this session to find out.

sessions.sessionName: IoT Cloud 101: Building Technology for a Connected World
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join us to hear from the team behind the Salesforce IoT Cloud and learn how the Thunder Platform can connect your devices to other Salesforce Clouds to enable you to maximize your existing Salesforce investment.

sessions.sessionName: IoT Cloud and AWS: Creating the End-to-End IoT Solution for Businesses
sessions.sessionAbstract: What do you get when you pair the edge capabilities of AWS with the IoT Cloud Platform? You get full visibility into how connected products work and move together. Visibility that helps you build better products for your customers and deliver better business value.

sessions.sessionName: Is Your Inbox Smarter Than A 5th Grader?
sessions.sessionAbstract: What if you could measure and track prospect emails, and even see what happens after you hit send? Join our session to learn how Salesforce is bringing the power of AI to your inbox. Also, learn how you can make Salesforce Inbox smarter with Einstein and gain intelligent insights from all your customer interactions in minutes.

sessions.sessionName: ISV Panel Discussion: Technical Strategy and Priorities
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join this panel discussion with some of our top AppExchange partners to hear insights and best practices on strategies and priorities for next year as it relates to new technologies like Lightning, Salesforce DX, Einstein, and others. Be sure to bring your tough questions! This session is for product managers, architects, and developers. #DF17Partners

sessions.sessionName: IT Cloud: Running ITSM and Dev Ops on Salesforce (at Salesforce)
sessions.sessionAbstract: How does Salesforce run IT? Join us to learn about how we manage IT operations, from tickets to laptops to incidents. We'll also show how we optimize the development lifecycle, so that engineers spend more time developing rather than worrying about deployments or environment management. All on the Salesforce Platform!

sessions.sessionName: It Takes One to Know One - SMB Customer Fanatics Panel
sessions.sessionAbstract: How do Salesforce's SMB customers leverage the platform to establish a culture of excellence around customer connections? Join Salesforce RVP Peri McDonald as she hosts a panel of 3 SMB executives to share stories of driving success to all parts of an organization while keeping the customer at the center of the business.

sessions.sessionName: Journey Diva Confessions: Transforming Marketing Campaigns at Fidelity
sessions.sessionAbstract: Fidelity has transformed its business by breaking down silos to connect with business customers, consumers, and advisors in a whole new way. With smarter customer journeys powered by Sales Cloud and Marketing Cloud data, Fidelity has experienced 13x higher engagment rates and all-time high advisor sentiment rates. Attend this session to learn how they did it and their vision for the future.

sessions.sessionName: Journey from Customizable Forecasting to Collaborative Forecasting in Lightning
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Customers moving from customizable to collaborative forecasting should be congratulated on the decision to move to the best in class forecasting solution available in the CRM industry. 
 
Moving to collaborative forecasting changes the way users and managers operate their forecasts. The migration from customizable to collaborative forecasting is a significant undertaking with huge benefits. Learn how Salesforce's org went through this transformation and we would like to share best practices and lessons learned to ensure a smooth transition.

sessions.sessionName: Justify Your Spend: Measuring Marketing ROI
sessions.sessionAbstract: Do you struggle to measure the ROI of your marketing campaigns? Are you relying on manual processes to demonstrate how your marketing campaigns stack up in revenue? Want to take the powerful combination of Pardot and Salesforce to the next level? In this session, you'll learn how to create a customizable campaign influence and attribution setup to completely automate the process of associating marketing campaigns to sales revenue. We'll also explore how to improve visibility into marketing's impact on the sales pipeline with native Salesforce reporting.

sessions.sessionName: KCS Strategies for Success: Using Service Console and Communities to Drive KCS
sessions.sessionAbstract: Discover how JDA Software provides a powerful, award-winning self-service experience with Service Cloud Console, Community, and Knowledge-Centered Service (KCS), a set of practices for creating and maintaining knowledge. In this session JDA will share 5 lessons learned from executing a self-service strategy aimed to reduce customer effort and increase agent efficiencies by putting knowledge at the forefront to scale their business operations.

sessions.sessionName: Keeping Customers Happy with a Unified Front and Back Office
sessions.sessionAbstract: Happy Or Not uses Salesforce CPQ and Billing to take full advantage of their sales data and drive revenue across their direct and indirect sales channels. Attend this session, hear their story, and learn how to achieve a true 360 degree view of your customers, with fully integrated front and back office operations.

sessions.sessionName: Keeping Salesforce in Tip Top Shape: Secrets from the Pros
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce Program Architects deal with some of the most sophisticated and longest standing implementations around. Often they are brought in to help our largest customers deal with Performance, Code, and Security issues. Where do they start? What tools do they use? What practices do they follow to help sort out these issues, and how can you leverage their knowledge to your benefit? Join us as three of our top Program Architects help you understand all of these and provide you with tangible activities that you can undertake in your own implementations to help keep it in tip top shape.

sessions.sessionName: Leading Change: Transform Your Culture to Transform Your Business
sessions.sessionAbstract: It's a given that effective leadership is required to achieve transformation success. But what exactly is effective leadership? Fast decision-making? Access to the C-suite? Strategic planning? Join us as we discuss the five keys to unlocking your ability to engage, connect, and lead your organization to sustainable transformative results.

sessions.sessionName: Learn How to Deploy Sales Cloud Einstein in Minutes (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Sales Cloud Einstein is different than every other AI solution on the market because #itjustworks. But, Admins still need to know how to turn it on and some of the nuances in Setup. Join this session to walk through the setup process, ask questions, and even hear about a customer that deployed it themselves in minutes.

sessions.sessionName: Learn How to Deploy Sales Cloud Einstein in Minutes (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Sales Cloud Einstein is different than every other AI solution on the market because #itjustworks. But, Admins still need to know how to turn it on and some of the nuances in Setup. Join this session to walk through the setup process, ask questions, and even hear about a customer that deployed it themselves in minutes.

sessions.sessionName: Learn how Verizon Rapidly Unlocked the Value of an Acquisitions with Salesforce
sessions.sessionAbstract: You've just bought a revenue stream worth over a $1B to accelerate growth. Now how do you integrate it into your existing business? Learn how Verizon rapidly onboarded a new business unit by leveraging Sales Cloud as their common Sales platform and Einstein Analytics as the glue to create a full 360 view of their new sales funnel.

sessions.sessionName: Learn how Zayo Transformed Service Experience with Field Service
sessions.sessionAbstract: At Zayo, inconsistent manual processes, non-integrated systems, inefficient scheduling made it challenging for Field teams to meet the customer demands on a timely basis. With a vision to revolutionize Service experience for customers, Zayo leveraged Field Service to automate,optimize and integrate every touchpoint from : Scheduling the initial install, proactive maintenance, minimizing the impact of service disruptions. Today the alignment across the various field teams has transformed both customer and employee experience, resulting in increased service efficiency, service productivity and customer satisfaction.

sessions.sessionName: Left to Right, Using Quick Actions to Streamline Everything
sessions.sessionAbstract: In a perfect world, your users should never have to hit that "edit" button. Quick actions are a flexible and powerful tool that can enhance any business process. We'll cover how to talk to your users and discover their daily processes and take that information and build solutions to simplify those processes. You'll walk away from this session being able to use quick actions to plot a path for your users, and how to leverage Quick Actions, Workflow Rules, Visual Flow and Process Builder to make great things.

sessions.sessionName: Lessons Learned: Rolling Out Salesforce Marketing Cloud at a Global Scale
sessions.sessionAbstract:
How do you roll out Salesforce Marketing Cloud to different countries, with different levels of digital marketing maturity, all while creating the proper governance and change management to support successful adoption and understanding? Join us to hear how digital marketing leaders from Merck Animal Health addressed these and other questions in their quest to support marketers in over two dozen countries. They will share their journey and lessons learned--including what has been successful, and not so successful. 

Regardless of the industry you serve, and whether your organization supports distributed teams across a country or numerous locations around the world, you'll learn tactics that can be used to improve the rollout process.

sessions.sessionName: Let's Try This Again: How Two Customers Fixed Their Implementation
sessions.sessionAbstract: If you are a customer running into your own implementation issues or are about to start a project and want to avoid problems down the road, this session is for you. Come hear how two companies, iHeartMedia and Milacron, were able to "reboot" their implementation of Salesforce and spur on company rebirths. This session is hosted by a former System Integrator with 6+ years deploying Salesforce.

sessions.sessionName: Let´s Make your Salesforce Multilingual!
sessions.sessionAbstract: If you have non-English-speaking users, then this session is for you! Come and learn all the tips and tricks to make your Salesforce speak their language, such as what can be translated and what cannot, importing data when you have translated picklist values, how to ask your developers to write code that is translatable, and how to translate everything with just one document.

sessions.sessionName: Level Up Your Processes with Google API and Salesforce Integration
sessions.sessionAbstract: Do you have a complex process part in Salesforce and part in Google Sheets, and somehow want to integrate the two? Then come check out this session! We'll cover how to integrate Google APIs in your Salesforce org by implementing an API library in Apex and authenticate through the JWT bearer token flow. We’ll then cover how you can use this new tool in your org!

sessions.sessionName: Leverage Marketing Cloud to Drive Engagement: Case Study in Customer Onboarding
sessions.sessionAbstract: Learn how salesforce uses its own Marketing Cloud technologies and core platform to reach, nuture, and engage new customers. First impressions matter with customers and so does the ability to proactively and personally guide them to a proven path to success. In this session, salesforce adoption strategists and technologist will address how they serve up a guided, relevant, data driven experience to new customers using our Getting Started for Sales Cloud Journey as a case study. Experts will share tips and answer questions on how you can do the same.

sessions.sessionName: Leverage the Power of Einstein in Salesforce DMP
sessions.sessionAbstract: Can a better user interface, built-in analytics, and improved CX bring the power of deep data analytics to everyday marketers? Learn how enterprise marketers and media and entertainment companies democratize data science through better segmentation, targeting, and deep analytics. The Salesforce DMP data science team leads an interactive discussion that looks at several key Einstein use cases such as Lookalike modeling, Segmentation, and Journey Insights.

sessions.sessionName: Leverage the Power of Picklists
sessions.sessionAbstract: We all love Picklists! While at first glance picklists look like a simple feature, they are actually one of the most powerful field types in the admin toolbox. An admin who can master picklists can rule the world! Come to this session to learn about all of the improvements and new features we have released around picklists in the past two years such as advanced picklist value management, restricted picklists, formula-based defaults and global value sets. We will help you become, The Master of Picklists.

sessions.sessionName: Leveraging Change Management Helped Penske Successfully Transition to Lightning
sessions.sessionAbstract: Many organizations struggle with end user adoption of new functionality. Join us as we hear Penske's story of how they built an effective change management program to successfully transition their Sales Users to Lightning.

sessions.sessionName: Leveraging Lightning to Drive User Adoption
sessions.sessionAbstract: How can I get salespeople to effectively use a CRM? Move to Salesforce Lightning to provide a better user experience! Learn how Lightning gave my sales team a reason to want to log into Salesforce. Instead of a ledger of tasks and buried related lists, migrating to Lightning has put the most important action items at the top of every screen, with news and recommendations in Salesforce Inbox directly from Einstein's machine learning about what works in our sales cycle. I'll show you how we unified the UI across desktop and mobile, took our standard tasks and turned them into publisher actions, and got better reporting and forecasting so more accurate business intelligence rolls up to management. Learn how Lightning electrified my sales org and made adoption skyrocket!

sessions.sessionName: Leveraging the Power of Client Data: Best Practices for Financial Advisors
sessions.sessionAbstract: Take a fresh look at your client data and see how it can be one of the greatest assets to your firm. With robust client profiles that include relationship and financial account data, advisors can effectively measure client trends and give relevant advise when it matters most. Join Morgan Stanley's Bryan VanDyke to see how they are using Financial Services Cloud and Addepar to turn data into actionable insights.

sessions.sessionName: Life at Salesforce
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Curious what it's like to work at the world's fastest growing enterprise software company? Join Us for a look Inside Life at Salesforce. Hear from members of our team who will share their experiences of building market leading technologies and partnering for success with some of the most respected brands in the world. 

Attend this session and learn more about what it's like to work at one of Fortune's 100 Best Companies to Work for nine years in a row!

sessions.sessionName: Life is dynamic! Your field service scheduling should be too!
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join us to learn how to manage the realities of life with the dynamic gantt: delays, absences, emergencies without missing a beat. Learn how you can group nearby jobs, handle emergency dispatch, fill in open schedules, reshuffle jobs and view technician detours so that you can maximize productivity even in the midst of life's ups and downs!

sessions.sessionName: Life Sciences: Accelerate Customer Growth and Retention with CRM
sessions.sessionAbstract: Hear how Salesforce pharma, med device, and CRO organizations are taking customer relationship management to the next level with intelligent insights and seamless experiences. Learn how customers are realizing business value through sales growth, customer retention, patient satisfaction, and lower cost of ownership.

sessions.sessionName: Life Sciences: Break Down Silos and Move Faster with Apps
sessions.sessionAbstract: Life science companies are moving faster than ever before to bring innovative products to market and connect with their customers. But siloed data can slow down this digital transformation. Hear how Salesforce customers across the life sciences are building agile applications that connect employees, customers, and data, to accelerate growth and drive operational efficiency. Learn how biopharma, medical device, and CRO organizations are generating business value through faster implementation, improved customer experiences, and employee productivity.

sessions.sessionName: Lightening the Fundraising Burden with the Right Tools: A Tale of Two Nonprofits
sessions.sessionAbstract: Let's face it, fundraising is a necessary evil. It can be tough when you're armed with antiquated tools that don't let you get access to the information you need to move prospects and donors along the pipeline. Join nonprofits that implemented new tools and have changed the way they approach fundraising.

sessions.sessionName: Lightning Adoption in the Enterprise: Partnering for Success
sessions.sessionAbstract: Excited about Lightning Experience but unsure when to move? Join us to hear how one of our customers achieved major efficiencies and adoption.

sessions.sessionName: Lightning Alternatives to JavaScript Buttons
sessions.sessionAbstract: On the path to migrating your orgs to Lightning, one common challenge many admins face is figuring out how to migrate away from JavaScript buttons. JavaScript buttons are powerful and commonly used in Salesforce classic but are not supported in Lightning for good reasons. In this session, we will learn about the reasons why, learn about quick actions, declaratively and programmatic tools you can use as alternatives to JavaScript buttons.

sessions.sessionName: Lightning Alternatives to JavaScript Buttons
sessions.sessionAbstract: On the path to transitioning your orgs to Lightning, one common challenge many admins face is figuring out how to migrate away from JavaScript buttons. JavaScript buttons are powerful and commonly used in Salesforce classic but are not supported in Lightning for good reasons. In this session, we will learn about the reasons why, learn about quick actions, declaratively and programmatic tools you can use as alternatives to JavaScript buttons.

sessions.sessionName: Lightning Architecture for Beginners
sessions.sessionAbstract: The lightning component based architecture is very different than the typical Apex/VF MVC architecture. It will require a developer to learn the transition from developing in one architecture to another. This presentation will help the User learn the basics of developing and architecting basic lightning components.

sessions.sessionName: Lightning Bolt Solutions: The quickest way to launch your partner channel
sessions.sessionAbstract: With industry specific Lightning Bolt Solutions, accelerating channel sales is easier than ever! Join us to learn how our partners have leveraged the Salesforce platform to create ready-to-deploy partner communities that utilize YOUR industry's best practices and creates engaging experiences. You'll quickly see how easy it is to deploy a Partner Community in your org.

sessions.sessionName: Lightning Component Composition - How to Stitch Things Together
sessions.sessionAbstract: Lightning is here and you want to build great components for your users, but how do you structure and compose these components optimally? In this session we will talk about how to break a page into components, the benefits and flaws of structuring components in different ways, and how you can use this information to build robust components to enhance your application.

sessions.sessionName: Lightning Component Pitch Contest (ISVs)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Shark Tank meets Lightning, and it is getting electric! In this fun 20 minute session you will hear from some of the most innovative ISVs who have built Lightning Components. They have to share and demo rapid fire. And they will be judged on their performance. Don't miss it!

sessions.sessionName: Lightning Components : Even More Power for Admins to Command
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Lead the next phase of your company's Salesforce innovation by harnessing the power of Lightning Components. Take hold of the possibilities offered by Lightning Experience to transform the way that your users work and impress your boss! 

In this session we’ll look at how Admins can combine new customisation options of LEX with pre-built Lightning Components in order to create a superior experience that will delight you and your colleagues. 

You will learn: 
+ What the benefits are of defining pages to match the way groups and individual users work 
+ How to enhance pages with additional components from Salesforce & AppExchange 
+ Why it’s beneficial to understand how Lightning Components communicate 
+ When it is appropriate to get your hands dirty to tweak Lightning Components 

You'll also learn the language used to describe component behaviour so that you can specify the requirements for a developer to build any custom components that need. 

Provide users with new data visualisations, combine information from different objects and on the same page, provide real time refresh and notifications. There are no limits!

sessions.sessionName: Lightning Components : Even More Power for Admins to Command (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Lead the next phase of your company's Salesforce innovation by harnessing the power of Lightning Components. Take hold of the possibilities offered by Lightning Experience to transform the way that your users work and impress your boss! 

In this session we’ll look at how Admins can combine new customisation options of LEX with pre-built Lightning Components in order to create a superior experience that will delight you and your colleagues. 

You will learn: 
+ What the benefits are of defining pages to match the way groups and individual users work 
+ How to enhance pages with additional components from Salesforce & AppExchange 
+ Why it’s beneficial to understand how Lightning Components communicate 
+ When it is appropriate to get your hands dirty to tweak Lightning Components 

You'll also learn the language used to describe component behaviour so that you can specify the requirements for a developer to build any custom components that need. 

Provide users with new data visualisations, combine information from different objects and on the same page, provide real time refresh and notifications. There are no limits!

sessions.sessionName: Lightning Components Energize BD Sales Competency
sessions.sessionAbstract: Becton Dickinson built a Sales Competency Model to bring their sales goals and vision to life. Working closely with a partner, Doextra, they designed and built the solution leveraging Lightning Components. In this session they will review why they chose to build this directly into Salesforce and how the use of Lightning Components allowed them to deliver a fast and responsive UX.

sessions.sessionName: Lightning Customization - Take Full Advantage of Lightning Experience
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Lightning Experience gives admins a whole new set of tools to customize in ways that were not previously possible. Productivity is the key theme for Lightning Experience and we want to show you how admins and end users can become more productive than ever.
In this session, we'll explore how to take advantage of Lightning Apps, Utility Bars, Lightning Pages, and more to empower admins to be super heroes.

sessions.sessionName: Lightning Dashboards Best Practices
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join the Salesforce Analytics product management team to learn best practices for deploying reports and dashboards to your users. Come prepared with questions.

sessions.sessionName: Lightning Development for Apex & Backend Developers
sessions.sessionAbstract: If you're a developer who has primarily worked in Apex or other backend languages, the transition to Lightning development can be daunting. You may be reluctant to get into HTML, CSS Frameworks and other technologies that you haven't had to worry about in the past. In this session we'll break down the concepts you need to understand about Lightning development from the perspective of a backend developer. You'll walk away with a clear understanding of the technologies and tools at their disposal for building beautiful, functional Lighting Apps and Components.

sessions.sessionName: Lightning Experience Roadmap: the Future of User Productivity
sessions.sessionAbstract: Lightning Experience is taking the world's #1 customer success platform by storm, and you don't want to miss this view into what the future holds! See how Salesforce will supercharge end-user productivity in Lightning Experience.

sessions.sessionName: Lightning Layout Gumshoe
sessions.sessionAbstract: Lightning can be an adjustment for an established Salesforce instance with an Admin who has been using Classic page layouts for years. Let’s open an investigation on layouts in Lightning, inspecting the source for each panel and component to ensure that we’re making the most of new Lightning features. And of course, a good Gumshoe never forgets the implications of those changes on Classic users as well! We’ll also shine our magnifying glass on assignments to ensure we’re keen on who sees what based on profile, record type and app.

sessions.sessionName: Lightning Login: The Best Feature You've Never Heard About
sessions.sessionAbstract: Want to be able to log into Salesforce with only a single mouse click and your mobile phone? That's Lightning Login, and it's available for every Salesforce organization, regardless of version and whether you have enabled Lightning Experience.We'll show you how to log into an org using Lightning Login and how to enable it for your Salesforce instance.

sessions.sessionName: Lightning Magic - Casting Spells with Lightning Data Service
sessions.sessionAbstract: One of the beautiful things about a client-side framework is, it's client-side. So why do Lightning Component developers spend time writing server-side Apex Classes for standard CRUD interactions? With Lightning Data Service (LDS) the answer is, they don’t – they use magic! During this session we will explore the magic that is Lightning Data Service. From basic syntax and structure to implementation considerations and advanced use cases, you’ll walk away armed with the magic to get the most out of LDS in your Lightning Component development.

sessions.sessionName: Lightning Migration Tips and Tricks for Solo Admins
sessions.sessionAbstract:
It is all everyone talks about, Lightning. Are you on Lightning or planning to migrate to Lightning? Have you seen the new features in Lighting?
