For those of us who are solo admins, the thought of moving to Lightning on our own can seem overwhelming. There is so much information out there, so many steps to follow, and the feeling that there is no way we could do it on our own.

But we can…you can! 

Join me as I walk you through which resources I found to be the most useful for each stage of the Lightning migration. From Trailhead's enablement pack, to how to get things to show up on the activity timeline, to awesome competitions on Twitter; I'll share where to find hidden gems, answers to weird nuances, and how to keep your users connected and engaged after the implementation.

sessions.sessionName: Lightning Ready App Pitch Contest (ISVs)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Shark Tank meets Lightning, and it is getting electric! In this fun 20 minute session you will hear from some of the most innovative ISVs who have built Lightning Ready Apps. They have to share and demo rapid fire. And they will be judged on their performance. Don't miss it!

sessions.sessionName: Lightning Sparks Schneider Electric's Global Transformation
sessions.sessionAbstract: Schneider Electric has embarked on their major Lightning transformation journey impacting 22k+ users globally. Join us to hear why they decided to transform, how they managed the process and lessons learned along the way.

sessions.sessionName: Lightning Success: Taking Your Migration by Storm
sessions.sessionAbstract: Nervous about your Lightning migration? Don't worry--we did it and lived to tell about it! Join us as we share how our team migrated our 900-user org to Lightning Experience. We will offer tips and challenges of our process from start to finish. How did we tackle the migration? What do we wish we had known? How did we accomplish user buy-in and increased adoption rates? Join us to find out how you can take your own Lightning migration and rollout by storm.

sessions.sessionName: Lightning-Fast Productivity Made Easy with Consoles
sessions.sessionAbstract:
We know consoles are great for service, but other users love them, too! With just a few settings, you can create tabs and sub-tabs, add in custom components - even third-party apps - to provide a dashboard-like experience for your users. 

In this step-by-step session, learn how easy it is to set up and customize a console to bring together the data users need to make their job easier and lightning fast.

sessions.sessionName: Living the Person Account Life
sessions.sessionAbstract: When your organization does not fit into the traditional business-to-business (B2B) model, there is another world within Salesforce where you will fit. That world is person accounts! Any organization that falls into the business-to-consumer (B2C) model or a hybrid that blends both B2B and B2C models, should look at person accounts TODAY! This presentation will discuss the basic concepts, principles, benefits and special considerations around the person account model. Along the way, we will debunk some of the long standing and antiquated myths about the feature. Sharing knowledge and use cases around person accounts will help others begin living the person account life in Salesforce TODAY!

sessions.sessionName: Location-Aware Salesforce Development
sessions.sessionAbstract: Location-Aware apps are changing the way companies interact with their customers. Apple’s introduction of iBeacon to iOS has exploded the number of mobile apps that now provide consumers with location-specific, real-time information. Join us as we build a location-aware Salesforce1 mobile app that leverages iBeacon technology and the Force.com platform to create a next-level CRM experience. Attendees will leave this session knowing how to leverage iBeacon technology in their mobile apps and how the Internet of Things can seamlessly interact with their Salesforce data.

sessions.sessionName: Looking Under the Hood of Your Org with Eclipse
sessions.sessionAbstract:
When making a change to a field or even a report in Salesforce, we often wonder as admins "Where is this used?" or "What will this impact?" Thinking of, and manually searching, all of the possible places that something might be used can be both daunting and impractical.
 
There has to be a better way–and there is! Whether something is utilized in a report, a workflow, a page layout, or even just mentioned in a dashboard; you'll learn how to find it with Eclipse and the Force.com IDE–a free tool built for developers that is perfect for clicks-not-code admins too.
 
In this session, we'll walk through installing Eclipse and the Force.com IDE, and then show you how to start searching your org. You will leave this session with a powerful toolset to confidently manage changes in Salesforce.

sessions.sessionName: Los 10 Mandamientos Apex (The 10 Apex Commandments in Spanish)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Don't be a Salesforce sinner! Don't break Salesforce rules! We've been there before and have gathered a list with the most relevant issues you should take into account to be a good Salesforce developer. Join us to get tips on how to develop good Apex code from the beginning. NOTE: This session is provided in Spanish.

sessions.sessionName: Low Adoption? Relaunch, Rebrand and Reengage with Lightning!
sessions.sessionAbstract: Learn how switching to Salesforce's new user interface can give your org the rebranding power you need to re-engage your users! You'll have to do more than flip the switch, but the new look of the platform gives you the ability to relaunch and reinvigorate the platform! Come hear about customers that have successfully increased their adoption of Salesforce after implementing LEX!

sessions.sessionName: Low Adoption? Relaunch, Rebrand and Reengage with Lightning! (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Learn how switching to Salesforce's new user interface can give your org the rebranding power you need to re-engage your users! You'll have to do more than flip the switch, but the new look of the platform gives you the ability to relaunch and reinvigorate the platform! Come hear about customers that have successfully increased their adoption of Salesforce after implementing LEX!

sessions.sessionName: Make Teamwork Simple with the Focus, Flow, Feedback Framework
sessions.sessionAbstract: Strong teams are cohesive teams who get a lot done and make a huge impact on their organization's outcomes. At Quip, we've found the strongest teams emulate 3 ideals to drive impact. They create a heightened sense of focus by efficiently prioritizing their work, they organize workflows that improve collaboration, and they build a culture of feedback and iteration. Learn the key strategies of the Focus, Flow, Feedback framework to help your team reach their full potential.

sessions.sessionName: Make the Jump to Lightning ...And Get It Right First Time
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Remember in Star Wars they fail to jump to lightspeed on the first attempt? Make sure you don’t suffer the same hiccup when you jump to Lightning. Join us to learn how to get it right the first time, by examining the 5 Ws of Lightning migration - What, When, Where, Who, and Why! 

In this session, we will present a series of tips for making the move from Classic to the Lightning Experience, to allow you to plan your migration journey and make the jump with ease. You’ll leave the session knowing how to assess your readiness, where and when to start, and how to make the most of Lightning-only features like Kanban, Path, and Streams. You’ll also learn how to replace your JavaScript buttons, how to migrate your custom code to the new experience, and - critically - how to handle change management.

sessions.sessionName: Make Your Business Scale & Grow Faster with the Salesforce Platform
sessions.sessionAbstract: Small business, big brand. Join us to learn how other small business customers are using Salesforce automation, analytics, dashboards, forecasting, and CPQ to think big, compete on equal footing with large enterprises, and do more with less.

sessions.sessionName: Make Your Community A Destination On Your Customer's Marketing Journey
sessions.sessionAbstract: The seamless integration between Community Cloud and Marketing Cloud means that Marketers and Community Managers can now drive personalized, 1:1 customer journeys within Communities, using all the collateral and data already found in your Marketing Cloud. Learn how to use this integration to drive valuable use cases within your community, including: Community Member Onboarding and Product Marketing.

sessions.sessionName: Making the Future Work: Accounting for Human Behavior to Help Enable Change
sessions.sessionAbstract: As changes in how we work accelerate, how can we apply findings from behavioral science to help people adopt new tools, processes and behaviors? In this interactive (fun!) session we will introduce frameworks grounded in behavioral research that can help us identify potential barriers to change. We will then discuss ways that Salesforce tries to make future-visions people-centered.

sessions.sessionName: Managed Packages in Salesforce DX and Feature Management
sessions.sessionAbstract: As an AppExchange Partner, have you wondered how you can pilot your new features with early adopters, get valuable feedback, and iterate? Do you have use cases where you want to know if your latest-cool feature is being used by your customers? Are you interested in knowing what Salesforce DX is, and how managed packages work with them? If yes, this is a great session to get an overview and see some awesome demos on two related technologies - Feature Management AND Managed Packages in Salesforce DX. #DF17Partners

sessions.sessionName: Managing Large Salesforce Data Using Heroku And Salesforce Connect
sessions.sessionAbstract: In this session attendees will learn how Cervello leverages Heroku, Postgres and Salesforce Connect to offload large objects to Heroku, but still make the data available in Salesforce for viewing, editing, searching and reporting. This session will also cover the complexities of archiving data and all the things you must consider before implementing a solution such as cascade deletes, restricted deletes, query only object and others.

sessions.sessionName: Managing Millions of Salesforce Records using Heroku Connect & Postgres
sessions.sessionAbstract: As your Salesforce deployment grows, you need to be able to query, manipulate, and unlock the value of millions of rows of data both in and out of Salesforce. Using bi-directional synchronization between Salesforce and Heroku Postgres, Heroku Connect unifies the data in your Postgres database with the standard and custom objects in Salesforce. You can also use Heroku External objects to use data from Heroku apps mastered in Postgres to drive custom business processes in Salesforce. In this session we will explore various data centric, app focused use cases. We will also dive into some of the data sync modes and share best practices for configuring Heroku Connect.

sessions.sessionName: Managing Multiple Enterprise Business Units Effectively in a Single Org
sessions.sessionAbstract: Boston Scientific manages 9 different business units in a single org with almost 6,000 users. They have well defined governance, development, deployment, and change management processes to make this org highly successful. Boston has also transitioned to Agile development over the last 18months. The session would describe the process the team uses to manage the org.

sessions.sessionName: Managing Salesforce Security in Einstein Analytics
sessions.sessionAbstract: Einstein Analytics is a powerful tool for visualizing data and creating important business insights. The platform allows organizations to analyze data from any source. Exposing the right data to the right users is critical for success. This session will cover advanced topics for mirroring Salesforce security in Einstein Analytics.

sessions.sessionName: Managing Security Threats in a Complex World
sessions.sessionAbstract: Current security threats are many and varied in size and scope. Join us as Jeff DiMuro of Salesforce's Customer Success Group shares effective approaches to 21st-century security and secrets for ensuring your company's information assets stay protected.

sessions.sessionName: Manufacturing Keynote: The Gateway to a Connected Customer Experience
sessions.sessionAbstract: Manufacturers today must invest in building ongoing relationships with their end customers - where the product is just one component of a larger connected customer experience. In this keynote, hear global manufacturers like KONE, Michelin, and Emerson share how they develop 1-to-1 relationships with customers that extend beyond the product sale. You will leave this session knowing how to expand the value of Salesforce to move towards proactive service, empower your sales organization to configure and sell complex products, and make your partner, dealer, and distributor networks more effective than ever before. You'll also see how artificial intelligence (AI) can be seamlessly be embedded in a CRM platform to intelligently score leads and enable automated proactive service. As we enter the era of relationship-centric manufacturing, customer insights can be put to work to better understand how your product is used, empower field productivity, and delight customers with world-class service.

sessions.sessionName: Manufacturing Transformation: Drive Growth with Lightning Bolt communities
sessions.sessionAbstract: Managing operations is an important part of any manufacturing business. It’s essential for reducing downtime and increasing growth. Learn how other manufacturers launched communities faster with Bolt solutions to better connect customer and partners with their products.

sessions.sessionName: Manufacturing: Transform Customer Experience through Intelligent Service
sessions.sessionAbstract: Service is the new front line for manufacturers. It’s where battles are being fought to differentiate from the competition. Winning these battles requires embracing a service-based business model and fundamentally changing the relationship between manufacturers and customers. Join this session to learn how leading manufacturers leverage the Connected Service solution to stay ahead of the competition by delivering first-class service focused directly on their customers.

sessions.sessionName: Manufacturing: Empowering Partners across Complex Distribution Networks
sessions.sessionAbstract: How do you give your customers a seamless experience with your products and services while having to manage a complex network or channels and partners? Join us to discover how you can empower your entire ecosystem. In this session, learn how Salesforce is enabling transformation across multiple B2B partner models and how companies have created partner solutions that deliver an integrated experience to end customers.

sessions.sessionName: Manufacturing: Simplifying the Complex Sale to Mass Produce Customer Success
sessions.sessionAbstract: For manufacturers, sales is no longer just about selling products — it’s about relationships and bringing value to customers. Why? Because with the emergence of the industrial internet, manufacturers who know their customers and turn services into solutions are the ones who will maximize new business opportunities. Join us to learn how Salesforce Connected Sales can help manufacturers collaborate globally with their entire business to bring value and serve their customers in a whole new way.

sessions.sessionName: Manufacturing: Smarter Customer Engagement with Connected Products
sessions.sessionAbstract: By 2020, there will be over 75 billion connected devices. AI and IoT are changing the way manufacturers operate and connect with their ecosystem. Join us to learn how manufacturers are leveraging the Salesforce Connected Products solution to take advantage of rapidly growing opportunities — and how you can connect your devices to the cloud, analyze device data, and create smart services that monetize your IoT investments.

sessions.sessionName: Manufacturing: Unleash Innovation with Integrated Front & Back Office Solutions
sessions.sessionAbstract: For many manufacturers, the path to innovation is often blocked by outdated and inflexible back-office systems which severely limits adoption of modern security models, collaboration tools, and mobile capability. Join us to learn how manufacturers have unleashed innovation in their organizations by leveraging the power of the Salesforce Platform, using its ecosystem to unlock back-office information and transforming front-office performance.

sessions.sessionName: Market Trends in Salesforce Hiring: Attracting and Retaining the Best Salesforce
sessions.sessionAbstract: Find out: What do Salesforce employees expect from employers? What's the average salary for a Salesforce professional? Does your compensation line up? How can your business attract and retain the most knowledgeable Salesforce employees?

sessions.sessionName: Marketing 101: An Introduction to Pardot for Small Businesses
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Looking to build out your marketing strategy and do more with a lean team, but not sure where to start? Join us for an introduction to Pardot - from what it is, to how it works, and how it integrates with Salesforce. 

Everyone will get a chance to experience an interactive marketing journey with Pardot, so you'll walk away with a clear picture of how to drive change and use Pardot at your company.

sessions.sessionName: Marketing Analytics at Salesforce: How Salesforce Uses Einstein Analytics
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Einstein Analytics has transformed how our Marketing teams at Salesforce collaborate, gain insights, and quickly identify issues. 

Come see how Salesforce uses Einstein Analytics which resulted in a 300% increase in efficiency.

sessions.sessionName: Marketing Cloud and Commerce Cloud Case Study (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Learn how retailers are driving customer retention and loyalty while engaging customers in a whole new way with unique experiences delivered through Commerce Cloud and Marketing Cloud.

sessions.sessionName: Marketing Cloud and Commerce Cloud Case Study (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Learn how retailers are driving customer retention and loyalty while engaging customers in a whole new way with unique experiences delivered through Commerce Cloud and Marketing Cloud.

sessions.sessionName: Marketing Cloud for AppExchange Partners
sessions.sessionAbstract: Interested in integrating with Marketing Cloud and launching your app on AppExchange? You can build the next app that connects with marketers as they improve their reach to customers. Hear partner use cases from our AppExchange Partner team, and learn how to take advantage of Marketing Cloud functionality. #DF17Partners

sessions.sessionName: Marketing Secrets of Startup Unicorns
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join startup marketing superstar, Bill Macaitis, as he shares his insight and experience leading some of the world's greatest growth marketing engines: Slack (CRO/CMO), Zendesk (CMO) and Salesforce (SVP of Marketing). Bill will draw on 20 years of experience to provide practical tips for going to market and accelerating growth.

sessions.sessionName: Mastercard's Digital Sales Aid - Raising the Bar with Customer Insights
sessions.sessionAbstract: Mastercard is rolling out 2500 DSA users (1000 mobile) with S/1, Analytics and Chatter to its global sales force. Salesforce Services developed the Solution as their SI. Users include tablets, iPhones, Samsung smartphones, Microsoft Surface, and desktop devices.

sessions.sessionName: Mastering Lightning Community Development
sessions.sessionAbstract: Creating a Lightning Community using Community Builder is easier than ever, with numerous, powerful customizations available. This session will explore numerous customizations and integrations from custom Lightning component development to Visualforce pages to Themes and 3rd party JavaScript libraries. You'll also learn how to tap into Topics, Articles, Standard and Custom objects and much more!

sessions.sessionName: Maximizing Leads & Decreasing CPA in Financial Services with Advertising Studio
sessions.sessionAbstract: In the U.K. and the U.S. 71% of consumers are now using mobile banking apps and financial brand advertisers are in hot pursuit of this valuable audience. In this session, you will learn exactly how financial services companies, big and small, are leveraging their CRM data to increase marketing productivity and effectiveness, optimize advertising spend, and grow revenue.

sessions.sessionName: Maximizing Your Earning Potential in the Salesforce Community
sessions.sessionAbstract: Mason Frank presents the 2017 Salesforce Salary Survey covering salaries, career progression, benefits, certifications, and factors that can help you increase your earning potential. In our presentation, find out what you’re worth and learn tips that can help you take your career forward.

sessions.sessionName: Measure & Automate: How Service Analytics Helps You Deliver Consistent Service
sessions.sessionAbstract: Your service agents are your company's front line, interfacing directly with customers on a daily basis and holding your company's reputation in the palms of their hands. How do you ensure they are performing at the top of their game? Try Service Analytics, a new Einstein Analytics application designed specifically for Service Cloud. Join us to learn about the latest developments with Service Analytics and how customers have created their own Analytics dashboards to analyze and reduce case backlog.

sessions.sessionName: Measure the Metrics that Matter for Sales Success
sessions.sessionAbstract: Choosing the right metrics can actually drive your reps' behavior. Learn best practices on how to inspire action and turn your sales reps into top performers with the right metrics, and how to measure them in Sales Cloud.

sessions.sessionName: Media: How Disruptive Media Companies Are Stealing the Show in Ad Sales
sessions.sessionAbstract: Both traditional and digital media companies want to provide integrated cross-media solutions for their advertisers. One of the biggest challenges in making this dream real is the disconnect between the Salesforce and downstream legacy digital and linear ad operations systems. Join us as we hear how Salesforce customers have overcome this challenge and are using the full power of the Customer Success Platform for Media and Entertainment to transform their ad sales business.

sessions.sessionName: Media: Lights, Camera, Success: Optimizing Production, Workflow and Scheduling
sessions.sessionAbstract: Many customers in the media and entertainment segment start their Salesforce journey implementing SFA functionality, but more and more are turning to Salesforce to manage complex, industry-specific business functionality. Hear how two media leaders have built Production Management and Scheduling applications on the Customer Success Platform for Media and Entertainment.

sessions.sessionName: Media: Staying Above Water in the Data Lake - Audience Engagement Strategies
sessions.sessionAbstract: As audiences of consumers and readers move to digital channels media, media and entertainment companies have a better ability to manage one-to-one relationships, providing a more personalized experience. The key to leveraging this paradigm is capturing better customer profile information to enhance the relationship with the end consumer, whether it is an entertainment venue or a consumer of information such as readers or viewers. Hear how media leaders are leveraging the Customer Success Platform for Media and Entertainment to drive better consumer engagement.

sessions.sessionName: Meet Salesforce for K-12: Let's Connect & Collaborate to Improve Outcomes
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join the Salesforce for K-12 team for our new and future product offerings for schools. In this session we will provide an overview of our current K-12 solutions as well as our upcoming roadmap. We’ll also hear from a Connected School and see how they are using Salesforce to supercharge their work and deliver on their mission.

sessions.sessionName: Meet the Developers
sessions.sessionAbstract: If you have ever wanted to just sit down with the technical leadership team at Salesforce and ask any question you want about Salesforce Platform technology, this is your chance. This annual and venerable panel session is an open Q&A with the product owners and engineers that are building all aspects of the Salesforce Platform. Bring you questions and here what other developers are burning to know as well.

sessions.sessionName: Meet the New Quip Platform – Collaboration as a Service
sessions.sessionAbstract: Tired of work applications that don't talk to each other? Wish you could centralize all of your applications where they can be discussed in context? Over the last year we have transformed Quip into a fully-loaded platform where you can do just that. Learn how to build on top of Quip, connect your existing applications, and customize Quip to improve your team's most important workflows. Quip offers "collaboration–as–a–service" for all of your mission-critical work applications.

sessions.sessionName: Mega Lightning Roadmap: Featuring the Customer Success Platform
sessions.sessionAbstract: Lightning is taking the world's #1 customer success platform by storm, and you don't want to miss this view into what the future holds! Our product leaders across all Clouds will outline the Lightning roadmaps for your favorite products and share exciting new features that will fuel your company to work faster, smarter and the way want. Note that each Cloud will have their own specific Lightning roadmap session but this is your chance to get a comprehensive overview!

sessions.sessionName: Mentorship in the Real World: Get the Support You Need for Your Career
sessions.sessionAbstract: “Get a mentor!” they say. But your company doesn’t have a working mentorship program. Or maybe, like me, you’ve had the humiliating experience of asking someone to be your mentor and gotten a big no, or worse, crickets. In this session, we’ll talk about what mentorship looks like in the real world, exploring personal missteps and lessons learned as a fledgling person in tech. You'll walk out of this session with real actionable steps for you to get the support you need. This is mentorship hacking for the rest of us!

sessions.sessionName: Microservice Based Architecture Using Platform Events
sessions.sessionAbstract: Platform Events are a cool new piece of technology for the platform that enable us to do some amazing things including developing our applications using the practices and principles of microservices. In this session you will learn what Platform Events are and how to use them properly. We will then dive deep into how they can be used to orchestrate and architect applications to deliver more scalable solutions.

sessions.sessionName: Migrate Existing AppExchange Apps to Lightning
sessions.sessionAbstract: For over 10 years, AppExchange partners have built amazing apps on the Salesforce Platform. With Lightning Experience, we introduced a wide range of features that allow partners to completely re-think and significantly improve their app's User Experience. This session will focus on best practices for existing partners to migrate their existing apps to Lightning - not only in terms of making their apps Lightning Ready, but also in terms of fully leveraging Lightning Components. #DF17Partners

sessions.sessionName: Migrating to Content Builder, Our Newest Content Editor
sessions.sessionAbstract: Want to learn how the Marketing Cloud can help you easily create well-designed and flexible emails with Content Builder? Content Builder is a cross-channel content management application in the Marketing Cloud. In this session, you will learn how to set up their Content Builder folder structure, import content from the Classic Email tools, and best practices for creating content for their marketing campaigns. Hear from the product team in charge of building the tools and provide feedback on the roadmap.

sessions.sessionName: Migrating your Existing Managed Package to Salesforce DX
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Are you a Salesforce Partner with an existing managed package and an established CI Process? Are you interested in how SFDX can enhance your process and if it’s worth the time and effort to move? If so, this is the session for you!
 
This session will cover two different approaches to migrating your package and CI Process to SFDX; iterative “baby steps,” and one big “leap.” We’ll discuss the pros and cons of each approach as well as potential challenges. During the session we will also demonstrate the conversion an existing managed package and CI system to SFDX. 
 
At the end of this session, attendees will walk away with enough knowledge to execute a migration to SFDX and more importantly knowing when the migration fits into their product development schedule. #DF17Partners

sessions.sessionName: MindForce: Control Salesforce with Your Mind
sessions.sessionAbstract: Have you ever wanted to control your Salesforce processes with your mind? Like thinking about approving a record... and boom, it is approved? Check out this session to learn how you can use the Muse headband and it's EEG detection capabilities to achieve exactly this. And besides this sneak preview of "Brain-Computer Interface", you will also see how this headband helps to experience the magic of mindfulness. What's the next thing you want to think of?

sessions.sessionName: Mobile Analytics: Customer Success On-the-go
sessions.sessionAbstract: Come see how Mobile Analytics can bring customer success to you and your business no matter where you are. Bring us your mobile-related feedback and questions, and learn about what's new in Mobile Analytics. Learn mobile patterns and best-practices as some of our customers share their stories of how they utilize Mobile Analytics to take the power of Einstein Analytics outside of the office!

sessions.sessionName: Mobile and Omni-Present Communication - What Retailers and Brands Need to Know
sessions.sessionAbstract: Corporate marketers are often the stewards of customer experience, but what if most of your customer touchpoints are outside of the corporate marketing department? Regional marketers, franchise owners, partners, financial advisors and agents all need the tools to speak with the same voice and deliver cohesive, connected customer experiences. Learn how a financial services organization developed a Distributed Marketing strategy to arm its advisors with the tools they needed to put the right customers down the right (branded!) journeys. Also, see a demo of the new Distributed Marketing platform from the Marketing Cloud, which is currently in Beta.

sessions.sessionName: Mobile Security & Compliance Fundamentals with Salesforce1
sessions.sessionAbstract: Mobile security and compliance is critical for any organization, especially those in regulated industries like Financial Services and Healthcare. Join us to learn how to manage Salesforce1 with enhanced App Policies and Mobile Device Management integrations.

sessions.sessionName: Mobile-ize Your Dashboards in Minutes Using Designer
sessions.sessionAbstract: Create analytics-on-the-go for your entire sales and service teams using the powerful layouts feature in Designer. Watch how Designer generates mobile-ready versions of your existing dashboards, and learn best practices for managing and organizing them for your teams.

sessions.sessionName: Modern Architecture: How Caesars Leverages IoT for Real-Time Engagement
sessions.sessionAbstract: Caesars is leveraging IoT Cloud to interact with guests "in-trip" to drive a greater share of wallet, improve yield and increase customer satisfaction. As customers engage with Caesars assets, IoT Cloud listens to these signals, contextualizes them and proactively engages guests across channels. These signals automate the curation of a virtual guest itinerary in real-time enabling Caesars to suggest complimentary offerings targeting the white space while reducing the volume of distressed inventory.

sessions.sessionName: Modern Architecture: How Comcast Streamlined Construction Management
sessions.sessionAbstract: Comcast leveraged the power of Salesforce to provide an integrated globally scalable Construction Tool, by Thinking Big, Starting Small, and Moving Fast. They produced a minimally viable product and showed value in less than 3 months compared to an existing 3-year non-solution. This Illuminative journey will show you how to establish the right architecture roadmap for agile development while building for scale and maintainability. Hear from Comcast as they discuss their strategy, plan, and execution, how they mitigate risk, and what lessons they've learned.

sessions.sessionName: Modern Architecture: Optimizing Cloud Computing with AWS & Salesforce Together
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Amazon Web Services collaborates across multiple disciplines internally, including Sales, Marketing, Support, Services, etc., in order to accelerate Amazon's renowned 'customer obsession' with a consistent vision of where and how to use both AWS and Salesforce capabilities to achieve the most innovative, mutually-beneficial cloud-based solutions for customers. 

AWS has been on an accelerating growth trajectory since its inception and required a ‘blueprint’ to show how Salesforce should be used more effectively to help it reach its business objectives. Utilizing Illuminate (Salesforce Business Architecture methodology), AWS successfully mapped their core capabilities and gaps, building a coherent 'future state architecture' vision, and most importantly, a detailed phased roadmap to help them realize this vision.

Come and learn from AWS team on their experience utilizing the platform, hear about best practices discovered along the journey, and lessons learned through this strategic partnership.

sessions.sessionName: Modern Architecture: PTC Transforms Experiences with Salesforce
sessions.sessionAbstract: PTC has the most robust Internet of Things (IoT) technology in the world. Our leading IoT and AR platform and field-proven solutions bring together the physical and digital worlds to reinvent the way you create, manufacture, operate, and service products. Learn how we leverage Salesforce and Enterprise Architecture to transform our customer experience.

sessions.sessionName: Modern Architecture: Transforming Guest Experience & Associate Engagement
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce as the Engagement Layer of Enterprise Architecture in Hospitality can transform Excellence in Guest Experience and Associate Engagement. There are many lessons learned on this transition and impact it is having on People, Processes, and Technologies. Hospitality is a highly competitive global industry. It is also in flux both from traditional merger/acquisitions as well as new entrants. An Innovative focus on Guest Experience and Enabling Associates has enabled customers to be highly successful, but adapting faster is essential. Cloud innovation adds agility to our Enterprise Architecture and enables companies to up their game while planning for the future. Transitioning Global High Touch Organization to add and roll-out capabilities required an Architectural Roadmap: • Infrastructure (Data, Integration, Security) • Process (Network, Business Process Change, Governance) • Stakeholder Experience (Guest, Internal, Partners, Mobile, and Device)

sessions.sessionName: Modern Architectures: Greater China Region and Beyond
sessions.sessionAbstract: Architecting Salesforce for the Greater China Region (GCR) and other APAC regions presents a unique set of challenges and benefits. Join us to hear real-world insights about the nuances, best practices, and lessons learned from Salesforce cloud architects. We will focus on Salesforce infrastructure updates with a GCR context, their impacts on performance optimization, and their potential applicability to regions beyond GCR.

sessions.sessionName: Modernize the Customer Experience with Connected Portals
sessions.sessionAbstract: Delivering a first-rate customer experience requires creating an online experience that seamlessly connects customers to the information and business process they need most to be successful. Please join us to see how Salesforce customers create beautifully branded, mobile portals that effortlessly connect customers with the tools and information they need most.

sessions.sessionName: More time coding, less time debugging. How to best use the debugger.
sessions.sessionAbstract: From developer console to debugger Salesforce has continued to evolve Apex Debugging tools. Now, developers have access to the Apex Interactive debugger! Developers who come to Apex from another language will find this a welcomed addition to the platform. Join us to learn about the interactive debugger, how to use it, and how it can transform your development team.

sessions.sessionName: Move Fast and Break Nothing: How Heroku Went Enterprise but Stayed Startup
sessions.sessionAbstract:
The startup motto is “move fast and break things” but that no longer works when you've gone enterprise, where everything is mission critical and customers pay actual money. 

This session will explore how Heroku has maintained its startup spirit in the midst of becoming a crucial piece of Salesforce's platform.

sessions.sessionName: Move Your Sales Team to Lightning in Less than 90 Days
sessions.sessionAbstract: Be an Admin Hero by leading your sales team to Lightning in less than 90 days! We did, and now our sales team is more productive and happier than ever before. At first, the prospect of moving away from Classic may seem too daunting. But Lightning is easier for users to learn, has improved navigation and workflow, has beautiful dashboards and reports, and increases user productivity. Now we are wondering why we didn't move to Lightning sooner!

sessions.sessionName: N to the P to the S to the P: Admin Hacks for the NPSP Admin
sessions.sessionAbstract: Do you love the Nonprofit Success Pack (NPSP) as much as we do? Great. That's why we are bringing you an admin session dedicated to the NPSP. Learn from Salesforce MVP about successful practices, admin tips and tricks, and hacks you didn't even know existed in NPSP.

sessions.sessionName: Named Credentials: Securing and Simplifying API Callouts
sessions.sessionAbstract: In a connected world, secure, integrated systems are a necessity. Using Named Credentials with Salesforce ensures security and authentication are friction free by simplifying the critical task of securely storing login details and authenticating with external APIs. Whether you are a beginner or a pro, come along and learn about the power of Named Credentials and the benefits they provide for developers and admins alike. You will see first hand the advantages they offer for managing environments, deployments, and future configurability and maintenance.

sessions.sessionName: National Instruments Successful Global Lightning Transition
sessions.sessionAbstract: Moving to Lightning doesn't have to be scary. With a little planning and some elbow grease companies of any size can make the transition with success. In this session, National Instruments will share their journey to Lightning and how they overcame objections from their business users and deliver productivity improvements.

sessions.sessionName: New Apex Compiler Rollout
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Is your org using the Old or New Apex compiler? Come find out! 
 
 Rewriting the Apex Compiler wasn't challenging enough, so we decided to maintain compatibility for all Apex code ever written. The team has worked tirelessly to ensure no one notices when we flip the switch -- have you noticed? Come learn about our atypical rollout process and the tools we built to support the rollout, see some examples of "valid" Apex code (according to the Old compiler), and learn about our roadmap for Apex once the New compiler is rolled out to all orgs.

sessions.sessionName: New Digital-First Experiences Dominate Mortgage and Lending
sessions.sessionAbstract: Digitization is leveling the playing field in lending: Fintech and industry incumbents are both moving at unheard-of speed and efficiency in mortgage and lending. Join this panel discussion of leaders from across the lending industry who are leveraging new digital approaches to create seamless lending experiences.

sessions.sessionName: New Life for a Commodore 64: An Old-Is-New-Again Salesforce Client
sessions.sessionAbstract: We love our old technology, so why not give it new life? This talk will show you how your beloved Commodore 64 (or a C64 emulator if your original power supply finally gave out) can return your tender care as a unique Salesforce client. Do you remember BASIC? Then let's PEEK and POKE your sObjects 80s style!

sessions.sessionName: New to Salesforce? Plan and Execute a Successful Launch
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join us for an intimate and interactive discussion with other customers about getting and staying on the path to success with your new Salesforce implementation. In this session we will focus on how you can improve your Salesforce Implementation and adapt it to your changing business needs. We will discuss the key questions to ask before beginning a Salesforce implementation, ideas and strategies to promote a successful launch, and how to create a roadmap to success.

sessions.sessionName: No Connection, No Problem
sessions.sessionAbstract: While it's true that we are living in a connected world, being offline doesn't mean being unproductive. In this session attendees will learn how to use the built-in offline capabilities of the Salesforce Mobile SDK within a hybrid iOS app. We'll create a simple training application, that allows users to complete modules with verification questions, regardless of whether they are on- or offline. Those flights to Dreamforce could be put to good use.

sessions.sessionName: No seriously; Test Your Code.
sessions.sessionAbstract: You don't have to change your underwear everyday. But you should. You don't have to write meaningful unit tests. But you should. Join us as we refactor a suite of tests so that they are meaningful. Meaningful not only to ourselves, but also our business users and the sociopath (with our address) tasked with maintaining our code years from now.

sessions.sessionName: No-Code IoT: Easily Unlock the Power of IoT Connected Products
sessions.sessionAbstract: In this interactive session you will learn how to use Xively, Heroku and Salesforce to quickly model your connected product business and accelerate your time to market. We’ll demonstrate how you can seamlessly deliver IoT-connected product data into Salesforce for rapid deployment and instant business value through Xively’s Heroku Add-On.

sessions.sessionName: OAuth with Salesforce Demystified
sessions.sessionAbstract: OAuth is a concept that can befuddle the most seasoned developers and users. In this session, we will dive deep into OAuth and see some demos primarily focused on: Distinction between Authentication(Identity) and Authorization(Access), Understanding what OAuth is, OAuth in Salesforce and different OAuth flows, Open ID protocol for Authentication(SSO). We will also see a quick review of the "Salesforce certified identity and access management designer" certification.

sessions.sessionName: Oh the Things You Can Do with Heroku
sessions.sessionAbstract: Heroku is a platform that enables you to build, run, and operate applications on Salesforce. Join deSingel to learn how they created an integrated website with real-time ticketing information and automated content updates on Heroku.

sessions.sessionName: Omni-Channel Product Roadmap: Routing to The Right Agent, at The Right Time
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join us to learn how leading companies are delivering smarter and seamless service with Service Cloud's intelligent, real-time routing solution, Omni-Channel. Enabling companies to dynamically push the right work to the most right agent at the right time, we'll dive into how Omni-Channel improves agents and managers productivity while overall increasing the efficiency of a call center.

sessions.sessionName: Optimize Every Selling Day with Sales Cloud Productivity Features
sessions.sessionAbstract: You can't give your team more hours in the day, but you can give them the tools and knowledge to maximize every single hour. Learn simple steps you can take today to maximize productivity in Sales Cloud and crush your sales goals.

sessions.sessionName: Optimizing Sales Pipeline Through Einstein Analytics
sessions.sessionAbstract: Learn how VMware leverage Salesforce Einstein Analytics to help Accelerate Sales Pipeline across their Global Deployment.

sessions.sessionName: Org Consolidation For The Largest Tech Merger In History, Dell & EMC
sessions.sessionAbstract: In this session we will discuss how Dell and EMC developed, and began executing on the consolidation journey. The new challenges neither companies had experienced and the new way the IT and business teams are solving to build a better seamless experience for the combined sales teams.

sessions.sessionName: Org Security Fundamentals
sessions.sessionAbstract: If you've read the news lately, you know you need strong security protections for your online systems. Join us as we teach you how to leverage access control features such as IP range restrictions, identity confirmation, and two-factor authentication to protect your Salesforce instance. Hear from Salesforce security engineers about how these protections work and threats they mitigate.

sessions.sessionName: Out with the Old, in with the New. Reimagine the Intranet.
sessions.sessionAbstract: Organizations of all shapes and sizes are hindered by complex organizational structures that make it hard to innovate. Knowledge and expertise often gets trapped in silos and is underutilized. So how do you harness the power of social and mobile to enable employees to be most engaged and productive? Come hear from Salesforce customers who have turned around their organizations with a social, mobile intranet with Salesforce.

sessions.sessionName: Outward Bound: Outbound Selling with Pardot and Salesforce (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: When initiating a successful outbound sales strategy, the man hours required can be overwhelming and the process unreliable - particularly when left up to the whims of each individual sales rep. Facing this obstacle, Covideo implemented an automated outbound sales strategy that allowed them to take back control of their pipeline and drive sales like never before. Covideo’s President and Co-founder, Jason Price, details how you can do the same by using their proven method.

sessions.sessionName: Outward Bound: Outbound Selling with Pardot and Salesforce (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: When initiating a successful outbound sales strategy, the man hours required can be overwhelming and the process unreliable - particularly when left up to the whims of each individual sales rep. Facing this obstacle, Covideo implemented an automated outbound sales strategy that allowed them to take back control of their pipeline and drive sales like never before. Covideo’s President and Co-founder, Jason Price, details how you can do the same by using their proven method.

sessions.sessionName: Panel Discussion: How to Monetize your IP as a Consulting Partner on AppExchange
sessions.sessionAbstract: Consulting Partners, have you thought about building and selling a product? Join this panel discussion to learn how to turn your consulting practice into a product organization. You'll hear from partners that have made the transition, along with tips and lessons learned to make the journey from a consulting company to a product company. #DF17Partners

sessions.sessionName: Pardot + Salesforce = <3 (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Experience Pardot like never before! Get an inside view of how Pardot is fully integrating with Salesforce as Adam and Chrisitina give an in-depth overview of the latest Pardot has to offer. Featuring everything offered as part of the Edge pilot which includes: a whole new way to navigate Pardot right from within Sales Cloud, a tightly integrated Campaigns experience like never before, Engagement History on all connected Campaigns, access to Engagement Programs like you've never seen, and an Email experience built on top of the Salesforce platform that will blow your mind!

sessions.sessionName: Pardot + Salesforce = <3 (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Experience Pardot like never before! Get an inside view of how Pardot is fully integrating with Salesforce as Adam and Chrisitina give an in-depth overview of the latest Pardot has to offer. Featuring everything offered as part of the Edge pilot which includes: a whole new way to navigate Pardot right from within Sales Cloud, a tightly integrated Campaigns experience like never before, Engagement History on all connected Campaigns, access to Engagement Programs like you've never seen, and an Email experience built on top of the Salesforce platform that will blow your mind!

sessions.sessionName: Pardot's End to End Engagement: A Customer Love Story (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Ever wonder how Salesforce manages engagement throughout the B2B customer journey? Be sure to attend this session to learn how Pardot uses social media and email to engage throughout the customer journey post acquisition. This session will show you how the Pardot team manages over 130K+ social fans, sends 300K+ emails a month and integrates social customer service throughout the journey to drive engagement, advocacy and, most importantly, impact.

sessions.sessionName: Pardot's End to End Engagement: A Customer Love Story (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Ever wonder how Salesforce manages engagement throughout the B2B customer journey? Be sure to attend this session to learn how Pardot uses social media and email to engage throughout the customer journey post acquisition. This session will show you how the Pardot team manages over 130K+ social fans, sends 300K+ emails a month and integrates social customer service throughout the journey to drive engagement, advocacy and, most importantly, impact.

sessions.sessionName: Partner Meetup: Americas - Commercial Market
sessions.sessionAbstract: Are you looking to find, network, engage and learn from colleagues at Dreamforce from the America's Commercial Market segment? Partner Meetup sessions are facilitated by Salesforce Alliances leadership focused on this Market segment. Leverage this partner and regional focused session for updates, overview the Alliances teams and networking with the Salesforce partner eco-system. Join the Partner Community (http://p.force.com/signup for help), and we’ll see you there.

sessions.sessionName: Partner Meetup: Americas - Enterprise Market Segment
sessions.sessionAbstract: Are you looking to find, network, engage and learn from colleagues at Dreamforce from the America's Enterprise Market Segment? Partner Meetup sessions are facilitated by Salesforce Alliances leadership focused on the Enterprise Market. Leverage this partner and regional focused session for updates, overview the Alliances teams and networking with the Salesforce partner eco-system. Join the Partner Community (http://p.force.com/signup for help), and we’ll see you there.

sessions.sessionName: Partner Meetup: Asia Pacific
sessions.sessionAbstract: Are you looking to find and network with colleagues at Dreamforce from the Asia Pacific region? Partner Meetup sessions are facilitated by Salesforce Alliances leadership focused on your region. A great platform to know more on the latest in partner programs and Industry strategy in APAC. Join the Partner Community (http://p.force.com/signup for help), and we’ll see you there.

sessions.sessionName: Partner Meetup: Building Apps to Extend the Financial Services Cloud
sessions.sessionAbstract: Discover the opportunities and innovations planned for partners to extend the Salesforce Financial Services Cloud. Join this Meetup to engage with the product team and hear how partners can build apps that extend the Financial Services Cloud. You'll also be able to network with other colleagues interested in the Financial Services industry. #DF17Partners

sessions.sessionName: Partner Meetup: Canada
sessions.sessionAbstract: Are you looking to find, network, engage and learn from colleagues at Dreamforce from Canada? Partner Meetup sessions are facilitated by Salesforce Alliances leadership focused on your region. Leverage this partner and regional focused session for updates, overview the Alliances regional teams and networking with the Salesforce partner eco-system. Join the Partner Community (http://p.force.com/signup for help), and we’ll see you there.

sessions.sessionName: Partner Meetup: Communications and Media Industries
sessions.sessionAbstract: Are you looking to find and network with colleagues at Dreamforce focused on the Communications and Media Industry? Partner Meetup sessions are facilitated by Salesforce Industry Alliances teams focused on Communicatons and Media Industries. Join the Partner Community (http://p.force.com/signup for help), and we'll see you there.

sessions.sessionName: Partner Meetup: Europe, Middle East and Africa
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join us to meet and network with Salesforce partners based or working in Europe, Middle East and Africa markets. Dreamforce Partner Meetup sessions are facilitated by the Salesforce Alliances leadership team focused on specific geographies. Attend this session to learn more about the benefits of the integrated EMEA partner ecosystem. Join the Partner Community (http://p.force.com/signup) and we look forward to seeing you there! #PartnerMeetup

sessions.sessionName: Partner Meetup: Extending the Salesforce Health Cloud & Life Sciences Products
sessions.sessionAbstract: Discover the opportunities and innovations planned for partners to extend the Salesforce Health Cloud. Join this Meetup to engage with the product team and network with colleagues at Dreamforce focused on Life Sciences. #DF17Partners

sessions.sessionName: Partner Meetup: Financial Services Industry
sessions.sessionAbstract: Are you looking to network with system integrators and ISVs at Dreamforce focused on the Financial Services industry? Salesforce Alliance Industry leaders at Dreamforce will facilitate a session focused on the Financial Services Cloud - market adoption and vision, ecosystem, datamodel and platform considerations for Wealth, Banking and Insurance. Join the Partner Community (http://p.force.com/signup for help), and we’ll see you there. #PartnerMeetup

sessions.sessionName: Partner Meetup: Government Industry
sessions.sessionAbstract: Are you seeking opportunities to find and network with colleagues focused on providing services to clients in the Public Sector? Partner Meetup sessions are facilitated by Salesforce Alliances leadership focused on this industry. We'll cover topics relevant to doing business with Government, including our initiatives and go to market strategy, insights from partners successfully growing their businesses and areas of opportunity for growth across this sector. Join the Partner Community (http://p.force.com/signup for help), and we’ll see you there. #PartnerMeetup

sessions.sessionName: Partner Meetup: Healthcare & Life Sciences Industries
sessions.sessionAbstract: Are you looking to network with colleagues at Dreamforce focused on the Healthcare & Life Sciences Industries? See how other HLS Partners are growing their business with Health Cloud. Salesforce Alliance Industry leaders will facilitate a session where you can learn how Salesforce is raising the bar for Health Plans, Healthcare Providers, Pharma and Med Device companies. Our Healthcare & Life Sciences experts will share Salesforce's vision including the critical role that partners are playing to achieve this vision. Join the Partner Community (http://p.force.com/signup for help), and we’ll see you there.

sessions.sessionName: Partner Meetup: Retail Industry
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Retail is under attack. Shoppers have access to information faster, richer and and better than ever before. Price matching, availability, online and offline - all to the shopper’s advantage. How can Retailers take advantage of the same technologies and catch up to the Mobile-powered consumer? 
They can, but they must leverage the technologies at the speed of the consumer; meaning, they cannot partake in lengthy projects that take months or years to deploy. Consumers won’t wait and Retailers must move fast. The way forward demands use cases and applications that can be stood up fast, with depth and a superior user experience. Solutions that can be implemented in a stepwise fashion, with reasonable fees and measurable results.
Salesforce Alliance Industry leaders at Dreamforce will facilitate a session focused on the Retail industry.

sessions.sessionName: Partner Portals & Communities: Roadmap for Partner Management
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce has made a significant investment to build a turnkey partner management solution that makes indirect sales fast and easy. Learn how the product team is blending CRM and PRM to power partners with personalized experiences so they can quickly find the tools, information, and resources they need to sell. And get a a sneak peak into the roadmap including new extensions for distributed marketing and intelligent content delivery.

sessions.sessionName: Partner Premier Success: Blazing Trails with Partners to Drive Customer Success
sessions.sessionAbstract: We strongly believe that the closer aligned we are with our partners, the more successful our customers will be. Delivering customer success through our partner ecosystem allows customers to accelerate user adoption, increase productivity and promote customer satisfaction by filling the gaps and implementing long term/nuanced solutions for customers. Join us for this session to understand the role Partner Premier Success plays in delivering customer success with and through our partners. #DF17Partners

sessions.sessionName: Path, Not Just for Opportunities Anymore
sessions.sessionAbstract: Sales Path was a feature previously available only for Opportunities. Now Path has been expanded to more standard and all custom objects, and it is a powerful feature that can be easily implemented to guide your users to succeed. We’ll demonstrate the features of Path, show you how to configure it, and discuss use cases. After this session, you’ll be ready to pave the path to success by creating your own Path in Salesforce.

sessions.sessionName: Pivot To Perpetual: Build Customer Relationships With Salesforce CPQ & Billing
sessions.sessionAbstract: The age of the customer demands that B2B enterprise companies provide flexibility in how they price, package and charge customers. New business models like subscriptions, consumption and hybrid one-time/recurring models are tools you can use to enhance customer relationships. Join this session to learn how one of our customers is leveraging Salesforce CPQ and Billing to manage their entire business including across multiple charge models and see a demo of Salesforce CPQ and Billing from quote through collections.

sessions.sessionName: Planning for the Road Ahead: Creating a Roadmap to Managing Change Along the Way
sessions.sessionAbstract: Urban Institute is prioritizing their Salesforce investment in a time of change and uncertainty. Come learn how Urban prioritized their implementation roadmap and built a framework to achieve consensus and optimize incremental investments in the Salesforce platform.

sessions.sessionName: Planning Your Migration to the Lightning Experience - Four Steps to Success
sessions.sessionAbstract: Ready to make the jump to the Lightning Experience (LEX) and take full advantage of all the amazing new features you’ve been hearing about? Migrating can be daunting for an Admin – it’s essentially a reimplementation of Salesforce. You’ll need to review every aspect of your org that interacts with your users - from page layouts, dashboards, third-party AppExchange apps, to custom code. Before you go live you’ll also need to retrain all your users on how to do their job in Lightning. Feeling overwhelmed? Not to worry, we have a plan! In this session we’ll walk you through the four steps needed to make the move to LEX: Assess, Plan, Build and Test, Train and Deploy. We’ll review the considerations and decisions that Admins need to make at each phase of the process, so that at the end of the migration your users will be giving you a high five!

sessions.sessionName: Planning Your Migration to the Lightning Experience - Four Steps to Success (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Ready to make the jump to the Lightning Experience (LEX) and take full advantage of all the amazing new features you’ve been hearing about? Migrating can be daunting for an Admin – it’s essentially a reimplementation of Salesforce. You’ll need to review every aspect of your org that interacts with your users - from page layouts, dashboards, third-party AppExchange apps, to custom code. Before you go live you’ll also need to retrain all your users on how to do their job in Lightning. Feeling overwhelmed? Not to worry, we have a plan! In this session we’ll walk you through the four steps needed to make the move to LEX: Assess, Plan, Build and Test, Train and Deploy. We’ll review the considerations and decisions that Admins need to make at each phase of the process, so that at the end of the migration your users will be giving you a high five!

sessions.sessionName: Platform Security With LockerService
sessions.sessionAbstract: LockerService is a set of security features for Lightning Components. In this session we will explain why we built LockerService and present how developers can develop LockerService compliant components. We will also demonstrate the methodology and tools that enable us to upgrade legacy component by scanning and refactoring existing code. We will conclude with a look at the roadmap.

sessions.sessionName: Point, Click, Connect: Unlock Your Back Office Fast
sessions.sessionAbstract: Integration made easy with Salesforce! Join us to see how easy it is to unlock your back office data and bring it to life inside Salesforce in minutes. Hear from IT leaders on how they leverage Salesforce Connect--our point and click integration tool-- and APIs to maximize their business value and increase employee productivity.

sessions.sessionName: Pop goes the screen! How CTI enables you to deliver a better customer experience
sessions.sessionAbstract: Customer Engagement Centers have evolved from the standard call center of several decades ago, to now include multiple channels where customers can choose how to engage with companies. Contributing to this growth and change is the blend of social media, mobile apps, and communities engagement with CRM (customer relationship management) software. CECs also serve more traditional channels like phone, web, and email. Join us to learn how the Service Cloud powers the Dreamforce Customer Engagement Center to support all Dreamforce attendees and how you can get started building out your Customer Engagement Center.

sessions.sessionName: Population Health: The Future of Connected Health
sessions.sessionAbstract: From wearables to innovative apps, healthcare providers and payers know that a 360-view can influence health outcomes. Learn from 2 trailblazing customers leading the way and seeing results.

sessions.sessionName: Prepare for Your Lightning Transition: Strategies for Success
sessions.sessionAbstract: Learn how to successfully adopt and leverage Salesforce Lightning for your organization. Regardless of where you are on your transition journey, this is a great opportunity to exchange best practices and get tips for a successful launch.

sessions.sessionName: Proactively Serving your customers through SMS
sessions.sessionAbstract: The audience will learn how to reach out proactively to their customers over SMS as well as how to engage their customers over preferred messaging channels. Topics included: Utilizing Process Builder to begin the conversation, Leveraging Omni-Channel to route conversations, Engaging over Facebook Messenger.

sessions.sessionName: Process Automation Makeover
sessions.sessionAbstract: Are you stuck in an automation style rut? Wish you could do away with unsightly workflow views cluttered by hard-to-manage rules with similar purpose? Does your org suffer from slow record-saving time performance because you're near the active workflow limit? Join us as we show you step-by-step how to update your business processes with the Lightning Process Builder. Learn how you can point-and-click your way to transforming all your unfashionable workflow rules into fashionable processes.

sessions.sessionName: Process Automation Showdown
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join us as four Salesforce community experts showcase their own cool and creative process automation solutions, using clicks, not code, to achieve things you didn’t know you could do with process builder and/or flow. Come watch, learn, get inspired and vote for your process automation champion! Who will walk away with the coveted title?

sessions.sessionName: Process Automation With and Without Code
sessions.sessionAbstract: Visualflow can be used in many areas from simple interview flows up to complex hotel reservation processes. This session will show you how to build powerful, dynamic flows using #clicksnotcode that automate your processes. You will learn how to create records, send emails and even how a 3rd party system can launch your flow. And if you wear a technical hat, this session can help you boost your flows even further with Apex!

sessions.sessionName: Productivity in a Flash: 3 Lightning Features Your Org Needs to Be Struck With
sessions.sessionAbstract: Lightning has struck, but it's more than just a pretty UI - it is a whole new way for sales reps/managers/admins to really maximize what it means to work in an all encompassing platform at lightning speed. In this session we will be exploring the top 3 new features that Lightning has to offer; demonstrating exactly what it means to collaborate, develop, and automate further with Lightning. This session will not only demonstrate new features but give attendees the opportunity to see multiple examples, ask questions and understand why Lightning is the new age of CRM Platform technology.

sessions.sessionName: Program Management on the Social Impact Platform
sessions.sessionAbstract: The most important asset for any nonprofit is staff time. But when your data lives in silos, manual and disconnected processes distract from program and service delivery. Join innovative nonprofits to get best practices on leveraging Salesforce to more efficiently manage your mission.

sessions.sessionName: Prospecting with Pardot: Tips for Developing a Powerful Lead Gen Strategy
sessions.sessionAbstract: Prospecting across multiple business units is a constantly revolving and often strained process with today's buyers demanding a personalized customer experience that doesn't end at a sale. Join us to learn how a Salesforce and Pardot work together to help you develop a shared strategy for your sales and marketing teams. You'll learn how to create automated processes within Pardot around delegating your leads, and how to enrich your contact records in Salesforce, while encouraging collaboration between sales and marketing and driving buyer engagement.

sessions.sessionName: Providing World Class Customer Service on Social Media channels in Service Cloud
sessions.sessionAbstract: Social is blurring the lines between Service and Marketing, Gartner predicts by 2020 over 90% of companies will provide service over social channels, yet many companies still struggle to connect the dots for a cohesive cross department strategy. Fortunately, connecting the dots has never been easier. Join us to learn how leading companies are providing social customer service and the concrete steps your organization can take to join them.

sessions.sessionName: Q&A with the Architects Behind Community Cloud
sessions.sessionAbstract: Have you ever wanted to get deeper into development of Lightning Communities? Join us for an active Q&A session with the leading architects behind Community Cloud to engage in meaningful dialog, learn about latest developments and directly share your thoughts on what you would like to see in the future.

sessions.sessionName: Quickly Build Branded, Connected Customer Portals (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: With the Winter Release creating engaging, branded business portals has never been easier. Now any company can easily connect their business data and process from Salesforce and third party systems with just a few click. See Community Cloud's portals capabilities firsthand with our Community experts.

sessions.sessionName: Quickly Build Branded, Connected Customer Portals (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: With the Winter Release creating engaging, branded business portals has never been easier. Now any company can easily connect their business data and process from Salesforce and third party systems with just a few click. See Community Cloud's portals capabilities firsthand with our Community experts.

sessions.sessionName: Quip Roadmap: A Sneak Peak at the Future of Productivity
sessions.sessionAbstract: Quip is building the future of how teams work together and we want to share our secrets with you. Learn about our core product philosophies, how we envision teams of the future will work together, and key insights from our upcoming product roadmap. We are changing the collaboration game, won't you join us?

sessions.sessionName: Reach New Levels of Sales Excellence by Making it to Sales High Camp
sessions.sessionAbstract: At Sales High Camp, sales teams maximize customer facing time, build & manage enough pipeline to meet their quota and easily produce the quotes & proposals needed to close deals & much more! Join us to get a high level overview of all of the incredible Salesforce tools that help companies get to Sales High Camp including: Sales Cloud Einstein, Salesforce Inbox, Salesforce CPQ, Pardot, Sales Analytics & Partner Community.

sessions.sessionName: Redefine Customer Service with Snap-Chat
sessions.sessionAbstract: Organizations that redefine customer service focus on creating a great customer experience that reshape their business. To provide a great customer experience, organizations must engage with customers across multiple touch points: websites, mobile apps, etc. Customers appreciate a more personalized interaction such as embedded chat using Service Cloud Snap-Ins. Having a personalized and connected chat experience embedded in web or mobile app drives an increase in customer satisfaction by 92%. Join us as we walk through the journey of embedding service/chat with Service Cloud Snap-Ins and how it can redefine your business.

sessions.sessionName: Reimagine Healthcare: Drive Patient Engagement with Community Cloud
sessions.sessionAbstract: Our leading partners are developing Bolt solutions specifically for the healthcare industry to help customers create communities faster. Learn how a connected and collaborative experience enables better communication, engagement, and deepens patient relationships.

sessions.sessionName: Reimagine Success In Mortgage
sessions.sessionAbstract: Independent mortgage firms are discovering new ways to innovate their mortgage experience for borrowers and lenders. Join us as we hear from leading independent mortgage firms, Homestar and Guild Mortgage, on their path to reimagining success in mortgage with the power of the Salesforce Customer Success Platform.

sessions.sessionName: Reinvent Your Inside Sales Team with Lightning, Einstein and Advanced Automation
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Hear how two Salesforce customers took their Inside Sales teams from “skeptics” to “fanatics” with Salesforce Lightning.
 
Learn how you can leverage the latest Salesforce technologies including App Builder, Path, Process Builder, and Einstein to boost adoption, accelerate sales, and modernize how your reps sell --- all with 100% button-click administration.

sessions.sessionName: Reporting 101: Make Data Driven Business Decisions with a Little Reporting Magic
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join us to take your Salesforce data to the next level with Salesforce reports. Whether you're the CEO, Head of Sales, or a sales rep, you can derive business critical insights from reports to find ways to identify gaps and improve sales performance. We'll share how to build custom reports, leverage formulas and filters, and more, so you can be a reporting rockstar in no time.

sessions.sessionName: Reporting Formulas Part Deux
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join us as we return with a brand new set of formulas to help you boost your career as an Awesome Admin reporting guru. Last year we gave you 8 reporting formulas which turned out to be too much awesomeness for a single session. This year we're going to give you 6. We'll share tips and tricks to make your Lightning reports even better and turn what seems impossible into a solution that will amaze your users. Join us as we dig deeper into Lightning reports and dashboards to take you through solutions you never knew existed. If you missed our session last year don't worry about it - we'll make sure you get links to those too.

sessions.sessionName: Reports and Dashboards in Lightning? No problem!
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Do you have dashboards your leadership depends on everyday to make decisions? Do you get excited when you see the new beautiful Lightning dashboards? We did too! 
We decided to take the plunge and convert our classic dashboards into Lightning dashboards. We'll show you the steps we took to convert our old service issue management dashboards to Lightning experience.

sessions.sessionName: Requirements Drive Processes. Processes Drive Solutions.
sessions.sessionAbstract: What good is the world's most robust solution if it doesn't meet all requirements? A decent admin can match a need with a technology that can fulfill it. An AWESOME admin can evaluate scenarios objectively and make proactive recommendations for improving underlying processes before bringing technology into the mix at all. Requirements drive processes. Processes drive solutions. Join us to learn how to start producing better solutions by putting the emphasis on requirements and incorporating the basics of process improvement into your strategies.

sessions.sessionName: Retail and Brand Marketers Drive Transformation: Salesforce Research Insights
sessions.sessionAbstract: To understand how leading retailers and brands market to customers, Salesforce conducted a survey of 570 marketing leaders in the Retail & Consumer Goods sector worldwide. This research shows how retail and consumer goods marketing leaders are breaking down barriers to provide a unified consumer experience on every channel and touchpoint throughout the customer lifecycle. Join us for this interactive session to hear the latest trends in Retail and Consumers Good and perspectives from our panel of customer experts.

sessions.sessionName: Retail Banking: A Single Platform to Transform Your Branch and Digital Channels
sessions.sessionAbstract: Transformation is critical. Digital channels are replacing bank branches as the predominant mode of customer engagement. At the same time, branches are transforming into high-touch engagement channels that need to be interconnected with digital channels to bring the entire banking experience together. In this session, we'll explore how Financial Services Cloud enables this shift by powering a consistent customer experience across both legacy channels and modern digital networks.

sessions.sessionName: Retail Banking: Accelerate Innovation to Be the Bank Your Customers Love
sessions.sessionAbstract: It’s the Age of the Customer, and banks have an opportunity to connect with their customers like never before. In fact, banking is the #2 industry where consumers expect technology to make a positive impact in their lives. Find out how trailblazing banks are using Financial Services Cloud to innovate more rapidly and drive customer loyalty. You'll leave this session with actionable ways to put your customers — rather than products, channels, or transactions — at the center of every interaction.

sessions.sessionName: Retail Banking: It's about the Journey. How to Engage Customers 1:1 Beyond the B
sessions.sessionAbstract: As consumers spend an increasing amount of time in digital channels, it is critical for banks to use these channels to connect with customers in meaningful ways. Gone are the days of statement stuffers and one-size-fits-all offers. Now is the time for personalized, goal-oriented communications that assist customers with all aspects of their banking needs. Come learn how pioneering banks are using Salesforce DMP and Marketing Cloud to achieve a deeper understanding of customers and create 1:1 customer journeys with rich personalization across channels.

sessions.sessionName: Retail Banking: Redefine CRM in the Era of Digital Banking
sessions.sessionAbstract: CRM is often thought of as technology for sales, service, and marketing, but in this session you'll see how innovative banks are redefining CRM to address far broader use cases and different stages of the customer lifecycle. These banks are putting CRM in the hands of everyone: bankers, mid-office support, brokers, and most importantly customers! Find out why CRM is the foundation for making digital banking personalized and engaging, rather than just electronic transactions.

sessions.sessionName: Retail Keynote: The Fastest Path to Shopper Success with AI
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Industry experts claim the retail apocalypse is here. Physical storefronts are closing at an unprecedented pace. Retail bankruptcy filings have multiplied, taking both major chains and mom and pop shops.

The time has come to disrupt or be disrupted. Retail is no longer about selling, it’s about solving shopper problems. When shoppers demand seamless, smart and convenient interactions, retailers must respond by delivering a connected shopping experience across the entire customer lifecycle, from awareness to advocacy.

In this keynote, join hear from retail brands like adidas and Casper to learn how they are using artificial intelligence (AI) across marketing, commerce, and service to acquire, engage and retain today’s shoppers. Experience visionary product demos showcasing the depth and breadth of the Salesforce intelligent Shopper Success Platform, the most complete CRM for retail.

sessions.sessionName: Retail Transformation: Connect Your Employees and Buyers to your Brand
sessions.sessionAbstract: Retail is constantly evolving. And the best retailers are building communities with Lightning Bolt solutions to connect employees and buyers to their brand. This streamlines communications and drives engagement. Learn how these companies power performance and growth by providing access to all of the content, resources, and data needed to be successful and grow their business.

sessions.sessionName: Retail Transformations with AI Powered Commerce Cloud Einstein
