sessions.sessionAbstract: Join us to learn how the power of Artificial Intelligence is transforming retailers' daily business operations. From powering personalized experiences for shoppers to eliminating labor intensive and inaccurate backend tasks, Commerce Cloud Einstein is making retailers smarter. In this session, hear from how our customers are eliminating hours of work and supercharging shopping experiences with AI technology embedded right in the Commerce Cloud.

sessions.sessionName: Retail Trend Briefing: The Wisdom of the Cloud (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: The shopping activity of more than 500 million shoppers narrates the true story of retailing today. In this talk, we'll surface the data-driven trends that reveal the key battlegrounds on which you must compete and win today; the dominance of mobile, the confusing signals from social, the personalization mandate, and the digital shadow of the store. Join us to hear how these new pillars of retail should guide retail initiatives.

sessions.sessionName: Retail Trend Briefing: The Wisdom of the Cloud (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: The shopping activity of more than 500 million shoppers narrates the true story of retailing today. In this talk, we'll surface the data-driven trends that reveal the key battlegrounds on which you must compete and win today; the dominance of mobile, the confusing signals from social, the personalization mandate, and the digital shadow of the store. Join us to hear how these new pillars of retail should guide retail initiatives.

sessions.sessionName: Retail: DWR Reaches New Level of Shopper Engagement with Marketing and Commerce
sessions.sessionAbstract: DWR reaches new level of shopper engagement by adding Marketing and Commerce to their Salesforce suite of products fueling their business. Come learn about their continued digital transformation with Salesforce and how they are now impacting the customer journey every step of the way.

sessions.sessionName: Retail: How GAP made Winning with Customer Service their New Normal
sessions.sessionAbstract: An omni-channel service program is no longer the future, it is the present. Brands, like GAP needed to pivot the way they provide support and meet the customers on their channel of choice with personalized communications, so that's what they did. With Service Cloud and integrations across other Salesforce products, GAP has changed the way they engage with their customers, sending them on service journeys to ensure resolution and advocacy and make a lifetime customer.

sessions.sessionName: Rethinking Collaboration with Salesforce for the Media Industry
sessions.sessionAbstract: Creativity takes time, and time is money. When the brands you service are just as valuable as the work you do, your teams need to be equipped to land the next massive brand. Once that major client signs on, can you confidently say your teams have the right tools to provide the service and attention that client needs? Come see how Salesforce is streamlining the way creative, sales, marketing, and account teams collaborate in the age of new media.

sessions.sessionName: Rethinking Sales Coaching: How Research Debunks Conventional Wisdom
sessions.sessionAbstract: In this jam-packed session, Michelle Vazzana will share surprising insights from her four-year study of high-performing sales managers. Many of her findings fly in the face of common practice, bringing into question the ways in which we equip managers to coach their teams. Michelle is a founding partner at Vantage Point Performance, a global sales management training and development firm, and has trained thousands of sales people, sales managers, and sales leaders. She is also co-author of Cracking the Sales Management Code: The Secrets to Measuring and Managing Sales Performance. Walk away with real insights you can apply immediately in your sales enablement efforts!

sessions.sessionName: Rethinking Your Architecture With Platform Events
sessions.sessionAbstract: Platform Events opened the door to native event-driven software architecture. As developers and architects, we now need to rethink our applications' architecture to take advantage of this new paradigm. In this session I will present how Platform Events impact existing and new architectures. You will learn about new solutions for external system integrations, module and package decoupling and extending standard platform features.

sessions.sessionName: Revolutionize Your Wins: Building the Ultimate Marketing Automation Machine (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Take a look at the marketing automation set-up that has contributed over five million dollars worth of sales, as well as a 34% increase in B2B prospect conversions. This session takes you through the highs and lows of a large financial services company as they implement Pardot and Salesforce, with spectacular end results. Through the lens of their Marketing and Digital Communications Manager, Jamie McCalman, you’ll see how they boosted their prospect conversion rate from 8% to 42% by implementing targeted, relevant B2B lead nurture programs. Also, how they increased repeat purchase and lifetime value from existing customers by leveraging Salesforce CRM data to construct personalised customer journeys; delivering five million dollars in sales in under two years. This session is your roadmap to powerful, multi-channel B2B lead nurture. Converting prospects to customers, and turning customers into repeat customers.

sessions.sessionName: Revolutionize Your Wins: Building the Ultimate Marketing Automation Machine (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Take a look at the marketing automation set-up that has contributed over five million dollars worth of sales, as well as a 34% increase in B2B prospect conversions. This session takes you through the highs and lows of a large financial services company as they implement Pardot and Salesforce, with spectacular end results. Through the lens of their Marketing and Digital Communications Manager, Jamie McCalman, you’ll see how they boosted their prospect conversion rate from 8% to 42% by implementing targeted, relevant B2B lead nurture programs. Also, how they increased repeat purchase and lifetime value from existing customers by leveraging Salesforce CRM data to construct personalised customer journeys; delivering five million dollars in sales in under two years. This session is your roadmap to powerful, multi-channel B2B lead nurture. Converting prospects to customers, and turning customers into repeat customers.

sessions.sessionName: Revolutionizing Child Welfare Through Salesforce
sessions.sessionAbstract: We’ve all heard that Salesforce can be customized to fit individual needs, but how far can it go? And how easily? Wolverine Human Services decided to find out and it changed the way they do business. In one month, they achieved what it took them two years to build in another, “industry-leading” software. They’ve revolutionized the way their state executes the back-end of the child welfare and juvenile justice system. With Salesforce, WHS can focus less time on paperwork and more time helping the children they exist to serve. Take a sneak peek into their truly unique system – and to learn actionable takeaways for customizing your own Salesforce instance.

sessions.sessionName: ROADMAP: The Future of Marketing Cloud Einstein
sessions.sessionAbstract: Can you feel it? The excitement around Artificial Intelligence (AI) is palpable. And at the Marketing Cloud we're not slowing down. Join us to meet Einstein, learn how he's already helping marketers become smarter and get a peek at exciting new AI innovation on the roadmap for Email, Social, Advertising and DMP.

sessions.sessionName: ROADMAP: The Future of Marketing Cloud Einstein
sessions.sessionAbstract: Can you feel it? The excitement around Artificial Intelligence (AI) is palpable. And at the Marketing Cloud we're not slowing down. Join us to meet Einstein, learn how he's already helping marketers become smarter and get a peek at exciting new AI innovation on the roadmap for Email, Social, Advertising and DMP.

sessions.sessionName: Rolling Out New Features in Salesforce to a Global Team as a Solo Admin
sessions.sessionAbstract: As a solo Admin, I used simple Salesforce tools to roll-out new features and aid in user adoption across the globe. You'll learn how to prepare users for the roll-out via Chatter, use Google Apps and Chatter for training and support, distribute training materials via custom links, teach users how to report bugs and enhancements via Chatter and Ideas, and how to encourage collaboration via Chatter to find solutions.

sessions.sessionName: Sales Analytics Anyone Can Create
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Has your sales leadership ever asked you to answer build them a report to answer multiple questions like: 
- What has been my customers historical spend across time? 
- How much pipeline do we have? 
- Is it the right kind of pipeline? 
Why not leverage the power of Einstein Analytics to solve these questions for everyone. In this session you'll see how regular business users can create rich, interactive content that benefits the entire organization quickly and easily.

sessions.sessionName: Sales Cloud Roadmap Deep Dive (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join us to learn about the exciting new products the Sales Cloud team is bringing to every Salesforce customer in 2017 and beyond.

sessions.sessionName: Sales Cloud Roadmap Deep Dive (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join us to learn about the exciting new products the Sales Cloud team is bringing to every Salesforce customer in 2017 and beyond.

sessions.sessionName: Sales Insights You Need, Now: Getting Up & Running Quickly With Sales Analytics
sessions.sessionAbstract: Today's top sales managers agree that good data is critical to a team's success. But being able to access that data quickly is just as critical. Unfortunately, most business intelligence tools take months to implement, and even longer to configure and maintain. Join us to learn how Sales Analytics, a new analytics app from Salesforce, eliminates the need for robust intelligence platforms, putting insights into your hands quickly, so you can focus on closing. This session features a customer panel.

sessions.sessionName: Sales Metrics: Research Reveals the Good, Bad, and Ugly
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce can create virtually any management report, but are all sales metrics useful? No!, says researcher Jason Jordan. Some metrics are absolutely critical to growing revenue, while others will just waste your time. The secret to great management is knowing the difference. Join Jason as he shares his insights and leaves you with a better understanding of sales metrics, coaching, and management in general.

sessions.sessionName: Sales Reps Will Love You with Lightning for Outlook and Gmail
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce Lightning for Outlook or Gmail have been improving each release and they are dynamite! Learn how to implement Salesforce Lightning for Outlook or Gmail with your users to ensure a smooth implementation. We'll guide you through the install steps and provide tips and tricks to making it a complete success for your company. You won’t be able to live without it.

sessions.sessionName: Sales Summit: AI–Friend or Foe to Sales?
sessions.sessionAbstract: Trish Bertuzzi and John Barrows will be discussing the good, the bad and the ugly of AI as it relates to sales, including real world customer examples and what we should all be focused on moving forward.

sessions.sessionName: Sales Summit: B2B Digital Sales — Give ’Em What They Want (McKinsey & Company)
sessions.sessionAbstract: 'Digital' might be the answer, but what is the question? Clearly digital is a game changer for sales organizations that do it well are in the lead. B2B players that embed digital in their go-to market programs grow >5x faster than their peers and have 30% higher acquisition efficiency than their peers. But if the question is, "What do your customers really want?", digital is just part of the answer. McKinsey's Jennifer Stanley will go beyond the latest research about when to use digital and when not to. She will also highlight how the best companies are reorganizing their sales organizations and building next gen capabilities to drive long-term sales growth.

sessions.sessionName: Sales Summit: Beat the Clock, and Your Quota in the Age of Distraction
sessions.sessionAbstract: As we get busier and busier, we compensate by adding more hours to our workday. But are we really fixing the problem, or making it worse? Join best-selling author and sales-acceleration strategist Jill Konrath as she shares how to take back control of your time.

sessions.sessionName: Sales Summit: Opportunities and Challenges for Multigenerational Selling
sessions.sessionAbstract: There’s often talk about how millennials are changing the workplace. Millennials may account for 40% of the workforce, but they’re only one part of the equation. With three generations represented and buyer behavior evolving, selling challenges have only become exacerbated. Learn how managers are successfully (and sometimes not so successfully) leading these generationally diverse teams. This is an opportunity for you and your team to become more flexible and gain an edge on the competition.

sessions.sessionName: Sales Summit: Sneak Peek of the Ultimate Sales Documentary Film
sessions.sessionAbstract: Get a sneak peek at an entertaining and enlightening new documentary film created by Salesforce: The Story of Sales. You'll see a segment of the film where thought leaders discuss how technology has impacted sales, and what the future holds for the sales profession. Then, hear from sales thought leaders and stars of the film in a fireside chat post screening.

sessions.sessionName: Sales Summit: Too Much? Why Sales Enablement Fails to Boost Productivity (CEB)
sessions.sessionAbstract: How much of today’s well-intended sales “enablement” actually enables seller productivity? The answer is both surprising and frustrating. Join Brent Adamson, Principal Advisor, CEB, now Gartner, as he shares the challenges and solutions to boosting sales productivity. From a rep’s perspective, the very support designed to make selling easier, has, in fact, actually made it harder—a phenomenon especially frustrating to sales enablement executives bombarded nearly every day by front-line seller requests for “better tools” and “more help” because the resources they’ve been provided so far “aren’t really what we need.” In a world where sales complexity means we can no longer leave reps to fend for themselves, find out why less is almost always more when it comes to building the kind of sales enablement that not only supports the sale, but supports the seller at the same time. As it turns out, overlooking the difference can crush productivity and really hurt your business.

sessions.sessionName: Salesforce Advisor Link Roadmap
sessions.sessionAbstract: Following the exciting Salesforce Advisor Link announcements in the Higher Ed Kickoff, join this session to dive into Salesforce.org's newest product made specifically for the art of advising. Hear about the exciting developments in our Pilot School Program, ways you can get involved with this community-driven innovation, and what's in store for Salesforce Advisor Link moving forward.

sessions.sessionName: Salesforce Analytics - Designing Beautiful Analytic Apps and Dashboards
sessions.sessionAbstract: Learn how to apply Design Thinking to your Analytics projects by following the best practices of the Salesforce Analytics User Experience team.

sessions.sessionName: Salesforce and IBM for Developers
sessions.sessionAbstract: The partnership between Salesforce and IBM opens up a new world of possibilities for customers, partners, and developers. Are you interested in learning about how to leverage them? Then join this session which will showcase real-world examples around API integration, weather or Watson. Authentication, authorization, workflows and UI - all will be handled and source code included. Become inspired to build your own solutions today!

sessions.sessionName: Salesforce Code Quality Automation With CodeScan & Sophos
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join Stuart from Sophos and Ben from CodeScan as they share the benefits of using Continuous Integration, the Git-Flow development paradigm and CodeScan for static analysis. With these tools you will learn how Sophos scaled their development team by 500% while maintaining strict quality control over their output.

sessions.sessionName: Salesforce CPQ & Billing: A Quote-To-Cash Story
sessions.sessionAbstract: Delivering quotes and invoicing customers are just the beginning of the quote-to-cash process. Join this keynote event to learn about what it takes to transform your business, align your front and back offices, and deliver a world class buying experience designed to turn your customers into evangelists.

sessions.sessionName: Salesforce CPQ is Your Friend
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce CPQ is your friend. Learning a new tool or product isn’t always an easy thing to do. This session is aimed at illuminating some of the key features that make Salesforce CPQ easy to learn and use. We will discuss success scenarios using Salesforce CPQ and the factors that made these solutions successful. We will also demonstrate some of the strongest features of Salesforce CPQ, templates, native design, intuitive architecture, and overall high quality product featuring a live demo using Salesforce Quote-to-Cash from install to generating a quote, creating templates quickly, and customizing the UI for your organization. By the end of this demo, you can start using Salesforce CPQ by customizing templates and the UI.

sessions.sessionName: Salesforce CPQ, AppExchange, or Out-of-the-box?
sessions.sessionAbstract: Is your organization looking for a functionality to generate quotes and custom price bundles? Having difficulty accommodating your complex price and product configuration? Join us for this engaging session to learn about how Salesforce CPQ can speed up your implementation and make it easier to set up product and price for your end users.

sessions.sessionName: Salesforce DMP Roadmap
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join Salesforce DMP product leadership to learn how data management platforms are evolving, and what we've got on our roadmap. Topics discussed will include connecting known and unknown customer profiles, the use of machine learning to drive segmentation and analytics, the importance of second party data, and new data science applications through Einstein.

sessions.sessionName: Salesforce DX - An Admins Perspective
sessions.sessionAbstract: The newly released Salesforce DX system dramatically enhances the development process on the Salesforce platform. While these changes were originally built to support developers, you don't have to write code in order to benefit from these features. In this session, we will introduce several components of Salesforce DX and look at ways to leverage them to improve our Salesforce administration practices. Discover how you can use scratch orgs and the existing declarative tools to create application specific configurations and then release those to your sandbox and production environments. You will leave this session with a better understanding of the Salesforce DX system along with strategies for implementing the features in your org.

sessions.sessionName: Salesforce DX and Fully Automated Deployments
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce DX is the new way to build and release applications for developers working in teams. In this session, you will get an introduction and a demo of the Salesforce DX tools. This talk will include a demo comparing the capabilities of Salesforce DX and other tools you may be using today (e.g. GIT, SVN, Jenkins and ant).

sessions.sessionName: Salesforce DX Packaging for AppExchange Partners
sessions.sessionAbstract: As part of the Salesforce Development Experience (SFDX), we are redesigning how AppExchange Partners organize, manage and distribute their app's metadata. Learn how Salesforce DX packaging transforms the way partners will interact with managed Apps. In this session, we will demo how partners can begin to make this transformation and discuss the road ahead for packaging. #DF17Partners

sessions.sessionName: Salesforce Einstein Today & Tomorrow
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce Einstein brings the power of Artificial Intelligence to every Sales, Commerce, Marketing, and Service Cloud user. Join us for a sneak peek at what's next on our roadmap for Einstein, and how we're continuing to deliver a more intelligent user experience to the products you know and love.

sessions.sessionName: Salesforce Einstein Today & Tomorrow
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce Einstein brings the power of data science to every Sales, Commerce, Marketing, and Service Cloud User. Join us for a sneak peek at what's next on the roadmap for Einstein, and how we're continuing to deliver a more intelligent user experience to the products you know and love.

sessions.sessionName: Salesforce for High Velocity Sales Reps
sessions.sessionAbstract: How are you using Salesforce for your high velocity sales team? Our Sales Cloud Product Manager will demonstrate how Einstein Lead Scoring and the Lightning Dialer bring the Lightning Sales Console to life. Come see how Einstein High Velocity Sales Cloud makes today's inside sales reps even more productive then ever before.

sessions.sessionName: Salesforce Jumpstart: Get Started as a Consulting Partner
sessions.sessionAbstract: Are you new to the Partner Program for Consulting Partners? Join us to understand the fundamentals of navigating the partnership as a consultant, how to effectively leverage the Partner Community to manage your partnership, and the latest resources available to maximize your participation in our program as you take your next steps in getting started. Learn more about the Jumpstart Program at http://p.force.com/jumpstart. #DF17Partners

sessions.sessionName: Salesforce on Einstein: How We Use AI in Sales, Service, Marketing, & Beyond!
sessions.sessionAbstract: At Salesforce we're passionate about bringing innovative AI products to our customers to help them in turn sell, serve, and communicate with their own customers more intelligently. What better way to bring these products to market than to use them ourselves? In this session we'll give you an inside look at how our internal teams at Salesforce are using Einstein in their apps to work smarter.

sessions.sessionName: Salesforce on Salesforce: 4 Tips for Getting Started with ABM
sessions.sessionAbstract: Have you ever wondered how Salesforce Pardot uses their own solution for account-based marketing? Or what it's like to have marketing automation throughout the entire lifecycle of your business? Come learn about the marketing automation strategies we've used over the years to create the best customer experience while experiencing tremendous growth. You'll see how we plan, build, and execute our account-based marketing strategy to achieve our marketing goals.

sessions.sessionName: Salesforce on Salesforce: 7 Sales Dashboards Used To Grow and Mature Pipeline
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce dashboards can help you measure where you’ve been, where you are now, and where you’re going. If you don't have visibility into your sales org - such as looking at product perfomance by territory - there's no way to know which direction you're trending and what to do about it. Get an inside look at 7 dashboards used by sales and marketing teams at Salesforce to build and progress pipeline.

sessions.sessionName: Salesforce on Salesforce: Quip Connect
sessions.sessionAbstract: When you combine increased productivity with customer success, incredible things can happen at your company. With Quip Connect, users can open Salesforce reports in Quip with Live Data. You can also search, access, and share Quip content right inside Salesforce. In this session, we will share our stories on how Salesforce Admins enabled Quip Connect to help our business drive collaboration within Salesforce.

sessions.sessionName: Salesforce on Salesforce: The Journey to Lightning Continues
sessions.sessionAbstract: This session would be a follow up to that with a look back at the past year, lessons learned, adjustments made and the focus on adoption as we press forward to the ability to fully decommission the Classic experience. the Lightning Experience is more than a new skin. Lightning is a full scale change to the experience you offer your users on the platform and should be approached as an opportunity to optimize and renew the entire experience. In this session we will share with you how Salesforce planned for this change, the approach we took in prioritizing our use cases and the pathway to deploying this major revision to our own internal user-base. This session is an open, honest telling of our own Lightning story from the perspective of our Distribution Business Architect and IT delivery org.

sessions.sessionName: Salesforce Optimizer Increases Productivity and Drives Salesforce Usage
sessions.sessionAbstract: If you're an Admin looking to cleanup, maintain, and optimize your org, join us to learn how Salesforce Optimizer can help. It is the fastest and most effective way to get insights into your org coupled with actionable recommendations and best practices. With Salesforce Optimizer, Admins can efficiently maintain customizations, decrease business and technical debt, increase productivity of admins and end users, and drive Salesforce usage.

sessions.sessionName: Salesforce Platform API Soft Limits
sessions.sessionAbstract: As more and more applications are interconnected with the Salesforce APIs, daily limits become a growing concern. Join us as we go over the existing mechanisms to help you manage your API limits, and discuss how we are approaching a new generation of "soft" limits and what this will mean for your developers.

sessions.sessionName: Salesforce Products for Nonprofits: Where We Are and Where We're Headed (Repeat)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join the Salesforce.org Nonprofit Industries team for the low-down on current — and future — product offerings for the nonprofit sector, including NPSP and relevant innovations from Salesforce.com.

sessions.sessionName: Salesforce Reports Roadmap: The Future of Salesforce Reporting
sessions.sessionAbstract: Do you rely on Salesforce Reports and Dashboards to serve up business-critical data on a daily basis? Then, get excited: our Reports and Dashboards are about to get even better. Join the Salesforce Reports & Dashboards team to get a sneak peek of our roadmap and the future of Lightning.

sessions.sessionName: Salesforce Sandboxes: Your Awesome Admin Playground
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join us for this introduction to Salesforce Sandboxes to learn how to leverage this feature as an Awesome Admin! Learn how to develop and deploy your apps and custom features using Sandboxes. Navigate the world of Sandbox types and setup, refreshes, change sets, and managing training and user access. Get ready to absorb helpful tips and tricks to add to your Awesome Admin toolset!

sessions.sessionName: Salesforce Security and Sharing Model Demystified
sessions.sessionAbstract: The Salesforce Sharing and Security Model has undergone numerous enhancements and offers many features to help you configure it to meet the privacy requirements your company demands. This session will cover declarative and programmatic approaches to consider and we'll explore how the performance of your Salesforce org is linked to the sharing settings you define. You'll ultimately walk away from this session with practical tips on how to make the most of your Salesforce security model.

sessions.sessionName: Salesforce Security: Admin Checklist
sessions.sessionAbstract: Regardless of business requirements, industry, or org size this security checklist will apply to almost all Salesforce Admins. Security is a growing concern for every organization and Salesforce Admins have a large role to play in Salesforce security. Attend this session to learn how to protect your instance from attackers by configuring network-based security, how and why to track login history to protect your instance, how to restrict ex-employees from exporting Salesforce data, why setting up two-factor authentication or Salesforce identity verification is crucial, and how to enable single sign-on for a secure and simple way to log in.

sessions.sessionName: Salesforce Shield : Protecting your customers' data with world-class security
sessions.sessionAbstract: Parker Harris once said, “Nothing is more important to our company than the privacy of our customers' data”, and we can't agree more. Enter Salesforce Shield, a world-class security toolbelt at your fingertips which offers enterprise-level security features to help customers secure Salesforce data. Join us to learn how you can utilize these features to setup a close-knit security system for your Salesforce Org.

sessions.sessionName: Salesforce Shield Vision & Roadmap: Taking Trust and Compliance to the Next Leve
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce Shield raises the bar for customers with complex governance and compliance needs. Join the Salesforce Shield product leadership team to learn about our future product plans for Platform Encryption, Event Monitoring, Field Audit Trail and Transaction Security. Step up your security and compliance game and see how you can take advantage of the next wave of innovation from Shield!

sessions.sessionName: Salesforce Shield: Getting Started with Event Monitoring & Field Audit Trail
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Companies of every size and industry are using Salesforce across departments to run their business faster. As use of Salesforce for critical business capabilities increases, monitoring user behavior, tracking changes to data, and preventing data loss is more important than ever. 
Join us to learn about Salesforce Shield and its ability to provide critical security insights and audit all user behaviors across Salesforce with Event Monitoring and Field Audit Trail. These insights are tremendously useful for both ensuring security of your data and discovering where you may need to strengthen your security policies. In this session, you will learn how you can proactively peer into your Org's operations for complete visibility. Hear from our customer, State Bank and Trust Company, who have achieved an 'X-ray view' of their orgs with Salesforce Shield Event Monitoring.

sessions.sessionName: Salesforce Shield: How to Use Event Monitoring to Drive Adoption and Performance
sessions.sessionAbstract: You may already be using Event Monitoring for security use cases, but did you know that you can also leverage Event Log Files with our Einstein Analytics dashboards to get robust information on your application's adoption and performance? Learn how you can use Event Monitoring insights to better understand Salesforce usage and the overall health of your apps. Join us to hear from our customer “” who has used Event Monitoring to ensure a smooth transition to Lightning!

sessions.sessionName: Salesforce Shield: Transaction Security & Event Monitoring
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce Shield is your expert detective investigating any potential crimes across your Salesforce instance. Learn how to monitor events and control user actions in your Salesforce instance with Salesforce Shield. After this session, you'll know the details about “what,” “when,” and “who” carried out any action in a Salesforce instance and prevent access to sensitive data and avoid security breaches.

sessions.sessionName: Salesforce User Personas
sessions.sessionAbstract: Who are your users? Join us to learn about our Salesforce user personas: how we surface and leverage personas in our product organization to build better products for our customers.

sessions.sessionName: Salesforce User Personas
sessions.sessionAbstract: Who are your users? Join us to learn about our Salesforce user personas: how we surface and leverage personas in our product organization to build better products for our customers.

sessions.sessionName: Salesforce's Top 10 Culture Hacks to Deeply Engage Employees
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Salesforce is fortunate to be achieving incredible business results. Many of our customers are curious what's going on behind the scenes that is driving those results. The answer is easy, it's our deeply engaged employees. 

In this session, Jennifer Johnston and Jill Unikel from the Salesforce Employee Marketing and Engagement team will share our Top 10 Culture Hacks that help us deeply engage our employees and deliver incredible success for our customers and our community.

sessions.sessionName: Salesforce.org Higher Ed Kickoff
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join us to hear from Salesforce.org leadership about all of the work Salesforce is doing in the Higher Education space and learn about our latest technology innovations. Listen to two customer showcases from leading universities as they share exciting things they're accomplishing across their respective campuses.

sessions.sessionName: Salesforce.org Product Roadmap for Nonprofits: Where We Are & Where We're Headed
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join the Salesforce.org Technology & Products team for the low-down on current and future product offerings for the nonprofit sector -- including the roadmap for NPSP -- as well as relevant updates from Salesforce innovations.

sessions.sessionName: Salesforce1 Mobile Roadmap: What's on Tap (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Want a sneak peek into the Salesforce1 Mobile Roadmap? Join us to hear about our future product plans directly from our product management leaders with an opportunity for Q&A.

sessions.sessionName: Salesforce1 Mobile Roadmap: What's on Tap (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Want a sneak peek into the Salesforce1 Mobile Roadmap? Join us to hear about our future product plans directly from our product management leaders with an opportunity for Q&A.

sessions.sessionName: Salesforce1 Mobile Roadmap: What's on Tap (3)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Want a sneak peek into the Salesforce1 Mobile Roadmap? Join us to hear about our future product plans directly from our product management leaders with an opportunity for Q&A.

sessions.sessionName: Sandbox Dataset Optimization for Salesforce Developers and Admins
sessions.sessionAbstract: No Salesforce developer/admin wants to introduce workflow and coding bugs into their production orgs. However, few have mastered how to easily configure and replicate the perfect, sized-to-fit test data sets on demand. Learn real user secrets to optimizing sandbox datasets and increase productivity in this technical session.

sessions.sessionName: Scale Your Business Application with Heroku
sessions.sessionAbstract: Learn how to extend your AppExchange apps' capabilities outside of core Force.com. We'll cover challenges and limitations partners can experience when building enterprise apps. You'll also hear partner use cases and techniques for using Heroku to solve enterprise challenges. Don't miss it! #DF17Partners

sessions.sessionName: Scale Your Enterprise Company with Salesforce CPQ & Billing
sessions.sessionAbstract: Good news, your business is growing. Not-so-good news, it's also growing out of the methods and tools you have in place. It's time to transform. But how do you even start? Our customers are transforming on many different levels. Join this breakout session to learn how they are using Salesforce CPQ and Billing to start a new chapter in business, moving into subscription based services, and enabling their sales team to lead the charge in the marketplace.

sessions.sessionName: SchemaPuker: Data Model to Diagram in Under Five Minutes Using Heroku
sessions.sessionAbstract: If you have ever tried to get an entity relationship diagram out of Salesforce you know how painful it can be. Using SchemaPuker I will show you how to document your data model in under five minutes, and how you can utilise technologies like heroku and the Salesforce APIs to build your own tools to save time!

sessions.sessionName: School Communication & Parent Engagement: Product Deep Dive & Customer Story
sessions.sessionAbstract: See how Salesforce for K-12 can be used to launch secure and school-branded community portals for parents and staff while also providing you with a centralized messaging center from which to make announcements, send out automated reminders and alerts, and engage parents, alumni, and others via email, mobile, social, and more. See how a large district and small private school have each used Salesforce solutions to engage their constituents and deepen their relationships.

sessions.sessionName: Search Showdown: Salesforce Search in Lightning vs. Classic
sessions.sessionAbstract: Not all Search is created equal. Join to understand the the differences between Search in Salesforce between Lightning and Classic, how Search works under the hood, and how to make Search work for you and your org. Powerful content for users and Awesome Admins.

sessions.sessionName: Search Showdown: Salesforce Search in Lightning vs. Classic
sessions.sessionAbstract: Not all Search is created equal. Join to understand the the differences between Search in Salesforce between Lightning and Classic, how Search works under the hood, and how to make Search work for you and your org. Powerful content for users and Awesome Admins.

sessions.sessionName: Secrets from Admins to Level-Up Your Developer Career (Panel)
sessions.sessionAbstract: What happens when an Admin, an “Admineloper” and a Salesforce Developer discuss what really matters to them? Three devoted Salesforce pros share their experiences and offer golden tips for developers that would take months (or even years!) of experience to learn. Hear about common misunderstandings between Admins and Developers, declarative "gotcha's" on the platform that you absolutely need to know, how to craft the elegant technical solution that non-coders will love, what Admins really want, and much, much more!

sessions.sessionName: Secure Data on Your Terms: Platform Encryption and Key Management
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce Shield is blazing the trail as a leader in cloud security. Join us for an update on Platform Encryption (including the newest "Bring Your Own Key" functionality) and learn how customers across regulated industries are leveraging Shield to bring higher security and peace of mind to its customers.

sessions.sessionName: Security Best Practices for Building Lightning Components
sessions.sessionAbstract: How secure are your Lightning components? Learn the foundations required to build a secure Lightning application. We'll cover common mistakes and misconceptions around field-level security (FLS), CRUD, content security policy (CSP). You'll walk away with the best practices for hardening your application and keeping your data secure. #DF17Partners

sessions.sessionName: Self-Correct Before You Self-Destruct: Secrets of the World’s Best Sales Coaches
sessions.sessionAbstract:
You have invested in one of the best sales tools in the world, but do you really know how to use Salesforce to maximize the competitive strengths of each of your reps? Join Rob Jeppsen, Founder and CEO of Xvoyant to learn how to create a culture of Intentional Improvement by coaching through Salesforce. In this session, Rob will provide tactics on how to create coaching moments that matter by prioritizing, dollarizing, and optimizing the coaching process with each salesperson in your organization. 

Rob is recognized as one of the nation’s leading sales coaches, having won a Salesforce Surfboard Award and 15 Stevie Awards since 2007 in categories including Sales Coaching Process of the Year and Sales Coach of the Year. Learn how leading sales organizations at Waste Management Corporation, Zions Bancorp, and other international large-enterprise organizations are improving forecast accuracy, increasing the amount of reps hitting quota, and creating legendary customer experiences by creating collaborative, predictive coaching with Salesforce. Give the members of your team a reason to use Salesforce besides forecasting and have them enter the world of predictable, intentional improvement as you are introduced to a successful coaching blueprint from one of the world’s leading sales coaches.

sessions.sessionName: Sell More with Leads and Opportunity Management
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join us for an intimate and interactive discussion with other customers to learn how to best manage Leads and Opportunities to deliver a greater return on your Salesforce investment. You can share ideas on ways to optimize leads and opportunities to improve sales reporting and take back tips to ensure you are leveraging online resources and developing the right strategies for continued success!

sessions.sessionName: Service Analytics: How Salesforce uses Einstein Analytics for Success
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join this session and learn how Salesforce leverages Einstein Service Analytics to drive Customer Success at Scale!

sessions.sessionName: Service Cloud Lightning - Get ready for the next generation Service Cloud
sessions.sessionAbstract: Lightning is taking the world's #1 intelligent customer service platform by storm, and you won't want to miss this look into the next generation of Service Cloud Lightning! From Lightning Console, Macros, Milestones and the Customer 360 to Keyboard Shortcuts, Quick Text and Favorites, we'll cover the gamut of exciting, must have features in Lighting Service. Join us to see how Lightning will enable your company to deliver smarter, faster and more personalized service for every customer. We'll conclude with a peek into the future roadmap and items like Mass Actions, Case Teams, Email enhancements and more.This is a must-attend session for anyone interested in the Lightning Console and Case Management!

sessions.sessionName: Service Cloud Lightning: The Path to Transforming the Service Experience
sessions.sessionAbstract: Are you thinking of transitioning to Service Cloud Lightning? Let’s chat! Join us to learn how you can take advantage of fast setup, out-of-the-box case management, and easy customization built right into the platform. We’ll also walk through best practices and recommendations as you define a rollout strategy.

sessions.sessionName: Service Cloud Platform: Roadmap Part 1 - The Agent Experience
sessions.sessionAbstract: You don't want to miss this sneak peek into the future of the agent experience. The Service Cloud Product Management team will share many exciting new features that will allow you to deliver amazing customer service in an increasingly connected world. We'll give you a preview of the next two releases of the Service Cloud Console. We love to hear feedback directly from our amazing customers and partners. We can't wait to see you in person!

sessions.sessionName: Service Cloud Platform: Roadmap Part 1 - The Agent Experience (Repeat 1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Service defines your brand. You don't want to miss this sneak peek to equip your agents for the new world of Service. The Service Cloud Product Management team will share exciting new features that will allow you to keep your competitive edge by deliver engaging Service. We'll give you a preview of the next two releases of the Service Cloud Console. We love to hear feedback directly from our amazing customers and partners. We can't wait to see you in person!

sessions.sessionName: Service Cloud Platform: Roadmap Part 1 - The Agent Experience (Repeat 2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Service defines your brand. You don't want to miss this sneak peek to equip your agents for the new world of Service. The Service Cloud Product Management team will share exciting new features that will allow you to keep your competitive edge by deliver engaging Service. We'll give you a preview of the next two releases of the #1 Customer Service Platform. We love to hear feedback directly from our amazing customers and partners. We can't wait to see you in person!

sessions.sessionName: Service Cloud Platform: Roadmap Part 2 - The Customer Experience
sessions.sessionAbstract: Service defines your brand. You don't want to miss this sneak peek to equip your agents for the new world of Service. The Service Cloud Product Management team will share exciting new features that will allow you to keep your competitive edge by deliver engaging Service. We'll give you a preview of the next two releases of the #1 Customer Service Platform. We love to hear feedback directly from our amazing customers and partners. We can't wait to see you in person!

sessions.sessionName: Service Cloud Platform: Roadmap Part 2 - The Customer Experience (Repeat 1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Service defines your brand. You don't won't want to miss our Service Cloud Roadmap reveal. In this part 2 of 2 session, our Product Management team will share the many exciting new customer-facing features coming to allow you to personalize service in this connected world. We will focus on what you can expect in our two upcoming releases, and spend more time in demos and prototypes than in slides.

sessions.sessionName: Service Cloud Platform: Roadmap Part 2 - The Customer Experience (Repeat 2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Service defines your brand. You don't won't want to miss our Service Cloud Roadmap reveal. In this part 2 of 2 session, our Product Management team will share the many exciting new customer-facing features coming to allow you to personalize service in this connected world. We will focus on what you can expect in our two upcoming releases, and spend more time in demos and prototypes than in slides.

sessions.sessionName: Service Insights You Need: Getting Up & Running Quickly With Service Analytics
sessions.sessionAbstract: There’s never been a better, or more pressing time for greater insight to customer service. New service channels create opportunities to balance and optimize interactions. However, customer data, service information, and reporting are still largely in separate systems and spreadsheets. Agents remain largely in the dark about a customer’s trends, behavior, opportunity, and risk while they're engaging with them. Service managers feel overwhelmed with machine- and user-generated data from service channels, agents, customer satisfaction scores and sentiment indicators. Join us to learn how Service Analytics, a new analytics app from Salesforce, can quickly expose insights from all your Service Cloud channel data. Integrate analytics so they're no longer separate tools and processes. Embed data-driven insights to inform and guide every service decision from executive, to service manager, to the contact center agent at the point of interaction.

sessions.sessionName: Shipping at Lightning Speed: How Salesforce Jolts Transportation and Logistics
sessions.sessionAbstract: Reams of paperwork, manual transactions, non-value-added activities, and poor collaboration are just some of the inefficiencies that lead to errors and delays within the transportation and logistics industry. In this session, you’ll learn how Salesforce can impact your revenue and help your business by leveraging the platform. We will show you how we can help you close technology gaps faster, increase productivity, drive transparency, improve collaboration in intermodal freight transport, and seamlessly connect cargo to customers.

sessions.sessionName: Should I Turn on Contacts to Multiple Accounts?
sessions.sessionAbstract: In the default Salesforce setup, a contact record is only related to a single account record. This can keep things simple but in today’s business world people often belong to - or work on behalf of - multiple accounts. In this session, learn about the Contacts to Multiple Accounts feature and why it could give your organization the flexibility it needs to get a 360 degree view of your customer.

sessions.sessionName: Siezing Opportunity in the B2C Digital Market
sessions.sessionAbstract: Today, the B2B market is changing, and many companies are adopting a direct-to-consumer (B2C) strategy to grow their businesses. Historically, B2B brands were slow to evolve outside of their wholesale model, but due to the growth in eCommerce, many traditional B2B brands are quickly entering the B2C digital market. In this session, hear how a Commerce Cloud customer deftly entered the B2C digital market and lessons learned from the process.

sessions.sessionName: Silos No More: Automate and Optimize Processes That Span Orgs With Nintex
sessions.sessionAbstract: Even simple business processes often include multiple teams, orgs, and external systems. See how you can use Nintex Workflow to break down these silos with intelligent process automation. No need to code or wait for IT. Learn how you can automate processes more quickly and improve business impact.

sessions.sessionName: Simplify Choosing a Report Type
sessions.sessionAbstract: You create new report using a familiar report type. After running the report, you realize that it wasn't the correct one and you must start over. Help ... there has to be a better way! Join us as we demystify report types and take a deep dive into the best ways to appropriately and accurately address report requests. Empower your users to rely on best practices during any report type quandaries. Rejoice Admins, Super users, and Report enthusiasts as we streamline the entire process of designing, building and running reports.

sessions.sessionName: Simplify Data-Driven Processes Using the Einstein Analytics Apex SDK
sessions.sessionAbstract: Wouldn't it be great to use all the data from Einstein Analytics within your Salesforce processes? Well, there is a solution for that: the Einstein Analytics Apex SDK. In this session we'll walk you through some real-world examples which showcase that Einstein Analytics can be much more than just a fancy UI. You'll learn how to perform different kinds of queries on your datasets using the SDK and use them within your declarative and programmatic development.

sessions.sessionName: Simplify Testing By Automatically Populating Sandboxes With Test Data
sessions.sessionAbstract: Data is a precious commodity to business users, but most fail to realize the value it has for developers. Sandboxes that are populated with data help to improve testing, and at the same time, reduce development time. In this session you’ll learn how to automatically populate your sandboxes with dependable data to create enhanced testing environments and deliver better results.

sessions.sessionName: Simplifying Security and Compliance with Security Health Check and Org Monitor
sessions.sessionAbstract:
The ever shifting landscape of security makes staying secure in the digital world challenging for anybody. Whether you have a single Salesforce org, or dozens, Security Health Check provides quick visibility into your security posture, making securing your data easier than ever. Join us to learn how Security Health Check along with a newly available tool, Org Monitor, help simplify monitoring of the security health and compliance of your salesforce orgs. We will explore how these tools have been used in real world implementations, and the lessons learned in the process. 

Speakers: Alessandro Lapucci, alapucci@salesforce.com, Senior Application Security Engineer, Salesforce

sessions.sessionName: Simplifying Your Sales Cycle With Salesforce CPQ
sessions.sessionAbstract: 70% of deals that fall apart do so during the quote creation part of the sales cycle. One of our customers will share how they were able to simplify their quoting process and create a better buying experience for their customers. Watch a live demonstration of how they leverage Salesforce CPQ to price and package their products and learn how they are able to create longstanding customers with the easy renewals process.

sessions.sessionName: Site Reliability & Incident Response for the World's Most Trusted Cloud
sessions.sessionAbstract: The Salesforce Global Site Reliability team leverages the Salesforce Platform to enable fast, consistent, and reliable response to production events that impact our product clouds. In this session you will learn how the Salesforce Global Site Reliability team utilizes Salesforce and other tools to improve mean-time-to-recovery (MTTR) while increasing operational efficiency.

sessions.sessionName: Six Steps to Build, Distribute and Sell Your Custom Mobile App
sessions.sessionAbstract: Creating a custom mobile app that integrates with the App Cloud can be confusing. We’ll cut through the fog and learn exactly what it takes to build, distribute and sell a custom mobile app from start to finish. You’ll learn just enough about Connected Apps, OAuth2, and managed packages to list your app on the Apple AppStore and Salesforce AppExchange. We'll use an iOS app as an example, but the basic principles and techniques apply equally well to Android apps, too.

sessions.sessionName: Smart Lookups with Machine Learning
sessions.sessionAbstract: Walk through the steps to use PredictionIO within Salesforce, showing how to define an Engine and Event Server using the Heroku buildpack for PredictionIO. Once environment is set we will setup a lookup field to work with, making predictions of which record is recommended to associate on it.

sessions.sessionName: Smarter Commerce Journeys with Commerce Cloud Einstein
sessions.sessionAbstract: Commerce Cloud is even smarter Einstein! In this session, attendees will learn about Commerce Cloud Einstein's embedded Artificial Intelligence capabilities. From empowering retailers to leverage their own data to supercharging 1:1 personalization, Commerce Cloud Einstein makes machine learning accessible to everyone. Developers can quickly embed Einstein into their sites with just a few clicks - minimal coding and no data scientists required.

sessions.sessionName: Smarter Marketing and Supercharged Productivity with Einstein
sessions.sessionAbstract: When we surveyed our ohana about artificial intelligence, what we heard is that marketers expect two things: to see efficiency gains in the way you work and to help create 1-to-1 marketing across every touchpoint. The question left for many is just how AI will practically help them do that. Join us as we cut through the hype and discuss how marketers can put AI into action across the consumer lifecycle using Einstein in the Marketing Cloud.

sessions.sessionName: Smarter Self-Service with Einstein Answers
sessions.sessionAbstract: Customer Communities supercharge the self-service experience by harnessing the collective knowledge of your entire customer base. Learn how leading companies are intelligently powering their self-service experiences with Einstein Answers to automatically deliver answers to common questions in real-time.

sessions.sessionName: Social Brand Monitoring with Einstein Platform Services
sessions.sessionAbstract: Have you ever wanted to gather valuable real-time insights from analyzing media social media channels like Twitter? Then Einstein Platform services with it's capabilities of intent detection and image classification comes to the rescue. Come and learn about datasets, models and and how to apply prediction to the data of your choice.

sessions.sessionName: Social In Regulated Industries: How HLS & FINS Companies Manage Social Customers
sessions.sessionAbstract: Marketing in a compliant world is no picnic. You're faced with HIPAA compliance, Medicare Marketing Guidelines, SEC and FINRA regulations, the Sarbanes-Oxley Act, the list goes on. The stakes are also higher in many cases - Negatives reviews could ruin a doctor's career, lack of education around a disease could have serious consequences, and a bad social or mobile banking experience could cause a customer to switch brands for life. In this session, you'll hear from a panel of customers from both Health & Life Sciences and Financial Services companies on how they're using social to effectively engage with customers, patients, and physicians, all while complying with industry regulations.

sessions.sessionName: Social Insights to Action: How Brands Are Driving Impact with Social Listening
sessions.sessionAbstract: Do you struggle to build social queries that aren't clouded with irrelevant results? Well, you're not alone...Between the millions of conversations happening every day across social media and the web, and the shift from text-based to image driven content, it's become more difficult than ever to listen and respond in a meaningful way. In this fast-paced and interactive session, Social Studio product experts and customers will team up to walk you through best practices for building social queries and how to use Einstein vision to uncover customer insights, identify influencers, track your brand, and understand where and how your products are being used.

sessions.sessionName: Social Studio Roadmap: Social in the Salesforce Platform
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join the Social Studio product team to learn about key trends in social media and how Social Studio will evolve to help you build deeper relationships with customers and prospects. Get key insights into the Social Studio roadmap and share feedback with the product team during this interactive session.

sessions.sessionName: SOQL: Performance Explained
sessions.sessionAbstract: As developers building on a platform on which we don’t have full database control, we often struggle to achieve maximum SOQL performance and deliver the best user experience. We need to understand how the database executes queries and joins data then, design our queries accordingly. In this session, I will present some SOQL performance optimization techniques. You will learn how the Query Optimizer works and how to use the Query Plan API.

sessions.sessionName: Sparking YouTube Success with Lightning Experience
sessions.sessionAbstract: YouTube has been a Salesforce customer since 2012, using Salesforce to manage the relationships for the largest YouTube Creators, as well as events at YouTube Spaces. Learn how YouTube rolled out Lightning Experience by leveraging team gurus and ultimately improving Account Manager happiness and effectiveness and to drive YouTube Creator success!

sessions.sessionName: Speed Up Relational Data Migration In Continuous Integration Environments
sessions.sessionAbstract: Efficiently and accurately migrating test and application configuration data between Salesforce orgs is an arduous challenge in any dev environment. Learn how to easily set up a data migration process using Prodly Moover's new centrally controlled deployment architecture and then see a customer use case related to Salesforce CPQ implementation.

sessions.sessionName: Stand Out from the Crowd: Nonprofit Social Media Strategies to Listen and Engage
sessions.sessionAbstract: It's hard being social sometimes. With everyone talking at once, it can get noisy. It's time to focus in on what you care about. With the Salesforce Social Studio you can finally get strategic about your social. Hear from Fair Trade USA who uses Social Studio to publish on-brand posts weekly, listen in on the conversations that are relevant to them, and analyze what campaigns are working and which can improve.

sessions.sessionName: Standard Bank of Africa Makes the Move to Lightning
sessions.sessionAbstract: Imagine being the biggest company in Africa, Imagine running over 16 different African countries, serving the biggest corporates and selling banking across the fascinating continent of the world! After 10 years with Salesforce, Standard Bank fell in love with Lightning! Join this session to learn how Lightning can help the biggest company in Africa have a 360 view of the customer, get relevant insights, get a full view of everything they need to do for their portfolio on their home page and manage sales processes in the lightning speed! Lightning made banking in Africa easier, smarter, faster!

sessions.sessionName: Start Your Team's Collaboration Revolution with Quip
sessions.sessionAbstract: Billions have been spent on productivity solutions, but the tools that existed before couldn't meet the needs of today's employees. Introducing Quip - the next generation productivity suite that combines documents, spreadsheets, checklists, and chat with your live CRM data into one seamless experience. Quip eliminates endless chains of emails, meetings, chats, and document versions, empowering teams to work smarter and faster. Come and hear how teams who adopt Quip for team collaboration are happier, faster, and more productive.

sessions.sessionName: Start Your Team's Collaboration Revolution with Quip
sessions.sessionAbstract: Billions have been spent on productivity solutions, but the tools haven't met the needs of today's workforce. Instead our collaboration culture is centered on email and meetings to get things done. Learn how Quip, the next enterprise collaboration platform eliminates endless email chains, calendars stuffed with meetings, and communication silos that slow your team down. Come see how Quip can make your team happier, faster, and more productive.

sessions.sessionName: State of Marketing: Insights on Top Marketing Trends for 2017 and Beyond (1/2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: To blaze trails in the Age of the Customer, marketers need to know what's top-of-mind for their peers, and understand what practices set top teams apart from the rest. Join this session to arm yourself with results from the fourth annual "State of Marketing" research study, based on a global survey of 3,500 marketing leaders. You'll learn about key trends that are changing the face of marketing, such as the evolution of customer journey strategies, the growth and influence of various channels, how teams are leveraging emerging technologies like artificial intelligence, and more.

sessions.sessionName: State of Marketing: Insights on Top Marketing Trends for 2017 and Beyond (2/2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: To blaze trails in the Age of the Customer, marketers need to know what's top-of-mind for their peers, and understand what practices set top teams apart from the rest. Join this session to arm yourself with results from the fourth annual "State of Marketing" research study, based on a global survey of 3,500 marketing leaders. You'll learn about key trends that are changing the face of marketing, such as the evolution of customer journey strategies, the growth and influence of various channels, how teams are leveraging emerging technologies like artificial intelligence, and more.

sessions.sessionName: Static Resources Made Easy
sessions.sessionAbstract: We’ll demonstrate a useful library that we’ve developed that makes working with static resources easier and faster when doing front end development. By hosting resources locally during development, iteration is faster while maintaining and encouraging best practices. Stop by to find how Acumen Solutions excels at front end development.

sessions.sessionName: Staying Connected with Talent through Communities
sessions.sessionAbstract: Allegis Group is leading the charge in contract employee engagement by establishing a new, very personalized talent experience. Join us to learn how to transform a placement-focused recruitment process to a relationship-focused customer journey.

sessions.sessionName: Strategies for Integrating Salesforce With Other Systems
sessions.sessionAbstract: Come get a hands on look at how Salesforce can leverage external systems, and be leveraged by external systems. This session will introduce strategies and solutions for integrating Salesforce with other systems.

sessions.sessionName: Streamline Any Process by Developing with the Path Base Component
sessions.sessionAbstract: Not all entities support path and the default path setup doesn't work for unique processes, but using the base path component developers can build custom paths to meet any use case. In this session, we will explain the power of the Path base component and explore custom paths.

sessions.sessionName: Streamline Your Salesforce Experience Through Data Archival and Cleanup
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Would you like to learn how to streamline your data to remove the clutter and archive data you no longer need? Join us for this interactive Circle of Success where we discuss how streamlining and archiving your data can improve the overall user experience. We will cover the following key areas:
 
 -Understanding your storage limits and data usage trends
 -The implications of archiving and purging data
 -Establishing a Data Streamlining Strategy
 -Identifying the tools to streamline your data
 
 This will be facilitated by Salesforce experts who will provide best practices, resources, and guidance, but also allow you to learn and collaborate with other customers.

sessions.sessionName: Streamlining Admissions & Enrollment: Product Deep Dive & Customer Story
sessions.sessionAbstract: Take a tour of Salesforce’s tools for streamlining admissions and enrollments processes. See how a large district has used Salesforce to implement an online, universal-enrollment process that spans across district and charter schools for their parents. Explore a private school’s use of Salesforce for reviewing applications, managing waitlists, bringing enrollment online, and keeping parents informed with automated updates.

sessions.sessionName: Structure For Sales Success with Balanced Territories
sessions.sessionAbstract: Territories are more than account owners. They impact how your company will reach its goals and help you retain reps. Come learn practical tips you can use to create balanced, fair territories to crush your goals and keep top talent on your team.

sessions.sessionName: Stump the AppExchange Experts!
sessions.sessionAbstract: Are you a rockstar at your company, but you're looking to learn even more about apps? Bring your toughest app questions to this session as Salesforce MVPs and AppExchange All Stars will answer them live, as well as share their secrets for maximizing value from their favorite apps. Get your questions answered, and take away tips and tricks to elevate your team to the next level.

sessions.sessionName: Supercharge Channel Sales with Salesforce's Partner Community & Salesforce CPQ
sessions.sessionAbstract: If your channel sales partners are using spreadsheets and word documents to create price quotes, it's time to consider a new solution. Learn how best in class Salesforce customers are using Salesforce's Partner Community and Salesforce CPQ to provide their channel sales network with an online selling platform that allows resellers and distributors to produce accurate and professional sales quotes for prospects quickly, while eliminating errors and inefficiencies.

sessions.sessionName: Supercharge Productivity with Lightning Console Apps
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Lightning Console Apps are the fastest way to work and you already have them available for free in your orgs! 

In this session, you will learn how console apps can make you a hero with your users by making them more productive:
- Automate data entry with Macros 
- Organize tabs with Workspaces
- Make Chatter replies super fast with the new Lightning new Lightning Console Chrome extension
- Throw your mouse away and become a keyboard ninja with Keyboard shortcuts 
- Automate opening up related records with a couple clicks in Setup 
- Configure utilities to get one click access to the tools your teams need 

And much more! Join us as we demonstrate how to make users more productive by leveraging Console.

sessions.sessionName: Supercharge Your Lightning Roadmap with Persona-Driven UX Design
sessions.sessionAbstract: Excited by all the awesome new features in Lightning but wondering how to get started migrating your users? In this session, we will share tips, tricks, and best practices for planning your Lightning roadmap through persona-driven UX strategy. We will help you understand what personas are, why they're important in Lightning, how they can help you prioritize, and we'll be sure to share lots of resources to help you after Dreamforce. You'll leave armed and ready to jump-start your own journey to Lightning!

sessions.sessionName: Supercharge Your Marketing with Sales Data
sessions.sessionAbstract: Your marketing department is small, so how do you create personalized content that will grab your prospect's attention? Learn how to use data you already have to create personalized marketing campaigns and deliver a more powerful and effective message to every person on your list.

sessions.sessionName: Supercharge Your Marketing with Sales Data
sessions.sessionAbstract: Your marketing department is small, so how do you create personalized content that will grab your prospect's attention? Learn how to use data you already have to create personalized marketing campaigns and deliver a more powerful and effective message to every person on your list.

sessions.sessionName: Supercharge Your ROI with Lightning Experience
sessions.sessionAbstract: We surveyed hundreds of Lightning Experience users in April 2017, and the message is loud and clear. Lightning Experience is delivering +41% increase in end user productivity, and a whole lot more. Join us to learn how you can boost your Salesforce ROI with Lightning.

sessions.sessionName: Supercharge Your ROI with Lightning Experience
sessions.sessionAbstract: We surveyed hundreds of Lightning Experience users in April 2017, and the message is loud and clear. Lightning Experience is delivering +41% increase in end user productivity, and a whole lot more. Join us to learn how you can boost your Salesforce ROI with Lightning.

sessions.sessionName: Supercharge Your Salesforce ROI: Case Study with Aspect Software
sessions.sessionAbstract: In this session we'll take a deep dive into how two trailblazers in their respective industries have taken their businesses to the next level. We'll explore case studies Aspect Software conducted by one of the top business analyst companies, Nucleus Research

sessions.sessionName: Support Your Customers Across Every Channel
sessions.sessionAbstract: In this session, you'll see how Salesforce can empower you to support your customers across every channel, wherever they are. Join us to see how SMS, Email, Social, Communities, and your Website can come together to provide a scalable, unified, customer support experience.

sessions.sessionName: Survival Kit for Beginner Developers
sessions.sessionAbstract: Are you a developer just starting out with Salesforce? Are you an admin looking to get into development? Join this session to learn a few easy, but essential tips and tricks I wish I knew when I was starting out. We will cover how to choose the right tools, how to decide when you do or do not need to actually write code, and what are some of the easier technologies you can dive into to get right in the middle of the action. After just 20 minutes, you will walk away knowing how and where to start your own developer journey.

sessions.sessionName: Switching to Lightning - The Carrot or the Stick?
sessions.sessionAbstract: So you are ready to switch to Lightning... now what? How do you get users to actually switch? Should we use rewards, punishment, or a combination of the two? For this breakout session we will discuss best practices and creative ideas to help users prepare to switch to Lightning. Please join us for a candid conversation about increasing user adoption with Lightning.

sessions.sessionName: Synchronize Data to Postgres with Change Data Capture
sessions.sessionAbstract: Integrating Salesforce apps with back-office often involves maintaining your own copy of Salesforce data. Salesforce’s Change Data Capture makes data replication straightforward by providing a reliable stream of data changes over the Salesforce event bus. In this session, we are going to show how to subscribe to the change stream and keep a Heroku Postgres copy of Salesforce Objects always up to date.

sessions.sessionName: Take It To Chatter: Drive Collaboration at Every Level of an Enterprise
sessions.sessionAbstract: How does Salesforce do it? How do we ignite our internal community to drive employee and customer success? We use Chatter and our Community Manager to drive connections, culture and success throughout the enterprise. Join us to learn about Chatter and our Community ManagerÕs role in relation to data, product, and enablement. And how they help drive new business and customer success.

sessions.sessionName: Take your Customer Experience to the Next Level with Sales and Service Together
sessions.sessionAbstract: There are many reasons to bring your team onto a single platform for Sales and Service. Yet, as we all are very aware, every business has it's own unique requirements that can make it difficult to make this change. Join Rebecca Jaynes, Sr. Solutions Architect from Commission, Inc. and learn the reasons why they moved their sales, onboarding, and account management teams to the Salesforce platform. You'll walk away with everything you'll need to be successful making changes at your own company - with tips on how to take your customer experience to new heights.

sessions.sessionName: Take Your Productivity to the Next Level with Lightning
sessions.sessionAbstract: In this special session we SVPs of Product Jon Sigler and Shawna Wolverton will be sharing how you can innovate faster and smarter with you in Lightning. You will also get to hear from T-Mobile and CrossMark about their experience creating next level apps that drive breakthrough adoption with Salesforce.

sessions.sessionName: Take Your Productivity to the Next Level with Lightning (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: In this special session we SVPs of Product Jon Sigler and Shawna Wolverton will be sharing how you can innovate faster and smarter with you in Lightning. You will also get to hear from UPS and CommScope about their experience creating next level apps that drive breakthrough adoption with Salesforce.

sessions.sessionName: Technology to Support Humanitarian Aid and Disaster Relief
sessions.sessionAbstract: When disaster strikes or civilians lack support to meet their basic needs, nonprofits are often the first to respond. Join leading humanitarian organizations from around the globe — CARE, The International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies (IFRC), and the International Rescue Committee — for a discussion on the role technology can play in providing critical aid to vulnerable populations.

sessions.sessionName: Telecom Best Practices: Putting Customers First with B2B Service
sessions.sessionAbstract: The business sector is a major growth area for many communications service providers. At the same time, servicing business customers is much more complex than servicing consumers. Business customers expect efficient and effective customer care, and more importantly, prefer vendors that empower them to serve themselves via digital channels. Join this session to learn how Salesforce can help service providers meet these high expectations and excel in B2B customer service.

sessions.sessionName: Telecom Panel: Best Practices for Customer Experience Transformation
sessions.sessionAbstract: Many communications service providers have already embarked on a digital transformation journey with the intent to deliver exceptional customer experiences across all assisted and digital interaction channels. However, this journey is not always an easy one. So, how can service providers create a smarter and easier digital transformation roadmap with tangible business value delivered at every stage? Join this panel discussion to find out.

sessions.sessionName: Telecom: Driving NPS and Loyalty by Proactively Engaging with Your Customers
sessions.sessionAbstract: Service providers that want to drive loyalty and Net Promoter Score (NPS) must transform the way they engage with customers and become more proactive. Join this session to learn how Bouygues Telecom, a leading service provider in France, is leveraging Marketing Cloud and Service Cloud to manage their customers’ journey. Hear Bouygues leaders talk about how they improved their marketing campaigns as well as drove customer satisfaction and loyalty by enhancing their customer care across all channels.

sessions.sessionName: Telecom: Gaining B2C Market Share with Omni-Channel Prospect Management
sessions.sessionAbstract: Consumers shopping for telecommunications products and services across multiple channels often face a frustrating purchase experience due to siloed sales and marketing teams, systems, and processes. And as a result, many abandon the transaction altogether. But it doesn’t have to be this way. Learn from Virgin Media a proven strategy for omnichannel prospect management, and start moving the needle on your B2C lead conversion rates with a seamless, consistent, and personalized shopping journey across every channel.

sessions.sessionName: Test Automation and continuous integration in SDLC using Salesforce DX
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce is changing the game for continuous integration, in this presentation we will explain tools and ways to face the challenges that will show up when creating a continuous integration process for your organization

sessions.sessionName: The ABCs of Influencer Content for ABM
sessions.sessionAbstract: ABM and influencer marketing are hot topics for B2B marketers all over the world as two of the most promising strategies for attracting, engaging and converting ideal customers. What many marketers don’t realize is how collaborating with influencers for ABM can create even more credible, relevant, and optimized experiences for target accounts. Join Lee Odden to learn how working with influencers and their communities can support content for ABM.

sessions.sessionName: The App After Your Org's Heart: Building Apps That Will Light Up Your Org
sessions.sessionAbstract: Apps can streamline processes, simplify work, and save time. But how do you know which apps are the right solutions to your users' needs? And how do you keep things simple in your org as you build more apps? This session will go over the main things to consider before, during, and after building an app: identifying the need, research, building the app, testing the app, and deploying.

sessions.sessionName: The Blueprint for Growth: Best Practices to Scale with Financial Services Cloud
sessions.sessionAbstract: Choosing the right technology is key in order to lock in future growth and expand your book of business. Hear from Portfolio Solutions and their integration partner, LiquidHub, on why migrating from customized Sales Cloud to Financial Services Cloud was integral to their growth as a firm. Plus, get an in depth look at how Portfolio Solutions is using Financial Services Cloud to drive a digital transformation across the firm with a single view of the client, integrations and more.

sessions.sessionName: The Clones are Coming (and Other Sandbox News)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Clones! Clones! Clones! Learn about the Sandbox cloning pilot, working with Scratch Orgs and get the latest insight into the Sandbox roadmap. Sandboxes are still the primary environmental choice for building, testing and deploying software on Salesforce.

sessions.sessionName: The Financial Services Cloud Advantage: Grow AUM with Relationship Intelligence
