sessions.sessionAbstract: A deep understanding of relationships, households, and goals is key to exceeding client expectations and locking in trust from one generation to the next. With relationship intelligence, advisors can grow their AUM across the household. See how Financial Services Cloud is empowering advisors to deliver personalized advice at scale so they can transform individual engagements into lifelong journeys. Join Joe Di Paola, CEO, Transamerica World Financial Group and Mark Jordahl, President, US Bank Wealth Management, to learn how their firms are putting clients at the center of the experience.

sessions.sessionName: The Future of App Development with Peter Coffee
sessions.sessionAbstract: The future of app development is riddled with exciting new innovations and challenging new obstacles. Industry expert, Peter Coffee, shares his vision for the future and how you can position your company to come out on top.

sessions.sessionName: The Future of AppExchange: A Roadmap for AppExchange Partners
sessions.sessionAbstract: Calling all AppExchange partners! The AppExchange team is blazing new trails to make it easier and better than ever to build and distribute apps. Join us to get an overview of the road ahead as our product team discusses the roadmap and our vision for the future of app distribution. This is a must-attend session for AppExchange partners wanting to learn about the ISV roadmap. #DF17Partners

sessions.sessionName: The Future of Client Advice: How Citi is Connecting the Bank with Salesforce
sessions.sessionAbstract: Citi is connecting different lines of business within the bank to create a unified and seamless client experience. See how they are using Financial Services Cloud to be forward compatible for their clients and how integrations with MoneyGuidePro, WealthEngine and Envestnet Yodlee are increasing their time to market so advisors and relationship managers can collaborate in real time.

sessions.sessionName: The Future of Indirect Sales: Adapt or Get Left Behind
sessions.sessionAbstract: Partners are essential to grow and scale your organization, but it's a constant battle to win mindshare from those who sell your products. Today's channel partners want to work with vendors who treat them as business parters and can deliver personalized access to information and real time collaboration. Learn from world renowned analysts and thought leaders on what steps your indirect sales organization should take to win mindshare from partners and accelerate channel revenue.

sessions.sessionName: The Future of Salesforce Security and Authentication
sessions.sessionAbstract: Learn how to enable the best security in a way that will have your users thanking you. Be the first to learn about the next-gen features and functionality of Salesforce Authenticator 3.0 and the all-new Mobile First Experience. Redesigned to add even more security to your organization with enhanced user experience, Salesforce Authenticator 3.0 will change the game. We will walk you through a step-by-step demonstration and highlight the new value-adds. We take your security as seriously as you do - let us show you the future.

sessions.sessionName: The Future of Work: A Conversation with Alan Lepofsky
sessions.sessionAbstract: The Future of Work focuses on integrating collaboration and business processes, structuring work via Social Task Management, leveraging analytics and digital assistants to work more productively, the strategic impact of mobile computing on business transformation, and measuring workforce culture based on Digital Proficiency instead of age. Join Alan Lepofsky, VP and Principal Analyst at Constellation Research, and Patrick Moran, CCO of Quip as they discuss the cultural shift in workplace productivity.

sessions.sessionName: The Future of Work: AI, Data & Diversity for Better Decision Making
sessions.sessionAbstract: Now that companies are relying more and more on algorithmic solutions to manage their employees, we see the emergence of new challenges when it comes to diversity. Machines are learning from humans to get smarter and therefore our unconscious biases are automatically replicated in how they're making decisions. This is why, when building automation tools that have a huge impact on people in the workplace, it is very important to understand that these biases exist in order to create intelligent systems that promote diversity and fight discrimination from the ground up. Join OrgVitality as we present cutting-edge research that will make you question your preconceived ideas, break down your prejudices, and open your mind to new ways to create organizational diversity using artificial intelligence.

sessions.sessionName: The Future of Work: Cultural and Technological Ways to Prepare
sessions.sessionAbstract: The world outside of work has changed significantly. With mobile, social, and open technologies transforming our culture, our expectations as a consumer have shifted. Unfortunately, the experience we have at work has not kept up leading to frustration and disengagement. Join us to learn how Salesforce is using consumer techniques and technology to deliver a world-class employee experience.

sessions.sessionName: The Future of Work: The Art and Science of Matchmaking
sessions.sessionAbstract: Have you ever struggled to find that special someone... for a role or initiative? Finding the right talent is a massive challenge, leading to decreased internal mobility, bloated recruiting costs, and lost revenue. Come and learn about the art and science of matchmaking and how companies are sourcing talent in a whole new way.

sessions.sessionName: The Growing Power of High Velocity Sales
sessions.sessionAbstract: High velocity is the fastest growing sales strategy out pacing field sales. How are you using Salesforce for your inside sales team? Come listen to a high velocity sales leader talk about their success in transforming sales in this new digital world. Our Sales Cloud Product Manager will demonstrate how Einstein Lead Scoring and the Lightning Dialer bring the Lightning Sales Console to life making today's inside sales reps even more productive then ever before.

sessions.sessionName: The Intelligent Wholesaler: Best Practices to Attract and Engage Advisors
sessions.sessionAbstract: Today's wholesalers need to help advisors with facets of their business that go far beyond product selection. In fact, zeroing in on the right behaviors and data signals is key to driving an increase in engagement and net inflows. Join us to learn best practices for how to intelligently leverage existing data to deliver valuable experiences that attract and retain advisors. Join Michael Bieselin, Head of Insight & Analytics at Invesco and Gurinder Singh, Head of Digital Innovation, TIAA nuveen, to hear how they are leveraging Salesforce to attract and engage Advisors.

sessions.sessionName: The Life-Changing Magic of Tidying Up Your Salesforce Org
sessions.sessionAbstract: If you haven’t heard of Marie Kondo, she’s a wildly famous professional organiser and author of The Life-Changing Magic of Tidying Up: The Japanese Art of Decluttering and Organising. But how does Marie Kondo relate to your Salesforce org? In the same way that she tells you to get rid of things that don’t spark joy, you should remove things from your Salesforce org that are no longer needed. Having a home that only has functional and beautiful things in it is the same as having a Salesforce org that only has relevant flows, reports, fields, etc. It's essential that we not only build new functionality; we also need to take stock of what’s already there and purge as needed. In this session, you’ll learn how to create an action plan that includes finding the places in your org to audit, how to communicate to stakeholders, and how to safely delete metadata. Speakers:

sessions.sessionName: The Magical Art Of Database Decluttering
sessions.sessionAbstract: How do you know your database is cluttered? What prospects bring you true joy? How can you make sure you don't introduce database chaos back again into your life? Join Skyler Holobach, Pardot's Email Reputation Manager, as she answers all these questions and more!

sessions.sessionName: The Modest, But Oh-So-Mighty-NPSP User
sessions.sessionAbstract: The definition of mighty is possessing great and impressive power or strength, especially on account of size. Other words for mighty include ferocious, tough, robust, muscular, strapping influential, strong, powerful, and important. Join us as two of our mightiest customers show you how their organizations are using Salesforce, fortitude, innovation and teamwork to deliver powerful, impressive, and inspiring levels of impact. Hear from two fantastic organizations who are punching above their weight with sophisticated use of the (free) Nonprofit Success Pack.

sessions.sessionName: The New Rules of Corporate Community Service
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce has re-defined corporate philanthropy with the 1-1-1 model— logging over 2 million volunteer hours to date. Come and hear those hours brought to life through the stories of our very own volunteer rockstars. Get inspired to become a volunteer rockstar yourself and return from service experiences ready to bring a new perspective into your workplace.

sessions.sessionName: The New Way to Get Dun & Bradstreet Data in Salesforce
sessions.sessionAbstract: Dun & Bradstreet is the gold standard for company data across the globe. Whether you're an existing Data.com customer, or have used Dun & Bradstreet data before, you won't want to miss this introduction to the new, innovative solution for integrating D&B company data right into your Salesforce org, with clicks not code. You'll get an intro to D&B data, the DUNS Number, the process for maintaining and updating data, the power of corporate linkage, and more!

sessions.sessionName: The New Way to Integrate Data in Salesforce (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce is making it easier to get intelligent about your customers by integrating valuable third-party industry data at the click of a mouse. From customer segmentation, to territory planning, to opportunity scoring, you need deep data to make your CRM processes more intelligent and effective. Join our partners to learn how customers are using these new features to deliver valuable insights directly into CRM with clicks, not code.

sessions.sessionName: The Pardot Roadmap: What's Next for the Age of Intelligent B2B Engagement (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Pardot is already revolutionizing the way B2B marketing and sales teams connect with their customers, but what's next? Join Pardot's leadership team to hear where Pardot is headed over the next year. Get an in-depth look at how we are supporting your growth and driving your revenue with new, innovative products and updates to existing processes.

sessions.sessionName: The Pardot Roadmap: What's Next for the Age of Intelligent B2B Engagement? (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Pardot is already revolutionizing the way B2B marketing and sales teams connect with their customers, but what's next? Join Pardot's leadership team to hear where Pardot is headed over the next year. Get an in-depth look at how we are supporting your growth and driving your revenue with new, innovative products and updates to existing processes.

sessions.sessionName: The Power of AI in Sales Cloud: One Customer's Success
sessions.sessionAbstract: Artificial intelligence has the power to drive sales productivity, but how are your peers putting it to use today? Join this session and hear how one customer has applied it to their sales processes, and what kind of results they're seeing.

sessions.sessionName: The Power of Integration: Unlock Healthcare Data to Transform Your Business
sessions.sessionAbstract: Value-based care programs are inspiring new partnerships to create care teams with shared risk and the growing need to unlock data. So how do you unify patient, member, and population data that reside in disparate systems, spread across organizations and platforms? Salesforce experts and our customers will share how they’re using Salesforce to connect clinical, claims, and engagement data for a complete patient or member view, with more efficient team communications, and improved collaboration across the entire healthcare ecosystem.

sessions.sessionName: The Power of Second Party Data
sessions.sessionAbstract: Learn the differences between first, second, and third-party data, and how the world's biggest enterprises are creating peer-to-peer data connections to drive business outcomes. Led by the Salesforce Data Studio team, this fast-moving discussion explains the value of how software enabled data governance enables differentiated data types, and how they can be used to drive better segmentation, activation, and insights.

sessions.sessionName: The Power of the Platform: How to Implement Salesforce CPQ with Clicks, not Code
sessions.sessionAbstract: CPQ implementations can be a nightmare, with long, drawn-out timelines, highly customized software, and a lack of sufficient resources and support. In this session, learn how our customers have implemented Salesforce CPQ quickly and easily with our out-of-the-box solution.

sessions.sessionName: The Recurring Revenue Revolution: From Transactions to Experiences
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Over the past decade, companies across every industry have begun shifting towards “as a service” or recurring revenue business models. During this same time, Wall Street has begun to understand and value the benefits that a subscription model can provide. As a result executive leaders and intrapreneurs are finding innovative ways to disrupt their own companies and reshape markets. Some are experimenting on the margin to figure out the formula while others have gone all in to transform and re-invent their entire company. 
 
As enterprises move towards recurring revenue services, it's not enough to get the customer experience right at the moment of the transaction, there must be a focus on the regular addition of rich, value-driven features to the service to retain subscribers. Ongoing enablement is a key component of the recurring revenue model precisely because subscriptions can be easily abandoned if customers find better value elsewhere.
 
In this session we'll discuss recurring revenue market trends, transformation patterns and the pitfalls we've seen companies make as they have attempted to implement these new models. We'll also share our thoughts on the elements for success and try to illuminate a path you can take as you blaze your trail to a new recurring revenue business model.

sessions.sessionName: The Salesforce Platform Roadmap - Part I
sessions.sessionAbstract: Get a first look at what's new in the Salesforce Platform and get a peek at where we are placing our biggest bets for the coming year. We'll cover security, performance, mobile services, and how the Salesforce Platform powers your business with new and advanced features for all your apps.

sessions.sessionName: The Salesforce Platform Roadmap - Part II
sessions.sessionAbstract: Get a first look at what's new in the Salesforce Platform and get a peek at where we are placing our biggest bets for the coming year. We'll cover security, performance, mobile services, and how the Salesforce Platform powers your business with new and advanced features for all your apps.

sessions.sessionName: The Salesforce Sales Playbook
sessions.sessionAbstract: Interested in how Salesforce runs sales? Join us to discover how Salesforce segments the market, on-boards and trains salespeople, manages the business, collaborates to win deals, and motivates the sales team. You'll leave with strategic and tactical pages from the Salesforce Sales Playbook you can apply to growing your business.

sessions.sessionName: The Second Annual State of IT: Top Trends in Business Technology
sessions.sessionAbstract: 75% of the 2,200 global IT leaders surveyed for the Second Annual State of IT research report believe that IT is in the midst of the biggest historical shift of its role. Join Salesforce Chief Digital Evangelist, Vala Afshar, as he delves into key findings from the study. You'll learn what strategies top-performing IT leaders across industries are adopting to propel their businesses into the digital era, the challenges they're facing along the way, and which technologies they're turning to for speed, innovation, and intelligence.

sessions.sessionName: The Seismic Shakeup in Healthcare Marketing: Are You Ready?
sessions.sessionAbstract:
A superconvergence of powerful forces in science, business and technology is pushing the entire healthcare ecosystem to disruption. What's a health and life sciences marketer to do? Join us for this session to learn why mass media direct-to-consumer ads and other traditional tactics no longer suffice--and specific steps you can take to create an effective, enduring and personalized health narrative that speaks directly to each customer's unique needs in a multi-screen, multi-device world. 

Larry Mickelberg, Managing Director of Life Sciences at Deloitte Digital, and a panel of health and life sciences marketing experts from Roche Diabetes Care, Duke University Health System, Piedmont Healthcare, and others will discuss the rise of a new kind of marketing that is more value-based, data-driven, and customer-centric than ever before. You'll leave with five essential capabilities every marketer must embrace, and practical insights into how to make them a reality in your organization.

sessions.sessionName: The State of IoT: Transform Connected Products into Engaging Experiences
sessions.sessionAbstract: How do you create real business value from the Internet of Things? Join us to hear from IoT Cloud EVP Woodson Martin on how Salesforce is bridging the gap between devices and people while making IoT accessible to every business user.

sessions.sessionName: The State of IoT: Transform Connected Products into Engaging Experiences (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: How do you create real business value from the Internet of Things? Join us to hear from IoT Cloud EVP Woodson Martin on how Salesforce is bridging the gap between devices and people while making IoT accessible to every business user.

sessions.sessionName: The Story of Sales Documentary Sneak Peek: Technology & The Future of Sales
sessions.sessionAbstract: Get a sneak peek at an entertaining and enlightening new documentary film created by Salesforce: The Story of Sales. You'll see a segment of the film where thought leaders discuss how technology has impacted sales, and what the future holds for the sales profession. Then, hear from sales thought leaders and stars of the film in a fireside chat post screeening.

sessions.sessionName: The Story of Sales Documentary Sneak Peek: What Makes a Good Salesperson
sessions.sessionAbstract: Get a sneak peek at an entertaining and enlightening new documentary film created by Salesforce: The Story of Sales. You'll see a minute segment of the film where thought leaders and real salespeople reveal the qualities and habits of high performing sales teams. Then, hear from sales thought leaders and stars of the film in a fireside chat post screeening.

sessions.sessionName: The War for Attention: Examining the New Media Ecosystem
sessions.sessionAbstract: Digital has surpassed Television. New fandoms have exploded around e-games, virtual worlds, and user generated content. Facebook, Netflix, Amazon, AT&T and Hulu are spending billions on producing their own content. With AR, VR, autonomous cars, 5G, and Blockchain on the horizon, the complexity in the war for attention continues to increase. In this session, we'll highlight the major forces emerging,, evaluate the potential implications for media, entertainment, and communications organizations, and define the key success criteria for tomorrow that leaders should be planning for now.

sessions.sessionName: The White Glove Treatment: Exceed Customer Expectations by Hitting your SLAs
sessions.sessionAbstract: Do you want to offer your customers gold, silver, or bronze levels of support? Do you want to continue to provide your tier one customers a white-glove experience even as you scale and grow your business? Join this session to learn more about how to leverage Entitlements in Service Cloud to meet and exceed your SLAs.

sessions.sessionName: Think Like an Analyst: Tips for Navigating Salesforce as a Solo Admin
sessions.sessionAbstract: Congrats on being a solo Admin! Now it’s time to craft your plan. In this session, you’ll gain the tactics and mindset to cross the line from Admin to analyst. We’ll teach you real tools to manage up, tame the flood of incoming requests, and how to ask the right questions to translate user asks into lasting solutions. We’ll help you understand your strengths to transform your career from order taker to product owner. You’ll walk away with tools you can use to manage your work, and a vision to help you think about what’s next.

sessions.sessionName: Thinking Compositionally: Why Salesforce Developers Grok it!
sessions.sessionAbstract: Becoming your best you isn't easy, it takes hard work and persistence. Come discuss what traits and skills set innovative developers apart on the Salesforce platform, and take away strategies to grow with the platform without feeling frustrated. Share stories and learn to push each other to new heights. Most of all, leave this interactive session feeling empowered to build the future with the power of Salesforce at your back.

sessions.sessionName: Thinking Lightning for Visualforce & Apex Developers
sessions.sessionAbstract: As a Visualforce or Apex developer, the thought of learning to develop in Lightning feels daunting. Here's the thing - you're actually much better prepared for it than you think! In this session, you'll learn tips and tricks for making the switch to Lightning and how close it is to what you already know. We'll cover where you can use Lightning Components, and key use cases for each scenario. By the time we're done, you'll be itching to write Lightning code!

sessions.sessionName: Three Ways I Got My Boss on Board with Lightning
sessions.sessionAbstract: We all loved Classic and I bet your boss does too. You know the Lightning Experience will provide a better user experience but are struggling with how to get buy-in from upper management to allocate the time and resources needed to do your Lightning migration. I'll share my Lightning Experience story and the three strategies I used to make my boss a Lightning convert!

sessions.sessionName: Tips and Tricks for Developing Components for Communities
sessions.sessionAbstract: Discover tips and tricks for developing Lightning Components for communities. This session will cover customizing Self Service templates including overriding the default header with a custom theme, allowing community administrators to control the look and feel of your custom components with design tokens, and best practices such as utilizing Lightning Component inheritance.

sessions.sessionName: Tips and Tricks to Pass the Salesforce Security Review Process
sessions.sessionAbstract: Building on the Salesforce platform means having access to our world-class security team. Join us to hear from our resident security experts and learn how you can leverage important tools and resources to build a secure app. Understand the purpose and payoff of having your app reviewed and learn how to streamline the process. #DF17Partners

sessions.sessionName: Tips for Interviewing and Hiring a Top Performing Sales Team
sessions.sessionAbstract: How do you effectively hire sales reps in a fast growing business and competitive market? What does an effective interview process look like, and how do you vet for skill set versus culture fit while keeping up with demanding growth plans? Join Aimee Frank, a Sales Manager at Salesforce as she'll walk through best practices on interviewing and hiring.

sessions.sessionName: To CPQ or Not To CPQ? How Well You Know Your Products Is the Question
sessions.sessionAbstract: In this session we'll discuss how to make the choice to use Salesforce CPQ or out-of-the-box quoting. We'll do this by looking at a case study of how one company chose Salesforce CPQ and how product knowledge and complexity weighed into the decision.

sessions.sessionName: To Digital and Beyond: Strategies for moving from eCommerce to Unified Commerce
sessions.sessionAbstract: You're building and enhancing your eCommerce presence, but what's next? How can you leverage your investment in Digital commerce to support use cases like buy online, pickup in store, ship-from-store, and more? This session covers tried-and-tested, successful approaches to moving from eCommerce to unified commerce. Retail leaders share methods for turning a single commerce channel into a holistic commerce approach, drawing on a single view of customers, catalogs, pricing, promotions and orders.

sessions.sessionName: Tooling API: Easily Access Metadata and Build Small Custom Tools
sessions.sessionAbstract: This session will help you in understanding how to access and leverage the Tooling API - the same Salesforce API the Developer Console uses. It will discuss when you should use it and what you can build using it. After this session you would be able to create your your app in your org and how the small effort can make a big impact on business.

sessions.sessionName: Tools, Techniques And Solutions To Avoid A Big-Data Blowout In Your Org
sessions.sessionAbstract: In this session you'll learn about managing large Salesforce database with 10s of millions of records and growing exponentially. This session will talk about the threshold of Salesforce big-data; how to recognize when you are approaching that limit, understanding query optimization, skinny tables, big objects and the different types of indexes that are available to help. During the session, we will run queries against a non-optimized data set, inspect the performance, optimize it using the discussed methods, and demonstrate the performance gains.

sessions.sessionName: Top 10 Flow/Process Builder Best Practices
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Do you hate Triggers and APEX? Me too! I am not a developer, yet I develop complex processes using two awesome declarative tools called Process Builder and Flow. I have eliminated a number of triggers and the need for other code by dragging and dropping my way to declarative freedom. Dev resources are hard to come by, but that doesn't stop my user base from asking for more and more complex automation in our org. With process builder and flow, I can make complex decision trees, cross object look-ups and updates. Button flows or those embedded in Lightning objects, give users' awesome shortcuts, savings dozens of clicks. They also allow for free text to explain the purpose of an object and make record creation and updates easy and understandable.

When a complex process does require code, I ask my developer to make sure the Class is Invokable (don't worry, they can figure out how to do this pretty quickly). And then I can set variables in the Class, just like I can for a Flow. The Class can then be called directly by Process Builder or from within a flow. So don't hate the code, learn to overcome it, create processes that you can maintain, activate and deactivate readily. Come to this session and learn some of the Best Practices from an early adopter of these two amazing Salesforce features!

sessions.sessionName: Top 10 Only in Lightning Experience Features
sessions.sessionAbstract: Whether you are an admin, developer or executive, the Lightning framework allows you to easily create customizations for your teams. In this session we'll show you 10 cool features only available in Lightning Experience.

sessions.sessionName: Top 10 Only in Lightning Experience Features
sessions.sessionAbstract: Whether you are an admin, developer or executive, the Lightning framework allows you to easily create customizations for your teams. In this session we'll show you 10 cool features only available in Lightning Experience.

sessions.sessionName: Top 10 Pro Tips for Addressing Common Gotchas in Lightning Experience
sessions.sessionAbstract: As a Salesforce Admin, you are critical to helping your users embrace Lightning Experience and the future of Salesforce. Check out the Top 10 Pro Tips for addressing common gotchas, so you can anticipate possible questions or concerns from your users. Getting ahead of these common questions early will give you more time to focus on the new productivity-enhancing features in Lightning, making your transition from Classic to Lightning Experience smooth and even exciting!

sessions.sessionName: Top 10 Pro Tips for Addressing Common Gotchas in Lightning Experience (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: As a Salesforce Admin, you are critical to helping your users embrace Lightning Experience and the future of Salesforce. Check out the Top 10 Pro Tips for addressing common gotchas, so you can anticipate possible questions or concerns from your users. Getting ahead of these common questions early will give you more time to focus on the new productivity-enhancing features in Lightning, making your transition from Classic to Lightning Experience smooth and even exciting!

sessions.sessionName: Top 3 New Salesforce Inbox Features
sessions.sessionAbstract: Is scheduling meetings with teammates even more challenging than scheduling meetings with customers? How about tracking link clicks in emails? Come learn about the top three new features making sales reps even smarter and more productive, right from their inbox.

sessions.sessionName: Top 3 Tips for Manufacturers to Supercharge Sales
sessions.sessionAbstract: How can manufacturers source more prospects, win more deals, and accurately forecast sales and demand? Join us as Trish Fontanilla, Head of Customer Experience at Freight Farms, an agricultural equipment manufacturer, shares her approach to prospect and customer engagement, and talks about the tools and techniques that enable her company to sustain a 300% annual growth for the 7th year in a row.

sessions.sessionName: Track and Move the Adoption Needle
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join us for an intimate and interactive discussion with other customers to learn how to empower managers and individual contributors for achieving a higher level of Salesforce adoption. We'll discuss strategies that help increase the value of Salesforce among users, thus positively impacting the acceptance and usage of Salesforce in your organization.

sessions.sessionName: Track Your Business Over Time with Reports and Einstein Analytics
sessions.sessionAbstract: Discover how your business evolves over time with Historical Tracking in Salesforce Reports. Make data-driven decisions by analyzing changes in opportunities, cases, forecasts, and custom objects over the last three months. Take a step further and unleash the power of Trend in Einstein Analytics. In just one-click, you can trend a Salesforce report to Einstein Analytics Dashboard and start exploring and sharing insights from your ever-changing business data.

sessions.sessionName: Trailhead @ Salesforce
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce drinks its own champagne! Not only does Trailhead power our administrator and developer communities, Salesforce uses Trailhead internally to enable our sales, engineering, and general employee organizations with content that is only accessible to Salesforce employees. Whether it's about how to sell, build, or work at Salesforce, Trailhead for employees enables us to scale our internal enablement organizations effectively. Learn about how we determine which content should be private vs public, how we organize teams to coordinate the creation of content, and how we publish badges for Salesforce employees from the people who manage their own trails. This session will provide a quick introduction to how we build content internally with a panel of enablement experts and then open the mic to your questions on how you can organize your own learning to be fun and engaging!

sessions.sessionName: Train End Users for Faster Adoption
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join us for an intimate and interactive discussion with other customers to learn about end-user training techniques to increase Salesforce adoption and empower users in your company. This session focuses on the framework used to design and deliver an effective end-user training program. We will discuss strategies on the 5 Ws, ways to develope a role-based curriculum, and explore ideas for delivering and measuring your training efforts. Education is an ongoing journey. Get started on the right track!

sessions.sessionName: Transform Customer Self-Service with Einstein Answers
sessions.sessionAbstract: Einstein Answers brings the power of machine learning to the most important core function of your self-service community — answering customer questions. Come see how artificial intelligence is changing the way that customers get access to service.

sessions.sessionName: Transform Event Data Into Actionable Information That Accelerates Conversions
sessions.sessionAbstract: As a B2B marketer, odds are good that you are challenged with generating increased demand with tight or limited budgets. The pressure is on to understand which marketing activities generate the most revenue, and events are a big part of that. Join Victor Kippes, CEO at Validar, who will describe exactly how to use event data pre, during and post-show, and what you should know about the revenue impact of your event content and strategies. He’ll cover lead and data capture best practices, as well as delve into pre-event preparatory steps to take with your sales cloud and marketing cloud to maximize success. This session will also provide real-world examples to demonstrate how to measure ROI and increase sales.

sessions.sessionName: Transform On-Site Service for SMB with Field Service Lightning
sessions.sessionAbstract: Do you have a mobile workforce or looking to scale your business through mobile workers? Do you schedule resources, whether it's your own employee or a contractor? How do you extend service out in the field? Join us and learn how Field Service Lightning is connecting every mobile employee, transforming on-site service.

sessions.sessionName: Transforming Customer Service with Intelligent Business Process
sessions.sessionAbstract:
Salesforce process automation empowers our customers to deliver the best customer engagement across every channel and experience.

In this session we will cover how Salesforce will deliver an Einstein-powered process engine automating how customers engage, service and delight every user. 

We will also showcase our ecosystem of partners who are creating, packaging and publishing industry-specific business processes and solutions, allowing customers to deliver success at scale.

sessions.sessionName: Transforming Quote-to-Cash Process: 1 Customer's Experience with Salesforce CPQ
sessions.sessionAbstract: Transforming how you do business is no small task. Moving away from transaction-based selling to contract-based selling requires a lot of internal changes to processes and systems. In this session, one customer will share how they made the transition with Salesforce CPQ. They will show you how they changed the way they price and bundle their products, how they manage their renewal opportunities and contracts, and how they were able to push CPQ functionality out to their partner community.

sessions.sessionName: Transforming Revenue Ops: Make Salesforce Your Revenue Engagement Platform
sessions.sessionAbstract: In today’s customer-centric world, expectations are high and it is not acceptable to have siloed front and back office teams and processes. Your system of engagement must support all engagement processes all the way through invoicing and collections. Join this session to learn how one of our customers used Salesforce CPQ and Billing to transform their revenue operations and make Salesforce their platform of revenue engagement.

sessions.sessionName: Transforming Your Business with the Salesforce Platform
sessions.sessionAbstract: Is your company juggling many disparate, expensive systems and still struggling to gain accurate insight into how it's doing? Come hear from Renee McKaskle, CIO at Hitachi Data Systems, who led a transformation of their business by connecting the front and back of the house with the Salesforce Platform. As they moved from a Capex to Opex model, Salesforce provided them a flexible, streamlined, and mobile solution with workflow & predictable forecasting. They did it and so can you!

sessions.sessionName: Transition Faster and Further to Lightning Experience with Optimizer
sessions.sessionAbstract: Learn how Salesforce Optimizer can reduce the heavy lifting to transition to Lightning Experience while increasing end users adoption. Double win!

sessions.sessionName: Transition Faster and Further to Lightning Experience with Optimizer
sessions.sessionAbstract: Learn how Salesforce Optimizer can reduce the heavy lifting to transition to Lightning Experience while increasing end users adoption. Double win!

sessions.sessionName: Travel & Hospitality Keynote: Reimagining the Traveler’s Journey with Salesforce
sessions.sessionAbstract: In the hyper-competitive Travel and Hospitality (T&H) industry, Traveler's expect personalized experiences and digital journeys that include smart recommendations, easy bookings and instant customer service. In this keynote, see first-hand how leading T&H companies are harnessing data to create personalized experiences from inspiration to trip guidance--tailoring customer interactions before, during and after trips. You will leave this session knowing how Salesforce can be used to reach new customers, shorten sale cycles, deliver omni-channel service and make your teams more productive. You’ll see actionable examples for how to generate customer loyalty and even infuse artificial intelligence into your applications for insight-rich customer engagement. Every traveler is looking for their “dream trip,” and with Salesforce make every step of the traveler's journey effortless, bringing on those five-star reviews.

sessions.sessionName: Travel Experience, 2025
sessions.sessionAbstract: If you were starting a new travel company from the ground up, without the burden of tradition, legacy tech, or industry orthodoxies, what kind of business would you build? This question is at the heart of a recent study sponsored by Salesforce — a collaboration between our Travel and Transportation industry team and Ignite, our internal innovation team. We've interviewed travel gurus, technologists and CEOs. We've conducted primary research with business and leisure travelers to understand the travel experience through their eyes. The result: visions for three possibles future that will challenge and inspire anyone trying to drive innovation around the travel experience.

sessions.sessionName: Travel: How Well Do You Know Me? Use Salesforce to Personalize Travel Experience
sessions.sessionAbstract: Travelers’ expectations have changed. They want cross-channel experiences and want to stay connected in their preferred way. What does this mean for hotels, airlines, and airports? We’ll show you how Salesforce can help you connect with customers in a meaningful way and create a personalized travel experience.

sessions.sessionName: Turning Customers Into Fans: Inside the LIDS Command Center
sessions.sessionAbstract: LIDS knows that their relationship with customers doesn't begin and end in their stores. As a brand that prides itself on creating fans of their own, they work hard at making connections with customers online and off. One of the ways they do this is through their digital and social marketing strategy. LIDS is brings all of these efforts together with their command center: the LIDS Press Box. LIDS Press Box is a digital command center in the company's Indianapolis headquarters that provides insight on customers, stores, products and the brand. Powered by Salesforce Marketing Cloud, the LIDS Press Box visualizes all of the digital touchpoints LIDS has with their customers for all LIDS employees to see. Whether it's comments on social media or the performance of a new campaign, everyone on the LIDS team can quickly get up to speed on what's going on and take action.

sessions.sessionName: Turning It On: How to Say Good-Bye to Classic for Days
sessions.sessionAbstract: After years working on your amazing instance, moving to lightning may seem like a tall order. In this talk we'll talk about all the user adoption, customization and mental hurdle that may cause an admin from turning on Lightning and how to get over them. We'll have real live scenarios of why of how to get your org Lightning ready and how to transfer your users over with little to no effort. We'll also discuss the how to transfer your customizations over from classic to lightning. After this talk your be on lightning...lightning fast. Speakers:

sessions.sessionName: Under the Hood with Cisco Spark's REST API and Mobile/Web SDK
sessions.sessionAbstract: See coding demonstrations building Spark chatbots, embed video into mobile/web apps with Spark Video SDKs, connect DevOps/CI-CD/LoB into collaboration spaces using Spark's REST API. Whether your implementing pre-built integrations from Cisco Spark Depot, prototyping Built.io/Zapier, or using Spark's SDKs for JavaScript, Swift, Python, bring coding questions to this session!

sessions.sessionName: Understanding and Exploiting Data in Marketing Cloud
sessions.sessionAbstract: In this session, we will explore data in Salesforce Marketing Cloud (MC). The session will be detailed in three parts - Defining Data, which will discuss what types of data is required for effective marketing, Putting Data to Work, which will discuss how to use the data for targeting and personalization of marketing content, and Navigating the Data, which will discuss how to bring data into and out of MC. We will wrap up the session with a demo consisting of MC UI and API to illustrate the the above content with personalized email marketing for targeted audiences.

sessions.sessionName: Unified Commerce Case Study (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Learn how a leading retailer has built a successful unified commerce system, facilitating sales, delivery, and returns across all physical and digital channels. Get a demonstration of how unified eCommerce, store, and order management systems work behind the scenes to deliver a complete view of customers, orders, catalogs, and more.

sessions.sessionName: Unified Commerce Case Study (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Learn how a leading retailer has built a successful unified commerce system, facilitating sales, delivery, and returns across all physical and digital channels. Get a demonstration of how unified eCommerce, store, and order management systems work behind the scenes to deliver a complete view of customers, orders, catalogs, and more.

sessions.sessionName: Unifying Your Brand with B2B Marketing Automation From Salesforce (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: ServiceMaster of Canada needed a way to align multiple marketing and sales teams and combine several complex marketing systems into one streamlined set of processes that could be implemented anywhere to make it easier for new franchises to get started. Learn how they were able to connect all of their locations and centralize and unify their marketing efforts using Pardot and Salesforce Engage.

sessions.sessionName: Unifying Your Brand with B2B Marketing Automation From Salesforce (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: ServiceMaster of Canada needed a way to align multiple marketing and sales teams and combine several complex marketing systems into one streamlined set of processes that could be implemented anywhere to make it easier for new franchises to get started. Learn how they were able to connect all of their locations and centralize and unify their marketing efforts using Pardot and Salesforce Engage.

sessions.sessionName: Unit Testing for Lightning Components
sessions.sessionAbstract: Want to learn how to write unit tests for individual Lightning components! Then come this session where we will demonstrate how to use Snapshot Testing (a common testing technique in React development) to create atomic tests for each Lightning component. Discover Jest the modern JavaScript library and use it to create tests that are quick-running and provide confidence in the quality of the overall application.

sessions.sessionName: Unleash Citizen Development - Tips from Zillow
sessions.sessionAbstract: Learn how Zillow brought together development teams and citizen developers with Salesforce Environments and Sandboxes. Zillow will share best practices and tips for unleashing citizen development. We will focus on how to enable anyone in your organization to build apps and then submit them for review in a dedicated Sandbox environment.We will also share information on how proper governance and integration with Salesforce DX can help your development teams embrace citizen development -- and make sure all your teams can move fast without breaking things.

sessions.sessionName: Unleash the Power of Customization with Lightning Base Components
sessions.sessionAbstract: Base Lightning components unleash the power of customization for developers - allowing them to build custom Lightning components without having to worry about HTML markup or CSS. In this session, we'll take a look at all of the new base components in Winter '18 and use them to build a component in a matter of minutes!

sessions.sessionName: Unleash Your Salesforce Data – 4 Compelling Solutions to Data-Driven Happiness
sessions.sessionAbstract: Data is the new currency and to assure digital transformation success it’s critical that your data is integrated, cleansed, mastered and automated. Attend this session and see a demo of 4 easy to implement solutions to unleash your Salesforce data on your journey to becoming a true data-driven enterprise.

sessions.sessionName: Unlock Productivity: 7 Effective Solutions to Remove Admin Tasks from Sales Reps
sessions.sessionAbstract: Ask any sales leader the number one asset they wish they had more of and it will always be TIME. This especially makes sense when we observe Salesforce's annual State of Sales which reveals that 25% of a sales rep's time is spent completing administrative work rather than selling. The good news? Best in class customers are taking back valuable selling time by leveraging Salesforce options and automations to eliminate administrative work. Join us as well go through 7 easy and effective solutions leveraged by successful Salesforce customers to reach new levels of sales excellence.

sessions.sessionName: Unlocking Pardot: Keys to Driving Sales Success
sessions.sessionAbstract: Pardot isn't just for your marketing team; Pardot is a vast toolbox that your sales teams can utilize, empowering them to engage with their prospects more personally and proactively. Learn how you can leverage Pardot to help your sales teams make smarter decisions and always be one step ahead of the competition.

sessions.sessionName: UPS Mobilizes its Sales Force with Lightning and Salesforce1
sessions.sessionAbstract: It's tough aligning your sales force onto a single process, especially if it's 11,000 people strong across 80+ countries. UPS did it with Sales Cloud and the power of the Salesforce Platform. Hear how their sales teams can access data on-the-go with the SF1 mobile app and collaborate in real time across regions and business units. Come gain insight into how the world's largest package delivery company got their sales teams onto a single platform, drove high adoption, and integrated with dozens of systems.

sessions.sessionName: Use Bindings to Create More Interactive Dashboards
sessions.sessionAbstract: Learn about using bindings 2.0 within EA to create interactive dashboard components. Present a dashboard building journey using most commonly applied binding scenarios.

sessions.sessionName: User Centric Design with Lightning
sessions.sessionAbstract: Lightning Experience has always been about a next level UI / UX that helps you work faster and smarter in every moment. Hear from the Lightning Experience team about our latest Lightning UI enhancements, including trailhead theming as well as improving legibility, hierarchy, and component separation. Soon - you will be able to completely make Lightning Experience your own branded experience!

sessions.sessionName: User Centric Design with Lightning
sessions.sessionAbstract: Lightning Experience has always been about a next level UI / UX that helps you work faster and smarter in every moment. Hear from the Lightning Experience team about our latest Lightning UI enhancements, including trailhead theming as well as improving legibility, hierarchy, and component separation. Soon - you will be able to completely make Lightning Experience your own branded experience!

sessions.sessionName: User Management Magic with Identity and Permission Sets
sessions.sessionAbstract: You are an administrator that support users with access to multiple applications, multiple services, and/or multiple Salesforce organizations. Lightning and new features adoption have exploded the number of profiles, permission sets, and hours you spent to manage your user and org's security settings! Join us to see how to simplify your life with best practices in identity and permission management.

sessions.sessionName: User-Centered Approach for Making the Move to Lightning
sessions.sessionAbstract: Case study on our experience of helping a nonprofit move to Lightning. We'll share our process, tips & tricks.

sessions.sessionName: User-Centered Approach for Making the Move to Lightning
sessions.sessionAbstract: Case study on our experience of helping a nonprofit move to Lightning. We'll share our process, tips & tricks.

sessions.sessionName: Using Apache PredictionIO for Predicting University Student Dropout Rates
sessions.sessionAbstract: Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning have become trendy in software development. And technologies like Apache PredictionIO make them accessible for every developer, not only for data scientists. Join us in this session to learn how we created a predictive engine with the University of Palermo, Argentina to solve one of it's biggest concerns - student dropout rates in specific courses. After this session you will walk away with an understanding of machine learning concepts, common libraries like Apache Spark's MLlib, and Scikit-Learn, and how to apply that to your scenarios.

sessions.sessionName: Using Chatter to Increase User Adoption
sessions.sessionAbstract: User adoption can make or break an implementation, but luckily Salesforce gives you powerful tools to monitor and increase user adoption. Learn how to use Chatter to encourage your users to engage with the platform. Hint: it’s all about rewards and recognition. With Chatter, you can put together an effective user adoption strategy that will make your implementation shine.

sessions.sessionName: Using Communities to Improve Interaction for Nonprofit, Higher Ed and K-12
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce.org nonprofit and higher ed customers - Learn new ways to engage constituents and increase impact with Communities. Collaboration among staff, supporters, partners, volunteers, and other constituents is key to building alignment and accelerating your mission.

sessions.sessionName: Using Einstein APIs for Intent and Sentiment with Python
sessions.sessionAbstract: In this talk I'll go over basics of Einstein Intent and Sentiment APIs and then show how to use these APIs using Python. I'll use preexisting intent and sentiment models to predict label of a document. I'll also show how to create custom models using user datasets.

sessions.sessionName: Using Facebook's New Audience Insights to Inform Strategy, Product & More
sessions.sessionAbstract:
If you're a social savvy marketer and are looking for something new in terms of how social can inform your business, buckle up because this session is for you.

Join product leaders from Salesforce's Social Studio and Facebook for a lively discussion on how Facebook's new Audience Insights API is used to:
-Provide behavioral and interest-based data about 2 billion real people
-Power rich consumer insights that inform advertising and social content strategy (e.g. creative, targeting, measurement, and budgeting)
-Enable exploration, testing, and prove key assumptions about audiences that inform strategic brand decisions

sessions.sessionName: Using Heroku and Apache Camel to create open source Integrations with Salesforce
sessions.sessionAbstract: You’re working with multiple software products and you want to integrate all of them with Salesforce. You have a feeling you need an integration framework but don’t know what to start with. In this session, we will show you how to use Apache Camel and Heroku platform to create integration with Salesforce quickly and efficiently. And yes, source code will be provided as well.

sessions.sessionName: Using IoT to visualise the health of your orgs
sessions.sessionAbstract: Keeping track of the tests in your sandboxes can be tricky, even for a seasoned developer. With new features to build and customers to delight, its all too easy to miss a single failure until it’s too late. But what if you could see the health of your orgs at glance and know where to work your magic? See how to use IoT to create your own wall of success and display the health of your orgs for all the team to admire!

sessions.sessionName: Using React Native to Build Awesome Salesforce Commerce and Community Cloud Apps
sessions.sessionAbstract: React Native allows users to build native Apps using web technologies like JavaScript and CSS. In this session we will show you how to use React Native to build Salesforce Commerce and Community cloud apps. We will build a mobile shopping app with e-commerce and customer support functionality handled by Salesforce on the backend.

sessions.sessionName: Using Salesforce to Document Your Changes to Salesforce
sessions.sessionAbstract: Have you ever looked at a workflow and forgot why in the world you created it? Have you ever left a company and scrambled through your last week trying to write down everything you had been doing over the last 5 years? Has your company ever been through an audit where you had to explain what customizations you have made? In this session, we will show you how you can use Cases along with a simple System Changes object to document your org like a pro and have peace of mind that will survive an audit, and the admin who takes over will inherit a well-documented org.

sessions.sessionName: Using Social to Create the Brick & Mortar Retail Experience Online
sessions.sessionAbstract: As consumers, one of the biggest complaints we have about online shopping is that we miss out on that personal 1-1 connection you get in a physical store. Because we can't simply see how something looks and feels in real life, reviews, communities, and real-time social interactions have become more important than ever. In this session you'll hear from leading retail brands on how they've used Social Studio to propel the growth of their brand, both online and offline, and come away with actionable ideas and best practices.

sessions.sessionName: Visions of Our New Reality: What AR, VR, and MR Mean for Business
sessions.sessionAbstract: Augmented Reality, Virtual reality, Mixed Reality – some of the most debated, intriguing, and burgeoning technologies around today. Join us for a 40 minute session to explore the power of AR/VR/MR, emerging use cases and intersections with the Salesforce platform, and potential scenarios for how these technologies will shift the future of customer engagement, human collaboration, and business models.

sessions.sessionName: Visualforce in Lightning Experience
sessions.sessionAbstract: So you want to move to Lightning, but you don't know what to do about your customized workflows and content like Visualforce pages, custom action buttons, and modified page layouts. Don’t let that hold you back. In this session, you'll learn best practices and tips for getting your pages to “just work” in Lightning Experience.

sessions.sessionName: Voice Applications - Next Generation Intelligent Interfaces
sessions.sessionAbstract: Have you ever wanted to build a Star Trek communicator, Knight Rider’s KITT, or Star Wars’ C-3PO? Now, with the introduction of Siri, Amazon Echo, or Google Home, voice interfaces are part of our everyday lives. Come and learn what open source tools we at Salesforce have built to achieve that. Walk away from the session with an understanding of the tools and how to create your own intuitive voice experience with the power of Salesforce.

sessions.sessionName: Wake up Sleepy Subscribers
sessions.sessionAbstract: Come join this discussion around subscriber engagement and learn clever ways to re- engage subscribers that have not been active in a while. We will focus on best practices around when to send re-engagement messages, how to optimize the message, and what to do with subscribers that do not re- engage.

sessions.sessionName: Weathering the Storm of Change Management
sessions.sessionAbstract: Discover how to best manage ongoing Salesforce changes to keep current with ever-changing business needs. We will share strategies on who to include when planning for change, how to entice users to provide feedback, and what you should consider when developing a change process to drive your Salesforce ROI.

sessions.sessionName: Weathering the Storm of Change Management for Nonprofit, Higher Ed and K-12 (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce.org nonprofit and higher ed customers - Determine how to effectively manage change and governance within your organization. Process, Roles, Governance and What's in it for Me! Join us for a discussion to collaboratively determine the characteristics of how to effectively manage change.

sessions.sessionName: Weathering the Storm of Change Management for Nonprofit, Higher Ed and K-12 (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Salesforce.org nonprofit and higher ed customers - Determine how to effectively manage change and governance within your organization. Process, Roles, Governance and What's in it for Me! Join us for a discussion to collaboratively determine the characteristics of how to effectively manage change.

sessions.sessionName: Webster Bank: Stories From the Road to Lightning
sessions.sessionAbstract: Webster Bank embarked on their journey to move to full time Lightning usage in 2017. Through careful planning and thorough testing, they have made the jump and want to show others how to be successful. Come learn what "bumps" they encountered as well as other "unknowns" that surfaced during the journey.

sessions.sessionName: What Do You Want To Be Known For?
sessions.sessionAbstract: For today's female executives and entrepreneurs, what you're known for is just as important as what your company is known for. Are you articulate and compelling with both? TED 2016 speaker and The Amplify Lab CEO Joanna Bloor is a people accelerator, scalability junkie and belief agent for brave and curious women. Join her as she talks about the idea of what you want to be known for, and the steps you need to take to build a compelling answer.

sessions.sessionName: What is a DMP? The Value in Data Management and More...
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join the Salesforce DMP team to learn what a DMP is, plus the five key sources of value in data management: audience planning, activation, optimization, personalization, and insights. In this fast-moving whiteboard session, attendees will also see first hand how some of the world's largest marketers, like Pandora, Heineken, and L'Oreal are using Salesforce DMP to drive customer success through leveraging their data.

sessions.sessionName: What It's Like to be Struck by Lightning (Migration Success Guide)
sessions.sessionAbstract:
So, you have a large SF org and want to move from Classic to Lighting but just don’t know where to start? How do you make the move successfully while delighting your users and making them want to step out of their comfort zone and use Lightning? If we can do it, you can do it, too! 
 
In this session, we’ll share the step by step guide for how we very successfully moved our Sales Cloud users from Classic to the Lightning Experience. We’ll demonstrate key change considerations, detail our rollout strategy and communication plan, provide tips for a seamless transfer and share our own lessons learned. After this session you’ll be able to put together a plan of action and be equipped to survive being struck by Lightning yourself.

sessions.sessionName: What's New in Sales Cloud (2)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Winter '18—it's the newest, shiniest, latest release, and it's live in your Salesforce instances right now. But what exactly is it? And what should you focus on? Join us to learn what's new and exciting for Sales Cloud in the Summer and Winter releases, plus get a sneak peek as to what's coming up in our roadmap!

sessions.sessionName: What's New in Sales Cloud Einstein, Winter '18 (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Sales Cloud Einstein continues to get smarter in Winter '18! Join this session to learn about new features and how existing features are even more powerful with new functionality.

sessions.sessionName: What's New With CPQ and Billing: 2017 and Beyond (1)
sessions.sessionAbstract: Want a sneak peek into the Salesforce CPQ and Billing Roadmap? Join us to hear about our future product plans directly from our product management leaders with an opportunity for Q&A.

sessions.sessionName: What’s Next: A Preview of Innovations from Salesforce Healthcare Partners
sessions.sessionAbstract: Health Cloud is quickly becoming the connective tissue for healthcare innovations among our growing ecosystem of application partners. Join healthcare trailblazer partners as they showcase solutions to engage individuals in their own health and wellness through population health management, Internet of Things (IoT), and healthcare education. These Trailblazers are enabling a whole new way to simplify, connect, and transform the healthcare experience.

sessions.sessionName: When Customers Meet Marketing: A Love Story
sessions.sessionAbstract: Marketers are faced with more demands and distractions than ever. Often they grow apart from the individual they most want to talk to. What if… instead of marketing to customers, you take the dating approach (not literally!). Have you ever been told ‘don’t fix it, just listen’? Instead of talking at customers, stop and listen to them. This approach is extremely effective when developing a powerful marketing strategy. This session will illustrate how a bit of understanding can reignite the spark with current customers and entice future ones.

sessions.sessionName: Where's the Undo Button?! Deployment Best Practices
sessions.sessionAbstract: I've done it. You've done it. No matter how powerful the testing methodology is, we're all bound to experience a moment of “it broke production — oh snap!” at some point in our Salesforce careers. The worst part of an “oh snap” moment is putting up with the break while you revert the change in a Sandbox and re-deploy. We'll share three techniques that ensure fool-proof deployments. After attending this session, we're confident you'll never have to put up with an “oh snap” moment in production again.

sessions.sessionName: Where, Why & How You Can Use SOQL
sessions.sessionAbstract: SOQL is a powerful query tool built into Salesforce that, as an Admin, you can leverage to quickly find the answers hidden in your data. Efficiency is vital to keeping your sanity and enabling your company to prosper. SOQL can help, and it isn’t just for developers! By the end of this session you will be able to create a SOQL query, know where to go to use SOQL and why having this tool will help you become even more awesome at being a Salesforce Admin.

sessions.sessionName: Which database is best ? -Depends who is asking
sessions.sessionAbstract: There are a lot of databases for teams to pick today - Relational, NoSQL, ElasticSearch, Graph, the list keeps going. Every engaging application depends on timely access to contextual data. Explore how Heroku platform enables choice and abstracts the complexity of database management for developers, so they can focus on building apps, fast.

sessions.sessionName: Who Wins When Sales & Service Teams Are on the Same Platform
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join us to learn Salesforce best practices to bringing Sales and Service together. Hear from current customers who have united their Sales and Service teams to deliver better ROI and benefit their bottom line.

sessions.sessionName: Why Sales Needs AI
sessions.sessionAbstract: Learn how Sales armed with Artificial Intelligence is more powerful than either one of them alone. With research from our annual State of Sales, you will learn why today and tomorrow's customers expect AI's capabilities when it comes to engaging with Sales. For high-performing sales teams, we will discuss the trends in use cases as well as actual and forecasted adoption. This is a great intro session into how Sales and AI work better together.

sessions.sessionName: Why Use Lightning Process Builder; How to Design workflows with LPB
sessions.sessionAbstract: Have you heard of Lightning Process Builder? Maybe you have experimented with it, but haven’t fully adopted it for your organization. Did you know that you can take complex and difficult Business Processes and build simple automations that can make your company more efficient?In this session I’ll cover some of the tips and tricks that will help you design and build effective workflows. I will also share the best practices you will need to deploy LPB between multiple platforms and replace your traditional workflow rules quickly, and efficiently. If you are still skeptical about what LPB can do, come to my session where I will show you how I took a complex business process and broke it down into multiple easy to understand Lightning Processes without using any Code.

sessions.sessionName: Women in Tech: A Journey from Admin to Architect
sessions.sessionAbstract: Working against gender norms? You’re not alone. We are all on a journey to increasing equality. Based on the latest industry stats, there is a unique opportunity for women in technology to grow their capabilities and responsibilities in the technology space. In this session, hear from a woman in tech on her journey from admin/developer to architect through defined strategies for career growth.

sessions.sessionName: Women In Tech: Transforming Tech Teams in the Age of the "Always-On" Customer
sessions.sessionAbstract: Women in Technology: Executive leaders share their stories and best practices of how they are transforming the role of technology inside their organizations with innovation and going beyond "IT" to deliver apps fast to meet the demands of the "always on" mobile customer.

sessions.sessionName: Work Smarter with Lightning Reports & Quip
sessions.sessionAbstract: Get excited. The new Lightning report builder is here and it makes building reports in Salesforce a breeze. What's more, now your Lightning reports will be natively integrated with Quip. Learn how you can take your reporting to the next level with Lightning.

sessions.sessionName: Work Smarter with Lightning Reports & Quip
sessions.sessionAbstract: Get excited. The new Lightning report builder is here and it makes building reports in Salesforce a breeze. What's more, now your Lightning reports will be natively integrated with Quip. Learn how you can take your reporting to the next level with Lightning.

sessions.sessionName: WORKdifferently: How to Scale New Ways of Working in Your Organization
sessions.sessionAbstract: The disruption impacting every industry is clear, but developing new ways of working to navigate change and create new value in your organization isn't. Even with the best intentions, over two-thirds of traditional change efforts fail. Hear what does work from experiences with Fortune 500 firms and start-ups. In this session, learn the defining characteristics of new work practices and a clear, actionable strategy to cultivate them in your organization. #WORKdifferently

sessions.sessionName: WORKdifferently: Translating User Insights into Opportunities
sessions.sessionAbstract:
"90% of executives agreed that customer experience and engagement are objectives of their corporation’s digital strategy. But how well do you know your customer? Developing solutions for changing customer needs requires new ways of working. Get hands-on experience identifying real user insights by building empathy maps and using a simple framework to translate insights into opportunity areas.

In this session you’ll experience real user research, learn a structure to translate insights into opportunities and work collaboratively with peers."

sessions.sessionName: WORKdifferently: Trend Hacking, Imagining the Future and Making it Real
sessions.sessionAbstract: Extraordinary opportunities exist to business leaders who see and respond to emerging trends. Unfortunately, many struggle to interpret and act. Join this session to practice using disruptive trends to explore and imagine the future. You will be guided through a series of activities to explore trends, develop foresight, and create practical steps to move ideas forward.

sessions.sessionName: WORKdifferently: Visual Thinking for Effective Collaboration
sessions.sessionAbstract: Visuals convey ideas more efficiently and memorably than words. Learn the basics of graphic facilitation—the process of visually representing information communicated verbally. Practice and discuss how to apply day-to-day to synthesize, record, draw, diagram and develop collective understanding across a group.

sessions.sessionName: You Can't Ignore Me Anymore! 3 Features That Matter to Admins in Lightning
sessions.sessionAbstract: What do Compact Layouts, Actions, and Apps have in common? Admins could largely get away without touching them in Classic. But now in the awesome new world of Lightning, these features are suddenly *really* important! Find out why, and learn how you can use all three to make your org amazing in Lightning.

sessions.sessionName: Your Apex Code and the Salesforce Security Model
sessions.sessionAbstract: Developers are often surprised to find that their Apex code doesn't behave the way they expect, especially when it comes to the Salesforce security model. Come join us in this session to discuss the the Salesforce security model, explore how Apex behaves "out of the box" and how you can change the default behavior, using Apex, to create a better experience for your end users.

sessions.sessionName: Your Partner Community: Strategies for Success
sessions.sessionAbstract: Learn how to mobilize your channel, and go from pipe to close faster. Join our Community Cloud success specialist for a personal walk-through of best practices for your Partner Community.

sessions.sessionName: Zillow's Citizen Developers and the New Age of IT Productivity
sessions.sessionAbstract: Increasing demands on IT require new approaches to productivity, and the hottest among them is the Citizen Developer. Learn how Zillow empowers business users to become Citizen Developers with the Salesforce Low-Code Platform so together they can meet demands. You'll learn how they structured an internal mentoring program using Trailhead and took advantage of Salesforce Sandboxes and ALM to maintain strict controls and governance.

sessions.sessionName: Financial Services Keynote: Build Loyalty with Relationship Intelligence
sessions.sessionAbstract: Industry and market boundaries continue to disintegrate. There is no clear path or destination, but one trend is consistent - convenience has become the new loyalty. Pioneering firms are using a new technology, artificial intelligence (AI), to create differentiated, convenient experiences. In this keynote, join industry trailblazers Naureen Hassan, Chief Digital Officer at Morgan Stanley, Yolande Piazza, CEO of Citi Fintech, and Premal Shah, President and Co-founder of Kiva.org to learn how they are leveraging relationship intelligence and marketing automation to power meaningful, convenient interactions that help them serve as a trusted partner on their client's financial life journey. Plus watch live demonstrations of the expanding capabilities of Salesforce Financial Services Cloud, the world’s #1 CRM, reimagined for financial services.

sessions.sessionName: Healthcare & Life Science Keynote: Prescription for a Connected Patient Platform
sessions.sessionAbstract: In a world of increasingly complex care including connected devices, value-based reimbursement, and integrated systems, today's healthcare and life sciences organizations are managing and analyzing an unprecedented amount of data and tasks. To gain a complete view of their patients or members and turn insights into actions, organizations must rethink how to use technology to scale teams, expand services, and serve more populations. Join industry trailblazers including UnitedHealth Group, Mount Sinai Health System, and other special guests to learn how they are leveraging the Salesforce platform to drive employee efficiencies, manage patient and member journeys, and collaborate across the entire healthcare ecosystem. In this keynote, you'll see examples of how Salesforce uniquely serves as the prescription for a connected patient platform built for flexibility, security, and innovation.

sessions.sessionName: Salesforce for Admins Keynote
sessions.sessionAbstract: Join Parker Harris, co-founder of Salesforce, Shawna Wolverton, SVP Product Management, Admin Evangelists, and special guests for an action-packed learning adventure. We'll help you put the best of Dreamforce 2017 to work immediately with demos you can do right away, practical tips from peers, the knowledge you need to catapult your career, and inspiration to lead your company into the future.

sessions.sessionName: Salesforce for Developers Keynote
sessions.sessionAbstract: Apps are increasingly critical in our lives and our work, and it has never been a better time to be a developer. At the same time, app user experiences are often fragmented and fail to meet expectations. Join Srini Tallapragada, President, Technology at Salesforce, in this year's Developer Keynote and be the first to see the future of Salesforce development and learn how to build smart apps with Einstein and deliver them faster than ever with exciting new Lightning and Salesforce DX features.
